anya-e0812n0:18: Te me jayanti guravo guravo guṇehi.
anya-e0812n0:23: Saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ vāṇī, mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:24_4: kimettha lakkhaṇakaraṇena adiṭṭhalakkhaṇāpi dissanti bandhantāti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi
anya-e0812n0:24_5: te ghuṇakkharappakāsā tabbidūnaṃ payogānusārino vā siyuṃ, pubbe katasatthaparicayā
anya-e0812n0:24_6: vā siyunti viññeyyaṃ. Vāṇī mayhaṃ manaṃ pīṇayatanti sambandho. Vāṇīti vā sarassatyaparanāmadheyyā
anya-e0812n0:24_7: kāci devatā, sā sabbāvadātā yathicchitatthasādhanapuṇḍarīkagabbhe nisīdatīti lokavādo.
anya-e0812n0:24_9: tatoyevāyaṃ devatā ruppate. Tattha sarassatiyā yathā’sattā jātāya manosampīṇananti
anya-e0812n0:24_10: loko, saddhammadevatāya tu manopīṇanaṃ, tassā sabbavajjarahitāyaccantanimmalāya nirantaratthanekatāṇappavattiyā
anya-e0812n0:24_11: manaso sampīṇanaṃ. Tena ca passaddhi, tāya pana sukhaṃ, tenāpi samādhi, samādhisambhavena
anya-e0812n0:25_0: Kiṃvisiṭṭhoccāha “muninde”ccādi. Ubho loke munāti jānātīti muni, indati paramissariyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:25_1: pavatteti sabbatthāti indo, muni ca so indo ca, munīnaṃ indoti vā munindo, sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0812n0:25_2: Tatoyaṃ tassa nimittakasaññā. Vijjamānesupi pariyāyasaddesvaññesu kavikāmitassatthassekantavācakatteno’
anya-e0812n0:25_3: cityasamposakoyaṃ munindasaddo, tathā hi yo ubhayalokajānanena munīnaṃ paramissariyapuggalānampi
anya-e0812n0:25_4: paramissariyaṃ vatteti, so paraṃ pīṇeti hetubhāvena’tre’tyu’citameva, tathā padantarānampi
anya-e0812n0:25_5: ocityaṃ poseti. Tathā hi tādisassa vadanāravindodare sambhavā sundarī, tatoyeva paṭisaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:25_6: tasmā ca mano pīṇetīti. Tassa vadanaṃ, tamiva munindavadanaṃ, ambhojaṃ. Tameva vā
anya-e0812n0:25_7: lakkhisaṃyogitādisadhammena’mbhojaṃ, padumaṃ. Tassa gabbho. Tattha sambhavena pavattiyā,
anya-e0812n0:25_8: uppattiyā vā sundarī niravajjā devatā. Vācā pana dosalesenāpa’samphuṭṭhāva niravajjā,
anya-e0812n0:25_9: tathā ca vakkhati “guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttā” subodhālaṅkāra 14 gāthā iccādi. Tatovāyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:25_10: saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ sattānaṃ paṭibhānādiguṇavisesāvahattamattena paṭisaraṇabhūtā devatā.
anya-e0812n0:25_12: Sabhāvanapuṃsakattā cettha na liṅgaparivattanaṃ. Mayhanti ekavacanenattano nirabhimānata’māneti
anya-e0812n0:25_14: cāyaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā sabbattha siriṃ poseti. Tathā ca vakkhati “vaṅkavuttīsu poseti,
anya-e0812n0:25_15: sileso tu siriṃ para”nti subodhālaṅkāra 172 gāthā. Ayamettha saṅkhepena nayena atthavaṇṇanā.
anya-e0812n0:25_16: Vitthāranayena pana nānappakārenattho saṃvaṇṇetuṃ sakkā. Tathā sati ganthagāravopi
anya-e0812n0:26_2: pariyattimūlakattā yena kenaci pariyāyena tassā pariyattiyā atthāvabodhena “appeva
anya-e0812n0:26_3: nāma sādhujanaṃ paritoseyya”miti tadadhigamopāyabhūtamidaṃ pakaraṇamārabhanto ganthārambhe
anya-e0812n0:26_5: visesato abhimataganthassānantarāyena parisamattiyā ca kāraṇamiti iṭṭhadevatānussaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:26_7: ca dassento “munindavadanambhoja…pe… parissamo”ti gāthattayamāha. Ettha paṭhamagāthāya
anya-e0812n0:26_9: nisedhitā, tatiyagāthāya abhidhānādikaṃ dassitaṃ. Tathā hi lokuttaradhammanissitapariyattisaṅkhātasabbaññubhāratiyā
anya-e0812n0:26_10: manosampīṇanāsīsanāpadesena attano nissesadhammaratane pasādo pakāsito. So pana dhammappasādo
anya-e0812n0:26_11: tadavinābhāvato buddhasaṅghesupi siddhoti ratanattayavisayaṃ paṇāmaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā
anya-e0812n0:26_12: dasseti. So hi atthato paṇāmakriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā. Ettha phalaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0812n0:27_0: Puna santesu rāmasammādyalaṅkāresu piṭṭhapisanaṃ viya hotīdaṃ alaṅkārakaraṇanti vadantā
anya-e0812n0:27_1: viruddhavādino rāmasammādīnamatthibhāvaṃ ubbhāvetvā abhyupagametvā (ka.) te suddhamāgadhikā
anya-e0812n0:27_2: na vaḷañjentīti iminā paṭisiddhā. Nirākaraṇaphalañhi ganthassa niddosabhāvova. Apica
anya-e0812n0:28: Satthappayojanānaṃ sādhyasādhanalakkhaṇo sambandho pana sambandhassa nissayabhūtasatthappayojanānaṃ dassaneneva tannissitattā sayampi vutto hoti. Vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0812n0:31_0: Tassattho– sambandhanissayā sambandhassa ādhārabhūtā satthaṃ, payojanañca ubho vuttā,
anya-e0812n0:31_1: taṃvuttiyāyeva tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ kathaneneva tannissito te nissāya pavatto sopi sambandho vutto bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n0:32_0: Ettha abhidhānakathanaṃ vohārasukhatthaṃ, abhidheyyādikathanaṃ pana tehi yuttānaṃyeva
anya-e0812n0:35_3: padaccayo, siyā vākyaṃ sakārako”ti abhidhānappadīpikā 106 gāthā vuttalakkhaṇamajjhapatitavākyasamudāyopetaṃ
anya-e0812n0:35_5: ato paraṃ vuttalakkhaṇasatthato aññaṃ anadhigataṃ nādhippetanti. Idaṃ panettha gāthānaṃ nikkhepappayojanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:36_0: Loke padumagabbhe vasantiyā sabbaṅgadhavalāya yathicchitatthasādhikāya sarassatīnāmikāya
anya-e0812n0:36_1: devatāya “vāṇī”ti vohārato iminā atthena yojetvā abhinnapadasilesālaṅkāravasena vuttattā
anya-e0812n0:36_2: padattho evaṃ veditabbo – munindassa sobhāsugandhādiguṇayogato mukhasadisassa, no
anya-e0812n0:36_3: ce mukhasaṅkhātaambhojassa gabbhe udare sambhavena pavattiyā uppattiyā vā sundarī
anya-e0812n0:36_4: niddosā, sobhanā vā pāṇinaṃ saraṇaṃ atoyeva ahitāpanayanahitāvahatthena sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:36_5: paṭissaraṇabhūtā vāṇī yathāvuttaguṇopetā sarassatīdevatā, no ce sabbaññubhāratīti
anya-e0812n0:36_6: vuttasaddhammaratanaṃ mayhaṃ manaṃ ganthaviracane byāvaṭassa me cittaṃ pīṇayataṃ
anya-e0812n0:37_0: Ubhayalokajānanato muni ca so indabhāvapavattanato indo ceti kammadhārayena vā, agāriyamunianagāriyamunisekhamuniasekhamunīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:37_1: catunnaṃ pañcamo hutvā indoti chaṭṭhītappurisena vā munindo. Devatāpakkhe vadanamiva
anya-e0812n0:37_2: vadananti ambhoje, saddhammapakkhe ambhojamiva ambhojanti vadane ca upacārena gahite
anya-e0812n0:37_3: kammadhārayo. Munindassa vadanambhojamiti ca, tassa gabbhoti ca, tasmiṃ sambhavoti
anya-e0812n0:37_4: ca, tena sundarīti ca vākyaṃ. Vāṇiyā visesanattepi ekantanapuṃsakattā saraṇasaddassa
anya-e0812n0:37_5: na liṅgaparivattanabhāvo. Pāṇinanti rassattaṃ, dīghassa byabhicārattā. Mayhanti ekavacanena
anya-e0812n0:37_6: attano sādhuguṇodayakāraṇaṃ niratimānataṃ dīpeti. Santesupi aññesu jinapariyāyesu
anya-e0812n0:37_8: ocityaṃ posetīti payutto. Tathā hi tādisassa mukhaṃ ambhojatulyaṃ, tasmiṃ mukhodare
anya-e0812n0:37_9: sambhavā sundarī, tatoyeva pāṇinaṃ saraṇaṃ. Tasmāyeva manosampīṇane paṭuttaṃ subyattamiti
anya-e0812n0:37_10: ocityaṃ hoti. Loke patthaṭamidamocityamādaraṇīyaṃ hoti. Tasmiñhi uttamakavayoyeva
anya-e0812n0:43: Tathāpi tu vaḷañjenti, suddhamāgadhikā na te.
anya-e0812n0:44_4: rāmasammādayo vā taṃsambandhato. Bhavati hi taṃsambandhato tabbohāro yathā kiñcipi
anya-e0812n0:44_6: ganthavisesā vā. Santo sobhanā. Dvepi purā pubbakāle bhavā purātanā, porāṇikā. Ubhopi
anya-e0812n0:44_7: santi. Yajjapi saṃvijjanti. Tathāpi tūti nipātasamudāyoyaṃ visesābhidhānārambhe.
anya-e0812n0:44_8: Evaṃ santepīti attho. Suddhamāgadhikāti magadhesu bhavā, tattha viditā vā magadhā,
anya-e0812n0:44_9: saddā. Te etesaṃ santi, tesu vā niyuttāti māgadhikā. Suddhā ca sakkaṭādibhāsitakālusiyābhāvena
anya-e0812n0:44_10: visuddhā, asammissā vā aparicitattā te māgadhikā cāti suddhamāgadhikā, yatipotā.
anya-e0812n0:44_11: Te yathāvutte alaṅkāre ābharaṇavisese na vaḷañjenti, pasādhanavisese nānubhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:44_12: Ganthavisese pana uggahaṇadhāraṇādivasena attano suddhamāgadhikattā, rāmasammādīnañca
anya-e0812n0:44_13: sakkaṭādibhāvatoti ayamettha saddattho. Bhāvatthalesopettha paripūrati, tathāvidhapatītiyogato.
anya-e0812n0:44_14: Suddhamāgadhikā attano parisuddhabhāvena pubbe sobhanāpi te alaṅkārā idāni malaggahitabhāvappattā
anya-e0812n0:44_15: “kiṃ tehi malaggahitehi amhādisānaṃ suddhasattāna”nti na vaḷañjentīti.
anya-e0812n0:50_0: 2. Santo viññūhi pasatthattā sobhanā purātanā pubbakālasambhūtā rāmasammādyalaṅkārā
anya-e0812n0:50_1: rāmasammādīhi ācariyehi viracitattā, tesaṃ taṃsambandhato tabbohārasadisanāmattā
anya-e0812n0:50_2: vā rāmasammādayo nāma alaṅkārā kismiñci vejjasatthe “bimbisāro”ti vohāro viya. Alaṅkārā
anya-e0812n0:50_3: bhūsāvisesā, alaṅkārattapaṭipādanato alaṅkāranāmikā ganthavisesā vā santi kiñcāpi
anya-e0812n0:50_4: vijjanti, tathāpi tu evaṃ santepi suddhamāgadhikā sakkaṭapākatādīsu aññabhāsāsu paricayābhāvato
anya-e0812n0:50_5: kevalamāgadhikā te rāmasammādike alaṅkāre na vaḷañjenti pasādhanavasena, uggahaṇadhāraṇādivasena
anya-e0812n0:50_6: na sevanti. Magadhesu bhavā, tesu vā viditā magadhā, saddā. Te etesaṃ atthi, tesu
anya-e0812n0:50_7: niyuttāti vā māgadhikā. Suddhasaddo magadhavisesano, māgadhikavisesano vā hoti. Saddānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:50_8: tādisapatītivisesayogato bhāvatthalesopi idha dippati. Tathā hi suddhamāgadhikā attano
anya-e0812n0:50_9: suddhattā tesaṃ vinyāsena sobhanatte satipi bhāsāya purātanattā aparisuddhoti avamaññamānā
anya-e0812n0:50_10: na vaḷañjentīti. Vatticchitassatthassa upatthambhakabhūto bhāvatthalesopi mahākavīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:55_0: Tassattho – mahākavīnaṃ pūjitakavīnaṃ vāṇīsu vacanavisesesu patīyamānaṃ gammamānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:55_1: yaṃ kiñci vatthu yo koci atthaleso attheva atthi eva, taṃ vatthu aṅganāsu vanitāsu
anya-e0812n0:55_3: viya pasiddhāvayavātirittaṃ pakāsasaddāvayavato adhikaṃ hutvā ābhāti dippatīti.
anya-e0812n0:60_0: 3. Teneccādi. Yena te alaṅkāre na vaḷañjenti, tena kāraṇena alaṅkāravajjite ābharaṇehi,
anya-e0812n0:60_1: ganthavisesehi vā rahite, alaṅkārā vā yathāvuttavajjitā yehi te, ete yatipote esaṃ
anya-e0812n0:60_3: ca anucchavikena alaṅkārena ābharaṇena, alaṅkārasatthena vā toseyyaṃ apināma yathicchitapasādhanavasena,
anya-e0812n0:60_4: savanadhāraṇādivasena vā vaḷañjanena santuṭṭhe kareyyaṃ appeva nāma yannūnāti eso
anya-e0812n0:61_0: Alaṅkaronti attabhāvamanenāti alaṅkāro, ābharaṇaṃ hārakeyūrādi. Alaṅkaronti bandhasarīramanenāti
anya-e0812n0:61_1: alaṅkārotiminā pana alaṅkārasaddena pasādādayo saddālaṅkārā, sabhāvavutyādayo ca
anya-e0812n0:61_2: atthālaṅkārā nānappakārā saṅgahitā, yehi saddatthasaṅkhātaṃ bandhasarīraṃ sobhate,
anya-e0812n0:61_3: yathā hi purisasarīre hārakeyūrādyalaṅkāro nyasyate, yena sobhate, tathā bandhasarīrepi
anya-e0812n0:61_4: saddālaṅkārā, atthālaṅkārā ca nikkhipīyanti, yato sobhate. Teneva vakkhati “taṃ tu
anya-e0812n0:62_0: Alaṅkāravidhānabhāvena tu bandhasarīrampi tadatthiyā alaṅkāro, tathā tappaṭipādakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:62_2: hi “ganthopi kavivācāna-malaṅkārappakāsako” subodhālaṅkāra 12 gāthā ccādi. Atra uccate –
anya-e0812n0:65_0: Anenassābhidheyyādīni vuccanti. Abhidhīyate iti abhidheyyaṃ, samuditena satthena
anya-e0812n0:65_1: vacanīyattho. So ca sarīrālaṅkāravibhāgakappanāya tesaṃ paṭipādanaṃ. Subodhālaṅkārena
anya-e0812n0:65_2: hi te paṭipādīyanti. Yena ca yo paṭipādīyati, tassāyamattho bhavatīti abhidheyyasatthopi.
anya-e0812n0:65_3: Dassitameva tu sarīrālaṅkārasaṅkharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ, taṃ nissāya subodhālaṅkārappavattito.
anya-e0812n0:65_4: Yassa hi yamuddissa pavatti hoti, taṃ tassa payojanaṃ, taṃ pana kavittakittipasiddhādilakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:68: Abhidheyyādikathanañca taṃsamaṅgisseva ca vīmaṃsāvisesasamaṅgīnamupādīyamānattā, aññādisassa pana ummattakavacanādino viya heyyattā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0812n0:72_0: 3. Yena te te alaṅkārena vaḷañjenti, tena kāraṇena alaṅkāravajjite ābharaṇavisesehi,
anya-e0812n0:72_1: ganthavisesehi vā vajjite, te virahite yehi ete suddhamāgadhike esaṃ suddhamāgadhikānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:72_3: vā anukūlena alaṅkārena ābharaṇavisesena, ganthavisesena vā toseyyaṃ alaṅkāravaḷañjāpanena,
anya-e0812n0:72_4: ganthavisese ganthavisaye (ka.) uggahaṇadhāraṇādikārāpanena vā santuṭṭhe kareyyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:72_5: apināma yaṃnūna sundaramiti, eso parissamo ayaṃ mama alaṅkārapakaraṇappayogo. Apināmāti
anya-e0812n0:73_0: Alaṅkārehi vajjitā, alaṅkārā vajjitā yehi vāti ca. Rūpassa anu anurūpaṃ, rūpaṃ anugataṃ
anya-e0812n0:73_1: anurūpaṃ vā, tena anurūpena. Alaṅkaronti attabhāvamaneneti alaṅkāro, hārakeyūrādi
anya-e0812n0:73_2: ābharaṇapakkhe, ganthapakkhe tu alaṅkaronti bandhasarīramaneneti alaṅkāro. Iminā
anya-e0812n0:73_3: mukhyabhāvena pasādādisaddālaṅkārā ca sabhāvavutyādiatthālaṅkārā ca pavuccanti. Amukhyato
anya-e0812n0:73_5: viya alaṅkārapakāsakaṃ “sammā bujjhanti dvippakārā alaṅkārā anene”ti iminā atthena
anya-e0812n0:76: Ettha sāmatthiyaṃ nāma tadādhāratappaṭipādakattavohārato tadādheyyatappaṭipādanīyaṃ na bhavati ce, aññaṃ kiṃ bhavatīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇamevāti.
anya-e0812n0:81: Kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā, yesaṃ natthi gurūnī’ha garūniha (ka.);
anya-e0812n0:83: 4-5. Evaṃ lakkhaṇārambhapaṭikkhepakajanapaṭibāhanapubbakamabhidheyyādikaṃ dassetvā idāni satthatova sabbattha guṇadosavivecanaṃ. Atoyeva vuccati –
anya-e0812n0:85: Yaṃ karoti vinā satthaṃ, sāhasaṃ kimatodhika”nti.
anya-e0812n0:86: Tasmā guṇadosavibhāgavicāraṇaṃ nāma tabbidūnaṃyeva, nāsatthaññūnaṃ purisapasūnaṃ. Tathā cāha –
anya-e0812n0:89_0: Yenevaṃ, tenettha guṇadosadassane pasannānekasatthacakkhuyevādhigato, nañño tabbiparītotyanvayabyatirekavasena
anya-e0812n0:89_1: dassento “yesa”ntiādigāthādvayamāha. Tattha yesanti aniyamuddeso, yehīti attho. Yehi
anya-e0812n0:89_2: na sañcitā na rāsikatā, nānāsantānavuttinīpi ekattanayena ekasmiṃ santāne na vāsitā
anya-e0812n0:89_3: naparibhāvitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kā sā? Paññā heyyopādeyyavivekarūpā. Kīdisīti āha “anekasatthantarocitā”ti.
anya-e0812n0:89_5: paricitā sāyaṃ paññā yesaṃ na sañcitāti pakataṃ. Eteti yathāuddiṭṭhānaṃ niyamavacanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:89_6: Sammohabbhāhatāti yathāvuttāyātisayavatiyā paññāyābhāvato balappattena mohena abbhāhatā
anya-e0812n0:89_7: visesena pahatā, evasadditā hontīti adhippāyo. Yato evaṃ, tasmāpi kiñcipi heyyopādeyyarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:89_9: sayālābhena nāvabujjhanti, na jānantītyattho. Yato ālasiyādidosalesapariggahopi satatācariyasevanavasena
anya-e0812n0:94_0: Tato etādiso paññavāyevettha guṇadosavibhāgavivecane adhikārī, nañño tabbiparīto
anya-e0812n0:94_1: purisapasūti ayametthādhippāyo. Ruḷho atthaviseso. Tenāha “kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā,
anya-e0812n0:94_2: yesaṃ natthi gurūnihā”ti. Ihāti imasmiṃ loke yesaṃ janānaṃ gurūnaṃ kātabbā pādasussūsā
anya-e0812n0:94_3: pādaparicariyā natthi, tehi janehi yathāvuttanayena paññāveyattiyarasānabhiññehi
anya-e0812n0:94_4: kiṃ payojanaṃ, lesamattampi natthi, anadhigatāyevettha eteti adhippāyo. Idāni byatirekamukhena
anya-e0812n0:94_5: āha “ye”tiādi. Ye pubbe katapuññatādisampattisampannā tappādarajehi tesaṃ gurūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:94_6: pādadhūlīhi okiṇṇā onaddhā gavacchitā, teva sādhū yathāvuttanayena paññāveyattiyena
anya-e0812n0:94_8: honti, teyevettha guṇadosavivecane adhigatāti adhippāyo. Sā cāyaṃ gurupādasussūsā
anya-e0812n0:94_9: visiṭṭhādarena karaṇīyāti vaṅkavuttiyā tadabhyāse sādhujane niyojeti.
anya-e0812n0:95_0: 4-5. Ye sakalasatthaparicitaññāṇapāṭavā yadi dosamāropayanti, tesaṃ taddosanirākaraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:95_1: vinā padesāvabodhanamattena paṇḍitamānīnaṃ vacanassāgurukaraṇaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā dassento
anya-e0812n0:95_2: ca taṃdvāreneva attano anaññasādhāraṇagurugāravataṃ sādhujanehi paramādarena sampādetabbamiti
anya-e0812n0:95_4: anekesaṃ ganthānaṃ antare tatvatthasaṅkhātaabbhantare ucitā savanauggahaṇadhāraṇādivasena
anya-e0812n0:95_5: paricitā paññā sutamayā paññā yesaṃ yehi na sañcitā, dvinnamekakkhaṇe pavattiyābhāvepi
anya-e0812n0:95_7: avatthabāhullapavattito vā sañcitabbāpi na rāsikatā. Ete īdisapaññāpāṭavarahitā ime
anya-e0812n0:95_8: sammohabbhāhatā paññāpāṭavābhāvato balappattena mohena visesena pahatā eva kiñcipi
anya-e0812n0:95_9: heyyopādeyyaṃ nāvabujjhanti. Na eke aneketi ca, te ca te satthā ceti ca, tesamantaramiti
anya-e0812n0:95_10: ca, tasmiṃ ucitāti ca sammohena abbhāhatāti ca viggaho. Tena vuttaṃ–
anya-e0812n0:98_0: Tassattho – asatthaññū jano guṇadosaṃ kathaṃ vibhajate. Tathā hi rūpabhedopaladdhiyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:98_1: nīlapītādirūpavisesāvabodhane andhassa adhikāro abhimukhakaraṇaṃ kiṃ hoti, na bhavatyeva,
anya-e0812n0:100: Yaṃ karoti vinā satthaṃ, sāhasaṃ kimatodhika”nti.
anya-e0812n0:101_0: Tassattho – sabbattha guṇadosavivecanaṃ satthatoyeva hoti, satthaṃ vinā satthocitatādisapaññaṃ
anya-e0812n0:101_1: vinā yaṃ karoti guṇāguṇavibhāgaṃ karoti, yaṃ karaṇaṃ atthi, atodhikaṃ sāhasaṃ kiṃ
anya-e0812n0:102: Iha imasmiṃ loke yesaṃ akatapuññānaṃ janānaṃ gurūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:107_0: Niddiṭṭhaguṇopetānaṃ ācariyānaṃ kātabbā pādasussūsā pādaparicariyā natthi, tehi kiṃ
anya-e0812n0:107_1: payojanaṃ. Ye katapuññā janā tappādarajokiṇṇā tesaṃ gurūnaṃ pādarajehi gavacchitā,
anya-e0812n0:107_2: teva sādhū janā eva vivekino kalyāṇamittagurupāsanāhi adhigatavisiṭṭhavivekabuddhino
anya-e0812n0:107_3: bhavanti, te eva vivekaṃ jānantīti bhāvo. Sotumicchā sussūsā, taṃ nissāya kattabbapādaparicariyāpi
anya-e0812n0:107_4: tadatthiyā sussūsā nāma hoti. Pādesu sussūsāti ca, tesaṃ pādāti ca, tesu rajānīti
anya-e0812n0:107_5: ca, tehi okiṇṇāti ca viggaho. Sissānaṃ sakalābhibuddhiyā gurupaṭibaddhattā attano
anya-e0812n0:118_3: vuttajātibhedabhinnaṃ pajjamayaṃ gajjamayaṃ pajjagajjamayaṃ campūnāmakañca, mahāvākyarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:118_4: mahākabbañca, taṃ pana mahākabbaṃ saggehi sagganāmakehi paricchedavisesehi bandhyate
anya-e0812n0:118_5: karīyatīti saggabandhoti pavuccati. Tassa tu lakkhaṇaṃ “saggabandhassa mukhaṃ iṭṭhāsīsanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:118_6: siyā paṇāmo vā bandhasambandhino kassaci atthassa niddeso vā”tiādinā anekadhā vaṇṇenti. Taṃ yathā?
anya-e0812n0:130: Kabbaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi, jāyate sādhvalaṅkatī”ti kābyādāsa 1.14 – 19 gāthā.
anya-e0812n0:131_1: vā. Catuvaggaphalāyattanti dhammādicatuvaggaphalāyattaṃ. Dhammo nāma abbhūdayanibbānahetuko.
anya-e0812n0:131_2: Attho nāma vijjābhumyādīnaṃ yathāññāyamajjanaṃ, ajjitānañca rakkhaṇaṃ. Kāmo nāma
anya-e0812n0:131_3: nirayo visayo payogo. Mokkho nāma sabbasaṃsāradukkhanivatti. Caturodāttanāyakanti
anya-e0812n0:131_4: ussāhasattimantasattipabhūsattiyogena caturo kusalo cāgātisayādiyogena udātto udāro
anya-e0812n0:131_5: nāyako vipakkho, paṭipakkho ca yattha, taṃ. Madhu nāma surā. Vippalambho viraho.
anya-e0812n0:131_6: Manto nītivedīhi saha kārīyanicchayo. Dūto sandhānappavatto puriso. Payānaṃ saṅgāmādinimittagamanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:131_7: Āji sandhyābhāve viggaho. Asaṅkhattarasabhāvanirantaranti asaṃkhittā bahuttā rasā
anya-e0812n0:131_8: siṅgāravīrādayo, bhāvā ratiussāhādayo, tehi nirantaraṃ patthaṭaṃ. Piyavuttasusandhibhīti
anya-e0812n0:131_9: piyāni sutisubhagāni vuttāni indavajirādīni aññamaññasambandhasaṃsaggatāya sobhano
anya-e0812n0:132: Punapi yathāvuttesu aṅgesu nagaravaṇṇanādīsu kiñca yathāsambhavaṃ madhupānādirahitampi taññūnaṃ mano rañjeti upādiyateva sabbhīti dassetumāha–
anya-e0812n0:139: Tajjayā nāyakukkaṃsa-kathanañca sukheti no”ti kābyādāsa 1.21 22 gāthā āhu.
anya-e0812n0:141_0: Nāṭakaṃ nāma bharatādināṭyasatthe nānappakāranirūpitarūpaṃ kappaṃ, taṃlakkhaṇekadesabhūtalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0812n0:141_1: pakaraṇādīni nava rūpakāni. Nāṭikā ca etthevāvarumbhanti. Kabbañca nāṭakañca, tesu
anya-e0812n0:141_2: nikkhittaṃ ṭhapitaṃ nettañca cittañca yehīti viggaho. Ke te? Kavino. Tattha nikkhittanettacittavacanena
anya-e0812n0:141_4: nicchitassa bhāvanā, nirantarābhiyogo ca dassito. Kabbanāṭakavacanena sutaṃ, cintitaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:141_5: bhāvitañca dassitaṃ. Sute dassite tannissayaṃ sutamayañāṇampi dassitameva siyāti.
anya-e0812n0:141_7: kabbaracanāya sāmatthiyaṃ dasseti. Hoti hi tādisānaṃ taṃsutādi bandhanakāraṇaṃ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n0:146_0: Yaṃkiñcīti attano cittāruḷhaṃ yaṃkiñci bandhajātaṃ. Iminā pana aniyamavacanena attano
anya-e0812n0:146_1: tattha ādarābhāvaṃ dīpeti. Racayanti karonti. Etaṃ tehi racitaṃ bandhajātaṃ paraṃ
anya-e0812n0:146_2: accantameva vimhayakaraṃ na hoti, tādisopāyasampattisampannassa upeyyasampattisabbhāvato
anya-e0812n0:146_3: anacchariyamevāti adhippāyo. Tattha tesu kabbanāṭakesu racanāvisesaekantopāyabhūtesu
anya-e0812n0:146_4: avihitādarāapi sutādivasena akatādarāpi ye sappurisā paññavanto yena bandhavisesena
anya-e0812n0:146_5: viññū guṇadosaviduno satthaññuno paṇḍitajane tosenti pīṇenti. Tosentiyeva hi te tādise
anya-e0812n0:146_6: sābhāvikipaṭibhāvirahepi etādisesu atthesu sutacintābhāvanāvasena vāyamantā. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n0:151_0: Paṭibhāvanto heyyopādeyyaparicchedalakkhaṇapaññāya paññavanto nāma, teyeva sappurisā.
anya-e0812n0:151_1: Savimhayo “kīdisāyaṃ, tādisopāyantararahitānampi etādiso bandho siyā”ti vimhayena
anya-e0812n0:151_2: saha vattamānopi. Sova bandho tameva bandhanaṃ tādisopāyasampattivirahenopeyyasampattiyā
anya-e0812n0:152_3: yaṃ kiñci attano abhimataṃ racayanti karonti, etaṃ bandhanaṃ paraṃ atisayena na vimhayakaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:152_4: acchariyakaraṃ na hoti, nirantarābhiyogato siddhopāyamūlapaññāsampadāya upeyyabhūtaganthasaṅkharaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:152_5: bhavatyevāti adhippāyo. Kavino idaṃ kabbanti ca, naṭakassa idaṃ nāṭakaṃ, naccagītādi.
anya-e0812n0:152_6: Idha pana tappaṭipādakakathāpakāsakagantho nāṭakaṃ nāma. Kabbañca nāṭakañcāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:152_7: kabbanāṭakesu nikkhittaṃ nettacittaṃ yehīti ca viggaho. Ye janā tattha tesu kabbanāṭakesu
anya-e0812n0:152_8: avihitādarāpi savanadhāraṇādivasena akatasambhamā eva viññū yena gantharacanāvisesena
anya-e0812n0:152_9: tosenti pīṇenti, teyeva paṭibhāvanto paṭibhānasaṅkhātapaññavanto bhavanti. Sova bandho
anya-e0812n0:152_10: savimhayo aññesaṃ uppajjamānavimhayena sahito. Paṭibhā etesaṃ atthīti ca, saha vimhayena
anya-e0812n0:152_11: vattatīti ca, avihito ādaro yehīti ca viggaho. Bāhirasatthābhiyogābhāvepi pubbavāsanābhāvepi
anya-e0812n0:152_12: iha nirantarābhiyogaṃ karonto tādisasāmatthiyaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n0:157_0: Tassattho – yadi pubbavāsanāguṇānubandhī atītajātiyā paricayavāsanāguṇassa anubalappadānavasena
anya-e0812n0:157_1: anubandho yassatthi, tādisaṃ abbhutaṃ paṭibhānaṃ na vijjatipi, tathāpi sutena savanena
anya-e0812n0:157_2: ussahanena paguṇakaraṇādivācussahanena vā upāsitā katagurupāsanā vācā kamapi anuggahaṃ
anya-e0812n0:157_3: kiñcipi paññāpāṭavaṃ dhuvaṃ ekantena karoti evāti.
anya-e0812n0:158_0: Ettha kabbaṃ nāma muttakakulakādivākyavasena ca avayavasabhāvehi tesaṃyeva antaravākyāvayavasamūhehi
anya-e0812n0:158_1: paripuṇṇaṃ vuttavisesehi pabhedagataṃ kevalaṃ pajjamayaṃ vā gajjamayaṃ vā campūtikhyātapajjagajjamayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:158_2: vāti mahāvākyasabhāvena ca tiṭṭhati. Nāṭakaṃ nāma bharatādinaṭasatthagatanānappakāradassitasabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:158_3: Kabbañca idheva dassitalakkhaṇato ekadesayuttappakaraṇādinavarūpakāni ca nāṭikā ca
anya-e0812n0:170: Kabbaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi, jāyate sādhvalaṅkatī”ti kābyādāsa 1.14 – 19 gāthā.
anya-e0812n0:171_1: uccate. Assa lakkhaṇaṃ tu vuccateti sambandho kākakkhigoḷakanayena tammukhaṃ tassa
anya-e0812n0:171_2: kabbassa ādi pana paṇāmo devatānamassanaṃ vā, vatthuniddeso –
anya-e0812n0:176: Iccādibandhasambandhino kassaci vatthuno dassanaṃ, āsīsāpi “mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ mana” miccādiiṭṭhāsīsanaṃ vā bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:177_2: vijjābhūmiādīnaṃ sañcayo, sañcitānaṃ rakkhā ca attho, apāyasaṃvattanikapañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n0:177_3: kāmo, sabbadukkhā nivattihetu mokkho cāti catuvaggaphalādhīnaṃ caturodāttanāyakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:177_4: ussāhasattimantasattipabhūsattiyogato caturo dakkho cāgātisayādiyogena udātto uḷāro
anya-e0812n0:177_5: sapakkho, vipakkho vā nāyako yattha, taṃ yathāvuttaṃ puraṇṇavutuselindu-savitūdayavaṇṇanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:177_6: puraṃ nagaraṃ, aṇṇavaṃ sāgaraṃ, utu hemantavasantādiutu, selaṃ pabbato, indusavitūdayo
anya-e0812n0:177_7: candasūriyānaṃ udayo cāti imesaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ yattha, taṃ. Savitāti ettha tupaccayanto.
anya-e0812n0:177_9: taṃ vippalambhavivāhehi dārāviyogadārapariggahehi ca kumārodayavaḍḍhihi kumāruppattikumāravaḍḍhīhi
anya-e0812n0:177_10: ca mantadūtappayānājināyakābhyūdayehi nītijānanapaññā manto, sandhānakārako dūto,
anya-e0812n0:177_11: yuddhābhigamanaṃ payānaṃ, yuddhasaṅkhāto āji, sapakkhanāyakassa abhivaḍḍhisaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n0:177_12: abhyūdayo cāti imehi alaṅkataṃ sajjitaṃ asaṃkhitta…pe… ntaraṃ asaṃkhittā vitthārā
anya-e0812n0:177_13: rasā siṅgārādayo aṭṭha bhāvā ratiussāhādayo cāti imehi nirantaraṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ piyavuttasusandhibhi
anya-e0812n0:177_14: sutisubhagehi indavajirādīhi vuttehi pubbāparasambandhaparicchedatāya sobhanā sandhi
anya-e0812n0:177_15: yesaṃ saggānaṃ, tehi sabbattha sabbasmiṃ paricchede bhinnasaggantehi bhinnasaggā
anya-e0812n0:177_16: pariyosānā yesaṃ, tehi nātivitthiṇṇasaggehi nātivitthārasaggasaṅkhātehi paricchedehi
anya-e0812n0:177_17: upetaṃ yuttaṃ sādhvalaṅkati sobhanālaṅkāravantaṃ kabbaṃ lokarañjakaṃ taṃ samānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:177_18: kappantaraṭṭhāyi kappanirantaraṭṭhāyi kappantare ṭhāyi vā jāyate. Ettha madhupānādirahitapuravaṇṇanādayopi
anya-e0812n0:177_19: taññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti ce, taṃpyaduṭṭhaṃ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n0:180_0: Tassattho – atra imesu kabbaṅgesu majjhe kehici aṅgehi kehici avayavehi nyūnamapi
anya-e0812n0:180_1: ūnamapi, nisaddotratabbhāve. Kabbaṃ na dussati, taṃ pana adussanaṃ bandhaṅgasampadā
anya-e0812n0:180_2: racitapuravaṇṇanādiaṅgasampadā taññū kabbaññū jane kāmaṃ icchānurūpaṃ ce ārādhayanti,
anya-e0812n0:180_3: evaṃ sante bhavati. Punapi nāyakavaṇṇanāsu sapakkhanāyakaṃ vaṇṇetvā tena nirākaraṇabhāvampi.
anya-e0812n0:180_4: No ce, paccatthikaṃ vaṇṇetvā attano nāyakena tassābhibhavanampi vaṇṇetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n0:186: Bandho ca nāma saddatthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
anya-e0812n0:188_0: 8. Evametehi sotujanasamussāhanaṃ dassetvā idāni kattumicchitabandhoti vuttaṃ bandhassa
anya-e0812n0:188_1: lakkhaṇaṃ kattumārabhate “bandho cā”tiādi. Dosavajjitā dosehi saddanissitehi, atthanissitehi
anya-e0812n0:188_2: ca virodhehi vajjitā pariccattā, te vā vajjitā yehi, saddatthā sahitā ekībhūtā. Vuttalakkhaṇā
anya-e0812n0:188_3: yehi te pubbācariyehi sahitā vuccanti. Sahitānaṃ bhāvo sahadayahilādakāraṇaṃ sādhyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:188_4: sāhiccaṃ. Iti dosavajjite sahite saddatthe pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā bandho nāma
anya-e0812n0:188_6: yathā “yo kuṇḍalī, so devadatto”ti. Casaddovattabbantarassa samuccayo, kiñcīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:189_0: Tattha jātiguṇakriyādabbalakkhaṇo saddānamattho mukhyo catubbidho hoti. Mukhyassatthassa
anya-e0812n0:189_1: catubbidhattā tividhesu saddesu tabbācako catubbidho hoti jātisaddo guṇasaddo kriyāsaddo
anya-e0812n0:189_2: dabbasaddoti. Tividho hi saddo vācako lakkhaṇiko byañjakoti byāpārabhedena. Byāpāro
anya-e0812n0:189_3: ca nāma saddassa’tthappatītikārittameva. So hi tividho mukhyo lakkhaṇo byañjanasabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:189_4: ceti. Tattha jātyādinirantaratthavisayo saddabyāpāro mukhyo. Soyeva abhidhāti uccate.
anya-e0812n0:189_5: Taṃbyāpāravā abyavahitajātyādisakehi tamatthaṃ mukhyabhāvena yo vadati goādiko, so
anya-e0812n0:189_6: vācako. Saddantaratthavisayaniddiṭṭho saddabyāpāro lakkhaṇo. Sā duvidhā suddhā, upacāramissā
anya-e0812n0:189_7: ceti. Tattha suddhā yathā “go muccatu, mañcā ugghosenti, gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso”ti. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:189_8: gosaddena visesanaṃ gottasāmaññamevoccate, na tu gobyatti. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n0:190: “Visesyaṃnābhidhā gacche, khīṇasatti visesane”ti kābyappakāse dutiyaullāse āgatanyāyo’yaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:191_0: Sāmaññassa byāpakattā, asarīrattā ca. Tattha bandhanamocanāni na sambhavantīti attano
anya-e0812n0:191_1: nissayabhūtā gobyatti ākaḍḍhīyate, tathā mañcānamugghosanaṃ na sambhavatīti attano
anya-e0812n0:191_2: ugghosanakriyāsiddhyatthaṃ mañcasamaṅgino purisā ākaḍḍhīyanti. Tathā gaṅgāsaddavāccassa
anya-e0812n0:191_3: jalappavāhassa ghosappatyākaratā na sambhavatīti gaṅgāsaddo attanobhidheyyassodakappavāhassa
anya-e0812n0:191_4: nikaṭaṃ taṭaṃ lakkheti. Upacārassānekappakārattā upacāramissā lakkhaṇāpyanekadhā
anya-e0812n0:191_5: siyā. Yathā katthaci kāraṇe kārīyamupacariyate, yathā “āyu ghata”nti. Katthaci kāraṇakāriyānamabhedo
anya-e0812n0:191_6: yathā “āyuyeveda”nti. Katthaci upamāne upameyyamupacarīyate, yathā “go bāhiko”ti.
anya-e0812n0:191_7: Katthaci abhedo tesaṃ, yathā “goyevāya”nti. Katthaci tadādhāratāya tadatthatāya (ka.)
anya-e0812n0:191_8: taṃbyapadeso, yathā “padīpaṭṭhā kapallikā padīpo”ti. Katthaci taṃkammasambandhā taṃbyapadeso,
anya-e0812n0:191_9: yathā “avaḍḍhakīpi vaḍḍhakī aya”nti. Katthaci saṃsāmisambandhā, yathā “rājasambandhī
anya-e0812n0:191_10: puriso rājāya”nti. Katthaci avayave samudāyabyapadeso, yathā “paṭekadese paṭasaddo” iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:192_0: Lakkhaṇāya nissayo saddo lakkhaṇiko. Byañjanasabhāvo pana parapariyāyo saddassa tatiyo
anya-e0812n0:192_1: byāpāro. Tassa nissayo saddo byañjanako. Iccetaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saddānaṃ vasena atthopi tividho
anya-e0812n0:192_2: hoti vācco lakkhaṇiyo byaṅgyoti. Tattha byaṅgyoyevattho bandhasatthā vuccate. Teneva
anya-e0812n0:192_3: padhānabyaṅgyo bandho uttamo, apadhānabyaṅgyo majjhimo, abyaṅgyo adhamo, byaṅgyena
anya-e0812n0:192_4: vinā bandho nijjīvo siyāti pubbācariyānaṃ pavatti, sabhāvavutti bandhopi tu nijjīvoti
anya-e0812n0:192_5: nāsaṅkanīyo. Yasmā kavīnaṃ lokavohārakosallaṃ sabhāvavuttiyeva gameti. Yo hi sakalalokaṭṭhitiṃ
anya-e0812n0:192_6: na jānāti, so kaviyeva na hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:193_1: Ettha vāṇīsaddassa saddhammasaṅkhāto attho vāccattho. Vāṇī nāma cetanā, tassaṃ yāva
anya-e0812n0:193_2: devatatthaṃ nāropyate, tāva tappatī attano manosampīṇanaāsīsanā na saṃgacchatīti
anya-e0812n0:193_3: vākyasāmatthiyāyeva vāṇiyaṃ sāyamocityabhedena devatāsaddassa āropitottho lakkhaṇiyo.
anya-e0812n0:193_4: Tathā vadanasaddassāpi mukhaṃ vāccattho. Ambhojasaddassa samāropitottho lakkhaṇiyo.
anya-e0812n0:193_5: Manosampīṇanassa tu aññathā anupapattiyā passaddhyādikkamena yathābhūtāvabodhasambhavā
anya-e0812n0:193_7: hoteva, ayaṃ byaṅgyattho. Tabbācakā saddā vācakalakkhaṇikabyañjakā hontīti evaṃ sabbattha
anya-e0812n0:194_0: Tamevaṃ yathāvuttabandhasarīraṃ katividhamiccāha “pajje”ccādi. Ayaṃ yathāvutto bandho
anya-e0812n0:194_1: bandhasarīraṃ tidhā bhave tippakārena siyā, nādhikaṃ nāpyūnaṃ. Kathaṃ? Pajjagajjavimissānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:194_2: bhedena pajjasabhāvādīnaṃ visesena tidhā bhaveti pakataṃ. Tattha pajjaṃ nāma amhehiyeva
anya-e0812n0:194_3: viracitavuttodayākhye chandasi nirūpitā vuttajātippabhedā catuppadikatthā nirūpito
anya-e0812n0:194_4: muttakādipi vuttajātippakāroyeva. Tenevettha tesamadassanaṃ. Tesu ekagāthā niṭṭhitatthā
anya-e0812n0:194_5: sappadhānā gāthantarānirapekkhā muttakaṃ, ekakriyādānena aññamaññasāpekkhā niṭṭhitatthā
anya-e0812n0:194_6: paccekaṃ aniṭṭhitatthā gāthā kulakaṃ, nānābhittiyo bhinnakiriyo sappadhānā gāthā
anya-e0812n0:194_7: koso viya ṭhapitā koso, ekabhittipadosādikaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ samudāyena pavattā bhinnakriyā
anya-e0812n0:194_8: gāthā saṅghāto, sopi catubbidho pajjappakāro yathāvuttasaggabandhovāti viññātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:194_9: Gajjaṃ nāma pādasanniṭṭhānarahito syādyantatyādyantappabandho. Tassa tu dve pakārā
anya-e0812n0:194_10: ākhyāyikā, kathāti. Vimissaṃ pajjagajjamayaṃ nāṭakappakaraṇādi, campū jātakamālādikā ca.
anya-e0812n0:195_0: 8. Idāni sañjānanābhilāsīnaṃ alaṅkāranissitaṃ bandhasarīraṃ, sova bandhoti adhikataṃ,
anya-e0812n0:195_1: “yo kuṇḍalī, so devadatto”ti pasiddhakuṇḍalittānuvādena appasiddhassa devadattattavidhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:195_2: viya dassento “bandho”ccādimāha. Tattha bandho nāma ca bandhanaṃ pana. Dosavajjitā
anya-e0812n0:195_3: saddatthanissitadosehi pariccattā, te vā vajjitā etehi tādisā. Sahitā aññamaññānurūpatthena
anya-e0812n0:195_4: sahabhāvaṃ gatā. Saddatthā saddo, attho ca. Evaṃpakārehi tu īdisasaddatthānaṃ viññūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:195_6: Saddatthāti ettha saddatthānaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti? Saddo pana atthappatītiyaṃ attano
anya-e0812n0:195_8: Kamato vācako lakkhaṇiko byañjanako ceti tividho. Tathā atthopi vācco lakkhaṇiyo
anya-e0812n0:195_9: byaṅgyo cebhi tividho. Atra tu vācako saddo attanā dīpetabbamukhyatthassa jātiguṇakriyādabbabhedena
anya-e0812n0:195_10: catubbidhattā sayampi jātiguṇakriyādabbasaddavasena catubbidho. Vācakasaddassa mukhyabyāpāro
anya-e0812n0:195_11: “abhidhā”ti ca voharīyati. So mukhyabyāpāro jātyādīhi abyavahitattheva vattate. Tathā
anya-e0812n0:195_12: hi “go nīlaṃ pācako visāṇi”ccādo goādisaddānaṃ mukhyabyāpāro gopiṇḍanīlapaṭapācakakattusiṅgīti
anya-e0812n0:195_13: dabbānaṃ visesanabhūtajātiguṇakriyādabbesveva pavattati, na pana jātyādīnaṃ nissayabhūtagopiṇḍādīsūti. Vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0812n0:196: “Visesyaṃ nābhidhā gacche, khīṇasatti visesane”ti kābyappakāse dutiyaullāse āgatanyāyo’yaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:197: Tassattho – visesane visesanabhūtajātyādimhi khīṇasatti khīṇabyāpāravatī abhidhā mukhyabyāpārova visesyaṃ dabbaṃ na gacche na pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0812n0:198_0: Jātyādīnaṃ nissayagopiṇḍādikaṃ abhidhā na vadati ce, evañca sati “go gacchati, nīlaṃ
anya-e0812n0:198_1: nivāseti, pācako āgacchati, siṅgī dhāvati”ccādīsu jātyādivisiṭṭhagopiṇḍādīnaṃ goādisaddassa
anya-e0812n0:198_2: kathaṃ vācakattaṃ yujjatīti? Dabbādhīnajātiguṇādīsu vuttesu tabbisiṭṭhassa dabbassa
anya-e0812n0:198_3: pariyāyato vācakattā. Nippariyāyato pana suddhalakkhaṇabyāpārasseva visayo. Lakkhaṇabyāpāropi
anya-e0812n0:198_4: suddho upacāramissoti duvidho. Tattha suddho lakkhaṇabyāpāro jātyādivajjitatthavisayo.
anya-e0812n0:198_5: Tathā hi “go gacchati, nīlaṃ nivāseti, pācako āgacchati, siṅgī dhāvati, mañcā ugghosenti,
anya-e0812n0:199_0: Misso tu upacārabhedena bahuvidho. Tathā hi katthaci kāraṇe kāriyamupacarīyate, yathā
anya-e0812n0:199_1: “āyughata”nti, ettha āyuvaḍḍhanakāraṇabhūte ghate kāriyabhūtaāyuno vohāro āropito
anya-e0812n0:199_2: hoti. Uparipi upacāro yathāyogaṃ yojetabbo. Ataṃsabhāve hi taṃsabhāvāropanaṃ upacāro.
anya-e0812n0:199_3: Katthaci kāraṇakāriyānamabhedo, yathā “āyuyeva ghata”nti. Katthaci upameyyaupamānopacāro,
anya-e0812n0:199_4: yathā “go bāhiko”ti. Katthaci upamānaupameyyānamabhedo, yathā “goyevāyaṃ bāhiko”ti.
anya-e0812n0:199_5: Katthaci tadādhāratāya tadūpacāro, yathā “padīpaṭṭhā kapallikā padīpo”ti. Katthaci
anya-e0812n0:199_6: kriyāsambandhena taṃbyapadeso, yathā “avaḍḍhakīpi vaḍḍhakī aya”nti. Katthaci saṃsāmisambandhena
anya-e0812n0:199_7: taṃbyapadeso, yathā “rājavallabhopi rājā aya”nti. Katthaci avayave samudāyabyapadeso,
anya-e0812n0:199_8: yathā “paṭo daḍḍho”ti. Iminā mukhena upacārabhedo daṭṭhabbo. Byañjanasabhāvabyāpāro
anya-e0812n0:199_9: eva “dhana”nti ca vuccati, tassa tatiyabyāpārassa visayo tādisavākyameva vāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n0:200: Ettha byaṅgyatthaṃ bandhassa jīvitamiti ca, byaṅgyatthapadhānaṃ bandhamuttamanti ca, byaṅgyatthapadhānarahitaṃ majjhimanti ca, abyaṅgyabandhaṃ adhamamiti ca vadanti. Honti cettha –
anya-e0812n0:214: Byañjako tu anaññattā, visuṃ tehi na vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n0:215_0: Lakkhaṇato evaṃ veditabbaṃ – “munindavadanambhoje” tyādigāthāyaṃ vadanasaddassa mukhattho
anya-e0812n0:215_1: vāccattho, āropitaambhojattho lakkhaṇiyattho. Ambhojasaddassa padumattho vāccattho,
anya-e0812n0:215_2: upacaritamukhattho lakkhaṇiyattho. Vāṇisaddassa saddhammasaṅkhāto attho vāccattho,
anya-e0812n0:215_3: āropitadevatāattho lakkhaṇiyattho. Ettha āsīsanā nāma yathāvuttanayena puññātisayatā,
anya-e0812n0:215_4: tato idha abhimatatthabādhakākusalanivāraṇañca kusalānamanubalappadānañca tato kāyacittapīḷāvigamo
anya-e0812n0:215_5: ca tato sukhappaṭilābho ca tato cittasamādhānañca tatoyeva anekavidhatthāvabodho
anya-e0812n0:215_6: ca tato abhimataganthaparisamatti ca bhavatītyayaṃ vākyasāmatthiyato laddhattho byaṅgyatto.
anya-e0812n0:215_7: Taṃtaṃatthappakāsakā saddā vācakalakkhaṇikabyañjanakā nāma bhavanti. Evaṃ saddasaddatthavicāro veditabbo.
anya-e0812n0:216_0: Idāni pakāsitabandhassa bhedaṃ vadati “pajjā”dinā. Ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇo bandho pajjagajjavimissānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:216_1: bhedena gāthācuṇṇiyatadubhayamissānaṃ vasena tidhā bhave. Saddo ca attho ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:216_2: sahabhāvaṃ itā pattāti ca, dosehi vajjitā, dose vā vajjitā yehīti ca, pajjañca gajjañca
anya-e0812n0:216_3: vimissañceti ca viggaho. Iha pajjaṃ nāma muttakakulakakosakasaṅghātavasena catuppabhedaṃ
anya-e0812n0:216_4: chandasi niddiṭṭhavuttavisesaviracitaṃ catuppadikagāthābandhaṃ. Tattha muttakaṃ nāma
anya-e0812n0:216_5: niṭṭhitatthā sappadhānā ekā gāthā, kulakaṃ nāma paccekamaniṭṭhitatthā aññamaññasāpekkhā
anya-e0812n0:216_6: ekakriyādvārikā nānāgāthā, kosako nāma nānāvidhavaṇṇanābhūmikā bhinnakriyādvārappavattā
anya-e0812n0:216_7: sappadhānā gāthārāsi, saṅghāto nāma sañcyākālādiekavaṇṇanābhūminissitā bhinnakriyāsamudāyena
anya-e0812n0:216_8: pavattā gāthā. Gajjaṃ nāma aniyatapado ākhyāyikākathāvasena dvippabhedo syādyantatyādyanto
anya-e0812n0:216_9: vacanappabandho. Misso pana imehi dvīhi saṃmisso nāṭakapakaraṇādi ca jātakamālādicampū ca.
anya-e0812n0:218: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
anya-e0812n0:220_0: 9. Evaṃ tippakāraṃ bandhasarīraṃ vatvā idāni aññathāpi dassetumāha “nibandhocā’nibandho
anya-e0812n0:220_1: ca, puna dvidhā niruppate” iti. Puna bhiyyo yathāvutto pajjamayabandho dvidhā dvippakārena
anya-e0812n0:220_2: niruppate nicchīyate. Kathaṃ? Nibandho ca tadekadesabhūtehi muttakādīhi catūhi saggabandhādivasena
anya-e0812n0:220_3: bandho ca anibandho ca kevalaṃ muttakavasenāti evaṃ dvidhā niruppate iti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:220_4: Nanu tassetassa yathāvuttavātimayassa sakkaṭaṃ pākataṃ apabbhaṃso pesācikaṃ missañceti
anya-e0812n0:220_5: pañcavidhattaṃ vatvā “sakkaṭaṃ nāma devatābhāsā. Pākataṃ catubbidhaṃ sakkaṭehi vaṇṇaññattamattena
anya-e0812n0:220_6: uppannattā mahindasindhavādi tabbhavaṃ, tassamaṃ hiriharakamalādi, mahāraṭṭhādidesapasiddhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:220_7: desīyaṃ, tabbhavādīhi sammissaṃ missaṃ. Ābhīrādīnaṃ vācā apabbhaṃso, so ca pākataṃ
anya-e0812n0:220_8: viya catubbidho, tividho ca nāgaraupanāgaravuddhabhedena. Pisācānaṃ vacanaṃ pesācikaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:220_9: Sabbesaṃ vasena missa”nti sakkaṭādīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā “siṅgārappadhānanaccasaṅkhātalāsyādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:220_10: paṭipādakatthena lāsyādikamabhinayappadhānattā dassanīyaṃ, itaraṃ kabbaṃ savanīya”nti
anya-e0812n0:220_11: duvidhaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ pubbācariyehi bhāsābhedena vuttaṃ pañcavidhattaṃ, viniyogabhedena
anya-e0812n0:220_12: vuttaṃ duvidhattañca idha kasmā na vuttanti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi tadevamidhānupayogitāya
anya-e0812n0:221_0: Evamalaṅkārādhiṭṭhānabhāvena paṭhamaṃ bandhasarīraṃ dassetvā idāni hārakeyūrādinā
anya-e0812n0:221_1: purisasarīramiva bandhasarīraṃ saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi vindanīyataraṃ hotīti dassetumāha
anya-e0812n0:221_2: “taṃ tu” iccādi. Tusaddo visesavacanicchāyaṃ. Taṃ bandhasarīraṃ tu alaṅkārā alaṅkariyati
anya-e0812n0:221_3: taṃ bandhasarīrametehīti pasādādayo saddālaṅkārā, sabhāvavutyādayo atthālaṅkārā ca
anya-e0812n0:221_4: vindanīyatarattanaṃ atisayena vindanīyabhāvaṃ assādanīyabhāvaṃ pāpenti nayanti. Sabbathā
anya-e0812n0:221_5: niddosabhūtānaṃ saddatthānaṃ aññamaññānurūpato sahitabhāvena paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya
anya-e0812n0:221_6: samannāgataṃ tādisapurisasarīramiva vindanīyampi samānaṃ alaṅkārehi pasādhite sati
anya-e0812n0:222_0: 9. Punapi tasseva bandhassa bhedaṃ kathetuṃ “nibandho cā”dimāha. Puna nibandho ca
anya-e0812n0:222_1: muttakādīhi catūhi avinābhāvato mahākabbādisabhāvena nirantaraṃ katvā bandho ca anibandho
anya-e0812n0:222_2: ca kevalaṃ mahākabbādisabhāvena muttakattā anirantaraṃ katvā bandho cāti sova bandho
anya-e0812n0:222_3: dvidhā niruppate nicchīyate. Punapi so bandho sakkaṭapākataapabbhaṃ sapesācikamissabhāsābhedena
anya-e0812n0:222_5: tadaññaṃ kabbaṃ savanīyamiti vaḷañjanabhedato duvidho ca hoti. So sabbopi payojanābhāvato
anya-e0812n0:222_6: iha na gahito. Tattha sakkaṭaṃ nāma devatābhāsā. Tato kehici akkharehi bhinnaṃ pākataṃ
anya-e0812n0:222_7: nāma. Taṃ pana tabbhavatassamadesiyamissavasena catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha sakkaṭato
anya-e0812n0:222_8: vaṇṇaññattamattena nibbattaṃ tabbhavaṃ nāma, taṃ mahindasindhavādi. Tassamaṃ hiriharakamalādi.
anya-e0812n0:222_9: Dese pasiddhaṃ desiyaṃ. Missaṃ nāma tabbhavādīhi sammissaṃ. Apabbhaṃso nāma gopālakādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:222_10: vācā, so ca tabbhavādīhi catubbidho, nāgaraupanāgaravuddhabhedena tividho ca hoti.
anya-e0812n0:222_11: Pisācānaṃ vacanaṃ pesācikaṃ. Tehi sakkaṭādīhi sammissaṃ missaṃ nāma hoti. Idāni īdisappabhedavantabandhassa
anya-e0812n0:222_12: alaṅkārena sobhanattaṃ vattuṃ “taṃ tu”ccādimāha. Taṃ tu taṃ pana vuttappakāraṃ bandhasarīraṃ
anya-e0812n0:222_14: atisayapasādanīyattaṃ pāpenti. Nirantaraṃ bandho nibandhoti ca, na nibandho anibandhoti
anya-e0812n0:222_15: ca, atisayena vindanīyo vindanīyataro, tassa bhāvo vindanīyatarattananti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:226_1: piḷakatilakakāḷakādyanāhatāya ca sundarabhāvato agarahitaṃ mukhambhojaṃ vadanāravindañca
anya-e0812n0:226_2: tathā anavajjā padādidosānabhibhūtāya sundarabhāvena agarahitā bhāratī ca vāṇī upacārato
anya-e0812n0:226_3: tappaṭipādanīyo attho cāti ete alaṅkatāva mukhaṃ tilakatāḍaṅkādinālaṅkārena, saddatthā
anya-e0812n0:226_4: saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi pasādhitā sajjitā eva, niralaṅkatā tathā apasādhitā asajjitā
anya-e0812n0:226_5: sobhante kiṃ nu, na sobhantevāti vitakkemīti attho. Nuiti vitakke.
anya-e0812n0:227_0: 10. Tameva “anavajja” miccādinā samattheti. Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādiavayavasampattiyā ca piḷakatilakakāḷakādidosarahitattā
anya-e0812n0:227_1: ca aninditaṃ mukhambhojañca anavajjā padadosavākyadosaatthadosehi amissattā agarahitā
anya-e0812n0:227_2: bhāratī vāṇī ca abhedopacārena tappaṭipādanīyattho cāti ime alaṅkatāva kuṇḍalatilakādiābharaṇehi
anya-e0812n0:227_3: ca saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi ca sajjitā eva, niralaṅkatā tehi avibhūsitā sobhante
anya-e0812n0:227_4: kiṃ nu, na sobhanteti maññe. Natthi avajjamassāti ca, mukhameva ambhojamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:230: Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
anya-e0812n0:231_0: 11. Alaṅkaraṇañca tesaṃ vinā gurūpadesena karonto vinā pahāsaṃ nāparaṃ visesamadhigacchatīti
anya-e0812n0:231_2: vā upadesaṃ “ettha evaṃ kate sobheyyā”ti upadisanaṃ vinā pariccajja mukhassa, bandhassa
anya-e0812n0:231_3: ca alaṅkaraṇānabhiññatāya bālo aññāṇako yo koci puggalo taṃ mukhaṃ, bandhaṃ vā alaṅkattuṃ
anya-e0812n0:231_4: anurūpavasena sajjetuṃ icchati adhippeti, so tādiso aññāṇapuggalo viññūhi tabbidūhi
anya-e0812n0:231_5: paṇḍitajanehi hassabhāvaṃ avahāsaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena na sampāpuṇeyya. “Kimidaṃ
anya-e0812n0:231_6: aññāṇapurisena kariyatī”ti hasantevāti adhippāyo. Nuiti vitakke.
anya-e0812n0:232_1: seṭṭhanti dassetuṃ “vinā gurūpadesa” miccādisilesālaṅkāramāha. Bālo mukhādisarīrālaṅkāre,
anya-e0812n0:232_2: bandhālaṅkāre vā asamattho yo koci gurūpadesaṃ vinā sarīrālaṅkārakaraṇassa, bandhālaṅkārakaraṇassa
anya-e0812n0:232_3: vā anurūpopadesamantarena taṃ sarīraṃ, bandhaṃ vā alaṅkattuṃ tilakatāḍaṅkādīhi, saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi
anya-e0812n0:232_4: vā sajjetuṃ icchati ce, so viññūhi tadubhayaññūhi hassabhāvaṃ avahasitabbataṃ kathaṃ
anya-e0812n0:232_5: na sampāpuṇe, pāpuṇātyeva, tasmā gurūhi sādarato uggaṇhitvā kattabbanti bhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:236_0: 12. Nanu saddagammā, atthagammā ca alaṅkārāti gantho kathanti āha “ganthopī”tiādi.
anya-e0812n0:236_1: Kavivācānaṃ kavippayogānaṃ samudāyarūpānaṃ, paṭipādanīyatāya tabbacanīyānañca atthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:236_2: alaṅkārappakāsako alaṅkārānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ vibhāvito ganthopi kiriyākappasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0812n0:236_3: satthampi tabbacanīyattaṃ tena alaṅkārasaddena vāccataṃ yāti upagacchati. Kinti āha
anya-e0812n0:236_4: “tabbohārūpacārato”ti. Tassa katavohārassa alaṅkārasaddassa, tasmiṃ vā maṇḍanavisese
anya-e0812n0:236_5: pavattassa alaṅkāravohārassa upacaraṇaṃ soyamityabhedena parikappanaṃ upacāro. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n0:236_6: Paṭipādanīyapaṭipādakānaṃ abhedavasena kāraṇe kārīyassa upacariyatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:237_3: tabbohārūpacārato tassa alaṅkāroti katavohārassa alaṅkārasaddassa kāraṇe kārīyūpacārena
anya-e0812n0:237_4: tabbacanīyattaṃ tena alaṅkārasaddena vattabbataṃ yāti. Apisaddo alaṅkāramapekkhati.
anya-e0812n0:237_5: Alaṅkāre pakāseti, alaṅkārānaṃ vā pakāsakoti ca, tena vacanīyo, tassa bhāvoti ca
anya-e0812n0:237_6: viggaho. Ettha bhāvoti vāccavācakasambandho. Tassa saddādialaṅkārassa vohāroti ca,
anya-e0812n0:241_0: 13. Idāni yathāvuttaalaṅkārānaṃ pabhedaṃ, tappasaṅkañca taṃbandhasarīrañca heṭṭhā
anya-e0812n0:241_1: vuttampi ekato sambandhetvā dassetuṃ “dvippakārā”di āraddhaṃ. Tattha tasmiṃ kiriyākappasaṅkhāte
anya-e0812n0:241_2: ganthe, tasmiṃ vā bandhālaṅkārādhikāre alaṅkārā yathāvuttā dvippakārā honti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n0:241_3: Saddabhedato, atthabhedato ca, saddālaṅkārā atthālaṅkārāti alaṅkārā dvippakārā hontīti
anya-e0812n0:241_4: attho. Yesaṃ bhedena te dvippakārā, te saddā, atthā ca. “Bandho” iti vuttaṃ nāmaṃ
anya-e0812n0:241_5: yassā āvaliyā sā bandhanāmā eva. Taṃsajjitatadāvali tehi alaṅkārehi sajjitā pakāsitā
anya-e0812n0:241_6: taṃsajjitā, tesaṃ saddatthānaṃ āvali samudāyā, mahāvākyaṃ, antaravākyaṃ vā. Paripuṇṇo
anya-e0812n0:241_7: bandho mahāvākyaṃ, muttakādayovayavā antaravākyāni, taṃsajjitatadāvalikaṃ pasiddhabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:242_1: ekato dassetuṃ “dvippakāre”ccādimāha. Tattha tasmiṃ kiriyākappasaṅkhāte alaṅkāraganthe,
anya-e0812n0:242_2: no ce, alaṅkārādhikāre vā alaṅkārā vakkhamānālaṅkārā saddatthabhedato saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārabhedena
anya-e0812n0:242_3: dvippakārā honti, yesaṃ bhedena alaṅkārā bhinnā, te saddatthā bandhanāmāva. Taṃsajjitatadāvali
anya-e0812n0:242_4: tehi saddatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkatā, tesaṃ saddatthānaṃ mahākabbādisamudāyarūpā paṭipāṭibandhoti
anya-e0812n0:242_5: vuttaṃ hoti. “Bandho” iti nāmaṃ yasseti ca, tehi saddatthālaṅkārehi sajjitāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:245: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
anya-e0812n0:246_0: 14. Evaṃ guṇena alaṅkārena sajjitāpi sā saddatthāvali appakenapi dosena saṃyuttā
anya-e0812n0:246_1: satī asamphusitabbāva viññūhi siyāti dassetumāha “guṇa” iccādi. Saddālaṅkārākhyena
anya-e0812n0:246_2: guṇena, atthālaṅkārena ca saṃyuttāpi visesena sajjitāpi saddatthāvali dosalavena
anya-e0812n0:246_3: dosalesenāpi aṅkitā abhilañchitā satī viññūhi guṇadosavibhāgavidūhi paṇḍitapurisehi
anya-e0812n0:246_4: na pasaṃsiyā neva pasaṃsitabbā. Kāviyāti āha “kaññā viyatādisī”ti. Yathā hi kaññā
anya-e0812n0:246_6: cālaṅkatā kenaci kuṭṭhadosalesena aṅkitā viññūnaṃ asamphusanīyā siyā, pagevāparā,
anya-e0812n0:246_7: evameva saddatthāvalipi appakenapi saddarūpena, atthalakkhaṇena ca dosena kuṭṭhakappena
anya-e0812n0:246_8: vajjanīyā eva viññūnaṃ, pageva bahunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:247_0: 14. Evaṃ saddatthānaṃ guṇībhūtehi alaṅkārehi sajjitā saddatthāvali kenaci padādidosena
anya-e0812n0:247_2: api saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātaguṇena, atthālaṅkārena ca visesena yuttāpi sā saddatthāvali
anya-e0812n0:247_3: dosalavaṅkitā padadosādinā aṇumattenapi dosena aṅkitā yuttā sahitā tādisī guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttāpi
anya-e0812n0:247_4: dosalavaṅkitā kaññā viya dasavassikā yobbanappattā vanitāva viññūhi guṇadosaparikkhakehi
anya-e0812n0:247_5: na pasaṃsiyā na pasaṃsitabbā. Yathā hi dasavassikā itthī piyasabhāvasaṇṭhitā manuññehi
anya-e0812n0:247_6: guṇehi, sobhanānurūpagīveyyādiābharaṇavisesehi yuttāpi dissamānena kenaci setakuṭṭhalavena
anya-e0812n0:247_7: yuttā samānā guṇadosaparikkhakehi dassanīyā na hoti, evaṃ vuttappakārāpi bandhapaddhati
anya-e0812n0:247_8: kuṭṭhatulyena kenaci padādidosena yuttā viññūhi assādanīyāti adhippāyo. Dosānaṃ lavo,
anya-e0812n0:247_9: tena aṅkitāti ca, sā viya dissatīti tādīsīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:250: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ.
anya-e0812n0:251_0: 15. Yato evaṃ, tena tasmā kāraṇā mahussāhena mahatā vāyāmena dosānaṃ padadosādīnamanatthanimittānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:251_1: nirāsova satthadiṭṭhiyā satthappabhāvato pariccāgoyeva sādhiyo sādhetabbo, “viññūhī”ti
anya-e0812n0:251_2: seso. Evaṃ dosanirāse ko guṇo upalabbhatīti ce. Sabbathā sabbappakārena niddosā dosehi
anya-e0812n0:251_3: niggatā sāyaṃ saddatthāvali saguṇā saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi guṇehi sahitā na bhaveyya
anya-e0812n0:251_4: kiṃ, bhavatyeva, guṇarahitaṃ taṃalaṅkatamanupādeyyaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:252_0: 15. Tena yato dosayuttā viññūhi anupādeyyā, tasmā mahussāhena adhikavāyāmena dosanirāsova
anya-e0812n0:252_1: padadosādīnaṃ nirākaraṇameva sādhiyo anekasatthavisayāya paññāya viññūhi sādhetabbo,
anya-e0812n0:252_2: evaṃ sati sabbathā sabbākārena niddosā dosarahitā sā ayaṃ saddatthāvali saguṇā saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0812n0:252_3: guṇehi yuttā na bhaveyya kiṃ, guṇayuttā bhaveyyāti adhippāyo. Dosānaṃ nirāsoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:252_4: natthi dosā etissā, niggatā dosehi vāti ca, saha guṇehi vattamānāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:256_1: Sā saddatthāvali alaṅkārehi viyuttāpi satī niddosā sabbappakārena dosehi niggatā
anya-e0812n0:256_3: harati attano santikamākaḍḍhatīti manoharā hotīti. Tatthodāharaṇamāha “dosarahitā
anya-e0812n0:256_4: guṇayuttā vadhū viyā”ti. Yathā yena kenacipi dosena virahitā vadhū manāpacāritādīhi
anya-e0812n0:256_5: guṇavisesehi saṃyuttā satī kenaci ābharaṇena amaṇḍitā apasādhitāpi kinnāma madhurā
anya-e0812n0:256_6: kavīnaṃ pasādhanaṃ kinnāma manoharā hoti, evamayaṃ saddatthāvalipi manoharā hotīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:257_1: Sā saddatthāvali alaṅkārehi viyuttā satīpi niddosā sabbappakārena dosarahitā guṇayuttā
anya-e0812n0:257_2: tatoyeva guṇībhūtā saddālaṅkārena yuttā dosarahitā dubbaṇṇadussaṇṭhānādidosehi pariccattā
anya-e0812n0:257_3: guṇayuttā hadayaṅgamaguṇayuttā vadhū viya aṅganā viya manoharā sādhujane ārādheti.
anya-e0812n0:259: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
anya-e0812n0:261_0: 17. Yato evaṃ guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttāyapi dosalavaṅkitāya viññūnamanādaraṇīyatā, alaṅkāraviyuttāpi
anya-e0812n0:261_1: dosābhāvena guṇayuttāya manoharatā, evamanatthāvahassāpi dosassa pariharitabbatā
anya-e0812n0:261_2: satthadiṭṭhiyā, tasmā te dose dassetuṃ paṭijānāti “pade”tiādinā. Tesaṃ padānaṃ vākyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:261_3: attho tadattho, tasmiṃ. Udāharīyati lakkhyabhāvenāti udāharaṇaṃ, saha udāharaṇehīti
anya-e0812n0:262_0: 17. Evaṃ alaṅkārayuttāpi appakena dosena yuttabandhassa anupādeyyattā, alaṅkāraalaṅkaraṇe
anya-e0812n0:262_1: asatipi dosarahite viññūhi upādeyyattā ca mukhyassa dosaparihārassa avassaṃ kattabbattā
anya-e0812n0:262_2: idāni adhigatadose dassetuṃ paṭijānāti “pade vākye”ccādinā. Pade nāmādicatubbidhapade
anya-e0812n0:262_3: ca, vākye “syādyantatyādyantānaṃ cayo vākyaṃ sakārakakiriyā”ti vuttalakkhaṇe vākye
anya-e0812n0:262_4: ca, tadatthe ca tesaṃ padavākyānaṃ atthe ca vividhā anekappakārā ye dosā viññūhi
anya-e0812n0:262_5: dosabhāvena matā ñeyyā, etesaṃ padādidosānaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ udāharaṇasahitaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:264: Nipātakañca taññūhi, asso khalvābhidhāvatī”ti rūpabhiddhiṭīkāyaṃ nāmakaṇḍe.
anya-e0812n0:265: Vuttaniyāmena padaṃ tāva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Udāharīyanti lakkhiyabhāvenāti udāharaṇānīti ca, saha udāharaṇenāti sodāharaṇanti ca, lakkhīyati lakkhiyamanenāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:280_0: 18-19-20. Idāni yathāpaṭiññāte dose uddisati “viruddhatthantara” iccādinā. Viruddhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:280_1: atthantaraṃ yassa taṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Padaṃ. Evamuparipi yathāyogaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:280_2: Adhiko attho visesyassa yena taṃ adhyatthaṃ. Nīyati avutto hetu ettha ānīyatīti neyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:280_3: Dosā padānanti yehi dosehi padāni duṭṭhāni, te viruddhatthantaratādayo padānaṃ dosāti
anya-e0812n0:280_4: attho. Evamuparipi yathāyogaṃ. Vākyānaṃ dosāti sambandho. Bhaggā rīti kamo yasmiṃ
anya-e0812n0:280_5: taṃ bhaggarītikaṃ, vākyaṃ. Apakkamatādayo vākyatthadosā, vākyatthānaṃ dosato. Vākyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:280_6: duṭṭhaṃ siyāti vākyameva visesyate. Tena sabbattha napuṃsakaliṅgena niddeso.
anya-e0812n0:281_0: 18-19-20. Idāni kathetabbabhāvena paṭiññāte dose uddisanto “viruddha…pe… nissitā”ti
anya-e0812n0:281_1: āha. Kavīhi icchitatthato viruddho aññattho yassa padassāti taṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:281_2: nāma. Visesyassa adhikatthabhāvakaraṇato ajhatthaṃ nāma. Kavīhi icchitatthassāvīkaraṇe
anya-e0812n0:281_3: avisadattā kiliṭṭhaṃ nāma. Desakālakalādīnaṃ viruddhattā virodhi nāma. Aññamāharitvā
anya-e0812n0:281_4: vattabbato neyyaṃ nāma. Visesanaṃ patvāva sātthakabhāvappattito visesanāpekkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:281_5: Visesyassa hīnatāpādanato hīnatthakaṃ nāma. Attharahitattā anatthakaṃ nāmāti ime
anya-e0812n0:282_0: Vuttatthasseva puna vacanato ekatthaṃ nāma. Bhinnakkamattā bhaggarītikaṃ nāma. Tathā
anya-e0812n0:282_1: sammohakāraṇattā byākiṇṇaṃ nāma. Visiṭṭhavacanavirahato gāmmaṃ nāma. Yatisampattivirahato
anya-e0812n0:282_2: yatihīnaṃ nāma. Padatthakkamato cutattā kamaccutaṃ nāma. Lokiyaṃ vohāramatikkamma
anya-e0812n0:282_3: vuttattā ativuttaṃ nāma. Samudāyatthato apagatattā apetatthaṃ nāma. Bandhapharusayuttattā
anya-e0812n0:282_4: bandhapharusaṃ nāma, tena sahitaṃ sabandhapharusanti ime nava vākyānaṃ tathā dosā
anya-e0812n0:283_0: Apagatakkamattā apakkamaṃ nāma. Ucitabhāvassa parihīnattā ocityahīnaṃ nāma. Bhinnavibhattikkamattā
anya-e0812n0:283_1: bhaggarīti nāma. Saṃsayajananato sasaṃsayaṃ nāma. Duppatītikarattā gāmmaṃ nāma. Dūsitālaṅkārattā
anya-e0812n0:283_2: duṭṭhālaṅkati nāmātime cha vākyatthanissitattā vākyatthadosā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:284_0: Añño attho atthantaro. Viruddho atthantaro yassāti viggaho. Dosapakāsakapadampi dosato
anya-e0812n0:284_1: abyatirittattā doso nāma. Evaṃ santepi samāsena padassa gahitattā napuṃsakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:284_2: Esevanayo ito paresupi. Visesyassa adhiko attho yassa taṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ viya kiliṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:284_3: Yathā hi malaggahito ādāso attano kiliṭṭhattā mukhādīnaṃ pakāsane avisado hoti, evamadhippetatthappakāsane
anya-e0812n0:284_4: asamatthaṃ padaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ nāma. Virodho assa atthīti virodhi. Nīyati avutto hetu
anya-e0812n0:284_5: etthāti neyyaṃ. Visesane apekkhā yassa taṃ. Hīno visesyassa attho yena taṃ. Natthi
anya-e0812n0:285_0: Padadosānaṃ anaññattepi vikappanābhedato “padānaṃ dosā”ti vuttaṃ, yathā “silāputtakassa
anya-e0812n0:285_1: sarīra”nti. Vākyānaṃ dosāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Eko attho yassa taṃ. Bhaggārīti kamo
anya-e0812n0:285_2: yassa taṃ. Visuṃ visuṃ ākiṇṇaṃ byākiṇṇaṃ. Gāme bhavo gāmmo, abyattānaṃ vohāro. Tappakāsakapadampi
anya-e0812n0:285_3: upacārato gāmmaṃ nāma. Yati hīnā etthāti yatihīnaṃ. Kamato cutaṃ kamaccutaṃ. Atikkamma
anya-e0812n0:285_4: vuttaṃ ativuttaṃ. Atthato apetaṃ apetatthaṃ. Bandhe pharusaṃ pharusatā yattha taṃ.
anya-e0812n0:285_5: Apagato kamo yasmā taṃ. Ocityaṃ hīnaṃ yattha taṃ. Bhaggā rīti yattha taṃ. Saha saṃsayena
anya-e0812n0:285_6: vattatīti taṃ. Gāmmaṃ vuttanayameva. Duṭṭhā dūsitā alaṅkati alaṅkāro yattha taṃ.
anya-e0812n0:285_7: Vākyānaṃ attho, tannissitā vākyatthanissitāti viggaho. Ettha anatthakāpetatthadosadvayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:285_8: padavākyato bhinnaṃ, aññaṃ bhaggarītidosadvayaṃ, gāmmadvayaṃ, kamaccutaapakkamadvayañca
anya-e0812n0:289: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:290_0: 21. Athoddesakkamena padādidose udāharati “viruddhi” ccādinā. Hi yasmā kāraṇā, pasiddhiyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:290_1: vā hisaddo. Yassa padassa añño adhippetato aparo attho adhippete vattumicchite atthe
anya-e0812n0:290_3: Yathā idaṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ, tathā aññampi tādisaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na tvidameveti yathāsaddassa
anya-e0812n0:290_4: attho. Megho visado sukhaye jananti. Visaṃ udakaṃ, taṃ dadātīti visado megho vārivaho
anya-e0812n0:290_5: janaṃ lokaṃ sukhaye sukhayatīti kavicchitattho. Visasaddo garaḷassa ca vācako siyāti
anya-e0812n0:290_6: garaḷado megho mārayati, na pana sukhayatīti “visado”ti visesanapadassa viruddhatā.
anya-e0812n0:291_1: Yassa padassa aññattho kavicchitatthato añño attho adhippete icchitatthe hi yasmā
anya-e0812n0:291_2: virujjhati, tasmā taṃ padaṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ nāma. Pasiddhiyaṃ vā hisaddo. Tathā
anya-e0812n0:291_3: hesa appasiddhaṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ “yassa aññattho adhippete virujjhatī”ti pakāsetvā
anya-e0812n0:291_4: tasmiṃ pakāsitatthavisaye vattati. “Taṃ hī”ti yojitattā “yassa aññattho adhippete
anya-e0812n0:291_5: virujjhatī”ti lakkhaṇaṃ pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā taṃ viruddhatthantaranti anuvaditabbaappasiddhaviruddhatthantaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:291_6: vidhīyate, yathā “yo kuṇḍalī, so devadatto”ti. Upari pasiddhānuvādena appasiddhavidhānameva
anya-e0812n0:291_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Yathā…pe… jana”nti udāharaṇaṃ lakkhiyaṃ dasseti. Yathā “megho visado”ccādi
anya-e0812n0:291_8: viruddhatthantarassa udāharaṇaṃ, evamīdisamaññampi imassudāharaṇaṃ, na kevalaṃ “megho”ccādimeva
anya-e0812n0:291_9: bhavatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāsaddo cettha ivasaddapariyāyatthepi udāharaṇattho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0812n0:291_10: uparipyevaṃ. Megho ambudharo visado visasaṅkhātaṃ jalaṃ dadanto janaṃ sukhaye sukhayatīti
anya-e0812n0:291_12: dadātīti visado”ti ettha visassa udakavisānaṃ sādhāraṇattā visadāyako megho nāsetiyeva,
anya-e0812n0:291_13: na sukhayatīti kavinā adhippetassa sukhakāraṇassa meghavisesanavisasaddassa viruddhaaññatthatāti
anya-e0812n0:297_0: 22. Yena padena visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ aparaṃ padaṃ atthavasena adhikaṃ bhavatītyanuvaditvā
anya-e0812n0:297_2: suviññeyyaṃ. Obhāsitā dīpitā asesā nikhilā disāyena soyaṃ khajjoto virājate dippati.
anya-e0812n0:298_0: 22. Yena visesanapadena visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ padaṃ atthavasena adhikaṃ hoti, etaṃ
anya-e0812n0:298_1: yathāvuttalakkhaṇopetaṃ padaṃ ajhatthaṃ bhave ajhatthaṃ nāma padadoso bhave. Yathā
anya-e0812n0:298_2: tassudāharaṇamevaṃ. Obhāsitāsesadiso jotitasabbadiso ayaṃ khajjoto ayaṃ jotiriṅgaṇo
anya-e0812n0:298_3: virājate dippati. Ettha visesyassa khajjotassa sakaladisobhāsanassa ajhatthattā atyuttattā
anya-e0812n0:298_4: (ka.) “obhāsitāsesadiso”ti visesanapadaṃ ajhatthapadadoso nāma. Obhāsitā asesadisā yenāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:304_0: 23. Pakatyādivibhāgatoti paccayā paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati. Ādisaddena paccayādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:304_1: pariggaho. Pakatyādīnaṃvibhāgato vibhajanato, “ayaṃ pakati, ayaṃ paccayo, ayamādeso”tiādinā
anya-e0812n0:304_2: pakatipaccayavibhāgakappanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pīṇetīti pī, tāya piyā vallabhāya soyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:305_0: 23. Yassa padassa atthāvagamo atthāvabodho pakatyādivibhāgato “ayaṃ pakati, ayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:305_1: paccayo, ayamādeso”tiādinā pakatyādīnaṃ vibhajanajānanena, “pakatyādi nāma ki”nti
anya-e0812n0:305_2: gavesanato vā dukkho, taṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ nāma. Yathā tassudāharaṇamevaṃ. Tāya piyā vanitāya
anya-e0812n0:305_3: so ayaṃ vallabho āliṅgyate silissate. Paccayā paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati. Sā ādi
anya-e0812n0:305_4: yesaṃ paccayānaṃ, tesaṃ vibhāgoti vākyaṃ. Pīṇetīti pī, nārī. Tāya piyā ettha piyāsaṅkhātāya
anya-e0812n0:305_5: vallabhāya kathane pīsaddassa avisadattā “piyā”ti padaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:309_1: Tattha yanti aniyamavacanaṃ, tassa niyamavacanaṃ yamakādikanti. Yamakamādi yassa
anya-e0812n0:309_2: paheḷikājātassa taṃ yamakādikaṃ. Kīdisanti āha “kiliṭṭhapada”ntiādi. Kiliṭṭhāni appatītadosasabhāve
anya-e0812n0:309_3: ṭhitatāya malitānyavisadāni padāni yassa taṃ kiliṭṭhapadaṃ. Mando appako abhidheyyo
anya-e0812n0:309_4: attho yassa taṃ mandābhidheyyaṃ, tādisaṃ tampi yamakādikaṃ kiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva yathāvutte
anya-e0812n0:309_5: anto abbhantare karīyati vidhīyati tattheva pakkhipīyati, kiliṭṭhapadadosato na byatiriccatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:310_0: 24. Idāni anadhippetamapi yamakādiṃ kiliṭṭhadoseyeva antokaraṇabyājena āvīkaronto
anya-e0812n0:310_1: āha “yaṃ kiliṭṭhe”ccādi. Kiliṭṭhapadaṃ appatītadosena missakattā avisadapadaṃ mandābhidheyyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:310_2: appakābhidheyyaṃ yaṃ yamakādikaṃ yaṃ yamakappaheḷikājātamatthi, tampi kiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva
anya-e0812n0:310_3: yathāvuttakiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva anto karīyati abbhantare karīyati, kiliṭṭhapadadosato
anya-e0812n0:310_4: abyatirittanti adhippāyo. Kiliṭṭhāni padāni yassa, mando abhidheyyo yassa, yamakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:310_5: ādi yassa paheḷikājātassa, kiliṭṭhapadānaṃ dosoti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:314_0: 25. Hotu kāmamanabhimatamedisaṃ yamakādikaṃ, kiñcarahi abhimatanti āha “patīti”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:314_1: Attano vacanīyatthappatītavasena vācakāpi saddā patītāyeva nāmāti patītehi pasiddhehi
anya-e0812n0:314_2: saddehi pāṭipadikehi racitaṃ kataṃ patītasaddaracitaṃ. Siliṭṭhā aññamaññāliṅganena
anya-e0812n0:314_3: maṭṭhā padānaṃ syādyantādīnaṃ sandhayo sandhanā yassa taṃ siliṭṭhapadasandhikaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:314_4: Patītasaddaracitattāyeva pasādasaṅkhātena guṇena saddālaṅkārena saṃyuttaṃ sammadevopetaṃ
anya-e0812n0:314_5: edisaṃ yathāvuttaguṇāsayaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ yamakaṃ mataṃ abhimatanti attho.
anya-e0812n0:315_0: 25. Idāni adhigatesu yamakesu īdisaṃ yamakamiṭṭhamiti sissānaṃ upadisanto āha “patīte”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:315_1: Patītasaddaracitaṃ “imassatthassāyaṃ vācako”ti patītehi pasiddhehi saddehi racitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:315_2: pāṭipadikehi kataṃ siliṭṭhapadasandhikaṃ siliṭṭhā syādyantādipadānaṃ sandhayo yassa
anya-e0812n0:315_4: saṃyuttaṃ īdisaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ guṇādhikato ramaṇīyaṃ upari vakkhamānayamakasadisaṃ yamakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:315_5: mataṃ viññūhi abhimataṃ. Patītā ca te saddā ca, tehi racitaṃ, siliṭṭhā padānaṃ sandhayo
anya-e0812n0:315_6: yassa, pasādoti guṇo saddālaṅkāro, tena saṃyuttanti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:319_0: 26. Idāni taṃ yathāvuttamabhimataṃ dassetumupakkamate “abyapete”ccādinā. Āvuttā adhivuttā
anya-e0812n0:319_1: punappunuccāraṇupetā anekesaṃ patirūpattā, bahuvaṇṇā sarabyañjanarūpā, na eko vaṇṇo
anya-e0812n0:319_2: tassānuppāsattā, tathā ca vakkhati “vaṇṇāvutti paro yathā”ti subodhālaṅkāra 127 gāthā,
anya-e0812n0:319_3: tehi jātaṃ yamakanti viññāyate. Katividhaṃ taṃ vikappīyatīti āha “abyapetaṃ byapetañña”nti.
anya-e0812n0:319_4: Tattha yaṃ vaṇṇantarābyavahitaṃ vaṇṇasamudāyena vuttaṃ. Tadabyapetaṃ yamakaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0812n0:319_5: tu byavahitaṃ, taṃ byapetaṃ. Yaṃ pana ubhayamissaṃ, taṃ aññaṃ aparaṃ abyapetabyapetanti
anya-e0812n0:319_6: tidhā yamakaṃ tāva vikappīyate. Tametaṃ tividhaṃ yamakaṃ visayavibhāganirūpanāyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:319_7: ādi ca majjho ca anto ca gocaro visayo yasseti ādimajjhantagocaraṃ viññeyyaṃ. Kesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:319_8: pādānaṃ? Paccekaṃ catunnaṃgāthāvayavānaṃ. Sāpekkhattepi samāso gammakattā.
anya-e0812n0:320_0: Tattha pādacatukkassa ādimajjhantabhāvīnaṃ yamakānaṃ yāvanto pakārā sambhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:320_1: te mūlā satta. Kathaṃ? Ekasmiṃyeva pāde kvaci ādiyamakaṃ, kvaci majjhayamakaṃ, kvaci
anya-e0812n0:320_2: antayamakaṃ, kvaci majjhantayamakaṃ, kvaci majjhādiyamakaṃ, kvaci ādyantayamakaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:320_3: kvaci sabbayamakanti. Evaṃ paccekaṃ mūlabhūtā sattāti catūsu aṭṭhavīsati honti. Pādādiyamakañca
anya-e0812n0:320_6: anekadhā pasaṃsanti. Yadā ca sabbatoyamakaṃ, tadā mahāyamakādayo vikappā jāyantīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:321_0: 26. Idāni abhimatayamakaṃ dīpeti “abyapete”ccādinā. Āvuttehi punappunaṃ vuttehi anekavaṇṇehi
anya-e0812n0:321_1: samudāyarūpattā anekehi sarabyañjanasarīrehi vaṇṇehi jātaṃ yamakaṃ aññehi vaṇṇehi
anya-e0812n0:321_2: abyavahitattā abyapetaṃ, vaṇṇantarehi byavahitattā byapetaṃ, ubhayamissakattā tehi
anya-e0812n0:321_3: aññaṃ abyapetabyapetañcāti tividhaṃ hoti. Tañca yamakaṃ visayavibhāganiyamena gāthāpādānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:321_4: ādigocaraṃ majjhagocaraṃ antagocaramiti tividhaṃ hoti. Ettha casaddo vattabbantare
anya-e0812n0:321_5: pavattati, vattabbantaraṃ nāma yathāvuttaabyapetādibhedato aññaṃ vattabbatāya samukhībhūtaṃ
anya-e0812n0:321_6: pādānaṃ ādimajjhāvasānantaraṃ, upanyāso vākyārambhoti ca etasseva nāmaṃ. Visadisena
anya-e0812n0:321_7: vaṇṇena apetaṃ byapetaṃ. Tabbiparītamabyapetaṃ. Abyapetañca byapetañca aññañcāti
anya-e0812n0:321_8: samāhāradvando. Aneke ca te vaṇṇā ca, āvuttāyeva anekavaṇṇā, tehi jātaṃ, ādi ca majjho
anya-e0812n0:321_9: ca anto ca, te gocarā yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:322_0: Tattha pādacatukkassa ādimajjhāvasānesu labbhamānayamakabhedā ekekasmiṃ pāde satta
anya-e0812n0:322_1: satta bhavanti. Kathaṃ? Pādādiyamakaṃ pādamajjhayamakaṃ pādantayamakaṃ majjhantayamakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:322_2: majjhādiyamakaṃ ādyantayamakaṃ sabbatoyamakanti evaṃ paccekaṃ satta satta katvā catūsu
anya-e0812n0:322_3: mūlabhūtayamakā aṭṭhavīsa bhavanti. Ettha pādādiyamakādikampi abyapetapaṭhamapādādiyamakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:322_7: evamabyapetapādādiyamakā dasa honti. Tathā byapetāpi dasāti vīsati, abyapetapaṭhamapādamajjhayamakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:322_8: tathā dutiyapādamajjhayamakamiccādinā majjhayamakampi vīsatividhaṃ hoti. Abyapetapaṭhamapādantayamakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:322_9: tathā dutiyapādantayamakamiccādinā antayamakampi vīsatividhaṃ. Saṃsaggabhedato pana anekavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:327_0: 27. “Sujanā”iccādi. Sujanā sajjanā, asujanā asajjanāti ete sabbe ubhayapakkhapātino
anya-e0812n0:327_1: visesā janā guṇena sīlādinā karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena vā vivekinopi sādhūsu labbhamānānamasādhūsvanupalabbhanato
anya-e0812n0:327_2: puthubhūtāpi avivekīnaṃ janānaṃ antike samīpe tesaṃ sannidhāne vivekaṃ vibhāgaṃ na
anya-e0812n0:327_3: samāyanti napāpuṇanti, vibhāgavijānanapaññāvekallena ca vivekinopi janā te ekato
anya-e0812n0:328_1: sādhujanā, asujanā asādhujanā ceti sabbe ubhayapakkhikā sīlādinā, pāṇātipātādinā
anya-e0812n0:328_2: guṇena hetunā vivekino api sādhūsu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ, asādhūsu sīlādīnaṃ appavattito
anya-e0812n0:328_3: guṇena puthubhūtāpi avivekijanantike vivekañāṇarahitānaṃ janānaṃ santike vivekaṃ
anya-e0812n0:328_4: vibhāgaṃ na samāyanti na pāpuṇanti. Viveko vinābhavanametesamatthīti vivekino. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:328_5: visayopacārena vivekoti paññā, na vivekinoti avivekino, teyeva janā, tesaṃ antikamiti
anya-e0812n0:333_0: 28. “Kusalā”iccādi. Pabalā āsevanappaṭilābhavasena balavanto ca. Athāti anantaratthe
anya-e0812n0:333_1: nipāto. Apabalā tadabhāvato dubbalā ca sabbe kusalākusalā dhammā yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ
anya-e0812n0:333_2: ahosittaṃ vinā uppattimattaṃ phaladānāsambhavato kevalaṃ “ahosī”ti vacanīyatthanimittamattakammabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:333_3: ahosikammattaṃ no yātā na sampattā, tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ sukhañca dukkhañca taṃ padantīti
anya-e0812n0:333_4: sukhadukkhappadā siyuṃ. Yāva saṃsārapavatti, tāva sukhadukkhadāyakā hontīti. Idaṃ
anya-e0812n0:334_0: 28. Pabalā āsevanādipaccayalābhena balavanto vā atha apabalā tadabhāvena dubbalā
anya-e0812n0:334_1: vā sabbe kusalākusalā ahosittaṃ phaladānābhāvato pavattimattataṃ yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ
anya-e0812n0:334_2: no yātā appattā, tāva tattakaṃ sukhadukkhappadā yathākkamaṃ sukhadukkhapadāyino siyuṃ
anya-e0812n0:334_4: vattabbassa bhāvo ahosittaṃ. “Ehipassiko”tiādīsu viya kriyāpadatopi ṇādipaccayā honti.
anya-e0812n0:337: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
anya-e0812n0:339_0: 29. “Sādara”miccādi. Vandanā dvārattayopadassiyamānā māno ca pūjā, tesaṃ bhājane
anya-e0812n0:339_1: ādhārabhūte ratijananādinā atthena ratanasaṅkhātānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ taye samūhabhūte
anya-e0812n0:339_2: ratanattaye sādaraṃ ādarasahitaṃ katvā mayā vihitā katā, vihitā alaṃsaṃsāradukkhavisaṭanirākaraṇato
anya-e0812n0:339_3: visesena hitā padhyā sā vandanā so paṇāmo daraṃ darathaṃ kāyacittapariḷāhaṃ hantu
anya-e0812n0:339_4: hiṃsatu. Mayāti vuttattā meti atthato viññāyati. Idaṃ pana paṭhamadutiyatatiyapādādiyamakamabyapetaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:340_1: ratijananādiatthena ratanasaṅkhātānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ taye mayā yā vandanā sādaraṃ ādarasahitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:340_2: vihitā katā, vihitā lokiya lokuttara sampattisādhanato visesena hitā sā vandanā daraṃ
anya-e0812n0:340_3: mayhaṃ kāyacittadarathaṃ hantu vināsetu. Idaṃ abyapetapaṭhamadutiyatatiyapādādiyamakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:340_4: Saha ādarena vattamānaṃ sādaraṃ, kriyāvisesanaṃ. Ettha kriyā nāma vihitāsaddena niddiṭṭhakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:340_6: vijjamānaṃ “akāsi”nti kriyāya sambandhamupentaṃ kammañca hoti, bhāve vihitassa yupaccayantassa
anya-e0812n0:340_7: napuṃsakattā napuṃsakañca, sattāya ekattā ekavacanañca tabbisesanattā sādarasaddopi
anya-e0812n0:344: Kātabbā tā visesane”ti sambandhacinto 15 gāthā bhedacintā 194 gāthā.
anya-e0812n0:345_0: Hi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ kriyāvisesane gahite sāmatthiyato “mayā”ti tatiyantassa paṭhamantattaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:345_1: “vandanā”ti paṭhamantassa chaṭṭhuntañca hoti. Vandanā ca māno ca, tesaṃ bhājanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:345_2: Tiṇṇaṃ samūho tayaṃ, ratanānaṃ tayanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:349: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sahitaṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:350_0: 30. “Kamala”miccādi. Kamalaṃ aravindaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alaṅkattuṃ sajjanatthāya hoti, vikasitāravindasandohasambhāvitodakassa
anya-e0812n0:350_1: vāpādīsu tādisaramaṇīyattasampattisambhavato, avanaṃ rakkhaṃ dadāti sassasampatyādikāraṇabhāvenāti
anya-e0812n0:350_2: avanado. Vanaṃ jalaṃ dadāti na tucchoti vanado megho ambaraṃ ākāsaṃ jaladhārabhārabharitambarakuharassa
anya-e0812n0:350_3: dassanīyatāguṇayogato alaṃkattunti adhikataṃ. Sahitaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ hitaṃ abhivuddhiṃ
anya-e0812n0:350_4: karaṃ karonto suṭṭhu gadatīti sugato mañjubhāṇī pubbabuddhā viya nekkhammādinā kāmacchandādike
anya-e0812n0:350_5: pajahanto gantvā arahattamaggena savāsanasakalakilese samucchinditvā sobhanaṃ nibbānapuraṃ
anya-e0812n0:350_6: gatoti vā sugatoti vutto so mahāmuni attano aparimitapāramitāsimpakacagalitatilakabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:350_7: lokaṃ lokattayaṃ, sahitaṃ lokanti vā yojanīyaṃ alaṅkattuṃ alaṃkaraṇāyāti. Idaṃ pādacatukkādiyamakamabyapetaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:351_0: 30. Kamalaṃ padumaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alaṅkattuṃ pañcavidhapadumasañchannassa udakassa ramaṇīyattā
anya-e0812n0:351_1: sajjetuṃ hoti. Avanado kāle vuṭṭhisampadāya sassasampadādīnaṃ kāraṇattā ārakkhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:351_2: dento vanado megho ambaraṃ ākāsaṃ alaṅkattuṃ jaladhārabhārabharitambarakucchiyā dassanīyattā
anya-e0812n0:351_3: sajjetuṃ hoti, sahitaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ hitaṃ abhivuḍḍhiṃ karaṃ karonto sugato citrakathī
anya-e0812n0:351_4: sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gato vā so sugato so tathāgato lokaṃ lokattayaṃ, sahitaṃ lokaṃ
anya-e0812n0:351_5: vā alaṅkattuṃ citrakathādikāraṇehi tādisassa aññassa ca lokarāmaṇeyyassābhāvā sajjetuṃ
anya-e0812n0:351_6: hoti. Sabbapadatthānaṃ sattābyabhicārittā hotīti gammaṃ. Tatoyeva sabbe paṭhamantabhavanakriyāya
anya-e0812n0:355_1: “abyapete”ccādinā. Abyapetassa abyavahitassa catunnaṃ pādānaṃ ādo, ādibhūtassa vā
anya-e0812n0:355_2: yamakassa eso yathāvutto leso kocideva bhedo nidassito vikappito. Aparānipi kiṃ na
anya-e0812n0:355_3: vikappiyantīticeti āha “ñeyyāni”ccādi. Imāya disāya iminā upāyena maggeneva aññāni
anya-e0812n0:355_6: abyapetabyapetāni, tathā majjhantapādayamakāni ñeyyāni jānitabbāni, viññūnaṃ tādisāya
anya-e0812n0:357: Vigāhante samaṃ nātha, cittaṃ citte kathaṃ nu te”.
anya-e0812n0:365: Suciraṃ suciraṃgaṃ taṃ, sa’malaṃ samalaṃbhi yo”.
anya-e0812n0:371: Yo taṃ jinavaraṃ dhīra-matthakāmosi ce tuvaṃ”.
anya-e0812n0:373_2: vā eso leso “sujani”ccādiko appakodāharaṇanayo nidassito niddiṭṭho. Aññāni yamakānipi
anya-e0812n0:373_3: imāyeva disāya iminā nayeneva ñeyyāni viññūhi ñātabbāni. Ādo yamakaṃ, ādibhūtaṃ vā
anya-e0812n0:373_4: yamakaṃ, abyapetañca taṃ ādiyamakañcāti vākyaṃ. Evaṃ dassitena iminā kamena abyapetadutiyapādādiyamakādayo
anya-e0812n0:376: Vigāhante samaṃ nātha, cittaṃ citte kathaṃ nu te.
anya-e0812n0:377_0: Bho nātha te tuyhaṃ citte sādhavo asādhavo te janā guṇāguṇena sakasakaguṇena aguṇena
anya-e0812n0:377_1: ca saha samaṃ ekajjhaṃ kathaṃ nu vigāhante, cittaṃ acchariyaṃ sujanadujjanesu samamettā
anya-e0812n0:380: Pādānate jinokāsi, so dhammo hantu vo’ppīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:381: Jino appiyabhāṇinopi sabbe jane piyena yena vacasā pādānate akāsi, so dhammo vo appiyaṃ hantu. Ettha apisaddapariyāyassa pisaddassa gahitattā yatibhaṅgo natthi.
anya-e0812n0:384: Suciraṃ suciraṃgaṃ taṃ, sa’malaṃ samalaṃbhi yoti.
anya-e0812n0:385_0: Ettha “samalaṃ samalaṃ, suciraṃ sucira”nti visadisavaṇṇehi abyavahitattā abyapetaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:385_3: ca byavahitattā byapetañca hoti. Suciraṃsuci sobhanaraṃsinā uci yutto yo jino saṃ
anya-e0812n0:385_4: santiṃ nibbānaṃ samalaṃbhi alabhi, alaṃ accantaṃ atisayena suciraṃgaṃ visuddhadehaṃ
anya-e0812n0:385_5: taṃ jinaṃ samalaṃ jallikāsaṅkhātena, rāgādikucchitasaṅkhātena vā malena sahitaṃ saṃ
anya-e0812n0:385_6: attānaṃ alaṃkattuṃ nimmalaṃ katvā sajjetuṃ suciraṃ sucirakālaṃ raṃjaye attani abhiramāpeyya.
anya-e0812n0:387: Manohara hara klesaṃ, jina cetobhavaṃ mama;
anya-e0812n0:389: Manohara jina mama cetobhavaṃ klesaṃ santāpaṃ hara apanaya, tvaṃ pāramīsārāmatabhāvitaṃ osadhaṃ dibbosadhaṃ nanu.
anya-e0812n0:392: Yo taṃ jinavaraṃ dhīra-matthakāmosi ce tuvanti.
anya-e0812n0:393_0: Yo jinavaro sādhunā jayaddhaninā veneyyajayaghosena mahiṃ āpūrayi, dhīraṃ taṃ jinavaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:393_1: tuvaṃ sappurisa ce atthakāmo asi, raṃjaya abhiramāpehi. Iminā niddiṭṭhayamakeheva
anya-e0812n0:399_0: 32. Kiṃ pana sākallena na vikappitānīti āha “accanti”ccādi. Tesaṃ vikappānaṃ sambhedo
anya-e0812n0:399_1: saṅkaro missattamuccāraṇappakāro yoni pabhavo yesaṃ te sambhedayoniyo, bhedā pakārā
anya-e0812n0:399_2: accantabahavo atisayena bahulā yathāvuttanayena sambhavanti, tatthāpi tesu vikappesupi
anya-e0812n0:399_3: keci vikappā sukhena karīyanti payujjantīti sukarā, tabbiparīto ca keci vikappā accantadukkarā.
anya-e0812n0:399_4: Iti dvidhā saṅgayhanti, tesu sukarānaṃ kesañci abhimatayamakānaṃ mukhamattaṃ dassitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:399_5: Idāni dukkarānaṃ kesañci mukhamattaṃ na sabbamevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:401: Kathaṃ na te na te siyuṃ;
anya-e0812n0:410_1: Tesaṃ yamakānaṃ sambhedayoniyo pabheduppattikāraṇabhūtā bhedā uccāvacapakārā accantabahavo,
anya-e0812n0:410_2: tatthāpi tesupi keci yamakā sukarā susādhiyā, keci accantadukkarā atisayena dussādhiyā.
anya-e0812n0:414: Manaṃ manaṃ tena dadeyya ce na,
anya-e0812n0:417_0: Yo puggalo manaṃ attano cittaṃ satthu jinassa manaṃ khaṇamattampi dadeyya ce, satthu
anya-e0812n0:417_1: munindassa manaṃ cittaṃ assa puggalassa manaṃ cittaṃ pīṇayati sampīṇeti, tena tasmā
anya-e0812n0:417_2: manaṃ manaṃ cittaṃ cittaṃ dadeyya ce na yadi no dadeyya, assa puggalassa manaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0812n0:417_3: manaṃpi muhuttampi sādhupujjaṃ sādhūhi pūjitabbaṃ na bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:419: Kathaṃ na te na te siyuṃ;
anya-e0812n0:423_0: Yato yena kāraṇena te tuyhaṃ satā sobhanena samunnatena sammā unnatena hetunā natepi
anya-e0812n0:423_1: avanatepi anatepi anavanatepi te te subhā te te sobhanā na na siyuṃ, bhavanteva,
anya-e0812n0:423_2: ato tena kāraṇena te subhā te sobhanā nate avanate kathaṃ na siyuṃ, bhavanteva.
anya-e0812n0:429_0: Paṇāmonatasajjanaṃ paṇāmitukāmonatasādhujanavantaṃ janaṃ veneyyajanaṃ asajja pamādamakatvā
anya-e0812n0:429_1: guṇe sīlādiguṇe nivesentaṃ niyojentaṃ veneyyanette añjanaṃ añjanabhūtaṃ guṇabhājanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:429_2: guṇānamādhārabhūtaṃ sajjanaṃjanaṃ iminā kāraṇena sādhujanānaṃ añjanabhūtaṃ janaṃ
anya-e0812n0:429_3: sādhujanaṃ khalu ekantena mamentaṃ mamāyantaṃ naṃ jinaṃ name namāmi.
anya-e0812n0:432: Sābhāya sā bhāti na ce kathaṃ na,
anya-e0812n0:435_0: Bhuvane sattaloke sābhāsu vijjamānābhāsu jinassa sābhā sobhanā ābhā sābhāya vijjamānāya,
anya-e0812n0:435_1: sobhanāya vā ābhāya ābhāto jātu ekantena bhāsatiyeva dippateva, sā jinābhā sābhāya
anya-e0812n0:435_2: vijjamānābhāto adhikā hutvā ce na bhāti yadi na bhāsati, sasābhānaṃ vijjamānasobhanābhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:435_3: brahmādīnaṃ sābhā sobhanābhāyo aticca atikkamma kathaṃ na bhāti, bhāsatiyeva.
anya-e0812n0:441_0: Surāvinissaṭā surāpānato apagatā janā yathā surājanti, tathā vibhūsitā visesena alaṅkatā
anya-e0812n0:441_1: tepi surā te devā api na bhāsurā sobhamānā na honti, tathā evaṃ surāparājitā surāpānahetu
anya-e0812n0:441_2: parājitabhāvaṃ pattā bhūri asurā bahavo vepacittiādayo asurāpi na bhāsurā na sobhanti,
anya-e0812n0:441_3: tathā evaṃ surājito suṭṭhu alaṅkato rājāpi sabhāsu na bhāsuro.
anya-e0812n0:447_0: Ye sappurisā jināṇattiyaṃ buddhassa vinayapaññattisaṅkhātāṇattiyaṃ ohitāsā avītikkamavasena
anya-e0812n0:447_1: patiṭṭhitaāsā honti sitāsā parisuddhāsā, te sādhavo hatāsā anukkamena hatataṇhā avassaṃva
anya-e0812n0:447_2: ekanteneva atāsā bhayarahitā yato honti, ato tasmā sabbapāpe sabbākusale satāsā bhayasahitā
anya-e0812n0:447_3: vatāsāva niravajjavatābhilāsavanto sādhujanā santissitā santinissitāyo sāmitāsā sāmibhāvāsāyo karonteva.
anya-e0812n0:451_0: 33. Nanu yamakaṃ nāma kavīnaṃ sāmatthiyavisesasūcakanti tattha taṃ sopayogaṃ, paheḷikā
anya-e0812n0:451_1: ca sopayogā kīḷāvinodane sambādhaṭṭhānamantane parabyāmohane paramabyāmohane (ka.),
anya-e0812n0:451_2: kābyādāsa 3.97 ca, tasmā tattha kathamupekkhā bhavatoti āha “yamaka”ntiādi. Taṃ yathāvuttaṃ
anya-e0812n0:451_3: yamakañca sukaradukkarappabhedaṃ. Paheḷikā pana pubbācariyehi soḷasa niddiṭṭhā samāgatāvañcitādikā.
anya-e0812n0:468_0: Dosattepi cesaṃ sabbesaṃ ukkantādīsu dosabhāve nāropitabbā. Esā hi manasoti (ka.)
anya-e0812n0:468_1: “bahuguṇe paṇamati”ccādinā subodhālaṅkāra 44 gāthā vākyasaṃkiṇṇanāmena na vuttā,
anya-e0812n0:468_2: pakappitā ca saṃsayadosaparihārena “yāte dutiyaṃ nilaya”nti subodhālaṅkāra 112 gāthā ādinā niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0812n0:475: Pamussitādayo tu lakkhaṇānusārena, tatthodāharaṇānusārena ca veditabbā.
anya-e0812n0:476_0: Evaṃ pubbācariyehi parikappitā paheḷikā ceti etāni sabbāni ekantena niyamena na madhurāni
anya-e0812n0:476_1: attharasassa vā saddarasassa vā kassaci abhāvena assāditabbāni na hontīti iminā kāraṇena
anya-e0812n0:476_2: sissānamuppanno khedoyeva bhayaṃ tato tesaṃ khedato vā uppannabhayato mayā upekkhiyantīti sambandhanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:477_0: 33. Evaṃ sukaradukkaravasena duvidhattaṃ vatvā kavīnaṃ sāmatthiyappakāsane sappayojanayamakānañca,
anya-e0812n0:477_1: kīḷāvinodane sambādhaṭṭhānasammantane parabyāmohane cāti imesu sappayojanānañca paheḷikānamavacane
anya-e0812n0:477_2: kāraṇaṃ niddisati “yamaka”miccādinā. Taṃ yamakaṃ yathāvuttaṃ sukaradukkarādibhedaṃ
anya-e0812n0:477_3: yamakajātañca paheḷi ca pubbācariyehi niddiṭṭhā samāgabhādikā paheḷikā ca iti imāni
anya-e0812n0:477_4: sabbāni ekantamadhurāni na iti assādetabbassa attharasassa, saddarasassa vā niyamato
anya-e0812n0:477_5: abhāvā ekantena amadhurāni, iti iminā kāraṇena ca sissakhedabhayā sissānaṃ asahanasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0812n0:477_6: asahanena jātāya vā bhītiyā ca mayā upekkhīyanti. Sissānaṃ khedoyeva bhayaṃ, sissakhedato
anya-e0812n0:501_0: Ayaṃ panettha attho – padasandhinā padānaṃ sandhānato guḷhatthā apākaṭatthā samāgatā
anya-e0812n0:501_1: nāma siyā. Guḷhatthāti pasiddhānuvādena apasiddhā samāgatā vidhīyate. Ito parampi
anya-e0812n0:501_2: anuvādānuvādyabhāvo evaṃ veditabbo. Yattha paheḷikāyaṃ aññattha ruḷhena saddena aññasmiṃ
anya-e0812n0:501_3: atthe pasiddhena ruḷhisaddena vañcanā vañcitā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:502_0: Atibyavahitappayogā atisayena antaritapayujjamānapadayuttā tatoyeva mohakārinī sammohakārikā
anya-e0812n0:502_1: paheḷikā ukkantā nāma. Yassā paheḷikāya padāvali padapanti dubbodhatthā duranubodhābhidheyyā, sā pamussitā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:503_1: nissāya āropanato upaṭṭhitapadayuttā samānarūpā nāma siyā. Paccayādīhi paccayādesādīhi
anya-e0812n0:503_2: kathañcipi yena kenaci pakārena jātasaddā nipphannasaddā pharusā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:504_0: Yattha yassaṃ paheḷikāyaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ gaṇanaṃ vuttamapi byāmohakāraṇaṃ hoti, sā paheḷikā
anya-e0812n0:504_1: saṅkhyātā nāma siyā. Yattha yassaṃ paheḷikāyaṃ vākyattho samudāyattho aññathā aññena
anya-e0812n0:504_2: pakārena ābhāsate viññāyate, sā pakappitā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:505_0: Yassā paheḷikāya nāme payuttābhidhāne nānatthakappanā vividhābhidheyyakappanā sambhavati,
anya-e0812n0:505_1: sā paheḷikā nāmantarikā nāma. Tulyatthasutihetuto samānatthasaddānaṃ payogahetuyā
anya-e0812n0:505_2: avaṭṭhitaññatthā patiṭṭhitaaññatthā hoti, sā nibhūtā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:506_0: Yā paheḷikā iṭṭhasaddapariyāyasādhitā icchitatthasaddassa vevacanehi nipphāditā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:506_1: sā samānasaddā nāma. Sādhukaṃ niddiṭṭhatthāpi dassitaatthayuttāpiyā mūḷhatāyeva sammohabhāvatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:507_0: Yassā paheḷikāya viracane nāmaṃ dassiyamānaṃ nāmaṃ sambandhabāhulyā sambandhassa
anya-e0812n0:507_1: bahulabhāvato bhavati, sā pārihārikī nāma. Yassā ādheyyaṃ byañja abhibyañjiya pakāsetvā
anya-e0812n0:507_2: nissayagopanā ādhāragutti bhavati, sā ekacchannā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:508_0: Yassā payoge ubhayagopanā ubhinnamādhārādheyyānaṃ gopanā bhavati, sā ubhayacchannā
anya-e0812n0:508_1: nāma. Yassā nānālakkhaṇasaṅkaro samāgatādinānāvidhalakkhaṇānaṃ saṅkaro hoti, sā saṃkiṇṇā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:509: Idāni samāgatādīnaṃ lakkhiyaṃ kamena evaṃ ñātabbaṃ –
anya-e0812n0:513_0: Nātha tava pabhavato paṭṭhāya natavittiṇṇā oṇatavasena patthaṭā, evaṃ sati nadī viya
anya-e0812n0:513_1: dissati. Pabhava pakaṭṭhatta sobhāvanta. Bho nātha tava tuyhaṃ mahatī satī mahantī
anya-e0812n0:513_2: samānā āṇā ānatavittiṇṇā attani natesu janesu patthaṭā pahutaphalasādhinī bahulatthanipphādanī
anya-e0812n0:513_3: cirāya cirakālaṃ jayataṃ ukkaṃsabhāvena pavattatu. Ettha pabhavaānataitisandhinā attho guḷho.
anya-e0812n0:517_0: Vidhūtamadakibbisaṃ vināsitamadadosaṃ bhaddameva mandapiya pindapissa (ka.) – bhaddajātikesu
anya-e0812n0:517_1: hatthīsu bhaddajātikahatthimeva upaseveyyāti vuttaṃ viya dissati. Bhaddameva uttamapurisameva
anya-e0812n0:517_2: seveyyāti attho. Sevanaṃ kimatthanti ce? Hatthipakkhe danto sikkhito so hatthi attanisevitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:517_3: attānaṃ bhajitaṃ janaṃ khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ puraṃ nagaraṃ sampāpeti. Purisapakkhe pana
anya-e0812n0:517_4: danto damito so ariyapuggalo attanisevitaṃ attānamupasevitaṃ janaṃ khemaṃ niddukkhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:517_5: puraṃ nibbānapuraṃ pāpeti. Ettha kavicchitauttamatthato aññena hatthiatthe ruḷhena
anya-e0812n0:521: Byākiṇṇadosatte satipi paheḷikāruḷhattā esā iṭṭhā. Vuttañhi “paheḷikāyamāruḷhā, na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā”ti. Iha sambandhīpadānaṃ aṭṭhānaṭṭhāpanena byavahitattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:525_0: Mukhaphullaṃ tilakādiṃ giṅgamakaṃ evaṃnāmakaṃ pasādhanaṃ niyuruggatthanunnataṃ niyuraṃ
anya-e0812n0:525_1: valayaṃ, uggatthanaṃ payodharapaṭaṃ, unnataṃ nalāṭapaṭādikaṃ, mukhato unnatābharaṇañca
anya-e0812n0:525_2: dhārayantiyā bhīruyā itthiyā paṭaccarī jiṇṇavatthanivāsī poso puriso varaṃ uttamo.
anya-e0812n0:525_3: Ettha bahupayogarahitehi saddehi racitattā atthassa duravabodhatā.
