anya-e0812n0:1029_4: natthīti. Sasaddassa attaattaniyavācakattā sassa attano guṇā se ca te guṇā ceti vā
anya-e0812n0:1029_5: viggaho. Bhūtoyeva attho, taṃ saṃsati vadati sīlenāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1033_0: 104. “Ocitya”miccādi. Loke sattaloke vikhyātaṃ pasiddhaṃ ābālajanaṃ ābālajanānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1033_1: (ka.) yathāsakamanurūpaṃ vijānanato ocityaṃ ucitabhāvo nāmeti pasiddhiyaṃ ādarā ādarena
anya-e0812n0:1033_2: ussāhena tato paramādaraṇīyassābhāvato, na hi anucitaṃ kiñci kenāpyādaraṇīyaṃ sabbathā
anya-e0812n0:1033_3: anassādanīyattā, viññeyyaṃ “sotūna”nti seso. Tattha tasmiṃ ocitye upadesassa paṭhamuccāraṇassa
anya-e0812n0:1033_4: uggaṇhāpanavasena pavattassa pabhavā uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā sujanā suṭṭhujanā kavipuṅgavā
anya-e0812n0:1034_0: 104. “Ocitye”ccādi. Loke sattaloke vikhyātaṃ ābālapasiddhaṃ ocityaṃ nāma ādarā gāravena
anya-e0812n0:1034_1: viññeyyaṃ viññūhi ñātabbaṃ hoti, tattha ocityavisaye upadesapabhavā paṭhamuccāraṇassa
anya-e0812n0:1034_2: uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā sujanā sādhujanabhūtā kavipuṅgavā uttamakavayo bhavantīti, pasiddhaocityapadena
anya-e0812n0:1034_3: yuttattā ettha nāmasaddo pasiddhiyaṃ. Upadesassa pabhavāti ca, pumāno ca te gāvo
anya-e0812n0:1034_4: ceti ca, kavīnaṃ puṅgavāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1040_1: sampatti yena so ocityahīnaṃ nāma dūsanaṃ parihare parivajjeyya. Tato tasmā parihārato
anya-e0812n0:1040_2: hetuto ocityassa sampose suṭṭhu vaḍḍhibhāve vaḍḍhane kate rasassa assāditabbatāsaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n0:1041_1: kavi ocityahīnaṃ nāma dūsanaṃ parihare nirākareyya, tato dosaparihārato ocityassa
anya-e0812n0:1041_2: sampose upabrūhane kate sati rasaposo mādhuriyasaṅkhatassa assādetabbassa pūraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1041_3: siyā bhaveyyāti. Ocityameva vibhavoti ca, viññāto ocityavibhavo yeneti ca, rasassa
anya-e0812n0:1041_4: poso puṭṭhabhāvo vuddhabhāvo (ka.) posetabbabhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1045: Tiṇāyapi na maññittha, so vo detu jayaṃ jino.
anya-e0812n0:1046_0: 106. “Yathe”tyudāharati “yo”iccādi. Vijayo parābhibhavo āsanno vijayo eva ussavo
anya-e0812n0:1046_1: abbhudayo nippaṭipakkhā pavatti yassa ediso yo āsannaṃ attano samīpamupagataṃ mārasenaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1046_2: tiṇāyapi na maññittha tiṇampi na maññittha, tiṇatopi hīnaṃ maññittha, so jino māraji
anya-e0812n0:1046_3: vo tumhākaṃ jayaṃ detūti vidadhātu. Ettha jayāsīsanā “jino”ti accantamucitaṃ, yo
anya-e0812n0:1046_4: ajini pañcamāreti jino parābhibhavekaraso, tassa paresaṃ vijayappadāne sāmatthiyekayogo
anya-e0812n0:1046_5: siyāti. “Mārasenamāsannaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññitthā”ti idaṃ panettha atisamucitaṃ yato
anya-e0812n0:1046_6: samīpamupagatampi tādisaṃ mārasenaṃ tiṇatopi hīnaṃ maññi, tenassa paresaṃ vijayappadānekarasatā visesato yuttāti.
anya-e0812n0:1047_0: 106. Iha satthe sabbattha saṅkhepakkamamicchantopi ācariyo ocityaṃ nāma ādarena saggarūhi
anya-e0812n0:1047_1: uggaṇhitvā payujjitabbamiccevaṃ vitthārena sisse anusāsitvā idāni ocityahīnapariharaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1047_4: āsannaṃ anekappakārabhiṃsanakarūpena attano samīpamāgataṃ mārasenaṃ mārabalaṃ tiṇāyapi
anya-e0812n0:1047_5: tiṇalavaṃ katvāpi na maññittha sallakkhaṇaṃ nākāsi, so jino so jitapañcamāro vo tumhākaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1047_6: jayaṃ detūti. Ettha yo pañcamāre jitattā jino nāma hoti, so parābhibhavane asahāyakiccattā
anya-e0812n0:1047_7: paresaṃ jayadāne sāmatthiyayuttoti “jayaṃ detū”ti kataṃ jayāsīsanamatiucitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1047_8: jayadāne sāmatthiyasseva posakattā. “Mārasenamāsannaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññitthā”ti idaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1047_9: vattabbameva natthīti. Evaṃ accantaucitapayogena ocityahīnadoso nirākatoti. Vijayo
anya-e0812n0:1047_10: eva ussavo, āsanno vijayussavo yasseti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1051_0: 107. “Āraddha”iccādi. Kattā ca kammañca tāni ādīni yesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ āraddhāni vattuṃ
anya-e0812n0:1051_1: paṭṭhapitāni kattukammādīni tesaṃ kamo tassa atikkamo pariccāgo tassa laṅghane sati,
anya-e0812n0:1051_2: vattumāraddhakattukammādikamānatikkameti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ yathāvutto bhaggarītivirodho
anya-e0812n0:1051_3: kvāpi katthacipi ṭhāne gatiṃ na vindati patiṭṭhaṃ na labhate.
anya-e0812n0:1052_1: kamapariccāgassātikkame ayaṃ yathāvuttabhaggarītivirodho kvāpi katthacipi ṭhāne gatiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1052_2: patiṭṭhaṃ na vindati na labhateti. Āraddhāni ca tāni kattukammādīni yesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1052_3: tesaṃ kamassa atikkamo tassa laṅghananti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1060_0: 108-109. Ettha ca “sujana”miccādike “bhesajje”iccādike ca gāthādvaye chaṭṭhiyā, sattamiyā
anya-e0812n0:1060_1: ca apariccāgena nāttharītiyā bhaṅgo, cakārassekassa katattā na saddarītiyā bhaṅgo.
anya-e0812n0:1060_2: Bahūnamatthānañhi samuccayatthaṃ vākye eko vā cakāro kātabbo paṭipadaṃ vā.
anya-e0812n0:1061_0: 108. “Sujane”ccādi. Sujanaññānaṃ sajjanehi aññesaṃ dujjanānañca itthīnañca visassa
anya-e0812n0:1061_1: jīvitaharaṇasamatthassa siṅgino visāṇavato ca roganadīrājakulassa ca vissāso saṃsaggo
anya-e0812n0:1061_2: na upapajjate kiñcikāle virujjhanato na yujjateti. Ettha āraddhassa chaṭṭhuntakkamassa
anya-e0812n0:1061_3: sabbattha apariccāgato attharītibhaṅgo ca, yuttaṭṭhāne ekasseva cakārassa yuttattā
anya-e0812n0:1061_5: vā, iha vuttaniyāmena avasāne vā, sabbattha vā yojanamarahati.
anya-e0812n0:1062_0: 109. “Bhesajje”ccādigāthāyampi eseva nayo sattamīmattameva viseso. Vihite pathye
anya-e0812n0:1062_1: bhesajje osadhe ca suddhabuddhādiratanattaye ca sajjane sādhujane ca api punapi saguṇe
anya-e0812n0:1062_2: vijjamānaguṇe ca pasādaṃ attano cittapasādaṃ niccaṃ satataṃ ācare sappuriso kareyya seveyyāti.
anya-e0812n0:1070_1: Raṃsisaddoyeva hi viseso, ettha raṃsisaddena suṇantānaṃ uppajjamānasaṃsayena sasaṃsayabhūtaṃ bandhadosamohatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1074: 111. “Saṃsaye”ccādi. Kīḷādīti ādisaddena ākiṇṇasammantanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, kīḷādihetunā yaṃ kiñci saṃsayāyeva yadi payujjateti sambandho.
anya-e0812n0:1075_1: saṃsayuppādanasamatthaṃ yaṃ kiñci padaṃ saṃsayāya eva sotūnaṃ uppajjamānasaṃsayatthameva
anya-e0812n0:1075_2: yadi payujjate tasmiṃ bandhane vattārehi payujjate ce, sasaṃsayasamappito sasaṃsayadosasahito
anya-e0812n0:1075_3: bandho na dosova aduṭṭhovāti. Sasaṃsayena samappitoti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1080_0: 112. “Yāte”ccādi. Gurumhi ajjhāpake sakagehato attano mūlanilayato dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1080_1: dutiyaṃ gharaṃ yāte sati niyatamekantamajjhayanādinā sukhaṃ pāpuṇeyyāmāti ayamanicchitattho.
anya-e0812n0:1080_2: Gurumhi surācariye suraccācariye (ka.) sakagehato attano jātarāsito dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1080_3: dutiyaṃ rāsiṃ yāte sati niyatamajjhayanādinā sukhaṃ pāpuṇeyyāmāti ayamettha icchitattho.
anya-e0812n0:1081_0: 112. “Yāte”ccādi. Gurumhi ācariye sakagehato attano vāsāgārato dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1081_1: gharaṃyāte sati, ayamanicchitattho. Gurumhi surācariye sakagehato attano jātarāsito
anya-e0812n0:1081_2: dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ rāsiṃ yāte gate sati anukūlattā niyatamekantena ajjhayanādinā
anya-e0812n0:1081_3: uggahaṇādinā sukhaṃ mānasikasukhaṃ, no ce sukhakāraṇaṃ ganthaparisamattiṃ pāpuṇeyyāmāti.
anya-e0812n0:1081_4: Ubhayapakkhassāpi aparatthe attho sādhāraṇo hoti. Ettha ajjhayanasaddasannidhānena
anya-e0812n0:1086_0: 113. “Subhage”ccādi. Etassa purisassa sā ayaṃ bhaginī subhagā sundarāti iccevamādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1086_1: sakalehi kavīhi api na gāmmamiti gāmmadosena na duṭṭhamiti niddiṭṭhanti. Subhaṃ sundarabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1086_2: gatāti “subhagā”ti aggahetvā bahubbīhisamāse kate labbhamānatthassa asabbhabhāvepi
anya-e0812n0:1086_3: kavīnaṃ cittakhedaṃ na janetīti adhippāyo. Iti evaṃ ayaṃ pakāro ādi assa īdisassa vākyassāti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1090: 114. “Duṭṭha”iccādi. Duṭṭhālaṅkārassa dosadūsitassa alaṅkārassa vigame apagame sati.
anya-e0812n0:1091_0: 114. “Duṭṭhi”ccādi. Duṭṭhālaṅkāravigame dosaduṭṭhassa alaṅkārassa apagame sati sobhanālaṅkatikkamo
anya-e0812n0:1091_2: paricchede āvibhāvaṃ pakāsattaṃ gamissati pāpuṇissatīti. Paricchijjatīti paricchedo.
anya-e0812n0:1091_3: Alaṅkārapakāsakattā tadatthena alaṅkāro ca so paricchedo ceti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1101_0: 115. “Dose”iccādi. Dose yathāvutte padadosādike pariharituṃ pariccajituṃ eso varo
anya-e0812n0:1101_1: uttamo upadeso satthantarānaṃ bahūnaṃ anusaraṇena anugamena anupagamena (ka.) mayā
anya-e0812n0:1101_2: evaṃ kato nipphādito, imaṃ upadesaṃ guruvarānaṃ adhikappasādā mahatā pasādena na
anya-e0812n0:1101_3: appakena, tathāvidhena tādisassa mahato atthassa apasijjhanato, viññāya jānitvā ādarato
anya-e0812n0:1101_4: kareyya dose yathāvutte dose yaso parisuddhabandhanaṃ kriyālakkhaṇato ekantena kittihetuttā,
anya-e0812n0:1101_5: taṃsabbhāvā kitti vā, taṃ abhilasati sīleneti yasobhilāsī paraṃ accantameva parihareyya dūrato kareyya.
anya-e0812n0:1104_0: 115. “Dose”ccādi. Dose yathāvuttapadadosādike pariharitumapanetuṃ varo uttamo eso
anya-e0812n0:1104_1: upadeso satthantarānusaraṇena bahūnaṃ bāhirasatthānaṃ anussatiyā mayā evaṃ anantaruddiṭṭhakkamena
anya-e0812n0:1104_2: kato viracito, imaṃ upadesaṃ guruvarānaṃ adhikappasādā adhikappasādena viññāya sabhāvato
anya-e0812n0:1104_3: ñatvā yasobhilāsī yasapaṭilābhakāraṇattā kāraṇe kāriyopacārena dosāpagamena parisuddhabandhanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1104_4: vā tādisabandhanahetu uppajjamānakittiṃ vā icchanto paññavā dose yathāvuttadose paraṃ
anya-e0812n0:1104_5: atisayena parihareyya dūrato kareyyāti. Ettha pubbaddhena dosaparihāraparicchedassa
anya-e0812n0:1104_6: pasatthabhāvo dassito, aparaddhena sissajanānusāsanaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā pubbaddhena
anya-e0812n0:1104_8: Tathā pubbaddhena attahitasampatti, aparaddhena parahitasampatti dassitāti. Evamanekākāradīpikāya
anya-e0812n0:1104_9: imāya gāthāya paricchedaṃ nigameti. Aññe satthā satthantarā, antarasaddo hi aññasaddapariyāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1104_10: Yathā “gāmantaraṃ na gaccheyyā”ti. Yasaṃ abhilasati sīlenāti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1114_0: 116. Evaṃ dosaparihāropadesaṃ dassetvā idāni dosaparihārā samupagataguṇaṃ upadassitumadhikāraṃ
anya-e0812n0:1114_1: viracayanto āha “sambhavanti”iccādi. Dosānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ padadosādīnaṃ evaṃ yathāvuttanayena
anya-e0812n0:1114_2: atikkame sati guṇā dhammā saddālaṅkārasabhāvā pasādādayo yasmā kāraṇā sambhavanti
anya-e0812n0:1114_3: sijjhanti, tañca “pasādo kiliṭṭhādīnaṃ vajjanā sambhavatī”tyādinā yathāyogaṃ viññeyyaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1114_4: tato tasmā kāraṇā ye guṇā sadde sambhūsayanti alaṅkaronti, te saddālaṅkārasaṅkhāte
anya-e0812n0:1115_0: 116. Evaṃ dosaparihārapavesopāyaṃ dassetvā idāni yathāvuttadosānaṃ parihārena “bandhanissitaguṇā
anya-e0812n0:1115_2: Dosānaṃ niddiṭṭhapadadosādīnaṃ evaṃ anantaraparicchede niddiṭṭhakkamena atikkame
anya-e0812n0:1115_3: sati guṇā pasādādisaddālaṅkārasaṅkhātā pasādādayo saddadhammā yasmā sambhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:1115_4: tato ye saddadhammā sadde sambhūsayanti sajjanti, te saddadhamme dassessaṃ pakāsissāmīti.
anya-e0812n0:1115_5: Ettha kiliṭṭhadosabyākiṇṇadosaparihārehi pasādālaṅkāro sijjhati, sesāpi yathālābhato ñātabbā.
anya-e0812n0:1122_0: 117. Idāni te vibhajati “pasādo”iccādinā pasatthi pasādo pakāsatthatā, ojo samāsavuttibāhullaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1122_1: atthapāriṇatyañca, madhuratā saddānaṃ rasavantatā, samatā pajjāpekkhāya catunnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1122_2: pādānamekajātiyasambandhatā, gajjāpekkhāya tu padānaṃ, sukhumālatā apharusakkharabāhullaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1122_3: silesanaṃ sileso bandhagāravaṃ, udāratā ukkaṃsatā kenaci atthena sanāthatā visiṭṭhavisesanayuttatā
anya-e0812n0:1122_4: ca, kanti sabbalokamanoharatā, atthabyatti siddhena ñāyena vā abhidheyyassa gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1122_5: samādhi lokappatītyanusāriamukhyatthatā, tesu ojaudāratā saddatthaguṇā, samādhi atthaguṇo,
anya-e0812n0:1122_6: atthānugāmittā ettha saddānaṃ, aññe tu saddaguṇāva.
anya-e0812n0:1123_0: 117. Idāni “pasādojo”iccādinā te saddālaṅkāre kamena vibhajituṃ uddisati. Pasādo
anya-e0812n0:1123_1: pasannaphaḷikāvali attani āvunitarattakambalasuttamiva saddānaṃ atthassa pasādanasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n0:1123_2: pasādālaṅkāro ca, ojo samāsavuttibāhulyaatthapāriṇatyasaṅkhato saddatthānaṃ guṇo
anya-e0812n0:1123_3: ca, madhuratā saddānaṃ rasavantabhāvasaṅkhātakaṇṇamadhuratā ca, samatā pajje pādassa
anya-e0812n0:1123_4: sutito sadisatā ca, gajje padānaṃ tatheva sadisatāti evaṃ pādānaṃ padānañca tulyaguṇatā
anya-e0812n0:1123_5: ca, sukhumālatā vaṇṇānaṃ atipharusaatisithilabhāvaṃ vinā samappamāṇamuduguṇo ca,
anya-e0812n0:1123_6: sileso ṭhānakaraṇādisambhūtasabhāgavaṇṇasutīhi acchiddaguruguṇo ca, udāratā ukkaṭṭhena
anya-e0812n0:1123_7: kenaci atthena bandhassa sajjitabhāvo ca, visiṭṭhavisesanapadena yuttatā ca, kanti
anya-e0812n0:1123_8: sabbesaṃ piyaguṇatā ca, atthabyatti icchitatthassa siddhena vā nyāyena vā supākaṭabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:1123_9: ca, samādhayo lokappatītianatikkantaaññadhammāropanena amukhyatthatā cāti ime saddatthaguṇā
anya-e0812n0:1123_10: dasa honti. “Samādhayo”ti tasseva bahuttaṃ dīpeti, imesu dasasu ojodāratāti dve saddatthaguṇā,
anya-e0812n0:1123_11: samādhi atthaguṇo pariyāyena tadatthajotakasaddaguṇopi, sesā satta saddaguṇā eva,
anya-e0812n0:1123_12: ete sabbepi alaṅkaronti bandhamanenāti vākyena alaṅkārā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1128_0: 118. “Guṇehi”ccādi. Etehiyeva vuttehi dasahi guṇehi dhammehi saddālaṅkārasabbhāvehi
anya-e0812n0:1128_1: sampanno yutto samiddho vā kavīnaṃ mano harati savase vattetīti kavimanoharo kavihadayahilādakārī
anya-e0812n0:1128_2: bandho kattūnaṃ bandhantānaṃ kavīnaṃ accantanimmalaṃ atisayaparisuddhaṃ aguṇalesenāpa’nālimpattā
anya-e0812n0:1129_1: samannāgato samiddho vā bandho pajjādibandho kavimanoharo attano niravajjattā kavīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1129_2: cittaṃ pīṇento kattūnaṃ racayantānaṃ accantanimmalaṃ appakadosenāpi asammissattā
anya-e0812n0:1129_3: atiparisuddhaṃ kittiṃ bandhanavisayabhūtayasorāsiṃ sampādayati nipphādetīti. Iminā
anya-e0812n0:1129_4: kāraṇena bandhassa yathāvuttadasavidhaguṇapariggaho saussāhaṃ kātabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:1129_5: Mano haratīti manoharo, kavīnaṃ manoharo kavimanoharoti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1134_0: 119. Idāni yathoddesānamesaṃ niddesaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ karonto āha “adūra”iccādi. Adūre
anya-e0812n0:1134_1: āsanne adūrena vā adūrāhitakriyākattukammādipadavasena āhito ṭhapito kato sambandho
anya-e0812n0:1134_2: anvayo, tena subhagā manoharā supasiddho suppakāso sugammo abhidheyyo attho yassā
anya-e0812n0:1134_3: sāti tathā, na tu bhāvattho tassa sabhāvagambhīrattā. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n0:1139: Tādisā yā padāvali padapanti ayaṃ pasādaṃ tannāmakaṃ guṇaṃ janaye uppādayati. Yathāti tamudāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1140_0: 119. Idāni uddesakkamena etesaṃ saddālaṅkārādīnaṃ niddesaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ dassento āha
anya-e0812n0:1140_1: “adūrāhite”ccādi. Adūre āsannapadese tadupacārena āsanne vā āhito kriyāya, laddhakriyāyogakattukammādipadānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1140_2: vasena ca kato, no ce vinyāsavasena ṭhapito vā sambandho icchitatthapatītikkamena
anya-e0812n0:1140_3: aññamaññāpekkhalakkhaṇakriyākārakayogo tena subhagā manoharā, supasiddho pasiddhatthavisaye
anya-e0812n0:1140_4: saddapayogato atipākaṭo abhidheyyo saddattho yassā sā ayaṃ padāvali padapanti pasādaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1140_5: pasādanāmakaṃ guṇaṃ janaye uppādayati. Yathāti lakkhiyaṃ dasseti. Adūre āhitoti vā,
anya-e0812n0:1140_6: upacaritattā adūro ca so āhito cāti vā, so ca so sambandho ceti ca, tena subhagāti
anya-e0812n0:1140_7: ca, su atisayena pasiddhoti ca, so abhidheyyo asseti ca vākyaṃ. Ettha supasiddho
anya-e0812n0:1140_8: nāma saddattho, adhippāyattho pana pakatigambhīro. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0812n0:1145_0: Tassattho – asaddagocaraṃ saddassa avisayaṃ hutvā mudukamhi pade kevalaṃ visuṃ phurantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1145_1: cāpentaṃ kavīnadhippāyaṃ kavīnamajjhāsayaṃ katassamā saddatthavisaye kataparicayā
anya-e0812n0:1145_2: paṇḍitā bhāvāvagamā padatthāvabodhena visanti pavisanti, tādisā ākatiyo tu saddasaddatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1149_2: muninoti viññāyati sutattā. Ambujodare tā kālopanatapupphakāsaramaṇīye padumabbhantare
anya-e0812n0:1149_3: sampatantā pavattamānā aruṇaraṃsīva bālasūriyaraṃsiyo viya sobhante virājanti.
anya-e0812n0:1150_1: adhararaṃsiyo tasseva munino oṭṭhadvayato nikkhantakantisamūhā ambujodare vikasanānurūpakālābhimukhe
anya-e0812n0:1150_2: padumagabbhe upaḍḍhavikasiteti vuttaṃ hoti. Sampatantā pavattamānā aruṇaraṃsī iva
anya-e0812n0:1150_3: bālasūriyaraṃsīva sobhante dibbantīti. Ettha adūrasambandhaṃ pasiddhatthañca nissāya
anya-e0812n0:1150_4: pasādaguṇo pākaṭo. Adhararaṃsīnaṃ munisambandho sutānumitasambandhesu sutasambandhassa
anya-e0812n0:1150_6: vā labbhatīti. Adhare raṃsīti ca, ambujassa udaranti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1156_0: 121. “Ojo”iccādi. Samāsassa ekatthavuttiyā bāhulyaṃ bhiyyobhāvo ityanuvaditvā puna
anya-e0812n0:1156_1: ojo vidhīyate, eso ojo samāsabāhullalakkhaṇo gajjassa vuttirūpassa jīvitaṃ hadayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1156_2: sāraṃ tappadhānattā gajjassa, na pajjassa, soyaṃ ojo anākulo agahano atoyeva kanto
anya-e0812n0:1156_3: hadayaṅgamo, pajjepi na kevalaṃ gajje kāmīyate payujjate. Yathetyudāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1157_0: 121. Idāni ojaguṇaṃ dasseti “ojo”ccādinā. Ojo nāma samāsabāhulyaṃ bhinnatthesu pavattasaddānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1157_1: ekatthapavattilakkhaṇassa samāsassa bahulatā, eso ojo gajjassa gajjabandhassa jīvitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1157_2: hadayaṃ, jīvitasīsena hadayasaṅkhataṃ cittaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. So ayaṃ ojo anākulo
anya-e0812n0:1157_3: nibyākulo kanto tatoyeva viññūnaṃ piyabhūto pajjepi pajjabandhepi kāmīyate kavīhi
anya-e0812n0:1157_4: payujjateti. Bahulassa bhāvo bāhulyaṃ, samāsassa bāhulyanti viggaho. Gajjabandhādhikārassābhāvā
anya-e0812n0:1161_0: 122. “Muninda”iccādi. Munindassa mandaṃ īsakaṃ sañjāto pavatto taṃsabhāvattā bhagavato
anya-e0812n0:1161_1: hāsassa yasassa (ka.) hāso hasitaṃ sova candanamiva candanaṃ dhavalattarūpattā, tena
anya-e0812n0:1161_2: limpitā upadehitā pallavā sabbāni kilasayāni “idameve”ti niyamābhāvato, dhavalā pakativaṇṇapariccāgena
anya-e0812n0:1161_3: sukkā ahesuṃ gāhāpitattā saguṇassa tādisavisiṭṭhassa paṭilābhato, evaṃ santepi tassa
anya-e0812n0:1161_4: munindasseva eko aññassa tādisassābhāvā adharapallavo na dhavalo dhavalo nāhosi.
anya-e0812n0:1164: Kiṃ tena vo na vihitaṃ hita’muggadugga-
anya-e0812n0:1166_0: Iccaparamudāharaṇaṃ. Evametādiso anākulo kanto ojo jānitabboti. Nanu ca ya-tasaddānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1166_1: nicco sambandho, tasmā kathaṃ “tasseveko nādharapallavo”ti ettha yasaddābhāvoti?
anya-e0812n0:1166_2: Saccaṃ, kintu pakkantavisayo, tathā pasiddhavisayo, anubhūtavisayo ca tasaddo yasaddaṃ nāpekkhate. Yathā –
anya-e0812n0:1172: Yadi vakkhati kattabbaṃ, ñātakārīhi so jino”.
anya-e0812n0:1178: Yasaddo tuttaravākyaṭṭho pubbavākye tasaddameva gamayati. Yathā –
anya-e0812n0:1184: Pubbavākyopātto tu yasaddo uttaravākyetasaddopādānaṃ vinā sākaṅkhe vākyassa ūnattaṃ janeti. Ettha pakkantavisayo tasaddo.
anya-e0812n0:1185_0: 122. Munindassa mandaṃ īsakaṃ sañjāto pavatto hāsoyeva sitaṃ candanacuṇṇamiva tena
anya-e0812n0:1185_1: limpitā ālepitā pallavā rukkhalatādīnaṃ pakatirattāni kisalayāni dhavalā saguṇapariccāgena
anya-e0812n0:1185_2: setā ahesuṃ, tathāpi tasseva tathāgatassa eko atulo asahāyo vā adharapallavo dantāvaraṇasaṅkhātapallavo
anya-e0812n0:1185_3: na raṃsisaṃsaṭṭhopi samīpaṭṭhopi dhavalo seto nāhosi. Evamettha agahanasamāsabāhulyaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1188: Kiṃ tena vo na vihitaṃ hita’muggadugga-
anya-e0812n0:1190_0: Aparamudāharaṇaṃ. Tassattho – kumatayo he aññāṇā! Pemāvabandhahadaye sabbesu tumhesu
anya-e0812n0:1190_1: niccaṃ pavattitadaḷhapemānubandhacitte sadaye tatoyeva dayāsahite tasmiṃ jinasmiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1190_2: visayabhūte kiṃ nu kasmā appasannā bhavatha, tathā hi vo tumhākaṃ tena jinena uggo
anya-e0812n0:1190_3: dāruṇo ca, duggo gantumasakkuṇeyyo ca, soyeva saṃsārasāgaro tassa samuttaraṇaṃ pariyantappattiyeva
anya-e0812n0:1190_4: avasānaṃ yassa taṃ na vihitaṃ akataṃ hitaṃ vuddhi nāma kiṃ hoti, na hoteva. Etthāpi
anya-e0812n0:1190_5: samāsassa pākaṭattā ojo guṇo kanto hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:1191_0: Nanu ya-tasaddānaṃ niccasambandhoti kathaṃ “tasseveko”ti ca “tasmiṃ nu kiṃ kumatayo”ti
anya-e0812n0:1191_1: ca iccādīsu heṭṭhā vuttayasaddo natthīti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi pakkantatthavisayo, pasiddhatthavisayo,
anya-e0812n0:1191_2: anubhūtatthavisayo vā tasaddo yasaddaṃ nāpekkhati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0812n0:1194: Evamādīsu “so”ti niddiṭṭhatasaddo “buddhānussatimādito”ti ettha atītena buddhasaddena vacanīyavisayo hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1196: Yadi vakkhati kattabbaṃ, ñātakārīhi so jino”ti.
anya-e0812n0:1200_1: tasmā tīsupi ṭhānesu tasaddo yasaddaṃ nāpekkhate. Ettha pana pakkantavisayo tasaddo
anya-e0812n0:1200_2: adhippeto. Apica uttaravākye ṭhito yasaddo pubbavākye tasadde asatipi tameva dīpeti. Tathā hi –
anya-e0812n0:1205_0: Yo budhānaṃ cakkhusotasatīnaṃ gocarataṃ visayabhāvaṃ sameto patto, tesaṃyeva dosārīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1205_1: kilesapaccatthikānaṃ dappamathane dappamaddane ekaraso padhānakicco samiddhivanto
anya-e0812n0:1205_2: vā hoti, taṃ bodhiṃ namāmīti sambandho. Pubbavākye payojito yasaddo uttaravākye tasaddopādāne
anya-e0812n0:1205_3: asati saṃsayamuppādayamāno vākyassa ūnattaṃ karoti. Udāharaṇaṃ pana pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1211_0: 123. “Padi”ccādi. Padassa abhidheyyo attho so visayo yassa. Yattha pacurasaddābhidheyyo
anya-e0812n0:1211_1: attho saṃkhittapadehi vuccate, so samāso. Yatthappakehi padehi abhidheyyattho pacurapadehi
anya-e0812n0:1211_2: vuccate, so byāso. Tato samāsabyāsato sambhavo yassa. Taṃ tathāvidhaṃ yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1211_3: pariṇatabhāvo hotīti anuvaditvā sopi iha sasatthe ojovāti vidhīyate. Taṃ yathetyubhayampi udāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1212_0: 123. “Pade”ccādi. Padānaṃ bahūnaṃ appakānaṃ vā padānaṃ abhidheyyavisayaṃ vitthārasaṃkhittatthavisayavantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1212_2: vā yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ kattūnaṃ ganthavisaye pariṇatippakāsako yo saddadhammo atthadhammo
anya-e0812n0:1212_3: hoti, saddaguṇo atthaguṇoti vuttaṃ hoti, sopi iha subodhālaṅkāre ojo nāma saddaguṇo
anya-e0812n0:1212_4: atthaguṇo. Taṃ yathāti dvīsu lakkhiyaṃ dasseti, padānaṃ abhidheyyo visayo yassa pāriṇatyasseti
anya-e0812n0:1212_5: ca, samāso ca byāso cāti ca, tato sambhavanti ca, tato sambhavo assāti ca, pariṇatassa
anya-e0812n0:1212_6: kattuno ganthassa eva vā bhāvoti ca viggaho. Kattu pāriṇatyapakkhe tappakāsakaganthassa
anya-e0812n0:1218: 124. “Jotayitvāne”ccādi. Iminā heṭṭhā pacurapadābhihito buddhavaṃso saṅkheparūpena vutto.
anya-e0812n0:1219_1: jotayitvāna ñāṇālokena obhāsetvā sadevake satte santāretvā saṃsārasāgarapariyantamupanetvā
anya-e0812n0:1219_2: aggikhandhova mahātejena aggikkhandho viya jalitvā anaññasādhāraṇarūpakāyasampattiyā
anya-e0812n0:1219_3: pajjalitvā ante sasāvako sāvakehi saha nibbuto khandhaparinibbānena parinibbutoti.
anya-e0812n0:1219_4: Iminā sakalabuddhavaṃse bahūhi padehi vuttattho saṅkhepakkamena vutto. Sataṃ dhammo,
anya-e0812n0:1219_5: santo saṃvijjamāno vā dhammoti ca, saha devehi vattamānāti ca, saha sāvakehi vattamānoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1222: Yato puññena te senti sentu (ka.), jenapādambujadvaye.
anya-e0812n0:1223_0: 125. “Matthakaṭṭhī”iccādi. Matassāpi maraṇamāpannassāpi me matthake muddhani aṭṭhī
anya-e0812n0:1223_1: rajobhāvaṃ dhūlittaṃ vajantu pāpuṇantu. Kasmāti ce? Yato yasmā kāraṇā puññena kusalena
anya-e0812n0:1223_2: kammena hetunā te rajā jinassa ime jenā, pādā, teyeva ambujāniva ambujāni, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1223_3: dvaye senti pavattanti, tathā hotu vā mā vā, paṇatigedheneva vadati. Ettha “kathamahaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1223_4: bhagavato pāde niccaṃ sirasā paṇamāmī”tyadhippāyo vitthārena vutto.
anya-e0812n0:1224_0: 125. “Matthaki”ccādi, matassāpi me mayhaṃ matthakaṭṭhī muddhani aṭṭhīni rajobhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1224_1: atisukhumarajattaṃ vajantu pāpuṇantu. Kasmā āsīsanaṃ karotīti ce? Yato yasmā kāraṇā
anya-e0812n0:1224_2: puññena mayhaṃ tathāvidhena kusalakammena hetunā te rajā jenapādambujadvaye jinapaṭibaddhacaraṇapadumayugaḷe
anya-e0812n0:1224_3: senti pavattanti, buddhassa siripāde kiñcipi rajojallaṃ na upalimpateva, tathāpi
anya-e0812n0:1224_4: vandanābhilāsena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha “kathamahaṃ bhagavato siripāde muddhanā niccaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1224_5: paṇamāmī”tyabhilāso vitthārena vutto. Matthake aṭṭhīti ca, rajaso bhāvoti ca, jinassa
anya-e0812n0:1224_6: imeti ca, jenā ca te pādā ceti ca, teyeva ambujānīti ca, tesaṃ dvayanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1228_0: 126. Byāsattamevassa vivarati “iccatri”ccādinā. Iccevaṃ atra gāthāyaṃ paṇatiyaṃ paṇāme
anya-e0812n0:1228_1: gedho adhikacchando sādhu sundaraṃ padissati viññāyate, ayaṃ yathāvutto ojo guṇo
anya-e0812n0:1228_2: pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhāto tikkhapaññānaṃ sātisayamatīnaṃ evaṃ santepi abhiyogato punappunappavattitaparicayabalena jāyate uppajjati.
anya-e0812n0:1229_1: Iti iminā anantaragāthāyaṃ vuttakkamena atra imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ niccaṃpaṇatigedho nirantarapaṇāme
anya-e0812n0:1229_2: adhikakattukāmatākusalacchando sādhu vibhūto vibhūtaṃ vā padissati paññāyati, ayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1229_3: guṇo yathāvutto ayaṃ pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhāto ojo nāma saddatthaguṇo tikkhapaññānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1229_4: sukhumabuddhimantānaṃ abhiyogato ganthavisayabhūtena nirantarābhyāseneva jāyate sijjhati,
anya-e0812n0:1229_5: vattu pāriṇatyeneva bhavanato yesaṃ kesañci yena kenaci pakārena na sijjhatīti. Niccaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1229_6: pavattā paṇatīti ca, tassaṃ gedhoti ca, tikkhā paññā yesanti ca, abhi punappunaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1232: Siyā samasuti pubbā, vaṇṇāvutti paro yathā.
anya-e0812n0:1233_1: Taṃ padāni vākyālaṅkārāni samānāni uttaruttarehi, tesaṃ āsatti ṭhānādināyathākathañci
anya-e0812n0:1233_2: samasutīnaṃ āsannatā padāsatti, paṭhamappayuttassakkharassa pacchā pāso pakkhepo
anya-e0812n0:1233_3: anuppāso, padāsatti ca anuppāso ca, tesaṃ vasena dvidhā hoti. “Kīdisā te”ti āha “siyā”tiādi.
anya-e0812n0:1233_4: Pubbā paṭhamābhihitā padāsatti samā yena kenaci ṭhānamattāsaṃyogādinā padantarena
anya-e0812n0:1233_5: suti vaṇṇo yassā sā siyā bhaveyya, paro pacchimo anuppāso tu vaṇṇassa sarabyañjanalakkhaṇassa
anya-e0812n0:1233_6: āvutti punappunuccāraṇaṃ siyāti. Evaṃ katthaci bandhe samānapadāsatti katthaci anuppāso
anya-e0812n0:1233_7: katthaci tadubhayaṃ, dvayena rahito viraso bandho nassādīyate kavīhi, tādisaṃ madhurattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1233_8: duvidhaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ, silesasamatānvitantuccantameva ramaṇīyaṃ siyāti lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1234_0: 127. Idāni madhuraguṇaṃ dasseti “madhuri”ccādinā. Madhurattaṃ savanīyabhāvato manoharattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1234_1: madhuraguṇaṃ, padānaṃ vākyāvayavasaṅkhātānaṃ syādyantādīnaṃ uparūparipadehi samānānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1234_2: āsatti ṭhānakaraṇādinā yena kenaci pakārena aññamaññaṃ āsannatā, anuppāso pubbuccāritavaṇṇānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1234_3: puna pakkhipanañcāti dvinnaṃ vasā vibhāgena dvidhā hoti. Tattha pubbā padāsatti samasuti
anya-e0812n0:1234_4: siyā, pubbāparavaṇṇānaṃ ṭhānamattākaraṇādīhi āsannasutisaṅkhatavaṇṇavutti hoti, paro
anya-e0812n0:1234_5: anuppāso pana vaṇṇāvutti sarabyañjanasabhāvānaṃ pubbuccāritavaṇṇānaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1234_6: siyāti. Yathāti dvīsu udāharaṇamādisati. Evaṃ katthaci bandhe padāsatti katthaci
anya-e0812n0:1234_7: anuppāso katthaci tadubhayaṃ, dvīhi vinimutto pana bandho viññūhi assādanīyo na hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1234_8: Upari vakkhamānāhi silesasamatāhi yuttaṃ madhurattaṃ pana visesato assādanīyaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:1234_9: Madhurassa bandhassa bhāvoti ca, padānaṃ āsattīti ca, anu pacchā pāso pakkhepoti
anya-e0812n0:1234_10: ca, padāsatti ca anuppāso cāti ca, tesaṃ vaso bhedoti ca, samā suti vaṇṇo yassāti
anya-e0812n0:1240_0: 128. Eso munipuṅgavo yadā yato pabhuti abhisambodhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sampatto samadhigato,
anya-e0812n0:1240_1: tadā pabhuti tato ārabbha dhammassa catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedassa sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n0:1240_2: mahussavo mahanto abbhudayo nippaṭipakkhā pavatti loke tividhe jāto ahosīti. Iha
anya-e0812n0:1240_3: kvaci dīghatākataṃ sadisattaṃ, kvaci ṭhānakataṃ, kvaci saṃyogakataṃ, kvaci aññathā,
anya-e0812n0:1241_0: 128. “Yadi”ccādi. Eso munipuṅgavo yadā abhisambodhiṃ sabbaññutaṃ sampatto sasantāne
anya-e0812n0:1241_1: uppādanavasena sampāpuṇi, tadā pabhuti tato paṭṭhāya dhammassa kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānādipabhedassa
anya-e0812n0:1241_2: sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammassa mahussavo mahābhivuddhi loke kāmādilokattaye jātoti.
anya-e0812n0:1241_3: Iha “yadā eso”ti dīghakālavasena āsannatā, “ya e”ti ṭhānavasena āsannatā, “abhisambodhiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1241_4: sampatto”ti saṃyogavasena āsannatā, “bhi dhi”nti dhanitato āsannatāti iccādinā padāsatti
anya-e0812n0:1241_5: daṭṭhabbā. Abhisambujjhati etāyāti ca, pumā ca so goceti ca, munīnaṃ puṅgavoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1241_6: mahanto ca so ussavo cāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1245_0: 129. Kundānaṃ kusumānaṃ sandoho samūho, tassa vibbhamo yesaṃ te, munindassa mandahāsā
anya-e0812n0:1245_1: manuññā hasitāni candassa kantiyo sobhāyo hasantā viḍambayantā disantamanudhāvanti
anya-e0812n0:1245_2: anuvicaranti. Iccatra nakārasahitassa dakārassa, takārassa cānuvattanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1249_1: te munindamandahāsā buddhassa manuññā hasitā candakantiyo nimmalacandakiraṇe hasantā
anya-e0812n0:1249_2: nindantā disantaṃ taṃ taṃ disaṃ, disāpariyantaṃ vā anudhāvanti vidhāvantīti. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:1249_3: nakārasahitadakārassa, nakārasahitatakārassa ca āvutti daṭṭhabbā. Mandā ca te hāsā
anya-e0812n0:1249_4: ceti ca, munindassa mandahāsāti ca, kundānaṃ sandohoti ca, tassa vibbhamo yesanti
anya-e0812n0:1249_5: ca, disāyeva disantaṃ, disānaṃ vā antanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1253_1: tatoyeva sobhāya nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ munindanayanadvandaṃ indīvarajjutiṃ nīluppalakantiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1257_0: 130. Yehi kehici āvuttito anuppāsoti ce? Netyāha “sabba”iccādi. Sabbehi komalehi
anya-e0812n0:1257_1: sukumārehi vaṇṇehi akkharehi anuppāso na pasaṃsiyo silāghanīyo na hoti silesavirodhittā.
anya-e0812n0:1257_2: “Yathe”ti taṃ udāharati. Ayaṃ mālatīmālā jātikusumadāmaṃ linānaṃ byādhitānaṃ lolānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1257_3: kusumarasārabbha lolupānaṃ alīnaṃ bhamarānaṃ mālā panti sā assā atthīti linalolālimālinī.
anya-e0812n0:1258_0: 130. Vuttānuppāsopi sabbakomalavaṇṇehi viracito na pasaṃsiyoti dassetuṃ “sabbakomalavaṇṇehī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:1258_1: Sabbakomalavaṇṇehi sabbehi sukumārakkharehi kato anuppāso vaṇṇāvuttilakkhaṇo na pasaṃsiyo
anya-e0812n0:1258_2: silesālaṅkāraviruddhattā pasattho na hoti. “Yathā”ti tamudāharati. Ayaṃ mālatīmālā
anya-e0812n0:1258_3: esā jātisumanamālikā linānaṃ byāvaṭānaṃ patantānaṃ lolānaṃ gandhaluddhānaṃ alīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1258_4: bhamarānaṃ mālinī pantiyuttāti. Ettha lakārasseva punappunappayogena komalavaṇṇāvutti.
anya-e0812n0:1258_5: Mālatīnaṃ mālāti ca, lolā ca te alayo cāti ca, linā ca te lolālayo cāti ca, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1258_6: mālāti ca, sā assa atthīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1264_1: mudūhi catūsupi pādesu sajātiyehi asithilakomalehi vā kakārādīhi vā sithilakomalassa
anya-e0812n0:1264_2: silesapaṭipakkhattā kevalehi phuṭehi vā adhimattasutīhi bhakārādīhi rāgādīhi (ka.)
anya-e0812n0:1264_3: vā akicchavacanīye kicchavacanīyassa sukhumālavipariyayattā missehi vā majjhimasutīhi
anya-e0812n0:1264_4: mudubhūtasaṃsaṭṭhehi vā vaṇṇehi akkharehi karaṇabhūtehi samatā tidhā hoti gajje pajje
anya-e0812n0:1265_0: 131. Idāni samataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “mudūhi”ccādimāha. Kevalehi phuṭamissehi aññattā sakalehi
anya-e0812n0:1265_1: mudūhi sithilakomalehi vaṇṇehi kakārādīhi vā kevalehi phuṭehi kevalakomalavaṇṇarahitattā
anya-e0812n0:1265_2: sakalehi akicchuccāraṇīyehi adhimattasutīhi bhakārādīhi vaṇṇehi vā missehi yathāvuttamuduphuṭasammissehi
anya-e0812n0:1265_3: vaṇṇehi vā karaṇabhūtehi samatā gajje vā pajje vā tidhā hotīti. Yadi sithilakomalavaṇṇehi
anya-e0812n0:1265_4: vicaritaṃ silesālaṅkārassa, kicchuccāraṇīyehi phuṭavaṇṇehi kataṃ sukhumālālaṅkārassa
anya-e0812n0:1272_0: 132. “Kokile”ccādi. Kokilānaṃ karavīkasakuṇānaṃ ālāpo kūjitaṃ, taṃ saṃvadati pakāsati
anya-e0812n0:1272_1: sīlenāti kokilālāpasaṃvādī, taṃsadisoti attho, munindassa ālāpo visaṭṭhādiaṭṭhaṅgiko
anya-e0812n0:1272_2: saro tassa vibbhamo vilāso sataṃ sappurisānaṃ hadayaṅgamataṃ manonusāritaṃ madhurabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1273_0: 132. “Kokili”ccādi. Kokilānaṃ karavīkasakuṇānaṃ ālāpaṃ nādalīlaṃ saṃvādī pakāsanasīlo,
anya-e0812n0:1273_1: taṃsadisoti adhippāyo, munindassa sabbaññuno ālāpassa visaṭṭhādiaṭṭhaṅgikanādassa
anya-e0812n0:1273_2: vibbhamo vilāso sataṃ sappurisānaṃ hadayaṅgamataṃ cittārādhitabhāvaṃ yāti ca, nibbutiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1273_3: sutasambandhena tesaṃyeva sādhūnaṃ nibbānaṃ deti ca dentopi hotīti. Ettha kokilālāpasaddena
anya-e0812n0:1280_0: 133. “Sambhāvanīye”ccādi. Sambhāvanīyo ādaraṇīyo. Sadevake loke santo sobhano bhāvo
anya-e0812n0:1280_1: adhippāyo yassa taṃ. Bhavantaṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti bhavantagu, taṃ vibhuṃ. Bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1280_2: sammāsambuddhaṃ. Bhavassa saṃsārassa anto avasānaṃ nibbānaṃ, tassa sādhanaṃ sampādanamākaṅkhati
anya-e0812n0:1280_3: sīlenāti bhavantasādhanākaṅkhī, ko nāma saṃsāravattijano. Na sambhāvaye ādaraṃ na
anya-e0812n0:1281_1: bhavantaguṃ bhavassa antasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ gataṃ vibhuṃ pabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1281_2: bhavantasādhanākaṅkhī nibbānasādhanābhilāsī ko katamo saṃsāravattijano na sambhāvaye
anya-e0812n0:1281_3: ādaraṃ na kareyya, karotyeva. Santo ca so bhāvo cāti ca, sambhāvanīyo sambhāvo yasseti
anya-e0812n0:1281_4: ca, bhavassa antanti ca, bhavantaṃ gatoti ca, tassa sādhananti ca, taṃ ākaṅkhati
anya-e0812n0:1286_0: 134. “Laddhi”ccādi. Laddho candanatarūnaṃ saṃsaggo paricayo tena sobhano gandho assāti
anya-e0812n0:1286_1: sugandhī surabhi malayānilodakkhiṇapavamāno munindassa mukhamārutā bhītova tādisamuduttasītalattasugandhasampattiyā
anya-e0812n0:1286_2: attano dūratarattā āyāti anuvattati. Mandanti āgamanakriyāvisesanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1287_2: mukhasurabhivāsitapavanato bhīto iva tādisamudusurabhisītalattassa attani asambhavato
anya-e0812n0:1287_3: bhītova mandaṃ saṇikaṃ yāti abhimukhametīti. Candanānaṃ saṃsaggoti ca, laddho ca
anya-e0812n0:1287_4: so candanasaṃsaggoti ca, sobhano gandho yassāti ca, laddhacandanasaṃsaggena sugandhīti
anya-e0812n0:1287_5: ca, malayato āgato aniloti ca, munindamukhato nikkhanto mārutoti ca viggaho. Mandanti
anya-e0812n0:1291_1: vaṇṇāni pāyāni bahūni yassā sā tathā, “niṭṭhurāni appakānī”ti pāyaggahaṇena sūcitaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1291_2: tatoyeva sabbehi kevalehi komalehi sithilehi laghūhi akkharehi nissaṭā niggatā kicchena
anya-e0812n0:1291_3: dukkhena uccāraṇā tato apetāni apagatāni byañjanāni yassā sāti anuvaditvā sukhumālatā vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:1292_3: nāmāti. Aniṭṭhurāni akkharāni pāyāni bahūni yassanti ca, sabbe ca te komalā ceti
anya-e0812n0:1292_4: ca, tehi nissaṭāti ca, kicchena uccāraṇāti ca, tehi apetānīti ca, tāni byañjanāni
anya-e0812n0:1296_0: 136. Udāharati “passantā”iccādi. Rūpavibhavaṃ rūpasampattiṃ passantā madhuraṃ giraṃ
anya-e0812n0:1296_1: vācaṃ suṇantā sādhavo keḷiparammukhā kīḷāya nicchantā carantīti sambandho. Katthāti
anya-e0812n0:1301_1: vihīnāpi edisī sukhumālatā sataṃ paṇḍitajanānaṃ sammukhataṃ abhimukhabhāvaṃ vācāgocarattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1301_2: ārohati upagacchati, kimutaatthālaṅkārālaṅkitetyapisaddo. Tena sabhāvavutyādinā alaṅkārena
anya-e0812n0:1301_3: ujjalā dittā pana visesenātisayena ramaṇīyā manuññāti.
anya-e0812n0:1302_1: sataṃ paññavantānaṃ sammukhataṃ abhimukhabhāvaṃ tesaṃ vacanavisayabhāvanti attho
anya-e0812n0:1302_2: ārohati pāpuṇāti. Tadujjalā tena sabhāvavuttivaṅkavuttisambhūtena atthālaṅkārena
anya-e0812n0:1302_3: jotamānā visesena atisayena ramaṇīyā manuññā hoti. Alaṅkārehi vihīnāti ca, tena ujjalāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1306_0: 138. Tamudāharati “romañce”ccādinā. Romañcā lomahaṃsā iva romañcā eva vā, piñchāni
anya-e0812n0:1306_1: barihāni parihārāni (ka.) tesaṃ racanā chattākārena vidhānaṃ yesaṃ te tathā, “sādhū”ti
anya-e0812n0:1306_2: vādo vacanaṃ taṃsadisoyeva vā, āhito dhani kekāsaṅkhāto yesaṃ te tathā, munimeghena
anya-e0812n0:1306_3: munisadisena munisaṅkhātena vā vāridena ummadā mattā sādhusadisā sādhu eva vā sikhāvalā
anya-e0812n0:1306_4: mayūrā laḷanti līlopetā vicaranti, aññamaññaṃ ramantīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:1307_1: romā eva vā piñchānaṃ barihānaṃ racanā chattākārena vitthāravantā sādhuvādāhitaddhanī
anya-e0812n0:1307_2: “sādhū”ti vacanasadisehi sādhuvādehi vā pavattakekāninnādehi samannāgatā munimeghummadā
anya-e0812n0:1307_3: munisadisena munisaṅkhātena vā meghena sañjātamadā ime sādhusikhāvalā sajjanasadisā
anya-e0812n0:1307_4: sādhuno eva vā mayūrā laḷanti līlopetā bhavantīti. Idaṃ asesavatthuvisayaṃ samāsarūpakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1307_5: amukhyapakkhe “romañcā viya sādhuvādo viya muni viya sādhavo viyā”ti ca, mukhyapakkhe
anya-e0812n0:1307_6: “piñcharacanā viya āhitaddhanī viya megho viya sikhāvalā viyā”ti upacaritabbaṃ. Romañcā
anya-e0812n0:1307_7: eva piñchānīti ca, tesaṃ racanā yesanti ca, “sādhu”iti vādoti ca, āhito ca so dhani
anya-e0812n0:1307_8: ceti ca, sādhuvādo āhitaddhani yesanti ca, muni eva meghoti ca, tena ummadāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1307_9: sādhavo eva sikhāvalāti ca vākyaṃ. “Munīmegho”ti ettha dīghattaṃ chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1311_0: 139. Na kevalaṃ sukhumālatā saddeva, atthepīti dassetumāha “sukhumālatta”miccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1311_1: Atthevāti vijjateva, taṃ tu anocityagāmmādivajjanā sambhavati. “Yathe”ti tamudāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1311_2: Matādisaddesu vattabbesu kittisesādīnaṃ saddānaṃ kittanaṃ kathanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1312_0: 139. Ayaṃ sukhumālatā na kevalaṃ saddeva, atthepīti dassetuṃ āha “sukhumālatta”miccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1312_1: Sukhumālattamattheva padatthavisayampi ca padābhidheyyagocarampi sukhumālattaṃ attheva,
anya-e0812n0:1312_3: vattabbesu kittisesādisaddānaṃ kittanaṃ kathananti. Mato itiādi yesaṃ “jīvitakkhayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1312_4: patto” iccādīnamiti ca, kittiseso itiādiyesaṃ “devattaṃ gato, saggakāyamalaṅkarī”tyādīnamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1318_1: siliṭṭhānaṃ padānaṃ saṃsaggena ramaṇīyo manuñño guṇo tassa ālayo pavattiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1318_2: Bandhassa racanāya gāravo asithilatā, saha tena vattatīti sabandhagāravoti anuvaditvā
anya-e0812n0:1318_3: soyaṃ sileso nāmāti vidhīyate. “Taṃ yathe”tyudāharati. Yathā ayaṃ sileso, tathā aññopi
anya-e0812n0:1318_4: tādiso daṭṭhabbo, na tvayameveti “taṃ yathā” saddassattho.
anya-e0812n0:1319_1: ṭhānakaraṇādīhi āsannavaṇṇānaṃ vinyāsahetu aññamaññanissitānaṃ padānaṃ samavāyena
anya-e0812n0:1319_3: saha pavatto so ayaṃ bandho sileso nāmāti. Sileso nāma bandhagāravo, tappaṭipādakabandhopyettha
anya-e0812n0:1319_4: silesoti vuccati. Siliṭṭhā ca te padā ceti ca, tesaṃ saṃsaggoti ca, tena ramaṇīyoti
anya-e0812n0:1319_5: ca, so eva guṇoti ca, tassa ālayoti ca, bandhassa guruno bhāvoti ca, tena saha pavattatīti
anya-e0812n0:1323_1: manoharattaṃ, taṃ chindati sīlenāti bālinduvibbhamacchediyo pañcamīcandassa kalāsannibhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1323_2: nakharānaṃ nakhānaṃ āvaliyo tāsaṃ kantibhi sobhāhi saha valitā saṃyuttā sā, munindassa
anya-e0812n0:1323_3: padāniyeva ambhojāni padumāni tesaṃ kanti. Vo tumhe sāmaññena vadati. Avataṃ pālayatu.
anya-e0812n0:1324_1: saha valitā saṃyuttā sā munindapadambhojakanti sā sambuddhapādapadumasobhā vo tumhe
anya-e0812n0:1324_2: avataṃ rakkhatūti. Bālo ca so indu cāti ca, tassa vibbhamoti ca, taṃ chindati sīlenāti
anya-e0812n0:1324_3: ca, nakhānaṃ āvaliyoti ca, tāsaṃ kantīti ca, bālinduvibbhamacchediyo ca tā nakharāvalikantiyo
anya-e0812n0:1324_4: cāti ca, munindassa padānīti ca, tāniyeva ambhojānīti ca, tesaṃ kantīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1330_1: guṇo cāgātisayādiko ukkaṃsavanto adhimatto yadi patīyate viññāyate bandheti viññāyati
anya-e0812n0:1330_2: “bandhapaddhatī”ti vakkhamānattā, ayaṃ udāro bhaveti vidhi. Udāroyaṃ hotu, kiṃ tato
anya-e0812n0:1330_3: siyāti āha “teni”ccādi. Tena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena bandhapaddhati racanakkamo nāthabhūtena
anya-e0812n0:1330_4: udāraguṇena saha vattatīti sanāthā, sampadāvāti sampadāvatīti (?) vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1331_0: 142. Idāni udārattamuddisati “ukkaṃse”ccādinā. Ukkaṃsavanto atisayavā yokoci guṇo
anya-e0812n0:1331_1: cāgātisayādiko saddāvaliyā paṭipādanīyo ānubhāvo yadi patīyate sace katthaci bandhe
anya-e0812n0:1331_2: viññāyate, ayaṃ yathāvuttaguṇo udāro nāma bhave. Tena kiṃ payojananti ce? Bandhabandhati
anya-e0812n0:1331_3: padāvali tena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena sanāthā sappatiṭṭhā hoti. Ukkaṃso assa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1331_4: nāthena saha vattatīti ca, bandhassa paddhatīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1334: Aho te jantavo yanti, sabbathā nirajattanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1335_0: 143. Tamudāharati “pāde”ccādinā. Gotamāti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati. Tava bhagavato
anya-e0812n0:1335_1: pādambhojānaṃ rajāni reṇavo, tehi littāni upadehitāni gattāni yesanti viggaho. Ye
anya-e0812n0:1335_2: janā te jantavo sabbappakārena rajolavenāpyanupalittattā rajehi kilesasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0812n0:1335_3: niggatā nirajā, tesaṃ bhāvo nirajattanaṃ nikkilesabhāvaṃ yanti pāpuṇanti. Aho acchariyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1335_4: yato rajasā littā nāma saṃkiliṭṭhāyeva siyuṃ, bhavaṃ pana pādarajasā vilepane jane
anya-e0812n0:1335_5: niraje karoti. Acchariyaṃ bhavato idanti attho.
anya-e0812n0:1336_0: 143. Idāni udāharati “pādambhoje”ccādinā. Bho gotama ye sattā tava tuyhaṃ pādambhojarajolittagattā
anya-e0812n0:1336_2: anupalittattā sabbappakārena nirajattanaṃ vigatakilesarajobhāvaṃ yanti pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0812n0:1336_3: aho acchariyaṃ. Rajolittā nāma saṃkiliṭṭhā siyuṃ, tvaṃ pana pādarajasā upalittepi
anya-e0812n0:1336_4: satte niraje karosīti bhāvo. Iha bhagavato ukkaṃsaguṇo dīpito hoti. Pādāniyeva ambhojānīti
anya-e0812n0:1336_5: ca, tesaṃ rajānīti ca, tehi littāni gattāni yesanti ca, rajehi kilesehi niggatāti
anya-e0812n0:1340_0: 144. Ko panettha ukkaṃsavanto guṇo yena bandho sanātho siyāti ce? Āha “eva”miccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1340_1: Evamiti jinānubhāvassa sammāsambuddhapabhāvassa samukkaṃso atisayo dissati padissate
anya-e0812n0:1340_2: atra bandhe, tasmā jinānubhāvena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena bandho sanātho siyāti. Pakāramimamaññatrapiatidisanto
anya-e0812n0:1340_3: āha “paññavā”tiādi. Paññavā paññāsampanno anena vidhinā iminā pakārena edisaṃ evarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1341_1: imissaṃ anantaragāthāyaṃ evaṃ yathāvuttakkamena jinānubhāvassa tathāgatappabhāvassa
anya-e0812n0:1341_2: samukkaṃso ādhikkaṃ dissati padissate, tasmā jinānubhāvasaṅkhātena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena
anya-e0812n0:1341_3: bandho sanātho bhaveyya. Paññavā pasatthañāṇavanto anena vidhinā iminā kamena īdisaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1347_0: 145. Aparamudārappakāraṃ dassetumāha “udāro”iccādi. Yaṃ pasatthaṃ silāghanīyaṃ visesanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1347_1: upādiyati, sopi na pana yathāvuttova udāro viññeyyo. “Yathe”tyudāharati. Kīḷāya kīḷatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1347_2: saro, līlāya yutto hāso, hemaṃ hemamayamaṅgadanti samāso, taṃ ādi yesanti bāhirattho.
anya-e0812n0:1347_3: Ādisaddena kusumadāmamaṇimekhalādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Ayaṃ tu bandhapharusagāmmapariccāgā sambhavati.
anya-e0812n0:1348_0: 145. Aññamapi udāraṃ dasseti “udāro”ccādinā. Yaṃ pasatthavisesanaṃ pasaṃsanīyavisesanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1348_1: hoti, sopi udāroti viññeyyo. “Yathā”ti tamudāharati. Kīḷāsaro kīḷāya kato saro. Līlāhāso
anya-e0812n0:1348_2: līlāya yutto hāso. Hemaṅgadādayo suvaṇṇakeyūrāiccādayoti. Kīḷatthāya saroti ca, līlāya
anya-e0812n0:1348_3: yutto hāsoti ca, hemaṃ hemamayaṃ aṅgadanti ca, līlāhāso ca hemaṅgadañcāti ca, tāni
anya-e0812n0:1348_4: ādīni yesaṃ kusumadāmamaṇimekhalādīnanti ca viggaho. Ayamudāro bandhapharusagāmmādidosapariccāgena sijjhati.
anya-e0812n0:1355_0: 146. Kantiṃ kathayati “lokiyi”ccādinā. Loke vidito lokiyo, taṃ lokiyaṃ atthaṃ abhidheyyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1355_1: anatikkantā anatītā sabbesaṃ kavīnamitaresaṃ vā janānaṃ eva kantā manoharā kanti
anya-e0812n0:1355_2: nāmāti vuccati. Ayaṃ pana saddaguṇo ativuttassa vākyadosassa pariccāgena sambhavati.
anya-e0812n0:1356_0: 146. Idāni kantiṃ dasseti “lokiyi”ccādinā. Lokiyatthānatikkantā loke pasiddhasaddatthamanatikkantā
anya-e0812n0:1356_1: sabbajanānaṃ sakalakavīnaṃ kantā manuññā kanti nāma vuccate, sā ativuttassa ativuttadosassa
anya-e0812n0:1356_2: parihārato vuttā dosaparihāraparicchede kathitā hoti. Ativuttadosaparihārato eva
anya-e0812n0:1356_3: kantiyā siddhattā tassa lakkhiyo eva etissā hotīti adhippāyo. Loke viditoti ca, so
anya-e0812n0:1356_4: ca so attho ceti ca viggaho. “Yathā”ti kantiyā udāharaṇaṃ dasseti “muninda”iccādi. Taṃ vuttameva.
anya-e0812n0:1363_1: saddato atthato vā sāmatthiyato vā aneyyatā patīti aññathā vagamo gatyantarābhāvā,
anya-e0812n0:1363_3: vidhīyate. Sā pana byākiṇṇaneyyādidosavajjanāya jāyate. Tadubhayā jātā sāyaṃ aneyyatā
anya-e0812n0:1364_0: 147. Idāni atthabyattiṃ dasseti “atthabyatti”ccādinā. Abhidheyyassa atthassa saddato
anya-e0812n0:1364_1: atthato atthasāmatthiyato ca aneyyatā tattheva vijjamānattā saddassa atthassa vā
anya-e0812n0:1364_2: āharitvā vattabbassa abhāvo atthabyatti nāma, tadubhayā tehi dvīhi jātā sā ayaṃ aneyyatāsaṅkhatā
anya-e0812n0:1364_4: sadda-sāmatthiyavilaṅghinī”ti vuttattā atthapatīti pana vinā saddañca sāmatthiyañca
anya-e0812n0:1364_5: aññathānupalabbhatīti iha “saddato atthato”ti vuttaṃ. Atthassa byatti patītīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1364_6: natthi neyyaṃ āharitabbaṃ assa abhidheyyassāti ca, tassa bhāvoti ca, te ca te ubho
anya-e0812n0:1364_7: saddatthā cāti ca, te avayavā etissāti ca, neyyassa parihāroti ca vākyaṃ. Idāni “yathe”ccādinā
anya-e0812n0:1371_0: 148. Puna dutiye tu dhīrāti āmantanaṃ. Te tava pādanakhesu sabhāvāmalatā pakatiparisuddhatā
anya-e0812n0:1371_1: mudhā tucchā. Kasmāti ce? Yato yasmā kāraṇā te pādanakhā avanatassa sannatassa anantassa
anya-e0812n0:1371_2: nāgarājassa moḷino kirīṭassa avanatānaṃ vā naramarānaṃ anantānaṃ moḷīnaṃ chāyā chaviyo
anya-e0812n0:1371_3: no jahanti na pariccajanti, sañchaviyo pana jahantīti. Ettha nakhesu sañchavittā
anya-e0812n0:1372_0: 148. “Puna atthena yathā sabhāvi”ccādi. Dhīra te tava pādanakhesu sabhāvāmalatā pakatiparisuddhatā
anya-e0812n0:1372_1: mudhā tucchā. Kasmāti ce? Yato yasmā te caraṇanakhā avanatānantamoḷicchāyā pādānatassa
anya-e0812n0:1372_2: anantanāgarājassa kirīṭassa sambandhinī, avanatānaṃ vā anantānaṃ devamanussānaṃ moḷīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1372_3: chāyā kantiyo no jahanti na vijahanti, pakativaṇṇaṃ pahāya kirīṭakantisadisā te honti,
anya-e0812n0:1372_4: tasmā ettha candakiraṇasannibhānaṃ nakharaṃsīnaṃ samīpe moḷīnaṃ nakharaṃsīhi amadditasakakantiyuttabhāvamāpajjanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1372_6: sāmatthiyā vibhūtaṃ gamyate. Sassa bhāvoti ca, tena amalāti ca, tesaṃ bhāvoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1372_7: paṭhamapakkhe avanato ca so ananto cāti ca, tassa moḷīti ca, tassa chāyāyoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1372_8: dutiyapakkhe anantā ca te moḷī ceti ca, avanatānaṃ anantamoḷīti ca, tesaṃ chāyāyoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1376_0: 149. Samādhiphalaṃ kiccāha “bandhe”ccādi. Yanti yaṃ samādhiṃ bandhassa gajjapajjamissabhāvassa
anya-e0812n0:1376_1: sāroti sabbassa jīvitaṃ tapparāyattā bandhassa samaggāpi viññuno sabbepi kavino maññanti
anya-e0812n0:1376_2: cintenti jānanti, ayaṃ samādhi nāma samādhikhyo guṇo dassane pakāsane avasaraṃ okāsaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1377_0: 149. Idāni samādhayo niddisati “bandhi”ccādinā. Samaggā api viññuno sabbepi kavayo
anya-e0812n0:1377_1: yaṃ samādhiṃ “bandhasāro”ti pajjagajjavimissasaṅkhātassa bandhassa jīvitamiti maññanti,
anya-e0812n0:1377_2: ayaṃ samādhi nāma guṇo dassanāvasaraṃ patto uddiṭṭhānukkamena dassanokāsaṃ patto
anya-e0812n0:1377_3: hoti. Bandhassa sāroti ca, dassane avasaranti ca, taṃ pattoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1383_1: vatthuno pakatāpekkhāya dhammo guṇo pasiddho, tato tasmā mukhyavisayā aññattha amukhye
anya-e0812n0:1383_2: visaye lokasīmānurodhato lokappatītyanuvattanena sammā sādhu lokasīmānuvattanameveha
anya-e0812n0:1383_3: sādhuttaṃ ādhīyate āropyate, iti iminā kāraṇena eso evaṃvidho dhammo “samādhī”ti
anya-e0812n0:1383_4: niruccatītidha sammā ādhīyatīti evaṃ nīharitvā vuccatīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:1384_0: 150. “Samādhī”ti ayaṃ vohāro bandhavisaye kathaṃ pavattatīti āsaṅkāyaṃ paṭhamaṃ nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1384_1: dassetuṃ āha “aññi”ccādi. Yasmā aññadhammo samādhānassa visayabhūtaamukhyato aññassa
anya-e0812n0:1384_2: mukhyavatthuno pasiddhaguṇo, tato mukhyavisayato aññattha amukhyavisaye lokasīmānurodhato
anya-e0812n0:1384_4: iti iminā kāraṇena eso yathāvuttaguṇo “samādhī”ti niruccati vuccatīti. Aññassa dhammoti
anya-e0812n0:1384_5: ca, lokassa sīmāti ca, tassā anurodhoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1387: Apāṇe pāṇinaṃ dhammo, sammā ādhīyate kvaci;
anya-e0812n0:1392_0: 151-152. Samādhānavisayamāha “apāṇe”iccādi. Kvaci ṭhāne pāṇinaṃ pāṇavantānaṃ padatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1392_1: dhammo guṇo apāṇe pāṇavirahite vatthuni sammā lokapatītyanuvattanena ādhīyate āropyate,
anya-e0812n0:1392_2: evamuparipi yathānurūpaṃ. Nirūpeti rūpavirahite vatthuni, kvacīti sabbattha anuvattati.
anya-e0812n0:1392_3: Asarīre aghane asaṃhate vatthuni kaṭhinassa daḷhassa, tesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ samādhīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1393_1: “apāṇe”ccādinā. Kvaci kismiñci ṭhāne pāṇinaṃ dhammo indriyabaddhānaṃ guṇo apāṇe pāṇarahitavatthumhi
anya-e0812n0:1393_2: sammā lokapatītianusārena ādhīyate āropyate, kvaci rūpayuttassa rūpavantavatthuno
anya-e0812n0:1393_3: dhammo nirūpe rūparahitavatthumhi, kvaci sarasassa rasavantassa vatthuno dhammo nirase
anya-e0812n0:1393_4: rasarahite ca, kvaci dravayuttassa dravavantavatthuno dhammo adrave dravarahite ca,
anya-e0812n0:1393_5: kvaci kattutā kattuguṇo akattaripi, kvaci kaṭhinassa thaddhassa vatthuno dhammo asarīrepi
anya-e0812n0:1393_6: sarīrarahitepi sammā ādhīyate. Tesaṃ channaṃ samādhīnaṃ rūpaṃ udāharaṇaṃ kamā “apāṇe
anya-e0812n0:1393_7: pāṇina”nti uddiṭṭhānukkamena siyā bhaveyyāti. Na santi pāṇā asseti ca, rūpā niggatoti
anya-e0812n0:1393_8: ca, rūpena yuttoti ca, rasā niggatoti ca, rasena saha vattamānoti ca, dravāaññoti
anya-e0812n0:1393_9: ca, dravena dravabhāvena yuttoti ca, kattuto aññoti ca, kattuno bhāvoti ca, natthi
anya-e0812n0:1399_1: uṇṇāromadhātusaṅkhātena puṇṇindunā saha saṅgamā saṃyogena kumudinī kumudiniyo kumudākarā
anya-e0812n0:1399_2: divāpi viniddā vigatasoppā sampamodanti maññe suṭṭhuyeva pamodantīti parikappemīti.
anya-e0812n0:1399_3: Ettha pāṇidhammassa suratarūpassa saṅgamassa viniddāya sampīṇanassa ca apāṇini āropitapumbhāve
anya-e0812n0:1399_4: uṇṇāpuṇṇindumhi, tathā āropitaitthibhāvāsu kumudinīsu lokasīmānurodhena samādhānato
anya-e0812n0:1399_5: soyaṃ pasiddho dhammo “samādhī”ti vuccati. Tadabhidhāyī saddo ca upacārato atthānugāmittā
anya-e0812n0:1400_0: 153. Tesu pāṇidhammasamādhino udāharaṇamādisati “uṇṇā”iccādinā. Nātha tava tuyhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1400_2: kumudinī keravākarasaṅkhātā kumudiniyo divāpi viniddā vikasitā sampamodanti maññe
anya-e0812n0:1400_3: atisantuṭṭhā hontīti kappemīti indusampamodo sahasaddena ñāyate. Ettha pāṇidhammasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n0:1400_4: suratasaṅgamo ca niddāpagamo ca sampamodanañcāti tiṇṇaṃ uṇṇāpuṇṇindukumudinīsaṅkhātesu
anya-e0812n0:1400_5: apāṇesu lokavohārānatikkamma buddhiyā āropanena pāṇidhammato pasiddhā tayo atthā
anya-e0812n0:1400_6: idha samādhayo nāma, tappaṭipādakaganthopi atthānugāmittā tadupacārena samādhīti
anya-e0812n0:1400_7: daṭṭhabbo. Puṇṇo ca so indu ceti ca, uṇṇā eva puṇṇindu cāti ca, vigatā niddā yehīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1405_0: 154. “Dayā”iccādi. Nātha te pādambujesu ānatā paṇāmavasena janā tilokakuharapavattino
anya-e0812n0:1405_1: sattā amatarasesviva pīyūsarasesu viya dayārasesu karuṇārasesu guṇesu. “Siṅgārādo
anya-e0812n0:1405_2: vise vīriye, guṇe rāge drave raso”ti amarakosa 3.3.226 hi nighaṇṭu. Mujjantā nimujjamānā
anya-e0812n0:1405_3: hatā naṭṭhā dosā vātādayo amatapakkhe, aññattha tu hatā naṭṭhā dosā rāgādayo yesanti
anya-e0812n0:1405_4: viggaho, tatoyeva sukhitā sukhaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ itā pattā gatāti attho.
anya-e0812n0:1406_0: 154. Idāni rūpadhammasamādhino udāharaṇaṃ uddisati “dayā”iccādinā. Nātha te tava
anya-e0812n0:1406_1: pādambujānatā caraṇapadume paṇatā janā devamanussā amatarasesu iva sudhājalesu viya
anya-e0812n0:1406_2: dayārasesu anaññasādhāraṇakaruṇāguṇesu mujjantā nimujjamānā hatadosā vinaṭṭhavātapittādayo
anya-e0812n0:1406_3: vinaṭṭharāgādidosā vā sukhitā tatoyeva ajarāmarasaṅkhātasukhaṃ itā pattāti. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:1406_4: rūpayuttajale labbhamānaṃ mujjanaṃ nirūpe dayāguṇe āropitaṃ hoti. Dayā eva rasā guṇāti
anya-e0812n0:1406_5: ca, amatā eva rasāti ca, hatā vātādayo rāgādayo vā dosā yesanti ca, pādāni eva ambujānīti
anya-e0812n0:1407: “Siṅgārādovise vīriye, guṇe rāge draveraso”ti amarakosa 3.3.226 ettha rasasaddo guṇajalesu vattati.
anya-e0812n0:1410: Madhurepi guṇe dhīra, nappasīdanti ye tava;
anya-e0812n0:1412_0: 155. “Madhure”ccādi. Dhiyā īratīti dhīro, bho dhīra tava madhurepi manoharepi guṇe
anya-e0812n0:1412_1: karuṇādike ye nappasīdanti pasādaṃ na karonti, khāraguṇānaṃ amadhuraguṇānaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1412_2: janānaṃ manaso vutti cittappavatti kīdisīti kimiva dissati, na viññāyate “īdisī”ti.
anya-e0812n0:1413_0: 155. Idāni sarasadhammasamādhino udāharaṇamuddisati “madhuri”ccādinā. Bho dhīra tava
anya-e0812n0:1413_1: te madhure api guṇe pakatisundare karuṇāpaññāguṇepi ye hīnādhimuttikā janā nappasīdanti,
anya-e0812n0:1413_2: khāraguṇānaṃ amadhuraguṇānaṃ tesaṃ janānaṃ manaso vutti cittappavatti kīdisī kathaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1413_3: ruhati. Dhiyā īrati pavattatīti ca, kā viya sā dissatīti ca, khārā guṇā yesanti ca
anya-e0812n0:1413_4: viggaho. Ettha samādhi nāma rasahīne āropitarasayuttadhammabhūtaṃ madhurakhāraguṇadvayaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1418_1: kundasobhāsalakkhaṇā kundakusumassa sobhāsavantā jutivijambhino mahāguṇā samantā
anya-e0812n0:1419_1: sabbakicce parinipphanna, nipphannehi sabbatthehi vā samannāgata he tathāgata tava
anya-e0812n0:1419_2: cūḷakapuṭapeyyā cūḷakapuṭena pātabbā kundasobhāsalakkhaṇā kundasobhāhi samānalakkhaṇā
anya-e0812n0:1419_3: kundasobhāsadisā vā mahāguṇā saṅkhyāmahantattā ānubhāvamahantattā vā mahantā vā arahattādayo
anya-e0812n0:1419_4: guṇā samantā samantato disā dasadisāsu dhāvantīti. Ettha dravayuttaguṇabhūto cūḷakapuṭapeyyabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:1419_5: dravarahite guṇe āropito samādhi nāma hoti. Sabbe ca te atthā ceti ca, te siddhā
anya-e0812n0:1419_6: yasseti ca, cūḷakameva puṭamiti ca, tena peyyāti ca, mahantā ca te guṇā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1419_7: kundānaṃ sobhāti ca, tāhi samānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yesanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1424_0: 157. “Mārā”iccādi. Māroyeva ari sattūti mārārī, tena, balena attano sattiyā, tassa
anya-e0812n0:1424_1: vā balena senāya vissaṭṭhā abhimukhaṃ chaḍḍitā nānāvidhā anekappakārā āyudhā bhindivāḷādayo
anya-e0812n0:1424_2: kuṇṭhā bheṇḍivālādayo (ka.) pariccattatikhiṇabhāvā tāyeva kuṇṭhabhāvappattiyā lajjamānā
anya-e0812n0:1424_4: pare amhe na jāneyyu”nti attano āvudhavesaṃ parivattitvā kusumavesena, jināti āmantanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1425_0: 157. Idāni kattudhammasamādhino udāharaṇamuddisati “mārāri”ccādinā. He jina mārāribalavissaṭṭhā
anya-e0812n0:1425_1: mārasattunā attano sattiyā vissaṭṭhā, mārārino vā senāya vissaṭṭhā abhimukhe pātitā
anya-e0812n0:1425_2: nānāvidhāyudhā anekappakārabhindivāḷaususattitomarādayo āvudhā kuṇṭhā atikhiṇā lajjamānā
anya-e0812n0:1425_3: “kasmā evaṃ lokapasiddhānubhāvānamamhākampi īdisaṃ vippakāramahosī”ti lajjantā aññavesena
anya-e0812n0:1425_4: “kathamamhe pare na jāneyyu”nti āvudhavesaṃ hitvā tadaññabhūtena pupphavesena tava
anya-e0812n0:1425_5: pādānatā pādasamīpe natā ahesunti. Ettha kattudhammabhūtaṃ lajjanañca aññavesena
anya-e0812n0:1425_6: parivattanañca ānatañceti ime lajjanādīnaṃ akattubhūtesu visayesu āropitā samādhayo
anya-e0812n0:1425_7: nāma honti. Māro eva arīti ca, balena vissaṭṭhāti ca, mārārinā balavissaṭṭhāti ca
anya-e0812n0:1425_8: mārārino balaṃ senāti ca, tena vissaṭṭhāti ca, nānā anekavidhā pakārā yesanti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1425_9: aññesaṃ vesoti ca, añño ca so veso cāti ca, pādesu ānatāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1432_0: 158. “Muninda”iccādi. Bodho sabbaññutaññāṇasadiso soyeva vā udayācalo udayapabbato
anya-e0812n0:1432_1: tasmiṃ kāle rattipariyante abhinikkhantasamaye udito pātubhūto munindo munindasadiso
anya-e0812n0:1432_2: soyeva vā bhāṇumā sūriyo andhatamaṃ andhakāraṃ mohaṃ vā paraṃ accantameva saddhammaraṃsinā
anya-e0812n0:1432_3: saddhammasadisena saddhammasaṅkhatena vā raṃsinā bhindaṃ padālento bhāti sobhatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1433_1: sabbaññutaññāṇasadise sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhāte vā udayapabbate kālodito rattikkhaye
anya-e0812n0:1433_2: māraparājitasamaye vā udito pātubhūto munindabhānumā munindasadiso munindoyeva vā
anya-e0812n0:1433_3: sūriyo andhatamaṃ pakatighanandhakāraṃ bahalamohandhakāraṃ saddhammaraṃsinā saddhammasadisena
anya-e0812n0:1433_4: saddhammabhūtena vā kiraṇena paramatisayena bhindaṃ padālento bhāti sobhatīti. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:1433_5: thaddhadhammabhūtaṃ bhedanaṃ asarīrabhūte andhakāre buddhiyā āropitaṃ samādhi nāma
anya-e0812n0:1433_6: hoti. Munīnaṃ indoti ca, soyeva bhānumāti ca, bodho eva udayācaloti ca, saddhammo
anya-e0812n0:1437_0: 159. Koci dhammo amukhyavisaye bandhe sobhate, na mukhyavisayeti dassanto āha “vamanaṃ”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1437_1: Vamanañca uggiranañca, ādisaddena virecanādipariggaho. Etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ guṇā padhānetarā
anya-e0812n0:1437_2: pasiddhavisayā visayantarapariggahalakkhaṇā vutti payogarūpā, tato apariccutaṃ aparigaḷitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1437_3: santaṃ amukhyabhūtaṃ atisundaraṃ accantamanoharamalaṅkārarūpattā, aññaṃ tu itaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:1437_4: pana mukhyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāmaṃ ekantena gāmmataṃ asabbhasabhāvaṃ bandhe tassānucitabhāvato
anya-e0812n0:1438_0: 159. Idāni imesuyeva pāṇidhammādīsu koci dhammo amukhyavisaye payutto pasattho, mukhyavisaye
anya-e0812n0:1438_1: payutto apasatthoti dassento “vamanuggi”ccādimāha. Etaṃ vamanuggiranādi vamanauggiranavirecanādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1438_2: guṇavutyapariccutaṃ amukhyapayogato agaḷitaṃ amukhyabhūtaṃ atisundaraṃ sabbesaṃ atipiyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1438_3: hoti, aññaṃ tu uttato byatirekaṃ mukhyavisaye payuttaṃ vamanuggiranādikaṃ pana kāmaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1438_4: ekantena gāmmataṃ sabhāvaappiyagāmmadosataṃ vindati sevatīti. Vamanañca uggiranañceti
anya-e0812n0:1438_5: ca, tāni ādīni yasseti ca, guṇā appadhānā vuttīti ca, tato apariccutanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1442_0: 160. Udāharati “kantīna”miccādi. Munino sammāsambuddhassa pādanakhānaṃ āvalī seṇiyo
anya-e0812n0:1442_1: kantīnaṃ attano nirantaraṃ nissarantīnaṃ sobhāvisesānaṃ vamanabyājā uggiranalesena
anya-e0812n0:1442_2: candakantī candacchaviyo sabbattha patthaṭattā pivantīva pānaṃ karontīti takkemi.
anya-e0812n0:1442_3: Kīdisī viyāti parikappanābījamāha “nippabha”ntiādi. Taṃ candaṃ nippabhaṃ pabhāvirahitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1442_4: karontiyo vidahamānā. Idañhi kappanābījaṃ yato nakhasobhāliṅganena candassa sobhāvato
anya-e0812n0:1442_5: nippabhattaṃ passitvā mahattañca tassā nakhāvaliyo candakantī pivantīti parikappeti
anya-e0812n0:1443_1: Munipādanakhāvalī munipādanakhaseṇiyo kantīnaṃ attano candamarīcisadisasobhānaṃ vamanabyājā
anya-e0812n0:1443_2: uggiranalesena taṃ nimmalacandaṃ nippabhaṃ karontiyo attano sabbattha patthaṭattā
anya-e0812n0:1443_3: nippabhaṃ karontiyo candakantī candaraṃsiyo pivanti maññe. Nakharaṃsīnaṃ sabbattha
anya-e0812n0:1443_4: patthaṭattā sappabhassāpi candassa nippabhattañca nakharaṃsīnaṃ adhikattañca disvā
anya-e0812n0:1443_5: candakantī pivanti iveti nakhāvalīnaṃ candakantipivanañca sakakantivamanañca pakati
anya-e0812n0:1443_6: na hoti, byājamiti kavinā parikappitaṃ hoti. Ettha bhattasitthādimukhyavisayato aññakantisaṅkhataamukhyavisaye
anya-e0812n0:1443_7: payuttaṃ vamanaṃ guṇavuttīti ñātabbaṃ. Vamanameva byājamiti ca, munino pādāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1443_8: tesu nakhāti ca, tesaṃ āvaliyoti ca, candassa kantiyoti ca, niggato pabhāhīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1447_0: 161. Yathāvuttaṃ nigameti “acitta”iccādinā. Iccevaṃ acitto kattā yassa taṃ acittakattukaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1447_1: Guṇo kammaṃ yassa taṃ guṇakammaṃ. Tañca vamanādi rujhamatimanoharaṃ bhavati bandhocitattā.
anya-e0812n0:1447_2: Nakhāvaliyo hi acittakattāro, kantiyo guṇakammanti vamanamatrātisundaraṃ. Nedameva
anya-e0812n0:1447_3: rujhanti āha “sacitta”iccādi. Etaṃ vamanādikaṃ sacittakattukampiyadiguṇakammaṃ, uttamaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1448_0: 161. Anantarodāharaṇassa pasatthattañca kammani guṇe sati sacittakattukavamanādikañca
anya-e0812n0:1448_1: iṭṭhamiti dassento “acittakattuka”miccādimāha. Iccevaṃ iminā pakārena acittakattukaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1448_3: vamanādikaṃ rujhaṃ racanāya ucitattā rucijanakaṃ hoti, etaṃ vamanādikaṃ sacittakattukampi
anya-e0812n0:1448_4: saviññāṇakakattuvantampi yadi guṇakammaṃ amukhyakammaṃ ce, uttamaṃ visiṭṭhameva,
anya-e0812n0:1448_5: “kantīna”nti bhāvasambandhe chaṭṭhiyā satipi vamanakriyāya kammattaṃ nātivattati.
anya-e0812n0:1448_6: Natthi cittaṃ yesanti ca, acittā kattāro yassāti ca, guṇo kammaṃ yasseti ca, saha
anya-e0812n0:1448_7: cittena vattamānoti ca vākyaṃ. Iti nidassane evaṃ pakāre nipāto, atha vā vacanavacanīyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1451: Bhāsanto madhuraṃ dhammaṃ, kaṃ na sampīṇaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1452_0: 162. Tadudāharati “uggirantovā”tiādinā. So jinavaro jane sakalasattanikāye sneharasaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1452_1: attano pemasaṅkhātaṃ anurāgaṃ uggirantova vamanto viya madhuraṃ atipaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1452_2: bhāsanto kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇaye, sabbameva sampīṇeti. Ettha jinavaro kattā sacitto,
anya-e0812n0:1453_1: jane sakalasattanikāye sneharasaṃ attano pemasaṅkhātaanurāgaṃ uggiranto iva vamanto
anya-e0812n0:1453_2: viya madhuraṃ ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ saddhammaṃ bhāsanto desento yathāsayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1453_3: vadanto kaṃ janaṃ kīdisaṃ puggalaṃ na sampīṇaye, pīṇeti evāti. Ettha uggiranaṃ jinavarasaṅkhatasacittakakattuvantampi
anya-e0812n0:1453_4: sneharasasaṅkhātaamukhyakammayuttattā pasatthaṃ hoti. Sneho eva raso anurāgoti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1462_1: kavitā kitti ca tadanugatā samupalabbhatīti samanusāsati “yo”iccādinā. Saddasatthe
anya-e0812n0:1462_2: byākaraṇe kismiñci “idameve”ti niyamābhāvā kusalo cheko nighaṇṭumhi abhidhānasatthe
anya-e0812n0:1462_4: ca kusalo na kevalaṃ saddasattheyeva, atha ca pana niccamanavarataṃ divā ca ratto
anya-e0812n0:1462_5: ca kato abhiyogo vāyāmo racanāvisaye yassa soyaṃ kavittavikalopi bandhakaraṇasaṅkhātakaviguṇaparihīnopi
anya-e0812n0:1462_6: kavīsu kaviguṇopetesu saṅkhyaṃ gaṇanaṃ ogayha paṭilabhitvā amandarūpaṃ atibahuṃ kittiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1466_2: “yo saddasatthakusalo”ccādimāha. Yo theranavamajjhimesu koci saddasatthakusalo saddānusāsanabyākaraṇavisaye
anya-e0812n0:1466_4: kusalo taṃtaṃvibhāgabuddhīnaṃ paṭipādanena cheko niccakatābhiyogo dhāraṇamanasikāravasena
anya-e0812n0:1466_5: niccaṃ katussāho hoti. So ayaṃ appamādī kavittavikalopi pakatisiddhakabbaracanaguṇarahitopi
anya-e0812n0:1466_6: kavīsu saṅkhyaṃ kabbakattūsu gaṇanaṃ ogayha kabbakaraṇaṭīkākaraṇādipakārena ogāhetvā
anya-e0812n0:1466_7: taṃ gaṇanaṃ pāpuṇitvā amandarūpaṃ anappakasabhāvaṃ atibahuṃ kittiṃ niddosaṃ sattharacanalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1466_8: puññasañcayaṃ, tappabhavaṃ pasiddhiṃ vā vindati labhatevāti. Yathāvuttasatthesu abhiyogo
anya-e0812n0:1471_0: Tattha sābhāvikī sabhāvasiddhā paṭibhā ca paññā ca bahu nimmalaṃ anappakaṃ nijjaṭaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1471_1: sutañca amando abhiyogo ca anappako abhyāso ceti ayameso sabbopi iha bandhane imissaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1471_2: kabbaracanāyaṃ hetu hoti kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti. Sadde sāsati ettha etenāti imasmiṃ atthe
anya-e0812n0:1471_3: tappaccayañca tassa thādesañca katvā saddasatthanti ñātabbaṃ, saddasatthe kusaloti
anya-e0812n0:1471_4: ca, nighaṇṭu ca chando ca alaṅkati alaṅkārañceti ca viggaho, ettha alaṅkatisaddo
anya-e0812n0:1471_5: satthāpekkhāya napuṃsako hoti, niccaṃ kato abhiyogo asseti ca, kavino bhāvoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1471_6: tena vikaloti ca, amandaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1478_1: Saguṇā yathāvuttehi pasādādīhi saddaguṇehi sahitā bandhapaddhati kabbaracanaṃ. Alaṅkarīyati
anya-e0812n0:1478_2: kantiṃ nīyati bandho etehi sarīramiva hārādīhīti alaṅkārā, tehi atthālaṅkārehi jātyādilakkhaṇehi
anya-e0812n0:1478_3: sahitā saṃyuttā satī saguṇā patibbatādiguṇopetā atthena dhanena alaṅkārena ābharaṇena
anya-e0812n0:1478_4: sahitā yuttā kantāva aṅganā viya. Yato accantakantā atisayaramaṇīyā siyā, tato tena
anya-e0812n0:1478_5: kāraṇena ye atthālaṅkārā avasaraṃ pattā, te adhunā idāni vuccante kathīyanti.
anya-e0812n0:1479_0: 164. Evaṃ saddālaṅkāravibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni tannissayaṃyeva atthālaṅkārabandhamārabhanto
anya-e0812n0:1479_3: saguṇā atthālaṅkārasahitā kantā iva patibbatādīhi guṇehi yuttā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādidhanehi
anya-e0812n0:1479_4: gīveyyakaṭakanūpurādīhi ābharaṇehi ca yuttā aṅganāva accantakantā yato atisayena
anya-e0812n0:1479_5: ramaṇīyā, tato tasmā te atthālaṅkārā adhunā dāni vuccante. Alaṅkaronti bandhaṃ sarīraṃ
anya-e0812n0:1479_6: vā etehīti ca, atthassa alaṅkārāti ca, tehi sahitāti ca, guṇehi saha vattatīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1479_7: bandhassa paddhatīti ca, accantaṃ atisayena kantāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1483_0: 165. Katippabhedā te iccāha “sabhāva”iccādi. Sabhāvavutti vaṅkavuttīti imesaṃ bhedā
anya-e0812n0:1483_1: pabhedena alaṃkriyā atthālaṅkārādvidhādvippakārā. Tesu sabhāvavutti kīdisīti āha
anya-e0812n0:1483_2: “paṭhamā”tiādi. Tattha tāsu paṭhamā sabhāvavutti vatthūnaṃ padatthānaṃ jātiguṇakriyādabbasabhāvānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1483_3: nānā vicittā, na dvekāva avatthā avasarā vibhāvinī pakāsikā viññeyyā. Jātyādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1483_4: padatthānaṃ yathāsabhāvamanekappakāraṃ sammadeva vivarantī sabhāvaṃ padatthānaṃ vicittaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1483_5: vadatīti sabhāvavutti nāmāti adhippāyo, sāva jātiyā padatthasarūpassa tathātathāpaṭipādakattena
anya-e0812n0:1484_1: Alaṃkriyā atthālaṅkārā sabhāvavaṅkavuttīnaṃ bhedā pabhedato dvidhā dvippakārā honti.
anya-e0812n0:1484_2: Tattha tāsudvīsu paṭhamā sabhāvavutti vatthūnaṃ jātiguṇakriyādabbalakkhaṇānaṃ padatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1484_3: nānāvatthāvibhāvinī anekappakārassa pakāsinī hoti. Ettha jātyādīnaṃ padatthānaṃ anekappakārasabhāvapakāsinī
anya-e0812n0:1484_4: sabhāvavutti nāma. Esāva jāti guṇādicatubbidhapadatthānaṃ sarūpasaṅkhātajātiyā tehi
anya-e0812n0:1484_5: ākārehi paṭipādanato upacārato jāti nāma hoti. Jātyādipadatthānaṃyeva yathāsabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1484_7: vaṅkavutti nāma. Yabhāvo ca vaṅko cāti ca, tesaṃ vuttīti ca, alaṃkaronti etāhīti
anya-e0812n0:1484_8: ca, nānā anekā ca sā avatthā cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1491_0: 166. “Yathe”ti taṃ udāharati. Līlāya vilāsena vihitāya vikantiyā gamanena sattapadavītihārasaṅkhātena
anya-e0812n0:1491_1: subhago sundaro disāsu dasasu thiramacalaṃ vilokanaṃ yassa so bodhisattaṅkuro tadahujāto
anya-e0812n0:1491_3: vadanto viroci visesena ramaṇīyattaṃ patto. Ayaṃ sabhāvavutti. Evaṃ jātisabhāvavutyādayopi parikappanīyā.
anya-e0812n0:1492_0: 166. Idāni sabhāvavuttiyā udāharaṇaṃ āha “yathā – līlāvikanti”ccādi. Līlāvikantisubhago
anya-e0812n0:1492_1: vilāsagamanena sattapadavītihārena sundaro disāthiravilokano dasadisāsu acalaolokano
anya-e0812n0:1492_3: bhāsaṃ vadanto viroci asobhīti. Iha bodhisattasaṅkhātassa dabbassa līlāvikantidisāthiravilokanavaconicchāraṇasaṅkhatānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1492_4: avatthānaṃ pakāsitattā dabbasabhāvavuttīti ñātabbā. Esāyeva dabbagatagatyādivicitrasarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1492_5: alaṅkaraṇato alaṅkāro nāma, dabbagatagatyādayo pana alaṃkiriyamānattā alaṃkiriyā
anya-e0812n0:1492_6: nāma. Jātiguṇakriyāsabhāvavuttiyopi evameva daṭṭhabbā. Līlāya yuttā vikantīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1492_7: tāya subhagoti ca, disāsu thiraṃ vilokanaṃ yasseti ca, bodhiyā paññāya sattoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1492_8: soyeva aṅkuroti ca, usabhassa bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ. Usabhassa bhāvasaṅkhātā akampanīyā
anya-e0812n0:1492_9: ṭhiti āsabhaṃ nāma, akampabhāvato tena samāpi vācā upacārato āsabhī nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1496_0: 167. Dutiyamāha “vutti”ccādinā. Vatthuno jātyādirūpassa padatthassa sabhāvo yassaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1496_1: avatthāyaṃ yādisaṃ rūpaṃ tassa aññathābhāvena tassa rūpassa tathetaṃ dabbāpanena
anya-e0812n0:1496_2: vutti vacanaṃ. Parā bhave aññā vaṅkavutti nāma siyā. Kiṃ sā sākallena vattuṃ sakkāti
anya-e0812n0:1496_3: āha “tassā”iccādi. Tassā vaṅkavuttiyā anantavikappattā aparimitabhedakattā bījassa
anya-e0812n0:1496_4: kāraṇattā sakalabyattibyāpisāmaññarūpassa yato pare vicittālaṅkārā pasavanti, upadassanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1497_1: tāsu tāsu avatthāsu yo sabhāvo vijjati, tassa sabhāvassa aññathā vijjamānākāraṃ hitvā
anya-e0812n0:1497_2: vattuparikappitena atisayaupamārūpakādiaññapakārena yā vutti yaṃ kathanaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n0:1497_3: sā parābhave sabhāvavuttito aññā vaṅkavutti nāma siyā. Tassā vaṅkavuttiyā anantavikappattā
anya-e0812n0:1497_4: appamāṇapakkhattā kathanena parisamāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā nayato tassa anantapakkhassa
anya-e0812n0:1497_5: pariggahaṇatthaṃ bījopadassanaṃ kāraṇamattassa nidassanaṃ hoti. Vakkhamānabhedato
anya-e0812n0:1497_6: ekamekampi attanā sadisaṃ anantabhedapariggahajānanatthaṃ pahotīti adhippāyo. Vatthūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1497_7: sabhāvoti ca, anantā vikappā yassa sabhāvasseti ca, tassa bhāvoti ca, bījassa upadassananti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1517: Vaṅkavuttīsu poseti, sileso tu siriṃ paraṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1518_0: 168-172. Yathoddesaṃ niddisitukāmo uddisati “tatthe”ccādi. Tatthāti tassaṃ vaṅkavuttiyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1518_1: “ete bhedā samuddiṭṭhā”ti iminā sambandho. Samuddiṭṭhāti saṅkhepanayena vuttā. Atisayo
anya-e0812n0:1518_2: upamā rūpakaṃ āvutti dīpakañca, samāso samāsavutti parikappanā ca, viseso ruḷhāhaṅkāro
anya-e0812n0:1518_3: ca, jīvitamuccateti tadabhāve bandhassa chavasseva heyyattā vuttaṃ, sileso tu vaṅkavuttīsu
anya-e0812n0:1518_4: sabhāvavuttiṃ hitvā vatthusabhāvato aññathā yathā tathā parikappanarūpāsu atisayādīsu
anya-e0812n0:1518_5: vuttīsu paraṃ siriṃ kantiṃ poseti taṃ pūreti āvahatīti.
anya-e0812n0:1519_0: 168-172. Bhedavantānaṃ padatthānaṃ sabhāvakathanaṃ uddesakkamena pākaṭaṃ hotīti vattamānehi
anya-e0812n0:1519_1: alaṅkārehi uddisanto “tatthātisaya…pe… rasī”ti gāthācatukkamāha. Tattha tatthāti
anya-e0812n0:1519_2: tissaṃ vaṅkavuttiyaṃ iti evaṃ ete pañcatiṃsa bhedā samuddiṭṭhā saṅkhepena vuttāti.
anya-e0812n0:1519_3: Etesaṃ pana padānaṃ attho niddese āvibhavissati. Iminā bhāvo ca sileso ca atippasatthoti
anya-e0812n0:1519_4: dīpeti. Bhāvo bhāvālaṅkāro jīvitaṃ bandhassa pāṇabhūtoti vuccate, bhāvarahitassa
anya-e0812n0:1519_5: bandhassa chavasarīrassa viya anupādeyyattā, sileso tu silesālaṅkāro pana vaṅkavuttīsu
anya-e0812n0:1519_6: atisayopamādivaṅkavuttīsu paramukkaṃsabhūtaṃ siriṃ sobhaṃ poseti pūreti.
anya-e0812n0:1526_0: 173. Tatthātisayavuttīnaṃ tāva niddisanto āha “pakāsikā”iccādi. Visesassa vatthugatassātimattassa
anya-e0812n0:1526_1: pakāsikāyāti anuvaditvā sā atisayavutti siyāti vidhīyate, atisayassa vatthuno ukkaṃsassa
anya-e0812n0:1526_2: paṭipādikā vutti atisayavutti. Sā ca duvidhāti āha “loka”iccādi. Lokaṃ lokappatītiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1526_3: atikkanto visayo gocaro yassā sā lokātikkantavisayā ca loke bhavā lokaṭhitimanatikkantattāti
anya-e0812n0:1526_4: lokiyā cāti atisayavutti dvidhā dvippakārā bhavati.
anya-e0812n0:1527_0: 173. Idāni uddesakkamena atisayavuttiṃ dasseti “pakāsi”ccādinā. Visesassa jātyādipadatthagataadhikavisesassa
anya-e0812n0:1527_1: yā vutti pakāsikā, sā atisayavutti nāma siyā, sā atisayavutti lokātikkantavisayā
anya-e0812n0:1527_3: visayāti ca lokiyāti ca yathāvuttalokamanatikkamma pavattanato lokiyāti cevaṃ dvidhā
anya-e0812n0:1527_4: dvippakārā honti. Vadatīti vutti, atisayassa vuttīti ca, lokaṃ atikkanto visayo etissāti
anya-e0812n0:1527_5: ca, loke bhavāti ca viggaho. “Visesassa pakāsikā”ti pasiddhaguṇānuvādena sā atisayavutti
anya-e0812n0:1527_6: siyāti apasiddhaṃ atisayavuttividhānaṃ karoti, yathā “yo kuṇḍalī, so devadatto”ti.
anya-e0812n0:1533_0: 174. Ayaṃ dvippakārā atisayavutti sabhāvavutyādīhi bhinnāti ce? Āha “loka”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1533_1: Jātiādayo yato padatthassa vicittaṃ sarūpaṃ vadatīti vicittasarūpapaṭipādikā sabhāvavuttipi
anya-e0812n0:1533_2: alaṅkāro, alaṅkāriyaṃ tu vatthumattaṃ, tato sabhāvavutyādayo ye bhedā visesā, ete
anya-e0812n0:1533_3: lokiyātisayassa bhedā, yathā sarīre yaṃ sahajaṃ sundarattaṃ, tassa posakāpi muttāvalippabhuti
anya-e0812n0:1533_4: alaṅkāroti vuccati, evaṃ bandhepyalaṅkāriyavatthunimittaṃ dhammattaṃ yāya ukkaṃsīyati,
anya-e0812n0:1533_5: sā ukkaṃsoti vuccati. Sā ca vutti alaṅkārasaddena vuccate. Sā pana atisayavuttiyeva.
anya-e0812n0:1533_6: Tenevāha “lokiyātisayassete, bhedā ye jātiādayo”ti. Yato evaṃ, tato lokātikkantavisayā
anya-e0812n0:1533_7: ca visuṃ dassanīyāti āha “paṭī”tiādi. Tusaddo bhede. Ajja tu idāni pana lokātikkantagocarā
anya-e0812n0:1534_0: 174. Idāni esā dvippakārāpi atisayavuttisabhāvavutyādīhi anaññāti dassetuṃ “lokiye”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n0:1534_2: niddiṭṭhā jātisabhāvavuttiguṇasabhāvavutyādayo ye bhedā visesā, ete lokiyātisayassa
anya-e0812n0:1534_3: lokiyātisayavuttiyāyeva bhedā avayavā. Tattha lokiyātisayavutti nāma jātisabhāvavuttiguṇasabhāvavutyādayoyevāti.
anya-e0812n0:1534_4: Esāyeva vicitrarūpapaṭipādikā ukkaṃsāti ca vuccati. Evaṃ lokiyātisayavuttiyā “līlāvikantisubhago”ti
anya-e0812n0:1534_5: udāharaṇassa gamyamānattā vakkhamānaṃ paṭijānāti “paṭipādīyate”ccādinā. Ajja tu idāni
anya-e0812n0:1534_6: pana lokātikkantagocarā atisayavutti paṭipādīyate udāharaṇato nipphādīyati. Loke
anya-e0812n0:1534_7: bhavoti ca, tassa atisayo ādhikkamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1540_0: 175. Tamudāharati “pivanti”ccādinā. Jina te dehakantī sarīrasobhāyo ye janā nettañjalipuṭena
anya-e0812n0:1540_1: attano nayanadvandasaṅkhātena añjalipuṭena pivanti, esaṃ janānaṃ taṇhaṃ pipāsaṃ lobhameva
anya-e0812n0:1540_2: vā harati anupatati apanayati (?). Taṇhāharopi samāno tvaṃ hantuṃ nivattituṃ kiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1540_3: nālaṃ kasmā asamatthosi. Taṇhāharā nāma taṇhameva nudanti. Atra hanantāmapiha sampanudati
anya-e0812n0:1541_0: 175. Idāni paṭiññātānusārena paṭipādeti “pivanti”ccādinā. Bho jina te tuyhaṃ dehakantī
anya-e0812n0:1541_1: sarīrasobhāyo ye janā nettañjalipuṭena nettasaṅkhātena hatthapuṭena pivanti, esaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1541_2: sādhujanānaṃ taṇhaṃ pipāsaṃ lobhameva vā taṇhāharopi tvaṃ sabbesaṃ taṇhāvināsakopi
anya-e0812n0:1541_3: hantuṃ nivāretuṃ kiṃ nālaṃ kasmā asamatthosīti. Ettha pivanaṃ nāma pipāsaṃ vinetīti
anya-e0812n0:1541_4: lokasabhāvo. Taṇhaṃ hantuṃ nālamiti lokasabhāvamatikkantattho. Kantīnaṃ adhikapiyatā
anya-e0812n0:1541_5: atisayadhammo, tassa vutti pana taṇhaṃ hantuṃ nālamiti lokātikkantaatthaṃ visayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1541_6: katvā pavatto hoti. Sā pana kathetumicchitaṃ kantīnaṃ adhikapiyataṃ taṇhāhanane asamatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1541_7: vatvā dīpetīti vaṅkavutti nāma. Vuccamānānaṃ upamārūpakādīnampi vaṅkavuttitā icchitatthassa
anya-e0812n0:1541_8: pakārantarena pakāsanatoyeva. Yathā nāma sarīrasahajaṃ pīnattādisundarattaṃ uddīpanākārena
anya-e0812n0:1541_9: ṭhitā kaṭakauṇhīsahārādayo alaṅkārā nāma bhavanti, evaṃ bandhasarīrasaṅkhāte alaṅkaraṇīyavatthumhi
anya-e0812n0:1541_10: vijjamānaatipiyatādimeva uddīpetvā alaṅkurumānā “taṇhāharosi tvaṃ esaṃ kantī pivantānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1541_11: taṇhaṃ hantuṃ nāla”miti vācābhaṅgī alaṅkāro nāma. Alaṅkāriyaṃ nāma alaṅkātabbakantipiyatāya
anya-e0812n0:1541_12: bahuttanti. Uttaripi alaṅkāraalaṅkāriyavibhāgo ca anurūpato yojanakkamo ca evameva
anya-e0812n0:1541_13: daṭṭhabbo. Dehe kantīti ca, añjalīyeva puṭoti ca, nettāniyeva añjalipuṭoti ca, taṇhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1545_0: 176. Upamaṃ niddisati “upamāne”ccādinā. Upamīyate anenāti upamānaṃ, padumādikavatthu.
anya-e0812n0:1545_1: Padumādiko tu saddo upamānavācako. Upamīyatīti upameyyaṃ, mukhādikavatthu. Mukhādiko
anya-e0812n0:1545_2: saddo tu upameyyavācako. Tesaṃ upamānopameyyānaṃ padumādimukhādivatthūnañca. Sadhammattanti
anya-e0812n0:1545_3: samāno dhammo kantimantatā yassa so sadhammo, tassa bhāvo sadhammasaddassa pavattinimittasamānena
anya-e0812n0:1545_4: dhammena saha sambandho sadhammattaṃ upamānopameyyapatiṭṭhitaṃ upamā siyā, upamīyati
anya-e0812n0:1545_5: yathāvutto sambandhoti katvā. Sā panālaṅkāriyassa dhammassātisayapaṭipādanappakāro.
anya-e0812n0:1545_6: Katividhā sāti āha “sadda”iccādi. Saddo ca attho ca, tehi gammā patīyamānā saddatthagammā.
anya-e0812n0:1545_7: Vākyaṃ padasamudāyo. Tassa attho visayo gocaro yassā vākyatthavisayāti ca sā upamā
anya-e0812n0:1546_2: upamā nāma siyā, sā alaṅkaraṇīyavatthuno ādhikkapaṭipādanappakārā upamā saddatthagammā
anya-e0812n0:1546_3: saddagammā ca atthagammā ca vākyatthavisayā ca, iti evaṃ tidhā tippakārā hoti. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:1546_5: padatthānaṃ upamatthassa patiṭṭhitattā upaṭṭhānatāya upamā nāma hoti, tannissayacandādayo
anya-e0812n0:1546_6: pana nissitavohārena upamā nāma hoti, upamānabhūtacandādiatthapaṭipādako candimādisaddopi
anya-e0812n0:1546_7: tadatthena upamā nāma hoti, upameyyupameyyanissayatappaṭipādakānampi upameyyabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:1546_8: evameva daṭṭhabbo. Upamīyate anenāti upamānanti katvā candādi upamānaṃ vuccati, upamīyatīti
anya-e0812n0:1546_9: upameyyaṃ, ānanādi, upamānañca upameyyañcāti ca, samāno ca so dhammo ceti ca, tassa
anya-e0812n0:1546_10: bhāvoti ca, saddo ca attho cāti ca, tehi gammāti ca, vākyassa atthoti ca, so visayo
anya-e0812n0:1550_0: 177. Tattha saddagammāpi tidhā siyāti dassetumāha “samāsa”iccādi. Samāso ca paccayo
anya-e0812n0:1550_1: ca ivādi ca, te saddā nāma, saddasaddena samāsādayo vattumadhippetāti attho. Tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1550_2: samāsādīnaṃ vasā saddagammā tidhā hoti samāsasaddagammā paccayasaddagammā ivādisaddagammāti,
anya-e0812n0:1550_3: samāsena samāsasaddena gammā upamā vuccatīti seso. Udāharati “munindo candimānano”ti,
anya-e0812n0:1550_4: candimā viya ruciramānanaṃ mukhaṃ yassa so candimānano. Ettha ca candimaṃ upamānaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1550_5: ānanaṃ upameyyaṃ, rucirattaṃ dhammo, candimānanānaṃ samānadhammasambandhijotako viyasaddo,
anya-e0812n0:1550_6: tesu sādhāraṇadhammavācakassa viyasaddassa copamājotakassāppayogo samāseneva vuttattā,
anya-e0812n0:1550_7: ettha pana viyasaddo candimāsaddena upamānavācakena sambandhamupagato candagatameva
anya-e0812n0:1550_8: sadisattaṃ vadati, mukhagataṃ pana sāmatthiyā padīyate, evamīdisaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1551_0: 177. Tesu yathāvuttesu saddagammassa tividhattaṃ dassetuṃ āha “samāse”ccādi. Samāsapaccayevādī
anya-e0812n0:1551_1: samāso, āyādipaccayā, ivādayo ca saddā nāma, tesaṃ samāsādīnaṃ vasā bhedena saddagammā
anya-e0812n0:1551_2: tidhā samāsasaddagammā paccayasaddagammā ivādisaddagammāti tividhā hoti. Samāsena
anya-e0812n0:1551_3: samāsasaddena gammopamā vuccati “munindo candimānano”ti. Munindo sammāsambuddho candimānano
anya-e0812n0:1551_4: candasamānamanoharamukhamaṇḍalena yutto hoti, samāso ca paccayo ca ivaiti idaṃ ādi
anya-e0812n0:1551_5: yesaṃ vādīnanti ca, saddena gammāti ca, munīnaṃ indoti ca, candimā viya ruciraṃ ānanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1551_6: mukhaṃ yasseti ca viggaho. Ettha “candimā”ti upamānaṃ, “ānana”nti upameyyaṃ, rucirattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1551_7: upamānopameyyānaṃ sādhāraṇadhammo, “viyā”ti saddo candānanānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānanagatarucirattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1551_8: cande ca, candagatarucirattaṃ ānane ca atthīti samānadhammasambandhaṃ joteti, iha
anya-e0812n0:1551_10: ca appayogo tesaṃ atthānaṃ samāsena vuttattā. Ettha upamānavācakena candimāsaddena
anya-e0812n0:1551_11: yutto viya saddo candagatasadisattaṃ joteti, mukhagatasadisattaṃ pana sāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n0:1551_12: patīyate. Tathā hi mukhaṃ candasamānamāgacchantaṃ candassa mukhasadisattaṃ vinā na
anya-e0812n0:1555_1: paccayā paccayasaddā nāma, tehi paccayasaddehi gammā upamā vuccati. Udāharati “vadana”miccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1555_2: Paṅkajamiva ruciramācarati paṅkajāyate. Etthāpi paṅkajamupamānaṃ, ācaraṇakriyāya
anya-e0812n0:1555_3: kattubhūtaṃ ānanamupameyyaṃ, rucirattaṃ sadhammo, paṅkajānanānaṃ samānadhammasambandhajotako
anya-e0812n0:1555_4: ivasaddo. Tattha rucira ivasaddānaṃ pubbe viyāppayogo paccayena vuttattāti sabbattha
anya-e0812n0:1556_0: 178. Idāni paccayasaddagammopamaṃ nidasseti “āyādi”ccādinā. Āyādī “āya īya ka”itiādayo
anya-e0812n0:1556_1: paccayā paccayasaddā nāma, tehi paccayasaddehi gammopamā vuccati “vadanaṃ…pe… dalīyatī”ti.
anya-e0812n0:1556_2: Vadanaṃ mukhaṃ paṅkajāyate padumamiva ruciraṃ ācarati. Munindanayanadvandaṃ sabbaññuno
anya-e0812n0:1556_3: nettayugaḷaṃ nīluppaladalīyati nīluppalapattamiva ruciramācarati. Āyo ādi yesaṃ īyādīnanti
anya-e0812n0:1556_4: ca, paṅkajamiva ruciramācarati pavattatīti ca, munindassa nayanadvandamiti ca, nīluppalassa
anya-e0812n0:1556_5: dalamiti ca, tamiva ruciramācaratīti ca vākyaṃ. Ettha “paṅkaja”miti ca “nīluppala”miti
anya-e0812n0:1556_6: ca upamānaṃ, ācaraṇakriyāya kattubhūtaṃ vadanaṃ nayanadvandañca upameyyaṃ, rucirattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1556_7: upamānopameyyānaṃ sadhammo, upamānopameyyānaṃ samānadhammajotako ivasaddo, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1556_8: atthānaṃ paccayena vuttattā tesamappayogo. Evarūpesu aññesupi evameva veditabbo.
anya-e0812n0:1558: Ivādī iva vā tulya-samāna nibha sannibhā;
anya-e0812n0:1570: Tassa coreti sobhaggaṃ, tassa kantiṃ vilumpati;
anya-e0812n0:1575_0: 179-184. Ivādī ivādayo nāma imeti sambandho. Ivo ca vā ca tulyo ca samāno ca nibho
anya-e0812n0:1575_1: ca sannibho cāti dvande iva…pe… sannibhā. Saddamapekkhiya pulliṅgatā. Evamuparipi
anya-e0812n0:1575_2: yathāyogaṃ. “Sadhammādī”ti ādisaddena sādhāraṇasacchāyādīnaṃ pariggaho. Jayaticcādīsu kammaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1576_0: 179- 184. Ivādisaddagammopamādhikāre paṭhamaṃ tāva “ivādayo nāma ete”ti dasseti “ivādi”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1576_1: Ivādīti padassa chaṭṭhamagāthāya imeti iminā sambandho, tassa cāti casaddaṃ yujjanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0812n0:1576_3: gahitā. Nindati issatīti padacchedo, ime dvepaññāsa ivādayo nāma. “Jayati akkosati
