anya-e0812n0:1576_6: gāthaddhassa vinā ubhayaddhamajjhe alabbhanato dūbhatipadato pubbeyeva samāso kātabbo,
anya-e0812n0:1576_7: no ce, asamāsoti gahetabbo. Tassa coreti sobhaggamiccādikampi vākyānukaraṇanti katvā
anya-e0812n0:1576_8: tattha samāso, vākye kevalapadānīti vā gahetabbo. Imesaṃ sabbesampi iva saddapariyāyattā
anya-e0812n0:1576_9: sadisatthāti sabbattha bhāvattho, avayavattho pana pākaṭoyeva.
anya-e0812n0:1580_0: 185. Ivādīnaṃ viniyogavisayaṃ dassetvā upamābhedaṃ dassetuṃ paṭijānāti “upamāna”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1580_1: Kecīti iminā apariyantattamesaṃ apariyantapabhedaṃ (ka.) dasseti. Tathā ca vakkhati
anya-e0812n0:1581_1: sadhammattaṃ samānadhammasambandho. Vibhāvihi pakāsakehi. Imehi ivādīhi saddehi jānitabbā
anya-e0812n0:1581_2: keci upamābhedā apariyantattā sampati dāni laddhāvasare niyyanti udāharaṇamattena paṭipādīyanti.
anya-e0812n0:1585_1: Kimiva? Vikāsipadumaṃva pabujjhamānapadumaṃviya. Iti ayamevaṃvidhā dhammopamā nāma
anya-e0812n0:1585_2: hoti. Kasmā? Ānanapadumānaṃ samānassa dhammassa guṇassa sundarassa lakkhaṇassa nidassanā
anya-e0812n0:1586_1: bujjhamānapaṅkajamiva atisundaraṃ hoti. Iti īdisā upamā tulyadhammanidassanā atisundaramiti
anya-e0812n0:1586_2: samānaguṇadassanena dhammopamā nāma hoti. Padumānanānaṃ sādhāraṇaguṇassa pakāsanato
anya-e0812n0:1586_3: atisundaramiti tulyadhammo nāma hoti. Ettha padumagatatulyadhammasambandhasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0812n0:1586_4: upamāya ivasaddena jotiyamānattepi atisundaranti vuttattā yathāvuttopamāya dhammena
anya-e0812n0:1590_0: 187. “Dhamma”iccādi. Munino sammāsambuddhassa mukhaṃ ambhojena padumena sadisaṃ samānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1590_1: Iti ayaṃ dhammahīnopamā nāma sundarasaṅkhātassa guṇassa aniddiṭṭhattā, sā tu atthavasā
anya-e0812n0:1590_2: gamyate. Kathamaññathā yujjatīti? Ettha pana sadisasaddo upameyyassa mukhassa visesananti
anya-e0812n0:1590_3: mukhagatameva sadisattaṃ vadati, ambhojagataṃ tu sāmatthiyā gamyate. Evamīdisaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1590_4: “Viparīte”ccādi. Munīti gamyate sutattā, bho muni tava ānanena mukhena ambujaṃ tulyanti
anya-e0812n0:1590_5: ayaṃ viparītopamā. Dhammahīnattepi pasiddhivipariyayenābhihitattā tannāmeneva vuttā. Evamuparipi.
anya-e0812n0:1591_1: dhammahīnā nāma. Vācakābhāve tulyadhammo kathaṃ patīyatīti ce? Munino mukhaṃ vadanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1591_2: ambhojasadisaṃ padumasadisamiti. Ettha mukhassa ambhojasamānattaṃ mukhambhojānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1591_3: sādhāraṇadhamme asati kathaṃ bhavatīti? Aññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyāti, ivapariyāyo
anya-e0812n0:1591_4: sadisasaddo mukhassa visesanaṃ yasmā hoti, tasmā mukhagatasadisattaṃ vadati, ambhojagatasadisattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1591_5: pana sāmatthiyā eva viññāyate. He muni tava tuyhaṃ ānanena ambhojaṃ tulyaṃ samānanti
anya-e0812n0:1591_6: ayaṃ viparītopamā. “Ambujena ānanaṃ tulya”nti lokappasiddhiyā vipariyayena “ānanena
anya-e0812n0:1591_7: ambujaṃ tulya”nti vuttattā dhammahīnatte satipi viparītopamā nāma hoti. “Sutānumitesu
anya-e0812n0:1591_8: sutasambandho balavā”ti paribhāsendusekhara 112 vuttattā ettha “munī”ti avijjamānepi
anya-e0812n0:1591_10: viññāyati. Ettha ivapariyāyo tulyasaddo ambujavisesanabhūto ambujagatasadisattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1591_11: vadati, ānanagatasadisattañca ambujānanānaṃ sādhāraṇadhammo ca sāmatthiyā ñāyaticcādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1591_12: vuttanayena ñātabbaṃ. Uparipi pākaṭaṭṭhānaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1595: 188. “Tava”iccādi. Aññamaññopamānatoti aññamaññassa mukhassa ambhojassa ca aññamaññena taṃdvayena upamānato.
anya-e0812n0:1596_1: Aññamaññopamānato aññamaññassa upamānattā aññamaññopamā nāma hoti. Aññamaññassa upamāti
anya-e0812n0:1596_2: ca, aññamaññassa upamānanti ca viggaho. Viggahadvayepi pubbavibhattilopo. Sabbādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1596_4: mukhāpekkhāya aññaṃ ambhojañca, ambhojāpekkhāya aññaṃ mukhañca kamena upameyyā nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1596_5: Ambhojāpekkhāya aññaṃ mukhañca, mukhāpekkhāya aññaṃ ambhojañca upamānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1602_0: 189. “Yadi”ccādi. Locanāni ca bhamuyo ca, tāsaṃ vibbhamo yasmiṃ, taṃ, tādisamambhojaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1602_1: kiñci kimapi yadi bhave. Tamīdisamambhojaṃ tava mukhasobhaṃ vadanakantiṃ dhāretuṃ
anya-e0812n0:1603_1: kiñci acchariyaṃ padumaṃ yadi bhave ce siyā, tamambhojaṃ tava mukhasobhaṃ vadanakantiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1603_2: dhāretuṃ samattho hoti. Iti īdisī upamā abbhutopamā abbhutadhammapakāsakattā abbhutopamā
anya-e0812n0:1603_3: nāma. Ettha avijjamānopi vijjamānattena parikappito padumagato locanabbhamuvibbhamasambandho
anya-e0812n0:1603_5: jotakattā nissitavohārena upamā, mukhaṃ upameyyanti mukhagato locanabbhamuvibbhamasambandho
anya-e0812n0:1603_6: yadi mukhe na bhaveyya, tādisaṃ mukhasobhaṃ dhāretuṃ kathaṃ samatthoti sāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n0:1603_8: ca, tāsaṃ vibbhamo yasmi”nti ca viggahe nipphannena bhinnādhikaraṇaaññapadatthasamāsena
anya-e0812n0:1607_0: 190. “Sugandhi”ccādi. Tava mukhaṃ ambhojamiva sisiraṃsunocandassa virodhi paccanīkaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1607_1: mukhaṃ taṃsamānakantittā ambujañca tadudaye saṅkocabhajanato. Sobhasambandhi kantiyuttaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1607_2: mukhamambujañca. Sugandho assa atthīti sugandhi ca dvayamapīti evaṃ silesapariggahena
anya-e0812n0:1607_3: mukhambujānaṃ upamāyogato sā yathāvuttā silesopamā matā.
anya-e0812n0:1608_0: 190. “Sugandhi”ccādi. Tava mukhaṃ ambhojamiva sisiraṃsuvirodhi candassa viruddhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1608_1: hoti tulyattā. Padumaṃ pana candodayena attano saṅkocanattā tassa viruddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1608_3: padumagatakantisambandhinā yuttaṃ hoti. Sugandhi ca catujjātisugandhavahanato …vamanato
anya-e0812n0:1608_4: (ka.) sugandhi ca hoti. Ambujaṃ pana padumasugandheneva yuttaṃ hoti. Iti īdisī upamā
anya-e0812n0:1608_5: silesopamā ekapadātihitaubhayatthalakkhaṇena silesavasena vuttattā silesopamā nāma
anya-e0812n0:1608_6: hoti. Sisirā sītalā aṃsu kanti asseti ca, tassa virujjhati sīleneti ca, paccayasāmatthiyavasena
anya-e0812n0:1608_7: dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ labbhanato silissati aparopi attho ettha alaṅkāreti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1608_8: silesavasena vuttā upamāti ca viggaho. Ettha sugandho ca sotasambandho ca sisiraṃsuvirodhittañceti
anya-e0812n0:1608_10: sadhammattā upamā nāma hoti, sā ambujasambandhinā ivasaddena jotitā, mukhagatatulyadhammo
anya-e0812n0:1608_11: pana assatthitassīlatthe katapaccaye satipi sāmatthiyāyeva gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:1612_0: 191. “Sarūpa”iccādi. Ayamuyyānamālā bālāva itthī viya. Kathaṃ? Sālakānanasobhinī
anya-e0812n0:1612_1: bālā tāva sahālakena kesasannivesavisesena vattate sālakamānanaṃ tena sobhate. Sālakānanasobhinī
anya-e0812n0:1612_2: uyyānamālāpi sālānaṃ rukkhavisesānaṃ kānanena gahanena sobhate, evarūpā sā tādisī
anya-e0812n0:1612_3: santānopamā ākhyāyate, kasmā? Silesopamattasabhāvepi sarūpena sadisena saddena “sālakānanasobhinī”tvevaṃvidhena
anya-e0812n0:1612_4: saddasantānena visesabhūtena vāccattā pakāsiyattā tassāiti gamyate. Yatheti nidassane.
anya-e0812n0:1613_1: vuccamānattā sā upamā santānopamā nāma hoti, silesatte satipi katasamāsehi padasantānehi
anya-e0812n0:1613_2: vuccamānattā santānopamā nāma hotīti adhippāyo. “Yathe”ti udāharati. Ayaṃ uyyānamālā
anya-e0812n0:1613_3: esā uyyānapanti sālakānanasobhinī alakasaṅkhātakesasannivesasahitena mukhena sobhamānā
anya-e0812n0:1613_4: bālāva aṅganā iva sālakānanasobhinī sālavanehi sobhamānā hoti. Upamānopameyyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1613_5: samānaṃ rūpaṃ yesanti ca, sarūpā ca te saddā ceti ca, tehi vāccā upamāti ca, tassā
anya-e0812n0:1613_6: bhāvoti ca, santānena yuttā upamāti ca, uyyānānaṃ mālāti ca, saha alakena vattamānanti
anya-e0812n0:1613_7: ca, tañca taṃ ānanañcāti ca, tena sobhati sīlenāti ca, sālānaṃ kānananti ca, tena
anya-e0812n0:1615: Khayī cando bahurajaṃ, padumaṃ tehi te mukhaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:1617_0: 192. “Khayī”iccādi. Cando khayī khayo accayo yasseti, padumaṃ bahurajaṃ bahūni rajāni
anya-e0812n0:1617_1: parāgāvayavā yasminti, tehi evaṃbhūtehi candapadumehi kantiādinā samānampi sadisampi
anya-e0812n0:1617_2: santaṃ tava mukhaṃ samukkaṃsi paramukkaṃsavantaṃ, khayasaddassa ca rajassa ca dosepi
anya-e0812n0:1617_3: vattanato, saddacchalena khayassa dosarūpassa bahurajattassa ca tatthābhāvatoti.
anya-e0812n0:1617_4: Iti evarūpā ayaṃ nindopamā matā ninditena candādinā khayassopamitattā.
anya-e0812n0:1618_0: 192. “Khayi”ccādi. Cando khayī pāṭipadato paṭṭhāya dine dine ekamekāya kalāya sūriyassa
anya-e0812n0:1618_1: āsannahetu khīyanasabhāvayutto hoti, padumaṃ bahurajaṃ bahureṇusamannāgataṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1618_2: tehi candapadumehi samānampi kantisugandhādīhi sadisampi te mukhaṃ tavānanaṃ samukkaṃsi
anya-e0812n0:1618_3: khayarajasaddehi dosassāpi vāccattā saddacchalehi gamyamānassa tādisassa dosassa
anya-e0812n0:1618_4: mukhe avijjamānattā adhikukkaṃsaguṇavantaṃ hoti, iti īdisī ayaṃ upamā nindopamā ninditānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1618_5: candapadumānaṃ mukhassa upamitāti nindopamā nāma hoti, mukhavisesanena ivasaddapariyāyena
anya-e0812n0:1618_7: dvīsu tulyadhammopi sāmatthiyā gamyate, apisaddo cettha vattabbantarasamuccaye, samukkaṃsoti vattabbantaro.
anya-e0812n0:1622_0: 193. “Asamattho”iccādi. Jina te mukhena jaḷo sīto akusalo ca kalaṅko migalañchanalakkhaṇo
anya-e0812n0:1622_1: doso assa atthīti kalaṅkī. Saddacchalena dosakathanaṃ. Tādiso indu cando paṭigajjituṃ
anya-e0812n0:1622_2: vivadituṃ asamattho, mukhantu visadaṃ alaṅkatañceti kathamanenāyaṃ sadisoti nisedhadvārena
anya-e0812n0:1623_0: 193. “Asamattho”ccādi. He jina te tuyhaṃ mukhena paṭigajjituṃ vivadituṃ jaḷo sītalo
anya-e0812n0:1623_1: avisado kalaṅkī sasalakkhaṇo vā sadoso vā indu cando asamattho hotīti, ayaṃ edisī
anya-e0812n0:1623_2: upamā paṭisedhopamā nāma. Kalaṅko assa atthīti vākyaṃ. Ettha visadena kalaṅkarahitena
anya-e0812n0:1623_3: mukhena sītalo avisado sadoso cando samāno bhavitumasamatthoti evaṃ paṭisedhadvayena
anya-e0812n0:1623_5: nindopamābhāve paṭisedhopamā nāma hotīti adhippāyo. “Paṭigajjitu”nti idaṃ candassa
anya-e0812n0:1627_0: 194. “Kaccha”miccādi. Candassa aravindassa ca kacchaṃ padaviṃ atikkamma avatthariya
anya-e0812n0:1627_1: tesa’mavakaṃsato avatthuyatesamaṇaṃsato (ka.), tava mukhaṃ attano sarūpeneva samaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1627_2: jātamiti evarūpā asādhāraṇatābhidhānena sadisattapatītiyā asādhāraṇopameti nigadyate.
anya-e0812n0:1628_0: 194. “Kaccha”miccādi. He muni tava mukhaṃ candāravindānaṃ lokapūjitānaṃ sasiambujānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1628_1: kacchaṃ padaviṃ avatthaṃ vā atikkamma attano atulyattena attanā eva samānattavatthuno
anya-e0812n0:1628_2: abhāvā samaṃ jātaṃ, iti īdisā upamā asādhāraṇopamā atulyadhammabhāvassa pakāsanato
anya-e0812n0:1628_3: asādhāraṇopamā nāma hoti. Iha upamābhūtānaṃ candāravindānaṃ mukhassa hīnabhāvapaṭipādanadvārena
anya-e0812n0:1628_4: candāravindehi mukhaṃ tulyanti paññāpanato candāravindā asādhāraṇopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1628_5: Samasaddo mukhagatassa sādhāraṇadhammaṃ joteti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1632: 195. “Sabba”iccādi. Katthaci ekaṭṭhāne rāsibhūto sabbesamambhojānaṃ pabhāsārova tavānanaṃ vibhātīti evaṃbhūtā ayaṃ abhūtopamā hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1633_1: uttamakantipuñjo viya tavānanaṃ vibhāti visesena pabhāti, iti īdisī upamā abhūtopamā
anya-e0812n0:1633_2: avijjamānavatthuno upamitattā abhūtopamā nāma hoti. Arāsi rāsibhūtoti viggaho. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:1637_0: 196. Atthagammopamaṃ dasseti “patīyate”iccādi. Atthagammā tu’pamā kvaci kismiñci
anya-e0812n0:1637_1: ṭhāne samāsādisaddānaṃ yogaṃ vinā api saddānaṃ payogavisesādigāḷhena aññathānupapattilakkhaṇena
anya-e0812n0:1638_0: 196. Tividhaṃ saddagammopamaṃ dassetvā idāni atthagammopamaṃ dasseti “patīyate”tyādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1638_1: Atthagammā tu atthagammopamā pana kvaci ṭhāne samāsapaccayevādisaddayogaṃ vināpi
anya-e0812n0:1638_2: tesaṃ saddānaṃ sambandhaṃ hitvāpi saddasāmatthiyā sambandhe payuttāvasesasaddānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1642_0: 197. Udāharati “bhiṅge”ccādinā. Na bhiṅgā ete, kiñcarahi cakkhūnimāni, nambujametaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1642_1: kintu mukhamevidanti evarūpā sā sarūpopamā matā bhiṅgādīnamaviparītasarūpassa dīpanato.
anya-e0812n0:1642_2: Tenāha “subyatte”tyādi. Subyattena bhiṅgacakkhūnaṃ ambujamukhānañca pariphuṭena sadisattena
anya-e0812n0:1642_4: yaṃ bhiṅgādiññāṇamuppannaṃ, tassa paccakkhānato upamājotakānamivādīnamabhāvepi bhiṅgalocanādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1643_0: 197. Idāni udāharaṇamāharati “bhiṅgāni”ccādinā. Imāni bhiṅgāni bhamarā na bhavanti,
anya-e0812n0:1643_1: kiñcarahi cakkhūni. Ambujaṃ na idaṃ padumaṃ na hoti, kintu mukhamevāti. Īdisī sā
anya-e0812n0:1643_2: upamā subyattasadisattena supākaṭena bhiṅgalocanānaṃ ambujamukhānañca tulyabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:1643_3: sarūpopamā nāma hoti. Ettha samāsapaccayaivādisaddapayogābhāvepi “bhiṅgānemāni cakkhūni”ccādinā
anya-e0812n0:1643_5: cañcalattakantimattādīsu subyattaṃ tulyattaṃ vinā cakkhumukhesu bhiṅgambujabuddhiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1643_7: upameyyabhūtānaṃ cakkhumukhānañca sadisattaṃ ñāyati. Suṭṭhu byattaṃ pākaṭanti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1643_8: tañca taṃ sadisattañcāti ca, samānaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassā upamāyāti ca, sā ca sā upamā cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1647_0: 198. “Mayevi”ccādi. Indu canda, assa munino mukhasobhā vadanajuti mayeva, nāññatrāti
anya-e0812n0:1647_1: evarūpā vikatthanā atthapasaṃsanena alamiti paṭisedho. Kimiti? Yato yasmā kāraṇā
anya-e0812n0:1647_2: sā mukhasobhā ambujepi na kevalamindumhi atthi, no natthīti asatopi tathā vikatthanassa
anya-e0812n0:1648_0: 198. “Maye”ccādi. He indu assa imassa lokasāmino mukhasobhā vadanakanti ekake mayi
anya-e0812n0:1648_1: eva, īdisī vikatthanā attasilāghena alaṃ nippayojanaṃ. Kasmāti ce? Yato sā mukhasobhā
anya-e0812n0:1648_2: ambujepi atthi, tasmāti. Iti īdisā ayaṃ upamā parikappopamā nāma hoti. Yatoti aniyamaniddiṭṭhakāraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1648_3: pana ambujepi sā atthīti dassiyamānaṃ padumepi tassa atthittameva. Parikappanāya
anya-e0812n0:1648_4: vuttā upamāti viggaho. Idha candassa avijjamānavikatthanassa vijjamānattena parikappanato
anya-e0812n0:1648_5: sadhammajotakasaddantare asatipi upamānabhūtainduno ca upameyyabhūtamukhassa ca sadisattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1648_6: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sadisattaṃ vinā vattuno tādisakappanā kathaṃ hotīti imāya atthasattiyā gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:1654_0: 199. “Kiṃ vā”iccādi. Anto bhantā alī bhamarā yasmiṃ, tamīdisamambujaṃ kiṃ vā. Lolāni
anya-e0812n0:1654_1: capalāni nayanāni yasmiṃ, tādisaṃ vā. Jina tavedaṃ mukhaṃ kinti mama cittaṃ dolāyate
anya-e0812n0:1654_2: dolevācarati. Evaṃ pakkhadvayapariggahena saṃsayatīti attho. Iccayamīdisī saṃsayavesena
anya-e0812n0:1655_1: kiṃ vā, tuyhaṃ lolanayanaṃ cañcalanettaṃ mukhaṃ kiṃ vāti mama cittaṃ dolāyate ubhayasambhamajananato
anya-e0812n0:1655_2: dolā viya hoti. Iti ayaṃ evarūpā upamā saṃsayopamā dvinnaṃ sadisattassa saṃsayena
anya-e0812n0:1655_3: pakāsitattā saṃsayopamā nāma hoti. Anto bhantā alī yasminti ca, lolāni nayanāni yasminti
anya-e0812n0:1655_4: ca, dolā viya ācaratīti ca, saṃsayena vuttā upamāti ca viggaho. Ihāpi sadhammapakāsake
anya-e0812n0:1655_5: saddantare asatipi yathāvuttavisesanadvayena visiṭṭhānaṃ dvinnaṃ ambujamukhānaṃ saṃsayanimitte
anya-e0812n0:1655_6: tulyatte asati kathaṃ saṃsayo uppajjatīti iminā sāmatthiyeneva tulyadhammasambandho gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:1661_1: tena vatthunā kenaci ākārena sadisassa aññassa vatthuno abhidhānato sāmyassa tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1661_2: dvinnaṃ sadisattassa patītiyā avasāyassa sambhāvā vijjamānattena pativatthūpamā vuccate.
anya-e0812n0:1661_3: Pativatthunā tathāvidhenādhigatassa vatthuno tulyatā paṭipāditā. Yathetyudāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1662_1: nidassetvā sadhammassa paṭipādanīyaatthena saha kiñci ākārena sadisabhāvassa kassaci
anya-e0812n0:1662_2: vatthuno abhidhānato kathanato sāmyappatītisabbhāvā sadisatāsambandhino parijānanassa
anya-e0812n0:1662_3: vijjamānattā pativatthūpamā vatthuno upaṭṭhitassa jinādipadatthassa tulyatthapakāsanato
anya-e0812n0:1662_4: nāmena pativatthūpamā nāma. Samāno dhammo yassa vā pārijātādino iti ca, samānānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1662_5: tulyānaṃ upamānopameyyānaṃ bhāvoti ca, sāmyassa patīti ca, sāmyappatītiyā sabbhāvoti
anya-e0812n0:1662_6: ca, pativatthunā vuttā upamāti ca vākyaṃ. Yathāti udāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1668_0: 201. “Janesu”ccādi. Jāyamānesu janesu majjhe ekopi jano guṇavā jinasādiso sammāsambuddhasamāno
anya-e0812n0:1668_1: na vijjatītyekaṃ tāva vatthu upadassitaṃ, dutiyo iccādi pativatthūpamadassanaṃ, nanūtyanumatiyaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1668_2: pārijātassa dibbarukkhavisesassa dutiyo samāno pādapo nattheva. Pārijātoyeva rukkhajātīsu
anya-e0812n0:1669_0: 201. “Janesu”ccādi. Jāyamānesu janesu ekopi jinasādiso sambuddhasadiso natthi, pārijātassa
anya-e0812n0:1669_1: rukkhassa dutiyo tena samo dutiyo pādapo rukkho natthi eva nanu, nanūti anuññāyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1669_2: Tena sabbaññuno aññena atulyabhāvaṃ anujānāti. Iha pārijātarukkhassa aññehi rukkhehi
anya-e0812n0:1669_3: uttamattañca buddhassa aññesu sattesu uttamattañcāti idaṃ dvayaṃ upamānopameyyabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1669_4: dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ sāmyaṃ nāma, etaṃ sāmyaṃ vuttatthassa samatthanavasena pativatthubhūtapārijātassa
anya-e0812n0:1675_1: teneva, na padatthamattena vākyattho vuttalakkhaṇo koci vattumicchito koci yadi upamīyate
anya-e0812n0:1675_2: sadiso kathyate, sā vākyatthopamā dvidhā bhijjate. Kathaṃ? Yuttā ca viyuttā ca yuttaviyuttā,
anya-e0812n0:1675_3: ivena atthaniddesoyaṃ yuttaviyuttā upamā, tassā bhāvā kāraṇā dvidhāti adhikataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1676_1: vākyatthena koci vattumicchito yo koci vākyattho vuttalakkhaṇo yadi upamīyate sadisabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:1676_2: kathīyate, sā upamā vākyatthopamā nāma hoti. Ivayuttaviyuttattā ivayuttaviyuttavasena
anya-e0812n0:1676_3: dvidhā dvippakārā. Ettha “ivā”ti ivādīnamatthassa gahitattā ivasaddopi tappariyāyasaddāpi gayhante.
anya-e0812n0:1683_0: 203. Udāharati “jino”iccādi. Saṃklesehi dasavidhehi tattānaṃ santāpaṃ anuppattānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1683_1: janānaṃ ayaṃ jino sammāsambuddho āvibhūto katakiccattā sammāsambodhādhigamena loke
anya-e0812n0:1683_2: pātubhūto. Ekaṃ tāva vākyamupameyyabhūtaṃ. Kimivetyāha “ghamme”ccādi. Ghammasantāpena
anya-e0812n0:1683_3: tattānaṃ janānaṃ ghammakāle gimhānasamaye ambudo megho viyāti dutiyavākyamupamānabhūtamityayamivayuttā
anya-e0812n0:1684_0: 203. Udāharati “jino”ccādinā. Ayaṃ jino eso jitapañcamāro satthā saṃklesatattānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1684_1: anekappakāra kilesasantāpatattānaṃ janānaṃ āvibhūto katakicco hutvā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamena
anya-e0812n0:1684_2: loke upaṭṭhito. Kena santattassa kassaci kimiveti ce? Ghammasantāpatattānaṃ janānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1684_3: ghammakāle gimhasamaye ambudoviya megho iva. Iha uttaravākyattho bhedakattā visesanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1684_4: hoti, pubbavākyattho pana bhedyattā visesyo hoti. Evaṃ vākyabhede satipi vākyattho
anya-e0812n0:1684_5: ekoveti daṭṭhabbo. Evamuttaratrāpi. Uttaravākye ivasaddo tasmiṃyeva guṇaguṇīpadatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1684_6: sadisattaṃ dīpeti, pubbavākye guṇaguṇīnaṃ sadisattaṃ pana uttaravākyatthassa pubbavākyena
anya-e0812n0:1684_7: samānattaṃ vinā aññathānupapattiyā ñāyati. Saṃklesehi tattāti ca, ghammo eva santāpoti
anya-e0812n0:1684_8: ca, tena tattāti ca, ghammo eva kāloti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1688: Uddhaṃ samuggatassāpi, kiṃ te canda vijambhanā.
anya-e0812n0:1689_0: 204. Dutiyamāha “muninda”iccādinā. Vilāsena ekamatulyaṃ manoharaṃ dutiyassa tādisassābhāvato
anya-e0812n0:1689_1: munindānanaṃ ābhāti atisayena sobhateti ekaṃ tāva vākyamupameyyabhūtaṃ. Bho canda
anya-e0812n0:1689_2: uddhaṃ gaganatalaṃ samuggatassāpi abbhuṭṭhitassāpi te tava vijambhanā sāhaṃkāraparibbhamanena
anya-e0812n0:1689_3: kiṃ payojanaṃ na kiṃpi, taṃsadisasobhāsampattiyābhāvato. Asadisattaṃ munindānanassa
anya-e0812n0:1689_4: tassa tatopi uddhamuggacchato vilāsamattameva piyāsamattameva (ka.) phalasambhavatoti
anya-e0812n0:1689_5: dutiyavākyamupamānabhūtaṃ. Tathā hettha sabbathā sadisatāpatītiyā kariyamānānamuggamanavijambhanānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1689_6: paṭikkhepena kathañcipi mukhacandānaṃ sādhammapatīti upamāvagamoti ayamivaviyuttavākyatthopamā.
anya-e0812n0:1690_1: līlāya atulyaṃ tatoyeva manoharaṃ munindānanaṃ sabbaññuno vadanaṃ ābhāti atidibbati,
anya-e0812n0:1690_2: tasmā he canda uddhaṃ uccaṃ nabhaṃ samuggatassāpi te tuyhaṃ vijambhanā ahaṃkārena
anya-e0812n0:1690_3: paribbhamanena kiṃ payojanaṃ. Iha pubbavākyatthassa uttaravākyattho ivaviyuttopamā
anya-e0812n0:1690_4: nāma hoti. Tathā hi “sabbathā mukhena sadiso bhavāmī”ti mānaṃ karontassa candassa
anya-e0812n0:1690_5: gaganatalārohopi vijambhanañceti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭikkhepena mukhacandānaṃ vilāsekamanoharattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1690_6: kantimattasaṅkhātasadisattaṃ ivādīnamabhāvepi viññāyatīti katvā uttaravākyattho pubbavākyatthassa
anya-e0812n0:1690_7: upamā ca visesanañca hoti. Vilāsena ekamatulyanti ca, tañca taṃ manoharañcāti ca
anya-e0812n0:1694_1: Yaṃ bhinnaliṅgādikaṃ tu, ādisaddena bhinnavacanahīnatāadhikatādīnaṃ pariggaho. Tusaddo
anya-e0812n0:1694_2: atthajotako, tathāpīti attho. Dhīmantaṃ medhāviṃ samubbejeti na pīṇeti, etaṃ bhinnaliṅgadikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1694_3: katthaci na sabbattha upamādūsanāya virodhatthaṃ alaṃ samatthaṃ. “Taṃ yathe”ti udāharati.
anya-e0812n0:1698_0: Katapaṭiññānusārena idāni dassetumāha “samubbejeti”ccādi. Yaṃ bhinnaliṅgādikaṃ tu
anya-e0812n0:1698_1: vakkhamānaṃ yaṃ bhinnaliṅgavacanādikaṃ pana dhīmantaṃ paññavantaṃ kaviṃ samubbejeti
anya-e0812n0:1698_2: “evaṃ nāma vattabbaṃ siyā”ti ubbegaṃ janeti, etaṃ bhinnaliṅgādikaṃ upamādūsanāya
anya-e0812n0:1698_4: aññattha alaṃ samatthaṃ. “Taṃ yathā”ti udāharati. Bhinnaṃ visadisañca taṃ liṅgañceti
anya-e0812n0:1698_5: ca, taṃ ādi yassa visadisavacanādinoti ca, upamāya dūsanamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1704_0: 206. “Haṃsīvāya”nti ayaṃ sasī cando haṃsīva haṃsīsadiso. Bhinnaliṅgā bhinnaliṅgopamā.
anya-e0812n0:1704_1: “Ākāsaṃ sarānivā”ti vijātivacanā visadisavacanopamā. “Bhaṭo adhipe sāmini sāva bhatto”ti
anya-e0812n0:1704_2: hīnā hīnopamā kukkurassa hīnena jātyādinā adhikassa upamitattā.
anya-e0812n0:1705_0: 206. “Haṃsi”ccādi. Ayaṃ sasī cando haṃsī iva haṃsidhenūva hoti. Iccādikopamā bhinnaliṅgā
anya-e0812n0:1705_1: upameyyato bhinnaliṅgattā bhinnaliṅgopamā nāma hoti. Ākāsaṃ nabhaṃ sarānivāti ayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1705_2: vijātivacanā upameyyena visadisavacanattā vijātivacanopamā nāma hoti. Adhipe sāmini
anya-e0812n0:1705_3: bhaṭo sevako sāva sunakho iva bhattoti ayaṃ hīnā jātihīnena sunakhena uttamassa purisassa
anya-e0812n0:1705_4: upamitattā hīnopamā nāma hoti. Bhinnaṃ liṅgametissāti ca, vividhā jāti sabhāvo asseti
anya-e0812n0:1705_5: ca, vijāti vacanaṃ assā upamāyāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1711_0: 207. “Khajjoto”iccādi. Khajjoto bhānumālīva sūriyo viya vibhātītyadhikopamā adhikena
anya-e0812n0:1711_1: hīnassa upamitattā. Balambhodhi senāsāgaro sāgaro viya saṃkhubhīti aphuṭṭhatthopamā
anya-e0812n0:1711_2: “balambhodhī”ti rūpakena senāya mahantattāvagamato puna “sāgaro viyā”ti upamāya kassaci
anya-e0812n0:1712_0: 207. “Khajjoto”ccādi. “Khajjoto bhānumālīva vibhātī”ti ayaṃ adhikopamā adhikāya upamāya
anya-e0812n0:1712_1: upamitattā adhikopamā nāma hoti. “Balambhodhi senāsamuddo sāgaro viya saṃkhubhī”ti
anya-e0812n0:1712_2: ayaṃ aphuṭṭhatthā senāya mahattaṃ “balambhodhī”ti tirobhūtaupamāyeva avagataṃ, tasmā
anya-e0812n0:1712_3: puna “sāgaro viyā”ti upamāya phusitabbatthassābhāvā aphuṭṭhatthopamā nāma hoti. Aphuṭṭho
anya-e0812n0:1712_4: attho etissāti ca, balaṃ eva ambhodhīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1718_1: yato cande bhiṅgo na sambhavati, pupphagacche tu sambhavatīti ayamupamā upamāpekkhinī.
anya-e0812n0:1718_2: Sakalaṅko sasalakkhaṇo nisākaro cando keravākāro kumudasannibhoti khaṇḍitopamā keravassa
anya-e0812n0:1719_1: upamāpekkhinī nāma hoti. Cande bhiṅgapavattiyā abhāvato tassa visayabhūtapupphagacchakādi
anya-e0812n0:1719_2: candassa upamattena gahetvā avuttattā duṭṭhāti adhippāyo. Sakalaṅko kalaṅkasahito
anya-e0812n0:1719_3: nisākaro cando keravākāro kumudasadisoti ayaṃ khaṇḍitā candagataṃ kaṇhattaṃ pakāsetuṃ
anya-e0812n0:1719_5: hoti. Upamaṃ apekkhatīti ca, khaṇḍaṃ itā gatāti ca, khaṇḍena itā yuttā vāti ca, keravassākāro
anya-e0812n0:1719_6: asseti ca, saha kalaṅkena vattatīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1722: Karonti cā’daraṃ dhīrā, payoge kvacideva tu.
anya-e0812n0:1723_0: 209. Vuttaṃ nigameti “icceva”mādinā. Rūpesu payogesu. Vigato apagato ādaro sambhāvanā
anya-e0812n0:1723_1: yesaṃ tathā bhavanti. Kiṃ bhinnaliṅgādikaṃ niyamenānādaraṇīyameva, aniyameneti niyameneti
anya-e0812n0:1723_2: (ka.) ce gayhūpagampi atthīti āha “karonti”ccādiṃ. Kvacideva tu payoge dhīrā kavayo
anya-e0812n0:1723_3: ādaraṃ karonti cāti. Casaddo vattabbantaratthaṃ samuccinoti.
anya-e0812n0:1724_0: 209. “Icce”ccādi. Iti anantaraṃ niddiṭṭhesu evamādirūpesu payogesu dhīrā vigatādarā
anya-e0812n0:1724_1: bhavanti. Imeyeva dhīrā kvacideva tu payoge bhinnaliṅgādike ādaraṃ karonti ca. Iti
anya-e0812n0:1724_2: evaṃ ayaṃ pakāro ādi yesamiti ca, tāni ca tāni rūpāni ceti ca, vigato ādaro yesamiti
anya-e0812n0:1724_3: ca viggaho. Casaddo vākyantarasamuccaye. Tasmā vigatādaratthena aññamādarakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1730_0: 210. Udāharati “itthi”ccādi. Ayaṃ jano itthīva yāti kriyānuvattito. Esā itthī pumāva
anya-e0812n0:1730_1: puriso viya vadati tādisassa pāgabbhiyayogato. Ettha liṅganānattamupamānopameyyānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1730_2: Ayamicchito koci me pāṇā iva piyo iṭṭho, vijjā byākaraṇādayo dhanamiva accitā rāsikatāti vacanabhedo.
anya-e0812n0:1731_0: 210. Idāni bhinnaliṅgānaṃ gahetabbavisayaṃ dasseti “itthīvā’ya”miccādinā. Ayaṃ jano
anya-e0812n0:1731_1: itthīva avisadagamanena mahilā viya yāti. Esā itthī pumā viya tādisapāgabbhiyayuttattā
anya-e0812n0:1731_2: puriso viya vadatīti. Iha dvinnaṃ upamānopameyyānaṃ liṅgabhede satipi kavayo ādaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:1731_3: karonti. Ayaṃ puriso me mama pāṇā iva pāṇā iva jīvo iva (ka.) āyavova piyo. Accitā
anya-e0812n0:1731_4: sañcitā vijjā byākaraṇanighaṇṭuādayo dhanamiva hontīti. Ettha upamānopameyyānaṃ vacanato
anya-e0812n0:1735_1: bhavaṃ viya virājate. Iti hīnenāpi hoti. Evaṃvidhe samucite visaye liṅgavacanabhedādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1736_0: 211. “Bhava”miccādi. Mahīpāla bho rāja, devarājā sakko devarājā bhavaṃ viya virājateti.
anya-e0812n0:1736_1: Ettha sakkamupādāya “bhavaṃ viyā”ti hīnattepi iṭṭhameva. Ayaṃ rājā aṃsumato sūriyassa
anya-e0812n0:1736_2: kacchaṃ padaviṃ tejasā ārohituṃ pattuṃ alaṃ samatthoti. Ettha tejasā adhikopi sūriyo
anya-e0812n0:1736_3: upamābhūto iṭṭhova, “kacchaṃ ārohitu”nti ivasaddapariyāyo. Īdisaṃ bhinnaliṅgādikopamādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1740_1: nānattābhāvassa nirūpanā āropanena upamānopameyyānamabhedaṃ rūpayati dassetīti rūpakamuccate.
anya-e0812n0:1740_2: Upamānassa upamānopameyyānamabhedāropanena tirobhūto apākaṭo bhedo nānattaṃ yassāti
anya-e0812n0:1740_4: padameva ambujasadisattā ambujaṃ rupyate. Ityupameyyopamānabhūtānaṃ padambujānamabhedāropanena
anya-e0812n0:1740_5: upamānopameyyagatasādhammasaṅkhātāyapi upamāya bhedo vijjamānopi tirohito. Na tu
anya-e0812n0:1740_6: āvibhūto abbhuto (ka.) “padaṃ ambujamive”ti. Sā copamā tathāvidhā upamānopameyyānamabhedamāyāti
anya-e0812n0:1741_1: anantaraniddiṭṭhaupamānopameyyānaṃ abhedassa sabhāvato bhede satipi vibhūtasadisattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1741_2: nissāya “so eso, eso so”ti vattārehi parikappitassa abhedassa nirūpanā upamānopameyyapadatthesu
anya-e0812n0:1741_3: buddhiyā āropanaṃ nissāya tirobhūtabhedā “padaṃ ambujamivā”ti evaṃ pākaṭanānattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1741_4: vinā “padambuja”nti tirohitabhedā upameva padatthānaṃ sādhammasaṅkhātā upamā eva
anya-e0812n0:1741_5: rūpakaṃ iti vuccate. Vibhūtasadisattaṃ nissāya upamānopameyyavatthūni abhedena gayhanti.
anya-e0812n0:1741_6: Tesamabhedaggahaṇeneva te nissāya pavattamānabhinnasādhammasaṅkhātāya upamāyapi bhedo
anya-e0812n0:1741_7: tirohito hoti. Evaṃ tirobhūtanānattavantasādhammasaṅkhātā upamā eva vatthūnamabhedaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1741_8: dīpetīti rūpakaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyo. Tirobhūto bhedo yasseti ca, abhedaṃ rūpayati
anya-e0812n0:1744: Taṃ dvidhā puna paccekaṃ, samāsādivasā tidhā.
anya-e0812n0:1745_0: 213. Tassa bhedaṃ niddisati “asesa”iccādinā. Asesavatthu visayo yassa taṃ tathāvidhañca,
anya-e0812n0:1745_1: ekadese avayave vivattatīti ekadesavivatti ceti taṃ rūpakaṃ dvidhā, puna paccekaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1745_2: visuṃ visuṃ samāsādivasā upamānopameyyānaṃ katasamāsattā samāsarūpaka asamāsarūpaka
anya-e0812n0:1746_0: 213. “Asesi”ccādi. Taṃ rūpakaṃ asesavatthuvisayaṃ ekadesavivatti cāti dvidhā hoti,
anya-e0812n0:1746_1: puna paccekaṃ taṃ dvayampi samāsādivasā samāsarūpakaṃ asamāsarūpakaṃ samāsāsamāsarūpakañceti
anya-e0812n0:1746_2: imesaṃ bhedena tidhā hoti. Asesaṃ vatthu visayo asseti ca, ekadese vivattatīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1746_3: ekaṃ ekaṃ patīti ca, samāso samāsarūpakaṃ ādi yesamiti ca, tesaṃ vaso bhedoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1751_1: pattehi saṃsobhiṃ accantaṃ virocamānaṃ nakhānaṃ dīdhitiyo kiraṇā eva kesarāni yattha
anya-e0812n0:1751_2: tādisaṃ munindassa padameva ambujaṃ sirasā muddhanā ke nāma janā na piḷandhanti pasādhanavasena
anya-e0812n0:1751_3: na dhārentīti. Idamasesavatthuvisayaṃ samāsarūpakaṃ aṅgino padassa aṅgānamaṅgulyādīnamasesānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1752_2: ke na piḷandhanti. Visesyabhūtaṃ caraṇaṃ visesanabhūtā aṅgulī nakhadīdhiti ceti imesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1752_3: upamābhūtehi ambujadalakesarehi abhedakappanāya ekattaṃ gahetvā samāseneva niddiṭṭhattā
anya-e0812n0:1752_4: idaṃ asesavatthuvisayasamāsarūpakaṃ nāma. Aṅguliyo eva dalānīti ca, tehi saṃsobhīti
anya-e0812n0:1752_5: ca, nakhesu dīdhitiyoti ca, tā eva kesarāni asseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1755: Ratanāni guṇā bhūrī, karuṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:1757_0: 215. “Ratanāni”iccādi. Ayaṃ jino sammāsambuddho, paccakkho na parokkho amhākaṃ ambudhi
anya-e0812n0:1757_1: sāgaro. Kathaṃ? Ye tassa bhūrī bahavo guṇā mettādayo, te ratanāni atulyadullabhadassanādisādhammena.
anya-e0812n0:1757_2: Yā tassa karuṇā, sā sītalaṃ jalaṃ sakalajanasantāpāpahattasādhammena. Yaṃ tassa gambhīrattamanuttānatā
anya-e0812n0:1757_3: lābhādīsu, taṃ agādhattamakalalambhaso ambudhiṭṭhatāsādhammenāti idamasesavatthuvisayaṃ asamāsarūpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1758_0: 215. “Ratanāni”ccādi. Ayaṃ jino amhākaṃ paccakkho ambudhi sāgaro, tathā hi tassa
anya-e0812n0:1758_1: bhūrī guṇā sīlasamādhiādayo ratanāni cittīkatādisādhammato ratanāneva, karuṇā anaññasādhāraṇakaruṇā
anya-e0812n0:1758_2: sītalaṃ jalaṃ santāpavinodanasādhammena sītalajalameva hoti, gambhīrattaṃ lābhālābhādīsu
anya-e0812n0:1758_3: ekākāratā agādhattaṃ gambhīratā eva hoti. Idaṃ asesavatthuvisayaasamāsarūpakaṃ. “Bhūrī”ti abyayaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1763_0: 216. “Candikā”iccādi. “Muninda”iccāmantanaṃ, te vadanameva indu vadaninduno iti samāsarūpakaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:1763_1: ayaṃ mandahāsā candikā candakantiyo, asamāsarūpakaṃ. Sādhūnaṃ manāniyeva kumudāni
anya-e0812n0:1763_2: keravāni, samāsarūpakaṃ. Tesaṃ kānanaṃ vanaṃ, pabodhayati vikāsayatīti idaṃ samāsāsamāsarūpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1764_0: 216. “Candi”ccādi. He munindate tuyhaṃ vadaninduno mukhacandassa mandahāsā mandamihitabhūtā
anya-e0812n0:1764_1: candikā candakantiyo, “aya”nti jātyekavacanena mandahāsacandikā niddiṭṭhā. Atha vā
anya-e0812n0:1764_2: ayaṃ vadanindu. Sādhumanokumudakānanaṃ sappurisānaṃ cittasaṅkhātakeravakānanaṃ pabodhayati
anya-e0812n0:1764_4: ca samāsarūpakaṃ. Tasmā idaṃ asesavatthuvisayasamāsāsamāsarūpakaṃ. Mandā ca te hāsā
anya-e0812n0:1764_5: cāti ca, vadanameva indūti ca, sādhūnaṃ manānīti ca, tāniyeva kumudānīti ca, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1769: 217. “Asese”ccādi. Asesavatthuvisaye rūpake ayaṃ “aṅgulīdalasaṃsobhiṃ”iccādikaṃ udāharaṇattayaṃ pabhedo hoti. Idāni ekadesavivattimhi rūpake bhedo viseso pavuccati.
anya-e0812n0:1773: Sukhaṃ ke vā na vindanti, passantā munino mukhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1774_0: 218. “Vilāsa”iccādi. Vilāsena yutto hāsoyeva kusumaṃ yassa. Ruciro manuñño adharoyeva
anya-e0812n0:1774_1: pallavo yassa. Tādisaṃ munino mukhaṃ passantā ke nāma janā sukhaṃ na vindanti sabbepīti.
anya-e0812n0:1774_2: Idaṃ aṅgāni hāsādīni rūpayitvā mukhamaṅgi na rūpitanti ekadesavivattisamāsarūpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1775_1: manuññaadharasaṅkhātakisalayaṃ munino mukhaṃ passantā ke vā ke nāma janā sukhaṃ na
anya-e0812n0:1775_2: vindanti pītisukhaṃ nānubhonti, anubhavanteva. Visesanabhūtānaṃ hāsaadharānaṃ upamābhūtakusumapallavehi
anya-e0812n0:1775_3: abhedaṃ dassetvā visesyabhūtassa mukhassa aññataraupamāvatthunā abhedena avuttattā
anya-e0812n0:1775_4: abhedāropanaṃ ekadeseyeva vivattīti idaṃ ekadesavivattisamāsarūpakaṃ. Vilāsena yutto
anya-e0812n0:1775_5: hāsoti ca, soyeva kusumaṃ asseti ca, ruciro ca so adharo ceti ca, soyeva pallavo asseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1780_0: 219. “Pāda”iccādi. Munindassa vijayino pādadvandaṃ tava vijayaṃ paṭipakkhaparābhavaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1780_1: dadātu. Kīdisaṃ? Yassa paramaccantaṃ kantā manuññā nakharaṃsī pāpānaṃ lobhādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1781_0: 219. “Pāde”ccādi. Yassa sambuddhassa paraṃ atisayena kantā manuññā nakharaṃsī caraṇanakhakantiyo
anya-e0812n0:1781_1: pāpajayaddhajā pāpavijaye ussāpitadhajāyeva honti, tassa munindassa pādadvandaṃ caraṇayugaḷaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1781_2: tava tuyhaṃ vijayaṃ paṭipakkhaparābhavaṃ dadātūti. Nakharaṃsīnaṃ upamābhūtadhajehi
anya-e0812n0:1781_4: Pāpānaṃ jayoti ca, tasmiṃ dhajāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1786_0: 220. “Sunimmala”iccādi. Sunimmalo kapolo yassa, tassa munindavadaninduno sādhūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1786_1: pabuddhaṃ dhammāvabodhavasena vikasitaṃ hadayaṃ cittaṃ keravakānanaṃ jātanti ekadesavivattisamāsāsamāsarūpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1787_1: sajjanānaṃ catusaccāvabodhena pasannamānasaṃ keravakānanaṃ kumudavanaṃ jātanti. Vadanahadayānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1787_2: upamābhūtehi indukeravehi abhedāropanaṃ katvā kapolassa maṇḍalādīhi upamāvisesehi
anya-e0812n0:1787_3: anirūpitattā ekadesavivattisamāsāsamāsarūpakaṃ. Ettha samāso nāma vadanindūnameva.
anya-e0812n0:1787_4: Asamāso nāma hadayakeravānamevāti. Tathā hi rūpakavisaye samāsāsamāsattaṃ upamānopameyyapadānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1787_5: dvinnamevāti. Suṭṭhu nimmaloti ca, so kapolo assāti ca, munindavadanameva indūti
anya-e0812n0:1787_6: ca, pabuddhañca taṃ hadayañcāti ca, sādhūnaṃ pabuddhahadayamiti ca, keravānaṃ kānanamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1795: Kassa nāma mano dhīra, nākaḍḍhati manohara”nti.
anya-e0812n0:1796: Yuttarūpakaṃ yuttattā pupphabhiṅgānaṃ, tadanusārena ayuttarūpakādipi viññeyyanti.
anya-e0812n0:1797_0: 221. Rūpakāni punapi santīti dassetumāha “rūpakāni”ccādi. Rūpakāni yuttāyuttādibhedato
anya-e0812n0:1797_1: yuttarūpakaayuttarūpakādibhedena bahūni eva honti, tāni rūpakāni ettheva rūpake antogadhāni.
anya-e0812n0:1797_2: Iti tasmā kāraṇā tāni visuṃ na vuttāni. Anto majjhe gadhāni pavattānīti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1799: Kassa nāma mano dhīra, nākaḍḍhati manohara”nti.
anya-e0812n0:1801: He dhīra sitapupphujjalaṃ mandahasitasaṅkhātehi kusumehi vijotantaṃ lolanettabhiṅgaṃ manoharaṃ tavānanaṃ kassa nāma mano nākaḍḍhatīti. Imassa paṭipakkhato ayuttarūpakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1805_1: Ettha ākāsassa taḷāke rūpite candassa padumattaṃ rūpakaṃ yuttanti etaṃ khaṇḍarūpakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1806_0: 222. Rūpake dosādosaṃ upamāyaṃ viya parikappetvā gahetabbanti upadisanto āha “candimi”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:1806_1: “Candimā cando ākāsapaduma”nti etaṃ khaṇḍarūpakaṃ ākāsassa taḷākattena anirūpitattā
anya-e0812n0:1806_2: khaṇḍarūpakaṃ nāma. Duṭṭhaṃ khaṇḍitopamā viya dosaduṭṭhaṃ nāma. “Ambhoruhavanaṃ nīluppalavanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1810_0: 223. Kimettakā evopamārūpakabhedā? Neti paridīpento avuttaṃ atidisati “pariyanto”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1810_1: Rūpakassa upamāya ca vikappānaṃ pabhedānaṃ pariyanto avasānaṃ natthi yaṃ yasmā kāraṇā,
anya-e0812n0:1811_0: 223. Idāni imesameva upamārūpakānaṃ avuttānantabhedo vuttānusāreneva ñātabboti dassetumāha
anya-e0812n0:1811_1: “pariyanto”iccādi. Rūpakassa ca rūpakālaṅkārassa ca upamāya ca upamālaṅkārassa ca
anya-e0812n0:1811_2: vikappānaṃ vividhākārena kappitapakkhānaṃ pariyanto koṭi yaṃ yasmā natthi, tena kāraṇena
anya-e0812n0:1811_3: avuttaṃ imasmiṃ subodhālaṅkāre avuttapakkhaṃ samūhaṃ anumānato anumānañāṇena viññeyyanti.
anya-e0812n0:1811_4: Upamārūpakānaṃ sakalamavuttapakkhaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ anatikkamitvā
anya-e0812n0:1811_5: vuttehi tehi tehi pakkhasaṅkhātehi liṅgehi siddhānumānañāṇena sāmaññalakkhaṇe antogadhānamanuttarūpakasaṅkhātānumeyyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1811_6: avabodho sakkāti adhippāyo. Rūpakassa pana upamantogadhattā upamāya niddiṭṭhadosādosaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1815_0: 224. Āvuttimadhikiccāha “puna”iccādinā. Atthassa abhidheyyassa padassa saddassa ca
anya-e0812n0:1815_1: ubhayesaṃ atthapadānañca punappunaṃ bhiyyo bhiyyo yaṃ uccāraṇaṃ, sāyaṃ tividhā nāmato
anya-e0812n0:1815_2: āvutti viññeyyā, uccāraṇavasena ā punappunaṃ vattanamāvuttīti.
anya-e0812n0:1816_0: 224. Idāni āvuttiṃ dasseti “punappune”ccādinā. Atthassa saddābhihitaatthassa ca padassa
anya-e0812n0:1816_1: ca ubhayesaṃ atthapadānañca yaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ, sā ayaṃ tividhā nāmato āvutti
anya-e0812n0:1816_2: iti viññeyyā. Punappuneti etadabyayaṃ kriyābāhulye vattate. Uccāraṇavasena ā punappunaṃ vattanamāvutti.
anya-e0812n0:1819: Mano harati sabbesaṃ, ādadāti disā dasa;
anya-e0812n0:1821_0: 225. Udāharati “mano”iccādi. Jinassa ayaṃ yasorāsi sabbesaṃ janānaṃ mano cittaṃ harati,
anya-e0812n0:1821_1: dasa disā ādadāti sabbadā sabbadhā (ka.) taṃvisayattā, nimmalattaṃ nimmalabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1821_2: gaṇhāti, ettha gahaṇalakkhaṇassa dasagahaṇalakkhaṇassa (ka.) atthassa anekehi pariyāyavacanehi
anya-e0812n0:1822_0: 225. Udāharati “mano harati”ccādinā. Jinassa ayaṃ yasorāsi sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ mano
anya-e0812n0:1822_1: cittaṃ harati gaṇhāti, dasa disā ādadāti avisayaṭṭhānābhāvato gaṇhāti, nimmalattañca
anya-e0812n0:1822_3: ādadāti, gaṇhātī”ti aññehi pariyāyavacanehi āvattitattā ayamatthāvutti nāma. Niggato
anya-e0812n0:1822_4: malehīti ca, tassa bhāvoti ca, yasaso rāsiiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1826: Vibhā senti ca sabbāpi, candādīnaṃ hatā viya.
anya-e0812n0:1827_0: 226. “Vibhāsenti”ccādi. Munino dehakantiyo sabbā disā vibhāsenti visesena dīpenti,
anya-e0812n0:1827_1: yato evaṃ tasmā kāraṇā candādīnaṃ sabbāpi vibhā sobhā hatā pahatā viya senti pavattantīti padāvutti.
anya-e0812n0:1828_0: 226. “Vibhāsenti”ccādi. Munino dehakantiyo sabbā disā vibhāsenti yasmā visesena pakāsenti,
anya-e0812n0:1828_1: tasmā candādīnaṃ sabbāpi vibhā kantiyo hatā pahatā viya senti pavattanti ca, “vibhāsentī”ti
anya-e0812n0:1828_2: padasseva āvattanato ayaṃ padāvutti nāma. Dehe kantiyoti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1831: Jitvā viharati klesa-ripuṃ loke jino ayaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:1833_0: 227. “Jitvā”iccādi. Ayaṃ jino klesaripuṃ jitvā loke viharati pavattati, ayaṃ tena
anya-e0812n0:1833_1: jito arivaggo sattusamūho dujjane rāsībhūto viya tato aladdhappatiṭṭhattā. “Viharatī”ti
anya-e0812n0:1834_0: 227. “Jitvā”iccādi. Ayaṃ jino klesaripuṃ jitvā loke viharati, ayaṃ arivaggo klesaripusamūho
anya-e0812n0:1834_1: dujjane rāsībhūtova viharatīti. Vāsasaṅkhatassa atthassa ca “viharatī”ti padassa
anya-e0812n0:1834_2: ca puna punappunaṃ (?) uccāraṇato ayaṃ ubhayāvutti nāma hoti. Kleso eva ripūti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1834_3: arīnaṃ vaggoti ca, arāsi rāsi abhavīti ca, kucchito janoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1838_0: 228. Dīpakaṃ paridīpayamāha “ekatthe”ccādi. Ekattha vākyassādo majjhe ante vā vattamānampi
anya-e0812n0:1838_1: kriyājātyādikaṃ sabbassa abhimatassa kassaci vākyassa kriyākārakasambandhābhidhāyino
anya-e0812n0:1838_2: padasantānassa upakārakaṃ vākyatthānvayavasena dīpakaṃ nāma, dīpo viya ekadese vattitopi
anya-e0812n0:1838_3: sakalapadatthavasena sabbavākyaṃ dīpayati pakāsetīti. Tañca dīpakaṃ ādi ca majjhañca
anya-e0812n0:1838_4: antañca visayo gocaro yassa tādisaṃ tidhā ādidīpakaṃ majjhadīpakaṃ antadīpakanti
anya-e0812n0:1838_5: tividhaṃ hotīti attho, tampi kriyādīnaṃ vasena paccekaṃ tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1839_0: 228. Idāni dīpakālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “ekatthe”ccādinā. Ekattha vākyassa ādimajjhāvasānesvekasmiṃ
anya-e0812n0:1839_2: vākyatthāvabodhavasena payojanaṃ dīpakaṃ nāma ekaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā visayībhūtasabbaṭṭhānagatadabbapakāsakapadīpasamānattā
anya-e0812n0:1839_3: dīpakaṃ nāma hoti. Tañca dīpakaṃ ādimajjhantavisayaṃ vākyassa ādivisayaṃ majjhavisayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1839_4: antavisayañceti tidhā hoti. Etesu ekekamapi kriyājātiguṇabhedena punapi tividhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1839_5: hotīti viññeyyaṃ. Dīpetīti dīpo, padīpo. Paṭibhāgatthe kappaccayena dīpo viyāti dīpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1839_6: Vākyassa ādi ca majjhañca antañceti ca, taṃ visayo asseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1844_0: 229. Udāharati “akāsi”ccādi. Buddho veneyyā vinetabbāyeva bandhavo tesaṃ amitamaparimitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1844_1: udayamabhivuddhiṃ akāsi. Na kevalaṃ tameva, sabbapāpehi samaṃ ekato anekānaṃ titthiyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1844_2: maddanañca akāsīti. Iha “akāsī”ti kriyāpadenādivattinā sabbameva vākyaṃ dīpayatīti kriyādidīpakametaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1845_1: Na kevalaṃ tameva, samaṃ ekakkhaṇe sabbapāpehi sahānekatitthiyamaddanañca akāsīti.
anya-e0812n0:1845_2: Vākyādimhi kriyāya ṭhitattā idaṃ kriyādidīpakaṃ nāma. Amito ca so udayo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1845_3: anekā ca te titthiyā ceti ca, tesaṃ maddanamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1850_0: 230. “Dassana”miccādi. Munino dassanaṃ sādhujanānaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ nāma jāyate amatassa
anya-e0812n0:1850_1: sādhanato, tehi sādhujanehi aññesaṃ jantūnaṃ niccamupatāpetīti niccopatāpanaṃ visaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1850_2: jāyate, tasmiṃ manopadosassa visasadisattā nirayādidukkhāvahabhāvatoti. Kriyāmajjhadīpakametaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1851_1: ekantakāraṇattā kāriyopacārena amataṃ bhūtaṃ jāyate, tadaññesaṃ tehi sādhujanehi
anya-e0812n0:1851_2: aññesaṃ jantūnaṃ tu niccopatāpanaṃ satatamupatāpakaraṇato visaṃ jāyate visatulyapaṭighakāraṇattā
anya-e0812n0:1851_3: kāriyopacārena visaṃ bhavatīti. Idaṃ kriyāya majjhe ṭhitattā kriyāmajjhadīpakaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1851_4: Sādhavo ca te janā ceti ca, tehi aññeti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1855: Jinānanindu indu ca, kassa nā’nandako bhave.
anya-e0812n0:1856_0: 231. “Accante”ccādi. Accantaṃ kantaṃ manuññaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ piyabhāvo, tameva, tamiva
anya-e0812n0:1856_1: vācandātapo candikā, tena manoharo jinānanindu indu cando ca kassa janassa ānandako
anya-e0812n0:1857_1: candakiraṇena, no ce, atisayena manuññapiyatāsaṅkhātavilāsasadisena candakiraṇena
anya-e0812n0:1857_2: manoharo jinānanindu sambuddhassa mukhacando ca indu ca pakaticando ca kassa ānandako
anya-e0812n0:1857_3: na bhave. Idaṃ kriyāya ante ṭhitattā kriyāntadīpakaṃ nāma. Antaṃ atikkantanti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1857_4: tañca taṃ kantañceti ca, lavaṇassa bhāvo lāvaṇyaṃ, madhurabhāvo, taṃsadisattā accantakantañca
anya-e0812n0:1857_5: taṃ lāvaṇyañcāti ca, candassa ātapo kiraṇoti ca, accantakantalāvaṇyameva candātapoti
anya-e0812n0:1857_6: ca, candapakkhe accantakantalāvaṇyamiva ca so candātapo cāti ca, tena manoharoti
anya-e0812n0:1857_7: ca, jinānanameva indūti ca vākyaṃ. Iminā kriyādīpakattayeneva avuttajātidīpakaguṇadīpakānipi ñātabbāni.
anya-e0812n0:1864_0: 232. Ādidīpakādīsupi tesu payogakkamena pakārantaramatthīti vadati “hoti”ccādi. Sīlaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1864_1: pañcasīlādikaṃ, avippaṭisārāya pacchānutāpābhāvāya hoti, so avippaṭisāro pāmojjassa
anya-e0812n0:1864_2: uppannamattāya pītiyā hetu hoti, taṃ pāmojjaṃ pītiyā balavabhūtāya hetu hoti, sā
anya-e0812n0:1864_3: cāyaṃ pīti passaddhādīnaṃ passaddhisukhādīnaṃ pasiddhiyā nipphattiyā hotīti yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1865_0: 232. Idāni navasu dīpakesu payogavisesena sādhetabbe aññappakāre dasseti “hoti”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1865_1: Sīlaṃ surakkhitaṃ pañcaṅgadasaṅgādisīlaṃ avippaṭisārāya hoti, so avippaṭisāro pāmojjahetu
anya-e0812n0:1865_2: hoti uppannamattāya taruṇapītiyā kāraṇaṃ bhavati, taṃ pāmojjaṃ pītihetu balavapītikāraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1865_3: hoti, sā ayañca pīti passaddhādipasiddhiyā kāyapassaddhicittapassaddhiādīnaṃ siddhiyā
anya-e0812n0:1865_4: hetu hoti. Na vippaṭisāro avippaṭisāro, nasaddo pasajjapaṭisedhe vattate. Pamuditassa
anya-e0812n0:1865_5: bhāvoti ca, tassa hetūti ca, passaddhi ādi yesaṃ sukhādīnanti ca, tesaṃ pasiddhīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1869_0: 233. Kimidaṃ tava pakārantaramiccāha “iccādi”ccādi. Iccevamimaṃ yaṃ taṃ mālādīpakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1869_2: pubbaṃ vākyaṃ “hotāvippaṭisārāya sīla”ntiādikaṃ apekkhinī apekkhamānā vākyānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1869_3: mālā paramparā pavattāti. Taṃ yathāvuttaṃ mālādīpakaṃ mataṃ, nādidīpakanti.
anya-e0812n0:1870_1: sambajjhamānā paramparā pubbaṃ pubbaṃ “hotāvippaṭisārāyā”tiādikaṃ vākyaṃ apekkhinī
anya-e0812n0:1870_2: pavattā. Iti idaṃ anantaragatappakāraṃ dīpakaṃ “mālādīpaka”nti matanti. Ādimhi dīpakamiti
anya-e0812n0:1870_3: ca, visayopacārena ādi ca taṃ dīpakañcāti ca, mālā eva dīpakamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1874_0: 234. Avutte dīpakavikappe atidisanto nigameti “aneni”ccādinā. Aneneva anantarā vuttena
anya-e0812n0:1874_1: pakārena vidhinā dīpake dīpakavisaye dīpakavisese (ka.) sesānamavuttānaṃ vikappānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1874_2: jātyādidīpakādibhedānaṃ anugati avabodho suddhabuddhibhi parisuddhamatīhi kavīhi
anya-e0812n0:1875_0: 234. Idāni avuttadīpakānipi atidisati “anenevi”ccādinā. Aneneva pakārena yathāvuttadīpakappakārena
anya-e0812n0:1875_1: dīpake dīpakavisaye sesānaṃ api vikappānaṃ avuttajātidīpakaguṇadīpakasaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1875_2: pakkhānaṃ jātyādidīpakaguṇādidīpakādīnaṃ channaṃ mālādīpakānañca anugati avabodho
anya-e0812n0:1875_3: suddhabuddhibhi kavīhi vidhātabbā vuttānusāreneva kātabbā. Visesato asaṅkarato kappīyantīti
anya-e0812n0:1875_4: ca, suddhā buddhi yesanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1881_0: 235. Akkhepamupakkhipati “visesi”ccādinā. Visesassa yassa kassaci vacanicchāyaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1881_1: nisedhassa paṭisedhassa vacanaṃ vutti, so akkhepo nāma akkhipanaṃ paṭisedhoti katvā.
anya-e0812n0:1881_2: Soyamakkhepo ca kālappabhedato atītādito tidhā tippakāro.
anya-e0812n0:1882_0: 235. Idāni akkhepaṃ dasseti “visese”ccādinā. Visesavacanicchāyaṃ tu yassa kassaci
anya-e0812n0:1882_1: padatthavisesassa kathanicchāya eva yaṃ nisedhavacanaṃ paṭisedhavacanaṃ atthi, so
anya-e0812n0:1882_2: paṭisedho akkhepo nāma akkhepālaṅkāro nāma. Ayañca akkhepo kālappabhedato atītādikālavisesena
anya-e0812n0:1882_3: tidhā hoti. Visesassa kassaci vacananti ca, tasmiṃ icchāti ca, nisedhassa paṭisedhassa
anya-e0812n0:1882_4: vacanamiti ca, akkhipanaṃ paṭikkhipananti ca, kālassa kriyāya vā pabhedoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1887_0: 236. “Ekāki”ccādi. So jino ekākī eko samāno anekasenaṃ taṃ māraṃ vijayi parājesi,
anya-e0812n0:1887_1: taṃ kathaṃ yujjate. Atha vā kiṃ na yujjate, yato tassa jinassa pāramī samatiṃsavidhā
anya-e0812n0:1887_2: pāramitā eva balaṃ īdisaṃ yādisaṃ tassa vijayakāraṇanti. Ettha ekākittakāraṇasāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n0:1887_3: māravijayāyogabuddhi “sasenaṃ māraṃ vijitavāti kathaṃ yujjatī”ti evamākārā atītā
anya-e0812n0:1888_0: 236. Idāni udāharati “ekāki”ccādinā. Sa jino so sabbaññū ekākī asahāyo adutiyo anekasenaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1888_1: taṃ māraṃ vijayī ajinīti, taṃ kathaṃ yujjati. Atha vā yujjateva, tassa jinassa pāramībalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1888_3: mārassa saparivārabhāvañca nissāya kassaci uppannā “ekākinā kathamanekaseno māro
anya-e0812n0:1888_4: jito”ti viparītabuddhi atītamāravijayavisayattā atītā hoti, “tassa pāramībalaṃ īdisa”nti
anya-e0812n0:1888_5: atthavisesassa kathanicchāya “atha vā”ti niddiṭṭhapaṭisedhavacanena akkhittanti atītassa
anya-e0812n0:1895_0: 237. “Kiṃ citte”ccādi. Citta ejāya taṇhāya samugghātaṃ sabbathā appavattiṃ appattosmīti
anya-e0812n0:1895_1: kiṃ khijjase, tuccho tava khedo. Sugate sakimpi ekavārampi kato paṇāmo soyeva taṇhāya
anya-e0812n0:1895_2: samugghātoyeva nanu ekantakāraṇattā tassāti vattamānakkhepoyaṃ vattamānassa khedassākkhitattā.
anya-e0812n0:1896_0: 237. “Kiṃ citte”ccādi. He citta ejāsamugghātaṃ ejāsaṅkhatāya taṇhāya samucchedapahānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1896_1: appattosmīti kiṃ khijjase, tuccho tava khedo. Tathā hi sugate buddhavisaye sakimpi
anya-e0812n0:1896_2: kato paṇāmo soyeva nanu taṇhāsamucchedassa ekantakāraṇattā kāraṇakāriyānamabhedabuddhiyā
anya-e0812n0:1896_3: so ejāsamugghātoyeva kiṃ na bhavati, bhavatyeva. “Paṇāmo”tyādivisesakathanādhippāyena
anya-e0812n0:1896_4: “kiṃ khijjase”ti cittassa vattamānakhedassa paṭisedhitattā ayaṃ vattamānakkhepo nāma.
anya-e0812n0:1898: Saccaṃ na te gamissanti, sivaṃ sujanagocaraṃ;
anya-e0812n0:1901_0: 238. “Sacca”miccādi. Sujanagocaraṃ sivaṃ santipadaṃ te saccaṃ niyataṃ na gamissanti.
anya-e0812n0:1901_1: Ye micchādiṭṭhiyā sassatādikāya parikkantaṃ abhibhūtaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yesaṃ tādisā
anya-e0812n0:1901_2: suṭṭhu atisayena dujjanāti yojanīyaṃ. Ayamanāgatakkhepo bhāvino gamanassākkhittattā.
anya-e0812n0:1903: Gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā kanta, mamāvatthā niveditā”ti kābyādāsa 2.139.
anya-e0812n0:1905_0: 238. “Sacca”miccādi. Sujanagocaraṃ sādhūnaṃ visayagataṃ sivaṃ santipadaṃ te saccamekantena
anya-e0812n0:1905_1: na gamissanti. Ke? Ye micchādiṭṭhiparikkantamānasā sudujjanā, teyevāti. “Micchādiṭṭhī”tiādivisesassa
anya-e0812n0:1905_2: kathanādhippāyena “te na gamissantī”ti titthiyānaṃ bhāvino nibbānagamanassa buddhiyā
anya-e0812n0:1905_3: paṭisiddhattā ayaṃ anāgatakkhepo nāma. Micchā viparītā ca sā diṭṭhi cāti ca, tāya
anya-e0812n0:1907: Gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā kanta, mamāvatthā niveditā” –
anya-e0812n0:1908_0: Tyādiko anādarakkhepopi dassitātītakkhepādīhi anaññattā visuṃ na vutto. Ayaṃ panettha
anya-e0812n0:1908_1: attho – he kanta vallabha mama jīvitāsā balavatī hoti, dhanāsā dubbalā, tvaṃ gaccha
anya-e0812n0:1908_2: vā tiṭṭha vā, mamāvatthā mama pakati niveditā viññāpitā. “Ettha mamāvatthā niveditā”ti
anya-e0812n0:1908_3: visesassa kathanādhippāyena “gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā”ti iminā anādaravacanena attano
anya-e0812n0:1908_4: vallabhassa vattamānassa anāgatassa vā gamanassa paṭisedhitattā vattamānakkhepo vā
anya-e0812n0:1914_1: kassaci vākyatthassa sādhano samatthako kassacideva atthassa parassa nyāso yo, so
anya-e0812n0:1914_2: atthantaranyāso ñeyyo atthantarassa kassaci vatthuno nyāso payogoti katvā. Tassa
anya-e0812n0:1914_3: bhedamāha “sabbe”ccādinā. Assa atthantaranyāsassa bhedato vikappato hivisiṭṭhā hisaddena
anya-e0812n0:1914_4: visesitā sabbabyāpī ca visesaṭṭho cāti ime bhavanti. Nanu pativatthūpamāya imassa
anya-e0812n0:1914_5: ca ko bhedoti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi ubhayattha atthantaranyāsamattena sadisattepi yattha
anya-e0812n0:1914_6: mukhyato sāmyappatītisabbhāvo, sā pativatthūpamā. Yattha pana sādhanarūpassevatthantaranyāso,
anya-e0812n0:1915_0: 239. Idāni atthantaranyāsaṃ dasseti “ñeyya”ccādinā. Yo aññavākyatthasādhano aññavākyatthassa
anya-e0812n0:1915_1: sādhano hoti, aññavākyatthaṃ sādheti, so atthantaranyāso sādhiyavākyatthato aññatthassa
anya-e0812n0:1915_2: ṭhapanaṃ kathanaṃ “atthantaranyāso”ti ñeyyo, assa atthantaranyāsassa bhedato pabhedena
anya-e0812n0:1915_3: sabbabyāpī visesaṭṭho ca, eteyeva hivisiṭṭhā cāti cattāro bhavanti. Attho ca so antaro
anya-e0812n0:1915_4: añño ceti ca, tassa nyāsoti ca, sabbaṃ byāpeti sīlenāti ca, visese padese tiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0812n0:1918: Tepi lokahitāsattā, sūriyo candimā api candimārapi (sī.);
anya-e0812n0:1919: Atthaṃ passa gamissanti, niyamo kena laṅghyate.
anya-e0812n0:1920_0: 240. Udāharati “tepi”ccādi. Lokassa hite abhivuddhiyaṃ āsattā abhirattā sūriyo candimā
anya-e0812n0:1920_1: apīti te mahantāpi atthaṃ udayavipariyāsa’mabhāvaṃ gamissanti, na gamissantā puna
anya-e0812n0:1920_2: (ka.) tatheva tiṭṭhanti, “passe”ti tamavabodhayati. Tathā hi niyamo “bhāvo nāma na
anya-e0812n0:1920_3: pāyini. Sabbe saṅkhārā vayadhammino”ti ayaṃ niyati. Kena nāma vatthunā laṅghyate
anya-e0812n0:1920_4: atikkamituṃ sakkāti. Ayaṃ hisaddarahito sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso tādisassa niyamassa sabbagatattā.
anya-e0812n0:1921_0: 240. “Tepi”ccādi. Lokahitāsattā lokābhivuddhiyaṃ laggā sūriyo api candimā api tepi
anya-e0812n0:1921_1: mahānubhāvā atthaṃ vināsaṃ gamissanti, passa etesaṃ pākaṭaṃ vināsaṃ olokehi. Tathā
anya-e0812n0:1921_2: hi niyamo “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti sabbapadatthamanatikkamma pavattaniyamo kena
anya-e0812n0:1921_3: laṅghyate paccayasamuppannena kena padatthena atikkamyateti. Ayaṃ hisaddarahito atthagamanasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n0:1921_4: niyamo sabbattha gatoti sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso. Pativatthūpamāya ca atthantaranyāsassa
anya-e0812n0:1921_5: ca atthantaranyāsattena tulyattepi tattha sādhammapakāsattasabhāvo, ettha vuttatthassa
anya-e0812n0:1921_6: sādhanasabhāvoti evamimesaṃ nānattaṃ subyattaṃ. Apīti sambhāvanāyaṃ, dutiyo apisaddo samuccaye.
anya-e0812n0:1925: Gatova nibbutiṃ sabbe, saṅkhārā na hi sassatā.
anya-e0812n0:1926_1: satthā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikehi paramatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti, vasī pañcahi
anya-e0812n0:1926_2: vasitāhi atisayavasīhi vasippatto sopi munissaro nibbutiṃ khandhaparinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1926_3: gato pattoyeva, hisaddo samatthane. Sabbe saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā na sassatā na
anya-e0812n0:1926_4: niccā uppādavayadhammattā aniccā. Ayampi hisaddasahitasabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso
anya-e0812n0:1927_1: yathārahamanusāsako vasī vuṭṭhānaadhiṭṭhānādīsu pañcasu vasibhāvesu sātisayaṃ issariyavā
anya-e0812n0:1927_2: so munissaro api nibbutiṃ khandhanibbānaṃ gato eva. Hi tatheva, sabbe saṅkhārā sassatā
anya-e0812n0:1927_3: na hontīti. Ayaṃ hisaddasahito aniccatāya sabbagatattā sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso.
anya-e0812n0:1932_0: 242. “Jino”iccādi. Jino saṃsāroyeva kantāro duggamattā, tato janaṃ sakalampi lokaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1932_1: nibbutiṃ pāpeti. Nanu pasiddhiyamanumatiyaṃ vā. Sāyaṃ gati nibbutipāpanasaṅkhātā
anya-e0812n0:1932_2: pavatti, vigato sārado bhayamassāti visārado, tassa bhāvo nibbhayatā nibbhayatāya
anya-e0812n0:1932_3: (ka.) vesārajjaṃ, tena samaṅgīnaṃ yuttānaṃ. Yuttāti anurūpāti. Ayaṃ hisaddavirahito
anya-e0812n0:1932_4: visesaṭṭho atthantaranyāso, vesārajjasamaṅgīnameva tathābhāvato na sabbabyāpī.
anya-e0812n0:1933_0: 242. “Jino”iccādi. Jino janaṃ sattalokaṃ saṃsārakantārā nibbutiṃ pāpeti, sā ayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1933_1: gati pavatti vesārajjasamaṅgīnaṃ catuvesārajjaguṇasamannāgatānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ yuttā
anya-e0812n0:1933_2: nanūti. Ayaṃ janānaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpanā vesārajjasamaṅgīnaṃyeva āveṇikattā visesaṭṭho
anya-e0812n0:1933_3: hisaddarahito atthantaranyāso. Vigato sārado bhayaṃ asseti ca, kassa bhāvoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1933_4: tena samaṅginoti ca vākyaṃ. Nanūti pasiddhiyaṃ anumatiyaṃ vā vattate. Dvinnampi attho
anya-e0812n0:1937: Sayaṃ rāgaparītā hi, pare rañjenti saṅgate.
anya-e0812n0:1938_0: 243. “Suratta”miccādi. Jina te tava surattaṃ bimbaphalasamānavaṇṇattā adharapuṭaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1938_1: mānasaṃ passataṃ yesaṃ kesañci rañjeti pīṇetīti. Hi samatthane, tathā hīti attho.
anya-e0812n0:1938_2: Sayaṃ yena kenaci rāgena rattavaṇṇena anurāgena vā parītā gatā saṅgate attanā saṃsaṭṭhe
anya-e0812n0:1938_3: pare aññe rañjenti rattavaṇṇe anuratte vā karontīti sasileso sādhano. Ayañca hisaddasahito
anya-e0812n0:1939_0: 243. “Suratta”miccādi. Bho jina te tava surattaṃ adharapuṭaṃ oṭṭhayugaḷaṃ mānasaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1939_1: passantānaṃ pasannacittaṃ (ka.) cittaṃ rañjeti pīṇayati. Hi tatheva, sayaṃ rāgaparītā
anya-e0812n0:1939_2: rattavaṇṇena anurāgena vā yuttā saṅgate attanā saṃsaṭṭhe pare aññe rañjenti rattavaṇṇe
anya-e0812n0:1939_3: anuratte vā karonti. Idaṃ tesaṃ sabhāvameveti. Ayaṃ īdisānameva āveṇikattā visesaṭṭho
anya-e0812n0:1939_4: hisaddasahito atthantaranyāso. Puṭasadisattā adharo eva puṭamiti ca, rāgena parītā yuttāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1945_1: sadisatte kathañci vatthūnaṃ tulyatte vācce saddena vācakena paṭipādite atha gamme
anya-e0812n0:1945_2: asaddapaṭipādite sabbatthabalena pakaraṇādinā ñāte vā, na kevalaṃ saddapaṭipādite.
anya-e0812n0:1945_3: Pabhedanaṃ tesameva vatthūnaṃ visesakathanaṃ byatireko byatirecanaṃ puthakkaraṇanti
anya-e0812n0:1945_4: katvā. Ayaṃ byatirekopi ekobhayabhedā ekabyatireko ubhayabyatirekoti vāccagammānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1946_0: 244. Idāni byatirekaṃ dasseti “vācce”iccādinā. Vatthūnaṃ vattumicchitānaṃ kesañci
anya-e0812n0:1946_1: padatthānaṃ sadisatte yena kenaci ākārena samānatte vācce vācakasaddena paṭipādanīye
anya-e0812n0:1946_2: atha puna gamme tasmiṃyeva sadisatte atthasattisaṅkhātasāmatthiyena gammamāne pabhedanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1946_3: tesaṃyeva vatthūnaṃ nānattakathanaṃ byatireko nāma. Ayampi byatireko ekobhayabhedā
anya-e0812n0:1946_5: ekabyatireko ubhayabyatirekoti visesena catubbidho hoti. Sadisānaṃ bhāvoti ca, pakārena
anya-e0812n0:1946_6: bhedanaṃ kathanamiti ca, byatirecanaṃ puthakkaraṇamiti ca, eko ca ubhayo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1953_0: 245. Udāharati “gambhīra”iccādi. Tvaṃ gambhīrattaṃ agādhatā ajjhāsayavisiṭṭhatā ca
anya-e0812n0:1953_1: mahattaṃ vepullaṃ guṇamahantatā ca taṃ ādi yassa upakāritādino, tasmā guṇā jaladhinā
anya-e0812n0:1953_2: sāgarena tulyo. “Asī”tisaddapaṭipāditaṃ sadisattaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhedaṃ dasseti “bhedo
anya-e0812n0:1953_3: tu”iccādinā. Bhedo tu viseso pana sāgarena saha īdisena dissamānena karacaraṇādimatā
anya-e0812n0:1953_4: rucirena te sarīreneva hetunā, nāññathā, tassedisaṃ sarīraṃ natthīti. Sadisatte paṭipādite
anya-e0812n0:1953_5: ekabyatirekoyaṃ ekasmiṃ jine vattamānena dhammena upameyyopamānabhūtajinasāgarānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1954_0: 245. Idāni tamudāharati “gambhīratti”ccādinā. He jina tvaṃ gambhīrattamahattādiguṇā
anya-e0812n0:1954_1: jaladhinā tulyo asi. Iminā vākyena jinasāgarānaṃ dvinnaṃ saddena vāccasadisattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1954_2: vuttaṃ. Bhedo tu sāgarena saha tava viseso pana te tuyhaṃ īdisena evarūpena dissamānahatthapādādiavayavayuttena
anya-e0812n0:1954_3: sarīrena sarīrahetunā hoti. Dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ vattabbasadisattaṃ vatvā iminā vākyena
anya-e0812n0:1954_4: “īdisena sarīrenā”ti ekasmiṃyeva jinapadatthe visesakathanena jaladhito jinapadatthassa
anya-e0812n0:1954_5: visuṃ katattā sadisatte saddena vācce sati ayamekabyatireko nāma. Gambhīrassa gambhīraguṇayuttassa
anya-e0812n0:1954_6: sāgarassa vā gambhīrajjhāsayasamaṅgino jinassa vā bhāvoti ca, mahato pakatiyā mahato
anya-e0812n0:1954_7: sāgarassa vā guṇehi mahato jinassa vā bhāvoti ca, gambhīrattañca mahattañcāti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1954_8: taṃ ādi yassa upakāritādinoti ca, so ca so guṇo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1959_0: 246. “Mahā”iccādi. Sāgaro sugatopi cāti te ubho mahantā sattā makarādayo yattha sāgare,
anya-e0812n0:1959_1: mahantaṃ vā sattaṃ sammappadhānaṃ yassa sugatassa, atigambhīrā atisayena agādhā iti.
anya-e0812n0:1959_2: Sadisatābhedamāha “sāgaro”iccādinā. Sāgaro añjanasaṅkāso añjanena tulyo, kaṇhoti
anya-e0812n0:1959_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Jino tu cāmīkarassa suvaṇṇasseva juti sobhā asseti cāmīkarajjuti. Vācce
anya-e0812n0:1959_4: sadisatte ubhayabyatirekoyaṃ ubhayattha vattamānena guṇena ubhinnamupamānopameyyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1960_0: 246. “Mahā”iccādi. Sāgaro sugatopi cāti ime dve mahāsattā kamena timitimiṅgalādimahāsattā
anya-e0812n0:1960_2: atigambhīrā avagāhitumasakkuṇeyyattā ca, ajjhāsayagambhīrattā ca dvepi atigambhīrā
anya-e0812n0:1960_3: honti. Tesu sāgaro añjanasaṅkāso, jino cāmīkarajjuti suvaṇṇasadisakantiyutto hoti.
anya-e0812n0:1960_4: Ettha pubbaddhena dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ sadisattaṃ vatvā aparaddhena tadubhayavatthugatavisesena
anya-e0812n0:1960_5: tesaṃ dvinnamaññamaññato visesitattā sadisatte saddena vattabbe sati ayaṃ ubhayabyatireko
anya-e0812n0:1960_6: nāma. Mahantā sattā macchakacchapādayo yattha sāgareti vā, mahantaṃ sattaṃ samānabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:1960_7: yassa sugatassāti vā, atisayena gambhīrāti ca, añjanena saṅkāso sadisoti ca, cāmīkarassa
anya-e0812n0:1965_0: 247. “Ni”ccādi. Migassa locanaṃ santāpaṃ kilesapariḷāhaṃ apahanati hiṃsatīti santāpāpahaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1965_1: na bhavati. Neva icchitaṃ saggamokkhasampattiṃ dadātīti nevicchitadaṃ. Muninda tava
anya-e0812n0:1965_2: nayanānaṃ dvandaṃ yugaḷaṃ tu tehi yathāvuttehi santāpāpahattaicchitadattaguṇehi bhūsitamalaṅkataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1965_3: Ettha pana migalocananayanānaṃ dīghattādinā sadisattaṃ patīyate. Gamme sadisatte
anya-e0812n0:1966_1: na hoti. Icchitadaṃ lokehi patthitalokiyalokuttaratthānaṃ dāyakaṃ na hoti. He muninda
anya-e0812n0:1966_2: tava nayanadvandaṃ pana tagguṇabhūsitaṃ janasantāpāpahānādiyathāvuttaguṇehi sobhitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1966_5: jinanayanānaṃ visuṃ katattā sadisatte gammamāne ayamekabyatireko nāma. Santāpaṃ apahanati
anya-e0812n0:1966_6: hiṃ satīti ca, icchitaṃ dadātīti ca, te ca te guṇā cāti ca, tehi bhūsitanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1971_0: 248. “Muninda”iccādi. Munindānanaṃ ambhojañceti yāni vatthūni kantādinā patīyamānattā
anya-e0812n0:1971_1: sadisatthāni, esaṃ nānattaṃ bhedo īdisaṃ. Kathaṃ? Vadanaṃ suvuttāmataṃ saddhammāmataṃ
anya-e0812n0:1971_2: sandadātīti suvuttāmatasandāyi, ambujaṃ tu nedisanti. Iminā bhedena imesaṃ visadisattā
anya-e0812n0:1971_3: “esa”ntyādināhu. Patīyamānena sadisānīti gamme sadisatte ubhayabyatirekoyaṃ vuttanayeneti.
anya-e0812n0:1972_0: 248. “Muninda”iccādi. Munindānanaṃ ambhojañceti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ nānattaṃ īdisaṃ. Kathanti
anya-e0812n0:1972_1: ce? Esaṃ dvinnaṃ vadanaṃ suvuttāmatasandāyi suṭṭhu vuttattā suvuttasaṅkhātassa saddhammāmatassa
anya-e0812n0:1972_2: dāyakaṃ hoti, ambujaṃ tu edisaṃ na īdisaṃ na hoti, tādisaṃ dhammāmataṃ na dadātīti
anya-e0812n0:1972_3: adhippāyo. “Esaṃ nānattamīdisa”nti vacanena sugandhakantimattādīhi guṇehi dvinnampi
anya-e0812n0:1972_4: bhedo natthīti gammamānattā taṃ pakāsetvā aparaddhena vadanato ambujassa, ambujato
anya-e0812n0:1972_5: vadanassa visuṃ katattā sadisatte gammamāne ayamubhayabyatireko nāma. Nānā anekappakārānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1972_6: bhāvoti ca, sādhu vuttamiti ca, tameva amatanti ca, taṃ sammā deti sīlenāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1976_0: 249. Vibhāvanaṃ sambhāveti “pasiddha”miccādinā. Yattha alaṅkatiyaṃ pasiddhaṃ lokappatītaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1976_1: kāraṇaṃ kiñci nivattetvā nirasya aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ pasiddhakāraṇato aññaṃ nimittaṃ vibhābyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1976_2: avagamyate. Yattha kāraṇantaraṃ natthi, tattha kā gatīti āha “sābhāvikatta”ntiādi.
anya-e0812n0:1976_3: Atha vā pakkhantare, sābhāvikaṃ sābhāvikattaṃ (ka.) dhammatāsiddhaṃ, tassa bhāvo
anya-e0812n0:1976_4: sābhāvikattaṃ vibhābyaṃ, sā tādisī vibhāvanā viññeyyā, vibhāvīyate pakāsīyate kāraṇantaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:1976_5: sābhāvikattaṃ vā etāyāti, etissanti vā katvā.
anya-e0812n0:1977_0: 249. Idāni vibhāvanaṃ dasseti “pasiddha”miccādinā. Yattha alaṅkāre pasiddhaṃ lokappatītaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1977_1: kāraṇaṃ taṃtaṃguṇasādhanahetuṃ nivattetvā paṭisedhetvā aññakāraṇaṃ lokappasiddhakāraṇato
anya-e0812n0:1977_2: aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ, atha vā no ce pasiddhakāraṇato aññakāraṇe labbhamāne sābhāvikattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1977_3: dhammatāsiddhaguṇaṃ vibhābyaṃ pakāsanīyaṃ hoti, sā vibhāvanā nāma hoti, kāraṇantaravibhāvanā
anya-e0812n0:1977_4: sābhāvikavibhāvanāti duvidhā hotīti adhippāyo. Aññañca taṃ kāraṇañceti ca, sassa
anya-e0812n0:1977_5: attano bhāvoti ca, tena sambhūtamiti ca, tassa bhāvoti ca, vibhāvīyati aññakāraṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1977_6: sābhāvikattaṃ vā etāya vibhāvanāya, etissaṃ vibhāvanāyanti ca vāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:1982_0: 250. Udāharati “anañjita”iccādi. Jina tava nettañca anañjitaṃ añjanasalākāya yavataṭṭhīnamaphuṭṭhameva
anya-e0812n0:1982_1: asitaṃ kaṇhaṃ, adharo ca anañjitoyeva lākhārāgādinā aruṇo ratto, ayaṃ bhamu ca anāvañchitā
anya-e0812n0:1982_2: ussāhena yena kenaci anāmitā samānā samānatā suṭṭhu ānatā, tato sabbaṃ lokiyaṃ taveti.
anya-e0812n0:1983_0: 250. Idāni udāharati “anañji”ccādinā. He jina tava nettaṃ pakatimadhuraṃ nayanayugaḷañca
anya-e0812n0:1983_1: anañjitaṃ vilocanānaṃ kaṇhattasādhanatthaṃ lokappasiddhaañjanehi anañjitaṃ samānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1983_2: asitaṃ bhavantarasiddhena kusalakammena nīlaṃ hoti, adharo ca arañjito kenaci rāgena
anya-e0812n0:1983_3: arañjito samāno aruṇo rattohoti, ayaṃ bhamu ca anāvañchitā kenaci vāyāmena anāmitā
anya-e0812n0:1983_4: samānā samānatā suṭṭhu ānatā hotīti. Ettha nayanaadharabhamūnaṃ kaṇharattakuṭilaguṇasādhane
anya-e0812n0:1983_5: lokappasiddhāni añjanāni kāraṇāni paṭisedhetvā nettādīnaṃ asitādibhāvakathaneneva
anya-e0812n0:1983_6: kāraṇavinimuttassa kāriyassa loke avijjamānattā atthappakaraṇādinā asitādibhāvassa
anya-e0812n0:1983_7: kāraṇaṃ nāma pubbajātiyaṃ siddhakusalakammamevāti patīyamānattā ayaṃ kāraṇantaravibhāvanā
anya-e0812n0:1983_8: nāma. Na añjitanti ca, na rañjitoti ca, na āvañchitoti ca vākyaṃ. Nasaddo pasajjapaṭisedhe
anya-e0812n0:1990_0: 251. “Na hoti”ccādi. Dujjanehi saha saṅgame samāgame satyapi sādhujantūnaṃ sappurisānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1990_1: sabhāvena tādisena payogena vināva nimmalatare atisayena nimmale cetasi dujjanyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1990_2: sujanetarabhāvo na hoti tādisātisayasādhuttasamāyogatoti. Iha kiñcāpi sabhāvasaddena
anya-e0812n0:1990_4: Tathāpi loko tamanapekkhamāno, pasiddhañca kāraṇaṃ tādisamapassanto sābhāvikaṃ phalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1990_5: voharati, tadanusārena ca sābhāvikaṃ phalaṃ vibhābyateti, ayaṃ sābhāvikaphalavibhāvanā.
anya-e0812n0:1991_0: 251. “Na hoti”ccādi. Dujjanasaṅgame api dujjanehi saha vāse satipi sādhujantūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1991_1: sabhāvanimmalatare kiñci payogaṃ vinā pakatiyā eva atinimmale cetasi dujjanyaṃ dujjanaguṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1991_2: khalu ekantena na hotīti. Iha cittanimmalahetubhūtānaṃ yonisomanasikārādīnaṃ vijjamānattepi
anya-e0812n0:1991_3: lokena taṃ kāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā aññampi pasiddhakāraṇaṃ cittanimmalakāraṇamadisvā
anya-e0812n0:1991_5: sabbākārena kāraṇaṃ paṭisedhaṃ katvā sabhāvasiddhanimmalattasaṅkhātaphalassa pakāsitattā
anya-e0812n0:1991_6: ayaṃ sābhāvikaphalavibhāvanā nāma. Dujjanānaṃ bhāvoti ca, sassa attano bhāvoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:1997_1: kārako ñāpako vijjamānasseva kassaci sambandhato kutoci paṭibodhako cāti hetavo duvidhā
anya-e0812n0:1997_2: siyuṃ. Nanu kimettha asanaṃ bhūsanaṃ (?), kevalaṃ “anenetaṃ karīyatī”ti sarūpakathanamatta,
anya-e0812n0:1997_3: na tu (?) viseso tu na na tu (?) koci visesarūpo vācālaṅkāroti visesaṃ yojayati “paṭī”tiādinā.
anya-e0812n0:1997_4: Tesaṃ kāriyuppādayogīnaṃ hetūnaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ upabrūhanaṃ visiṭṭhabhāvena pariphuṭaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1997_5: katvā yāthāvato kathanaṃ alaṅkāratāya bandhabhūsanarūpena uditaṃ abhihitaṃ visesarūpattā,
anya-e0812n0:1998_0: 252. Idāni hetvālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “janako”ccādinā. Janako ca kassaci “sattā asattā”ti
anya-e0812n0:1998_1: vuttassa bhāvābhāvasaṅkhātakāriyassa janakahetu ca ñāpako ca kassaci vijjamānattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1998_2: aññena kenaci sambandhena avabodhento ñāpakahetu cāti evaṃ hetavo duvidhā siyuṃ.
anya-e0812n0:1998_3: Iha phalapakāsakahetumhi vuccamāne “iminā hetunā idaṃ phalaṃ jāta”nti sarūpakathanamattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1998_4: vinā visesarūpālaṅkāro idha natthīti āsaṅkiya alaṅkārasarūpaviseso esoti dassetumaparaddhamāha.
anya-e0812n0:1998_5: Tesaṃ phalapakāsanakhamānaṃ hetūnaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ visiṭṭhabhāvena pakāsaṃ katvā
anya-e0812n0:1998_6: tatvato kathanaṃ alaṅkāratāya alaṅkārasabhāvena uditaṃ pasiddhaṃ hoti, kavīhi patthitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:1998_7: vā hoti. Sāliaṅkurādīnaṃ sālibījādayo viya janyassa accantopakārako janakahetu nāma,
anya-e0812n0:1998_8: vijjamānaaggiādīnaṃ dhūmādayo viya kassaci vijjamānattañāpako ñāpakahetu nāma. Alaṅkārassa
anya-e0812n0:1998_9: bhāvo alaṅkāratā. Alaṅkāratayāti chandaṃ nissāya mattāhāni.
anya-e0812n0:2004_0: 253. Udāharati “bhāva”iccādi. Bhāvo sattā ca, abhāvo asattā ca, teyeva kiccāni tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2004_1: vasena ca, cittā pasiddhahetuviparītā acchariyārahā hetavo tesaṃ vasenāpi ca bhedā
anya-e0812n0:2004_2: hetuvikappā anantā anavaviyo anavadhayo (?), yato evaṃ tasmā tesaṃ hetūnaṃ idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2005_1: ca, cittahetuvasāpi ca pasiddhahetuno viruddhena acchariyahetūnaṃ pabhedena ca, bhedā
anya-e0812n0:2005_2: hetuvisesā anantā yasmā apariyantā honti, tasmā idaṃ vakkhamānaṃ tesaṃ hetūnaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2005_3: avasesahetūnaṃ ogāhaṇadvāramattassa nidassanaṃ hoti. Bhāvo ca abhāvo cāti ca, teyeva
anya-e0812n0:2005_4: kiccānīti ca, tesaṃ vaso bhedoti ca, cittā vicittā ca te hetavo cāti ca, tesaṃ vasoti
anya-e0812n0:2005_5: ca, mukhameva mukhamattaṃ, mukhañca taṃ vā mattaṃ sāmaññañceti ca, tassa nidassanamiti
anya-e0812n0:2005_6: ca vākyaṃ. Mattasaddo avadhāraṇe sāmaññe vā vattate.
anya-e0812n0:2012_1: asahāyakiccaṃ yassā sā tādisī. Sabbesaṃ mano haratīti sabbamanoharā munino ayaṃ desanā
anya-e0812n0:2012_2: me mānasaṃ cittaṃ kāmamekantena tosetīti ayaṃ bhāvakicco kārakahetu santosasattāya kāraṇato.
anya-e0812n0:2013_2: sabbesaṃ manoharā munino ayaṃ desanā me mayhaṃ mānasaṃ kāmaṃ ekantena tosetīti. Buddhassa
anya-e0812n0:2013_3: dhammadesanā pubbe avijjamānassa santosassa sattāsaṅkhātasamuppādaṃ karotīti kārakahetu
anya-e0812n0:2013_4: nāma hoti. Sā ca desanā “mānasaṃ tosetī”ti ettakena adassetvā “paramatthapakāsekarasā”ti
anya-e0812n0:2013_5: savisesanaṃ katvā vuttattā alaṅkāroti abhimatā. Eko ca so raso ceti ca, paramatthapakāsoyeva
anya-e0812n0:2013_6: ekaraso ekakiccamasseti ca viggaho. Bhāvakicco bhāvasaṅkhātaṃ sattākiccaṃ katvā pavatto
anya-e0812n0:2018_0: 255. “Dhīrehi”ccādi. Dhīrehi sappaññehi saha saṃvāsā saṃsaggena ca, saddhammassa
anya-e0812n0:2018_1: sambuddhadesitassa abhiyogato abhyāsena ca, indriyānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ niggahena visayappavattinirodharūpena
anya-e0812n0:2018_2: vijayena ca hetunā dukkhassa pañcakkhandhasaṅkhatassa anuppādanirodhasaṅkhāto upasamo
anya-e0812n0:2018_3: siyā bhaveyyāti ayaṃ abhāvakicco kārakahetu anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātassa abhāvassa kāraṇato.
anya-e0812n0:2019_0: 255. “Dhīrehi”ccādi. Dhīrehi saha saṃvāsā samaggavāsena ca, saddhammassa buddhadesitassa
anya-e0812n0:2019_1: abhiyogato nirantarābhyāsena ca, indriyānaṃ cakkhuādīnaṃ niggahena rūpādiārammaṇesu
anya-e0812n0:2019_2: subhādiggahaṇassa nivāraṇena cāti imehi kāraṇehi dukkhassa khandhāyatanādikassa upasamo
anya-e0812n0:2019_3: anuppādanirodho khandhaparinibbānaṃ vā siyāti. Abhiṇhaso yogoti viggaho. Abhāvakicco
anya-e0812n0:2019_4: dukkhassa upasamasaṅkhātaṃ asattākiccaṃ katvā pavatto kārakahetu avijjamānasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0812n0:2019_5: asattāya uppādanato janakahetu nāma. Abhāvo kiccamasseti ca, kārako ca so hetu cāti
anya-e0812n0:2024_0: 256. “Munindi”ccādi. Munindeti āmantanaṃ. Te tava candasaṃvādinā candasadisena kantabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:2024_1: upasobhinā sobhamānena mukheneva pāpehi rāgādīhi abhinissaṭaṃ byapagataṃ manaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2024_2: subodhaṃ suṭṭhu viññāyatīti ayaṃ bhāvakicco ñāpakahetu avabodhasattāya ñāpanato.
anya-e0812n0:2025_0: 256. “Muninda”iccādi. He muninda te tava candasaṃvādikantabhāvopasobhinā candakantabhāvasadisena
anya-e0812n0:2025_1: kantabhāvena sobhamānena mukhena manaṃ tuyhaṃ cittaṃ pāpābhinissaṭaṃ rāgādīhi kilesehi
anya-e0812n0:2025_2: nikkhantanti subodhaṃ suṭṭhu viññāyatīti. Iha mukhaṃ manakantabhāvasambandhena samannāgataṃ
anya-e0812n0:2025_3: sayaṃ vijjamānameva kilesāpagamassa avabodhasattaṃ ñāpetīti bhāvakicco ñāpakahetu
anya-e0812n0:2025_4: nāma jāto. Candena abhedopacārato candalāvaṇyena saṃvādī sadisoti ca, so ca so kantabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2025_5: ceti ca, tena upasobhitoti ca, pāpehi abhinissaṭanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2030_0: 257. “Sādhu”iccādi. Muninda te caraṇānaṃ dvandassa rāgo bālo ca so ātapo ceti rāgabālātapo
anya-e0812n0:2030_1: taruṇakiraṇasamūho lohitattādinā sādhūnaṃ hatthāravindāni kantādinā phusaṃ visārittenā’masanto
anya-e0812n0:2030_2: kathaṃ saṅkocayati makulayati, añjalipaṇāmabandhena ayuttametaṃ. Bālātapo hi padumānamummīlanahetu,
anya-e0812n0:2030_3: ayaṃ tu apubbo bālātapo yo padumāni nimīletīti anucitakāriyakāraṇā ayuttakārī cittahetu,
anya-e0812n0:2031_0: 257. “Sādhu”iccādi. He muninda te tava caraṇadvandarāgabālātapo pādayugaḷassa aruṇavaṇṇasaṅkhataabhinavasūriyakiraṇo
anya-e0812n0:2031_1: sādhuhatthāravindāni sujanānaṃ karapadumāni phusaṃ attano sabbabyāpittā phusanto
anya-e0812n0:2031_2: kathaṃ saṅkocayati karasampuṭarūpena makulayatīti. Bālātapo nāma padumavikasanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2031_3: vinā saṅkocanaṃ na karoti, eso ātapo acchariyo vicittoti gamyamānattā ayuttasaṅkocasattākaraṇato
anya-e0812n0:2031_4: ayaṃ ayuttakārī cittahetu nāma. Ayuttaṃ karotīti ca, cittañca taṃ hetu cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2036_0: 258. “Saṅkocayanti”ccādi. Munindassa pādānaṃ dvande nakhā eva candā kantādinā tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2036_1: aṃsavo kiraṇā iha loke jantūnaṃ sattānaṃ pāṇayo eva paṅkeruhāni kantādinā saṅkocayanti
anya-e0812n0:2036_2: paṇāmakaraṇasampuṭarūpena milīyantīti milāyayantīti (?) yuttakārī cittahetu candato
anya-e0812n0:2037_1: candānaṃ aṃsavo raṃsayo iha loke jantūnaṃ pāṇipaṅkeruhāni saṅkocayanti karasampuṭākārena
anya-e0812n0:2037_2: saṅkocayanti makulaṃ karontīti. Candakiraṇehi kattabbāya eva padumasaṅkocasattāya
anya-e0812n0:2037_4: katattā ca ayaṃ yuttakārī cittahetu nāma. Pāṇayo ca te paṅkeruhāni ceti ca, munindassa
anya-e0812n0:2037_5: caraṇadvandamiti ca, tasmiṃ nakhānīti ca, teva candāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2041_0: 259. Kamaṃ vivaritumupakkamati “uddiṭṭhāna”miccādi. Uddiṭṭhānaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ padatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2041_1: vatthūnaṃ kesañci yathākkamaṃ uddesakkamānatikkamena anuddeso puna atthantaraniddesanayena
anya-e0812n0:2041_3: vuttaṃ. Vidheyyattā tesaṃ padhānattamiti tadapekkhāya napuṃsakattaṃ, anuvaditabbattānuddesassāppadhānattamiti
anya-e0812n0:2042_1: padatthānaṃ yathākkamaṃ uddiṭṭhakkamamanatikkamma anuddeso atthantaraṃ nissāya punakathanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2042_2: “saṅkhyāna”miti ca, “yathāsaṅkhya”miti ca niddiṭṭhaṃ, kamopi ca niddiṭṭho. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:2042_3: pasiddhaṃ anuddesaṃ pubbaddhena anuvaditvā appasiddhaṃ kamampi kamapariyāyaṃ saṅkhyānayathāsaṅkhyadvayampi
anya-e0812n0:2042_4: aparaddhena vidadhāti. Ettha vidhātabbaṃ dassetuṃ anuvādassa āhariyamānattā anuvādo
anya-e0812n0:2042_5: appadhāno, vidhātabbo padhāno. Yañhi vidhātabbaṃ, taṃ padhānaṃ, itaramappadhānanti
anya-e0812n0:2042_6: iminā kāraṇena vuccati. Tasmā “niddiṭṭha”nti “saṅkhyānaṃ, yathāsaṅkhya”nti dvayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2042_7: apekkhāya (tassa appadhānattā) idaṃ padadvayaṃ sīhaḷabyākhyāyaṃ na dissati napuṃsakaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2042_8: hoti. “Kamo”ti apekkhāya “niddiṭṭho”ti pulliṅgo hoti. Appadhāno anuddesoti nāpekkhati.
anya-e0812n0:2042_9: Kamamanatikkammāti ca, saṅkhyāya anabhikkamoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2046_0: 260. Tamudāharati “ālāpi”ccādinā. Muninda tava ālāpahāsā ca tesaṃ līlāhi, uddesoyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2046_1: Vijayā kokilakumudānaṃ parābhavena kokilā karavīkā kumudāni ca, yathoddesamanuddesoyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2046_2: vuttāpekkhāya. Vakkhamānāpekkhāya tu ayampi uddesova, “kokilā vanaṃ, kumudāni jala”miti
anya-e0812n0:2046_3: yathoddesamanuddesoyaṃ. Upasevante iva nissayanti maññe. Iti vatthuto eva sambhavo
anya-e0812n0:2046_4: iveti parikappate. Yajjevaṃ parikappanāya kathaṃ yathāsaṅkhyanti ce? Atroccate –
anya-e0812n0:2046_6: voharīyate tasseva mukhyato vattumicchitattā. Yatthālaṅkārantaraṃ na gamyate, tattha
anya-e0812n0:2047_0: 260. Udāharati “ālāpi”ccādinā. He muninda te tava ālāpahāsalīlāhi madhurasaralīlāhi
anya-e0812n0:2047_1: saddhiṃ mandahasitalīlāhi sañjātā vijayā jayahetu kokilā karavīkā ca kumudāni keravāni
anya-e0812n0:2047_2: ca vanaṃ jalañca kamena upasevante iva nissayaṃ karontīti maññeti. Ettha “ālāpahāsalīlāhī”ti
anya-e0812n0:2047_3: uddeso, “kokilā kumudānī”ti vuttāpekkhāya anuddeso, “vanaṃ jala”nti vakkhamānāpekkhāya
anya-e0812n0:2047_4: uddesova hoti, tatvato īdisavijayena kokilādīnaṃ vanādinissayakāraṇābhāvato ivasaddapayogena
anya-e0812n0:2047_5: niddiṭṭho. Evaṃ sati ayaṃ parikappanā na bhavati. Kasmā? Nānālaṅkārasannipāte sati
anya-e0812n0:2047_6: yo yo alaṅkāro vattunā icchito, tasseva mukhyato voharīyamānattā. Evaṃ parikappanālaṅkārasaṃsagge
anya-e0812n0:2047_7: satipi uddesakkamena dassitassa anuddesassa mukhyattā ayaṃ kamālaṅkāro nāma. Īdisaññampi
anya-e0812n0:2047_8: evameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ālāpo ca hāso ceti ca, tesaṃ līlāyoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2051: 261. Piyataramāharati “siyā”iccādinā. Atisayena piyassa kassaci attharūpassa abhidheyyasabhāvassa yaṃ paṭipādanamākhyānaṃ hoti, etaṃ piyataraṃ nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n0:2052_0: 261. Idāni piyatarālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “siyā”iccādinā, atisayena piyassa kassaci attharūpassa
anya-e0812n0:2052_1: abhidheyyasabhāvassa yaṃ paṭipādanaṃ kathanaṃ hoti, etaṃ paṭipādanaṃ piyataraṃ nāma
anya-e0812n0:2052_2: piyatarālaṅkāro nāma hoti. Atisayena piyanti ca, attho eva rūpaṃ sabhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2054: Pīti yā me samuppannā, santa sandassanā tava;
anya-e0812n0:2055: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, taveva puna dassanā.
anya-e0812n0:2056_0: 262. Udāharati “pīti”ccādi. Santa sappurisa mahāmuni tava sandassanā cakkhupathāpāthamattena
anya-e0812n0:2056_1: madhurakathāsavanā yā pīti me mama samuppannā, ayaṃ pīti kālena īdisena sukhena sukhaṇane
anya-e0812n0:2056_2: (?) taveva nāññassa kassaci, ko hi nāmoñño tavādisoti, puna dassanā bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0812n0:2057_0: 262. “Pīti”ccādi. He santa sappurisa tathāgata tava sandassanā mama nette āpāthagamanato
anya-e0812n0:2057_1: yā pīti me samuppannā, ayaṃ pīti kālena īdisakkhaṇena tayā sadisassa aññassābhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2057_2: taveva puna dassanā dassanato bhaveti. Ettha pītiyā’tisayahetubhūtaṃ atiiṭṭhārammaṇañca
anya-e0812n0:2057_3: dassane atigedhañca pakāsanena atipītīti padatthaṃ atipiyaṃ pībhipadatthaṃ (ka.),
anya-e0812n0:2057_4: pakāsitaṃ hoti. “Ayaṃ pīti bhave”ti pubbakāle uppannapītiyā punāsambhavato taṃsadisāyeva
anya-e0812n0:2057_5: pīti gahitā yathā “soyeva vaṭṭako vaddhako, tāniyeva osadhānī”ti.
anya-e0812n0:2061_1: manasi nihitassa vatthuno atthassa vutyā kathanena ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇā samāsavutti
anya-e0812n0:2061_2: nāma. Kasmā? Atthassa vattumicchitassa saṅkhepo saṅkhipitvā kathanaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:2061_3: tasmā tatoyamanvatthasaññā saṅkhepavutti samāsavuttīti katvā. Kasmā? Ayaṃ guṇībhūtā
anya-e0812n0:2061_4: sakatthā atthantaraṃ vidadhāti, na tu sakatthapadhānā.
anya-e0812n0:2062_0: 263. Idāni samāsavuttiṃ niddisati “vaṇṇite”ccādinā. Vaṇṇitena pasaṃsitena upamānena
anya-e0812n0:2062_1: upamānavatthunā karaṇabhūtena adhippetavatthuno icchitatthassa vutyā kathanena atthasaṅkheparūpato
anya-e0812n0:2062_2: vattumicchitatthassa saṅgaharūpattā ayaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇā samāsavutti nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2062_3: Ettha vattumicchitatthaṃ saṅgahetvā manasi katvā tassa upamābhūtatthassa vaṇṇanāya
anya-e0812n0:2062_4: manasi katassa pakāsanato ayaṃ samāsavutti nāma. Etissā padābhihito sakattho appadhāno,
anya-e0812n0:2062_5: gammamānattho pana padhāno hoti. Adhippetañca taṃ vatthu ceti ca, samāsena saṅkhepena
anya-e0812n0:2062_6: vutti kathanamiti ca, saṅkhepoyeva rūpaṃ sarūpanti ca, atthassa saṅkheparūpanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2066_0: 264. Tassā pabhedaṃ dasseti “sāya”miccādinā. Sā ayaṃ samāsavutti yaṃkiñci vatthu
anya-e0812n0:2066_1: sāmaññākārappatītaṃ “īdisamidaṃ nāññathā”ti kutoci byavacchijjate kenaci guṇādinā
anya-e0812n0:2066_2: vavatthāpīyate, taṃ visesyaṃ, tameva mattaṃ visesanabhedabyavacchedato, tena. Bhinnā
anya-e0812n0:2066_3: atulyā avayavadhammassa samudāye vattanato. Abhinnaṃ tulyākāraṃ visesanaṃ yassaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2066_4: sā abhinnavisesanāpi attheva. Aparāpyatthi, na kevalaṃ sāyeva. Kīdisī? Bhinnañca
anya-e0812n0:2066_5: abhinnañca visesanaṃ yassanti bhinnābhinnavisesanā. Visesyaṃ tu bhinnanti.
anya-e0812n0:2067_0: 264. Idāni tassā samāsavuttiyā bhedaṃ dasseti “sāya”miccādinā. Sā ayaṃ samāsavutti
anya-e0812n0:2067_1: visesyamattena guṇādisadisadhammena karaṇabhūtena kenaci upamānavatthunā manasi kataṃ
anya-e0812n0:2067_2: “idaṃ upameyyavatthu īdisa”nti sāmaññāvatthato visuṃ katavisesyena bhinnā visuṃ jātā,
anya-e0812n0:2067_3: tattakena atulyā vā, abhinnavisesanā tulyavisesanayuttā attheva bhinnābhinnavisesanā
anya-e0812n0:2067_4: atulyatulyavisesanayuttā bhinnavisesyayuttā aparāpi atthi. Evaṃ samāsavutti dvidhā
anya-e0812n0:2067_5: hoti. Visesyameva mattamiti ca, avayavena sambhavabhedasabhāvassa samudāyepi pavattattā
anya-e0812n0:2067_6: bhinnāti vuttā. Abhinnāni visesanāni yassamiti ca, bhinnāni ca abhinnāni ceti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2074_1: hetunā mayā āpādito patto, kīdiso? Visuddhaṃ lokavohārato devāsurānaṃ mathane visenāsammissattā
anya-e0812n0:2074_2: amataṃ pīyūsaṃ sandadātīti visuddhāmatasandāyī, ambhodhi. Visuddhaṃ dosalesenāpyasamphuṭṭhattā
anya-e0812n0:2074_3: accantanimmalaṃ amataṃ maraṇābhāvena amatasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ sandadāti upadesakabhāvenāti
anya-e0812n0:2074_4: visuddhāmatasandāyī, saddhammo. Pasatthāni niravajjattā ratanāni muttāmaṇiādīni,
anya-e0812n0:2074_5: tesaṃ ālayo pavattiṭṭhānaṃ, ambhodhi. Pasatthāni buddhādīhi anekadhā, vaṇṇitāni ratanāni
anya-e0812n0:2074_6: sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhatāni, tesaṃ ālayo, saddhammo. Gambhīro ca agādhattā
anya-e0812n0:2074_7: sāgaro saddhammo ca ayamāpāditoti pakataṃ. Ayaṃ visesyamattabhinnā abhinnavisesanā
anya-e0812n0:2074_8: visesyassa ambhodhino vivacchitā saddhammā bhinnattā, visuddhāmatasandāyittādino
anya-e0812n0:2075_2: buddhiyaṃ vattamānassa saddhammassa pakāsanato visuddhāmatasandāyī kāmāmisādidosalavenāpi
anya-e0812n0:2075_3: amissitattā atinimmalaṃ jarāmaraṇarahitaṃ nibbānaṃ upadesadānena veneyyānaṃ dāyako,
anya-e0812n0:2075_4: pasattharatanālayo niddosattā pasatthānaṃ muttāmaṇiādīnaṃ ratanānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhūto
anya-e0812n0:2075_5: samuddapakkhe, saddhammapakkhe pana pasattharatanālayo buddhādīhi pasatthānaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhataratanānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2075_6: pavattidesabhūto, gambhīro pakatiyāyeva agādho, ekattanayādicatubbidhanayehi gambhīro
anya-e0812n0:2075_7: ayaṃ ambhodhi ca eso samuddo ca, cittena gahitasaddhammo ca puññena bhavantaropacitakusalakammena
anya-e0812n0:2075_8: mayā āpādito pattoti visesyabhūtassa ambhodhino vattumicchitasaddhammato bhinnattā
anya-e0812n0:2075_10: abhinnattā ca ayaṃ samāsavutti visesyamattena bhinnā abhinnavisesanā hoti.
