anya-e0812n0:2082_1: kīdiso? Icchitaṃ lokiyaṃ yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ padadātīti icchitatthapado, kapparukkho.
anya-e0812n0:2082_2: Icchitaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ padadātīti icchitatthapado, jino. Sāro
anya-e0812n0:2082_3: seṭṭho, kapparukkho jino ca. Phalāni pupphāni, tehi upasobhito, kapparukkho. Saha
anya-e0812n0:2082_4: chāyāya candasūriyālokavilomarūpāya vattate sacchāyo, kapparukkho. Jino tu pubbe
anya-e0812n0:2082_5: vuttāya kāyakantādirūpāya chāyāya yuttoti sacchāyoti. Ayaṃ visesyamattabhinnā bhinnābhinnavisesanā
anya-e0812n0:2082_6: jinato visesyassa kapparukkhassa bhinnattā, phalapupphopasobhitatthassa kapparukkheyeva
anya-e0812n0:2082_7: sambhavā, icchitatthapadatthassa sāratāya sacchāyatāya ubhayattheva bhāvato vuttavidhināti.
anya-e0812n0:2083_1: dāyako kapparukkhavaṇṇanāya citte patiṭṭhitassa jinapadatthassa kathetukāmatāya icchitatthapado
anya-e0812n0:2083_2: sattehi patthitānaṃ lokiyalokuttarānaṃ sakalatthānaṃ anurūpavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2083_3: dāyako, sāro rukkhesu īdisarukkhassābhāvato uttamo, sāro sadevakādisattalokesu tādisasattavisesābhāvato
anya-e0812n0:2083_4: uttamo, phalapupphopasobhito kappaddumānurūpaphalehi pupphehi ca upasobhito, sacchāyo
anya-e0812n0:2083_6: samannāgato, apubbo pubbe asañjāto ayaṃ kapparukkho eso paccakkho kappapādapo samuṭṭhito
anya-e0812n0:2083_7: sattānaṃ puññānubhāvena loke pātubhūtoti. Vattumicchitatthajinapadatthato visesyassa
anya-e0812n0:2083_9: ubhayasādhāraṇattā ca, phalapupphopasobhitatāya rukkhasseva visesanattā ca ayaṃ samāsavutti
anya-e0812n0:2083_10: visesyabhinnāva bhinnābhinnavisesanā hoti. Icchito ca so attho ceti ca, taṃ padadātīti
anya-e0812n0:2083_11: ca, phalapupphehi upasobhitoti ca, saha chāyāya vattamānoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2089_1: sāgaraguṇasadisattā sāgararūpena uditoti sambandho, kittitoti attho. Jino rukkhattena
anya-e0812n0:2089_2: yathāvuttanayena udito taṃ patto anupekkhitassa kakkhavuttiyā ambhodhiādisaddānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2089_3: Pakaraṇādinā tu tathā patītyudayo, aññathā kathaṃ ambhodhiādisaddānaṃ dhammādisacchāyakattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2089_4: siyā. Bhedo tu ayaṃ pubbatra “visuddhāmatasandāyi”ccādike sabbe ye keci tatropāttā
anya-e0812n0:2089_5: visuddhāmatasandāyittādayo sādhāraṇā tulyā dhammā visesanāni ubhayatrāpi sambhavā,
anya-e0812n0:2089_6: aññatra tu anantaravutta “icchitatthapado”iccādo pana tayaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dvayaṃ sādhāraṇañca
anya-e0812n0:2090_0: 267. Idāni tehi dvīhi samāsavuttehi vuttatthadvayaṃ pakāseti “sāgari”ccādinā. Sāgarattena
anya-e0812n0:2090_1: sāgararūpena saddhammo sammāsambuddhena desitapariyattisaddhammo udito kathito, rukkhattena
anya-e0812n0:2090_2: jino udito. Sāgarakapparukkhādisaddā attano abhidheyyabhūtasāgararukkhādike atthe
anya-e0812n0:2090_5: mukhyabhāvena pavattantīti adhippāyo. Tathā hi yadi ete mukhyatthena na pavattanti,
anya-e0812n0:2090_6: ambhodhikapparukkhasaddā saddhammajinapadatthe kathaṃ pakāsentīti tesu dvīsu udāharaṇesu
anya-e0812n0:2090_8: sabbe visesanadhammā sādhāraṇā ambhodhisaddhammānaṃ samānā, aññatra tu “icchitatthapado”tiādike
anya-e0812n0:2090_9: aññasmiṃ udāharaṇe pana tayaṃ “icchitatthapado, sāro, sacchāyo”ti visesanattayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2090_11: Tathā hi iminā rukkhadhammabhūto koci viseso pakāsito na hotīti visesanattaṃ aññesuyeva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2094_0: 268. Parikappanaṃ parikappeti “vatthuno”ccādinā. Vatthuno sajīvassa nijjīvassa vā
anya-e0812n0:2094_1: vutti avatthā aññappakārena vattumicchitappakārāpekkhāya aññeneva rūpena ṭhitā, tasseva
anya-e0812n0:2094_2: tato yathāvaṭṭhitappakārato aññathā aññena pakārena parikappīyate yattha vuttiyaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2094_3: sā parikappanā hoti, parikappīyate aññathā karīyate vatthuṭṭhiti etissanti katvā.
anya-e0812n0:2095_0: 268. Idāni parikappanaṃ dasseti “vatthuno”iccādinā. Vatthuno yassa kassaci saviññāṇakaaviññāṇakapadatthassa
anya-e0812n0:2095_1: vutti pavatti aññappakārena kappanīyappakārato aññena vijjamānappakārena ṭhitā pavattamānā,
anya-e0812n0:2095_2: tadaññathā tato vijjamānappakārato aññenāvijjamānappakārena yattha vuttiyaṃ parikappīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2095_3: sā parikappanā nāma hoti. Parikappīyate aññathā karīyate vatthuṭṭhiti etissamiti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2099: 269. Bhedaṃ tassā dasseti “upamā”iccādinā. Upamā abbhantare yassā, tassā bhāvo, tena ca, kiriyādivasena ca vividhā nānappakārā parikappanā idāni kamena udāharissāmi.
anya-e0812n0:2100_0: 269. Idāni tassa bhedaṃ dasseti “upamābbhantare”ccādinā. Upamābbhantarattena upamāya
anya-e0812n0:2100_1: abbhantare vijjamānattā ca kiriyādivasena ca vividhā parikappanā kamena udāharissāmi.
anya-e0812n0:2100_2: Upamā abbhantare assā parikappanāyeti ca, tassā bhāvoti ca, aneke vidhā pakārā yāsamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2107_1: bodhimūle katābhilāsavināsena āturā dukkhitā atiniccalasabhāvappattā atiniccalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2107_2: nāsikagge nayane katānatāvasena accantamakriyamāsīnā nisinnā tā accharā yoginisaṅkāsā
anya-e0812n0:2107_4: (ka.) vatthūnaṃ vutti vuttā, sāyamaññathā parikappīyate. Dhīraṃ devaṅganānampi siṅgārabhāvopacaritavilāsātisayenāpi
anya-e0812n0:2107_5: akampattā. Taṃ bhagavantaṃ. Yogo mantānuṭṭhānaṃ, tattha abhiyogato yuñjanena vasamattano
anya-e0812n0:2107_6: āyattabhāvaṃ tadā nentīva vahanti maññeti. Ettha iva saddasutiyā upamāsandeho na
anya-e0812n0:2107_7: kātabbo, savasānayanamakubbantiyo māraṅganā vasaṃ nentīvāti parikappīyante. Hoti ca–
anya-e0812n0:2110_0: Kriyāparikappattepi ayamupamābbhantarā parikappanā, na kevalakriyāparikappanā māraṅganānamacalopavesanassa
anya-e0812n0:2110_1: yogābhiyogena sāmyasandassanato, tathābhūtāya copavesanakriyāya dhīrassāpi tādisassa
anya-e0812n0:2111_1: bhagavantaṃ “palobhessāmā”ti māraṅganā attanāyeva katāya icchāya anibbattiyā pīḷitā,
anya-e0812n0:2111_2: atiniccalaṃ hutvā nāsikagge patitadiṭṭhehi samannāgatānaññavuttiyā kriyantaravirahato.
anya-e0812n0:2111_3: Āsīnā jhāyamānā nisinnā tā accharā yoginisadisā taṇhāaratiragāsaṅkhātā māraṅganāyo
anya-e0812n0:2111_4: dhīraṃ siṅgārādhippāyena katānekalīlāvilāsenāpi akampamānaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ yogābhiyogato
anya-e0812n0:2111_5: mantajappanasaṅkhātayoge yuñjanena vasaṃ attano vasaṃ tadā attano parājitakāle nentīva
anya-e0812n0:2111_6: pāpenti maññeti. Ettha pubbaddhena māraṅganāsaṅkhātasajīvapadatthānaṃ vijjamānappakāraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2111_7: dassitaṃ. Puna aparaddhena tesameva avijjamānayogābhiyogena vasīkaraṇaṃ kappitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2111_8: Māraṅganānaṃ niccalanisajjāya yoginīnaṃ mantajjhayanasadisattā māraṅganānaṃ yoginīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2111_9: upamānopameyyattaṃ sāmatthiyā gamyateti esā upamābbhantaraparikappanā nāma. “Nenti
anya-e0812n0:2111_10: ivā”ti payoge katepi kriyāparikappanaṃ na hoteva. Icchāya bhaṅgoti ca, tena āturāti
anya-e0812n0:2111_11: ca, niggataṃ calaṃ calanaṃ asmā āsanasmāti ca, atisayena niccalanti ca, kriyāvisesanaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2112: “Nenti ivā”ti idha ivasaddasutiyā upamājotanatthaṃ ceti saṃsayo na kātabbo, sādhammasaṅkhātaguṇavisesassa sambandhe asati kriyāmattassa upamābhāvato. Vuttaṃ hi–
anya-e0812n0:2115_0: “Vasaṃ nentīva dhīra”nti ettha nayane gamyamāne pāpane upamānatā upamānabhāvo natthi,
anya-e0812n0:2115_1: hi tatheva, kattukriyāya kattusambandhiyā kriyāya upamānopameyyatā upamānabhāvo upameyyabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2120_0: 271. “Gaja”miccādi. Yuddhāya accantamatisayena unnatamuccaṃ gajaṃ hatthiṃ samāruḷho
anya-e0812n0:2120_1: māro vasavattī taṃ jinātīti atthena jinato bhīto palāyituṃ kiñci nilīyanaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2120_2: maggaṃ pathaṃ anvesati nūna maññe. Iti kriyāparikappanā ārohanakriyāya maggamanvesanatthanti parikappitattā.
anya-e0812n0:2121_1: gajaṃ girimekhalaṃ samāruḷho māro jinā bhīto palāyituṃ maggaṃ nibbhayaṃ pathaṃ anvesati
anya-e0812n0:2121_2: nūna gavesati maññe. Yuddhatthaṃ kurumāno gajārohanaṃ maggānvesanatthamiti kavinā
anya-e0812n0:2121_3: parikappitattā esā kriyāparikappanā nāma. Accantamiti asaṅkhya sasaṅkhyabhāvepi pakaraṇato
anya-e0812n0:2126_0: 272. Muninda te cāru ca taṃ rājīvaṃ padumañca tamiva sundaraṃ tasmiṃte pādadvande
anya-e0812n0:2126_1: soṇimā lohitattaguṇo, iti yathāvaṭṭhitā acetanassa lohitattalakkhaṇassa vatthuno
anya-e0812n0:2126_2: vutti vuttā, sāyamaññathā parikappīyate. Pāpānaṃ kilesārīnaṃ abhisammaddena atisayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2126_3: sampisanena jātaṃ soṇaṃ rudhiraṃ, tena jātoti maññe. Iti guṇaparikappanā pādadvandasannihitalohitattaguṇassa
anya-e0812n0:2127_0: 272. “Muninde”ccādi. He muninda te tava cārurājīvasundare manuññapadumasundare pādadvande
anya-e0812n0:2127_1: soṇimā rattavaṇṇaṃ pāpābhisammaddajātasoṇena maññe saparasantānagatapāpānaṃ sammaddanena
anya-e0812n0:2127_2: jātena rudhirenāti maññe. Sabbaññuno pāde bhavantarasiddhapuññakammānubhāvena jātarattavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2127_3: “pāpābhisammaddanenā”ti parikappitattā ayaṃ guṇaparikappanā nāma. Cāru ca taṃ rājīvañcāti
anya-e0812n0:2127_4: ca, pāpānaṃ abhisammaddoti ca, tena jātañcāti ca, tañca taṃ soṇañcāti ca, soṇassa bhāvoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2130: Sā’yaṃ byañjīyate kvāpi, kvāpi vākyena gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:2131_0: 273. Vohāratthaṃ parikappanāsūcake sadde dassento āha “maññe”iccādi. Iti evarūpo
anya-e0812n0:2131_1: saddarāsi ādi yesaṃ “takkemi, parikappemi, cintayāmi, yathe”tyevamādīnaṃ, tehi sāyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2131_2: parikappanā kvāpi yathāvutte byañjīyate pakāsīyate, kvāpi katthaci pana vākyena gamyate
anya-e0812n0:2132_0: 273. Vohārasukhatthaṃ parikappanāpakāsake sadde dasseti “maññe”ccādinā. Maññe, saṅke,
anya-e0812n0:2132_1: dhuvaṃ, nūna, iva, evamādīhi saddehi sāyaṃ parikappanā kvāpi ettha viya katthaci
anya-e0812n0:2132_2: byañjīyate pakāsīyate, kvāpi katthaci vākyena kriyākārakasambandhasahitapadasamudāyena
anya-e0812n0:2132_4: niddiṭṭhaṃ. Iti evaṃ pakāro saddasamudāyo ādi yesaṃ “takkemi, parikappemi, cintayāmi,
anya-e0812n0:2136: Pīṇentā jina te sādhu-janaṃ sarasataṃ nayuṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2137_0: 274. Udāharati “dayā”iccādi. Raso sineho, tena saha vattamāno saraso. Deho. Dayāya
anya-e0812n0:2137_1: karuṇāya sañcāro dukkhitasattavisayā nirantarappavatti, tena saraso, tato. Jina te
anya-e0812n0:2137_2: dehā sarīrato nikkhantakantiyo sādhujanaṃ pīṇentā tappentā tameva janaṃ sarasataṃ
anya-e0812n0:2137_3: sapemataṃ nayuṃ pāpesuṃ, tādisaṃ tathāvidhadehanikkhantakantī naṃ sādhujanaṃ pīṇenti.
anya-e0812n0:2137_4: Gammamānaparikappanāyaṃ yato kantiyo laddhasarasasarīrasaṃsaggā sayampi sarasā iva
anya-e0812n0:2137_5: attānaṃ sevamānampi sādhujanaṃ sarasataṃ nentīti gamyate.
anya-e0812n0:2138_1: dukkhitasattavisayāya karuṇāya savisaye nirantarappavattiyā sañjātasnehato dehā sarīrato
anya-e0812n0:2138_2: nikkhantakantiyo dasadisāsu niggatā nīlādichabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo sādhujanaṃ katapuññaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2138_3: uttamajanaṃ pīṇentā sarasataṃsasnehabhāvaṃ pemasahitattaṃ nayuṃ tameva sādhujanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2138_4: pāpesuṃ. “Sarasataṃ nayu”nti ettha “sādhujana”nti sutasambandhena ñāyati. Karuṇāsinehasommadehasaṃsaggato
anya-e0812n0:2138_5: kantiyo sayampi nissayaguṇato sommabhūtā attānaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattajanepi muduṃ
anya-e0812n0:2138_6: karontevāti ivādīnaṃ abhāvepi vākyagammaparikappanā. Ettha acetanānaṃ kantivatthūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2138_8: Dayāya sañcāro punappunaṃ pavattīti ca, saha rasena snehena vattamānoti ca, dayāsañcārena
anya-e0812n0:2138_9: sarasoti ca, nikkhantā ca tā kantiyo ceti ca, sādhu ca so jano ceti ca, sarasassa bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2140: Ārabhantassa yaṃ kiñci, kattuṃ puññavasā puna;
anya-e0812n0:2142_0: 275. Samāhitaṃ samāharati “ārabhantassi”ccādinā. Yaṃ kiñci kāriyaṃ kattuṃ sattubhaṅgādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2142_1: ārabhantassa sajjībhūtassa yassa kassaci pumuno puññavasā kusalabalena kāraṇena kusalasāmatthiyena
anya-e0812n0:2142_2: puna sādhyate sādhiyamaneneti sādhanaṃ, tato tameva vā antaramaññaṃ, tassa lābho,
anya-e0812n0:2142_3: aññakāraṇalābhoti attho. Taṃ samāhitaṃ vadanti, samādhānaṃ samāhitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2143_0: 275. Idāni samāhitālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “ārabha”miccādinā. Yaṃ kiñci amittavijayādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2143_1: kattuṃ ārabhantassa yassa puññavasā kusalabalena puna yo sādhanantaralābho tasseva
anya-e0812n0:2143_2: kāriyasiddhiyā upakārakassa aññasādhanassa yo lābho atthi, taṃ kāraṇalābhaṃ samāhitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2143_3: vadanti tasseva kāriyassa samādhānattā patiṭṭhitattā samāhitaṃ iti kavino kathenti.
anya-e0812n0:2143_4: Sādhyate sādhiyamaneneti ca, tañca taṃ antaramaññañceti ca, tassa lābhoti ca, samādhānamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2147_0: 276. Udāharati “māra”iccādi. Mārārino mārasattuno bhaṅge abhibhave abhimukhaṃ na
anya-e0812n0:2147_1: parammukhaṃ manaṃ yassa tassa satthuno upakārikā āraddhamārabhaṅgakriyānuggāhikā
anya-e0812n0:2147_2: mahāmahī ayaṃ mahārāvaṃ mārāridussahaṃ mahānādaṃ ravī akāsi. Idha mārāribhañjanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2147_3: kāriyamāraddhaṃ, tassa puññavaseneva mahīrāvo aparaṃ sādhanaṃ samāpannanti lakkhaṇaṃ yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2148_1: tassa satthuno upakārikā āraddhamāravijayassa upatthambhikā ayaṃ mahāmahī mahārāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2148_2: mārassa hadayavatthuṃ maddanto maddantī (?) viya sahitumasakkuṇeyyaṃ mahānādaṃ ravī
anya-e0812n0:2148_3: akāsi. Ettha mārabhaṅgajananaṃ satthūhi āraddhakāriyaṃ, tasseva siddhiyā hetubhūtaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2148_4: aññakāraṇaṃ nāma mahīrāvo. Māro eva ari sattūti ca, tassa bhaṅgoti ca, tasmiṃ abhimukhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2148_5: manaṃ yasseti ca, mahantī ca sā mahī ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2152_0: 277. Pariyāyavuttiṃ paṭipādeti “avatvā”iccādinā. Abhimataṃ kiñci atthaṃ dhanadānādilakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2152_1: avatvā añjasā vācakabyāpārena anākhyāya tassābhimatassatthassa siddhiyā nipphādanatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2152_2: aññathā aññena pakārena tannibbattianuguṇena yaṃ dassanaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ sucibuddhayo
anya-e0812n0:2153_0: 277. Idāni pariyāyavuttiṃ dasseti “avatvā”iccādinā. Abhimataṃ iṭṭhaṃ dhanadānādisarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2153_1: dhanadhaññādiṃ (sīhaḷabyākhyāyaṃ) yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ avatvā ujumakathetvā tassa abhimatatthassa
anya-e0812n0:2153_2: siddhiyā nipphattiyā aññathā vattumicchitatthassānurūpenāññappakārena dassanaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2153_3: kiñci dassanaṃ kathanamatthi, sucibuddhayo pariyāyavuttīti taṃ vadanti. Pariyāyena
anya-e0812n0:2153_4: vutti kathanamiti ca, suci buddhi yesamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2157_0: 278. Udāharati “vivaṭaṅgaṇe”ccādi. Dhanaṃ vivaṭe kenaci anāvaṭattā aṅgaṇe pakāsappadese
anya-e0812n0:2157_1: nikkhittaṃ atha ca pana ārakkhavajjitaṃ. Dhanaṃ kāmetīti dhanakāmāti āmantanaṃ. Tuvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2157_2: yadi icchasi gantuṃ dhanaṃ vā, yathākāmaṃ gaccheti dhanāvaharaṇamicchitamañjasā avatvā
anya-e0812n0:2158_1: nirāvaraṇaṭṭhāne yena kenaci ṭhapitaṃ apica ārakkhavajjitaṃ. Bho dhanakāma tuvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2158_2: yadicchasi dhanaṃ gamanaṃ vā, yathākāmaṃ gacchāti cittenicchitadhanāvaharaṇavidhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2158_3: “dhanamāharā”ti ujumavatvā evaṃ byājena vuttattā idaṃ pariyāyavutti nāma. Vivaṭañca
anya-e0812n0:2158_4: taṃ aṅgaṇañceti ca, tasmiṃ nikkhittanti ca, ārakkhena vajjitamiti ca, dhanaṃ kāmetīti
anya-e0812n0:2158_5: ca, kāmaṃ taṇhaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ vā cittamanatikkammāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2160: Thutiṃ karoti nindanto, viya taṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ;
anya-e0812n0:2162_0: 279. Byājavaṇṇanaṃ vaṇṇeti “thuti”miccādinā. Nindanto viya dosaṃ nidassento viya
anya-e0812n0:2162_1: thutiṃ karoti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, taṃ byājathutilakkhaṇaṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ nāma. Kathamettha
anya-e0812n0:2162_2: guṇā patīyantīti āha “dosi”ccādi. Atra vuttivisese dosā viya ābhāsanti paṭibhanti.
anya-e0812n0:2162_3: Tādisapadādinā dosābhāsā guṇā eva iddhimantatādayo na dosopi koci sannidhimavaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2162_4: yanti. Hīti avadhāraṇe atra byājavaṇṇanamevidaṃ, na nindakamiti.
anya-e0812n0:2163_0: 279. Idāni byājavaṇṇanaṃ dasseti “thuti”ccādinā. Nindanto viya dosaṃ dassento viya
anya-e0812n0:2163_1: thutiṃ karoti vaṇṇanaṃ karoti, taṃ vaṇṇanākaraṇaṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ nāma hoti. Nindāsabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:2163_2: pavattathutittā nindā eveti ce? Atra asmiṃ vuttivisese dosābhāsā dosā viya paṭibhāsamānā
anya-e0812n0:2163_3: guṇā eva tādisapadappayogena iddhimantatādayo guṇāva sannidhiṃ guṇasabhāvāvaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2163_4: yanti pāpuṇantīti. Byājena vaṇṇanamiti ca, dosā iva ābhāsanti paṭibhāsantīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2166: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha, guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2167_0: 280. Udāharati “sañcāletu”miccādinā. Nātha tvaṃ akhilaṃ kuvalayaṃ uppalaṃ pathavīvalayañceti
anya-e0812n0:2167_1: siliṭṭhaṃ sañcāletuṃ bhamayitumito cito ca bhusamaccantaṃ alaṃ samatthopi tāvatā
anya-e0812n0:2167_2: taṃmattena te guṇānaṃ visesaṃ atisayalakkhaṇaṃ kiṃ kena kāraṇena vadāma. Iha uppalacālanasāmatthiyavibhāvanavasena
anya-e0812n0:2167_3: nindati, tāva nikhilabhūmaṇḍalasañcālāvikaraṇato paramāya thutiyā saṃyojitoyaṃ bhagavā
anya-e0812n0:2168_0: 280. Idāni udāharati “sañcāletu”miccādinā. Nātha tvaṃ akhilaṃ kuvalayaṃ nissesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2168_1: nīluppalavanaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ vā sañcāletuṃ kampetuṃ bhusamatisayena alaṃ samattho,
anya-e0812n0:2168_2: tāvatā te guṇānaṃ visesamatisayaṃ kiṃ vadāma kathaṃ bhaṇāmāti. Kuvalayasaddassa uppalavisesavācakattā
anya-e0812n0:2168_3: paṭhamaṃ nindāva, tasseva saddassa pathavīmaṇḍalavācakattā “iddhimato tava idaṃ kiṃ
anya-e0812n0:2168_4: visesa”nti uttamaguṇavaṇṇanā katā hoti. Īdisā byājavaṇṇanā pasatthā, sā ca sabbathā
anya-e0812n0:2168_5: silesaṃ nissāya pavattatīti. Kuyā pathaviyā valayaṃ maṇḍalamiti samāso.
anya-e0812n0:2172_0: 281. Visesavuttiṃ vatteti “visesicchāya”miccādinā. Visese atisaye kismiñcipi kāriyavisese
anya-e0812n0:2172_1: icchāyaṃ dabbādīnaṃ yatra vekallassa abhāvassa dassanaṃ vacanaṃ, ayaṃ viseso nāma
anya-e0812n0:2173_0: 281. Idāni visesālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “visesi”ccādinā. Visesicchāyaṃ atisaye kāriyavisese
anya-e0812n0:2173_1: icchāyaṃ sati dabbassa ca kriyājātiguṇassa ca yatra yasmiṃ vuttivisese vekalladassanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2173_2: abhāvakathanamatthi, ayaṃ viseso nāma bhave visesavutti nāma siyāti. Vikalassa bhāvoti
anya-e0812n0:2175: Na rathā na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā na padātayo;
anya-e0812n0:2178: 282. Udāharati “na rathā”iccādi. Subodhaṃ. Atra ca vijayopakaraṇacaturaṅgānīkalakkhaṇadabbābhāvena samatiṃsapāramitāsaṅkhatasambhārāvajjanasseva mārārivijayalakkhaṇo viseso vutto.
anya-e0812n0:2179_0: 282. “Na rathā”iccādi. Rathā tayo antamaso saparivārānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rathānaṃ anīkavohārato
anya-e0812n0:2179_1: tādisā tayo rathā ca natthi. Mātaṅgā tayo vuttanayena anīkasaṅkhātā tayo mātaṅgā
anya-e0812n0:2179_2: ca natthi. Na hayā tayo tādisā anīkasaṅkhātā tayo assā ca natthi. Padā na antamaso
anya-e0812n0:2179_3: sāyudhānaṃ catunnaṃ purisānaṃ anīkavohārato tādisā cattāro purisā padā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n0:2179_4: Tathāpi muninā sambhārāvajjanena hi samatiṃsapāramidhammānaṃ ābhogakaraṇeneva mārāri
anya-e0812n0:2179_5: mārapaccattiko jito abhibhavito. Iha jayopakaraṇabhāvena ṭhitānaṃ rathānīkādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2179_6: dabbānaṃ vekallaṃ dassetvā sattuvijayasabhāvānaṃ sambhārānaṃ āvajjanavisesassa vuttattā
anya-e0812n0:2179_7: esā dabbavisesavutti nāma. Ratho nāma catupurisaparivāro, tādisaṃ rathattayaṃ rathānīkaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2179_8: nāma. Hatthī pana dvādasapurisaparivāro hoti, tādisaṃ hatthittayaṃ hatthānīkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2179_9: Asso tipurisaparivāro, tādisaṃ hayattayaṃ hayānīkaṃ nāma. Sāyudhā cattāro purisā
anya-e0812n0:2179_10: padānīkaṃ nāma. Iha rathādīsu ṭhitā viya sīghaṃ pādabalena gantvā yujjhamānā purisā
anya-e0812n0:2179_11: pādopacārena “pādā”ti vuttā. Rathādīnaṃ pamāṇaṃ tayoti anīkaṭṭhāne dassetvā purisapamāṇassāvuttepi
anya-e0812n0:2179_12: antamaso cattāro purisā anīkaṃ nāma hontīti pakaraṇato cattāroti ñāyati. No ce? Sāvudhapurisavācakassa
anya-e0812n0:2179_13: padātisaddassa “padātayo”ti bahuvacanena rūpasambhavato “rathā na, mātaṅgā na, hayā
anya-e0812n0:2179_14: na, padātayo na” iti sambandho. Dabbavisesavutti dabbena dabbapaṭisedhanato visesakathanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2179_15: visesassa vuttīti ca, dabbena dabbapaṭisedhena visesavuttīti ca vākyaṃ. Kriyāvisesavutyādittayampi evameva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2184_0: 283. “Na baddhā”iccādi. Bhūkuṭi bhamubhaṅgo kopajanito na baddhā na racitā, dasanacchado
anya-e0812n0:2184_1: cādharo neva phurito neva kampito kopena. Tathāpi ca varo uttamo munivīro sayaṃ mārārino
anya-e0812n0:2184_2: bhaṅgaṃ parājayaṃ akāsīti. Bhūkuṭibandhanādikriyāvigamena nibbikāravijayalakkhaṇo viseso dassito.
anya-e0812n0:2185_0: 283. “Na baddhā”iccādi. Bhūkuṭi kopavikārabhūto bhamubhaṅgopi na baddhā na katā,
anya-e0812n0:2185_1: dasanacchado dantāvaraṇo neva phurito na kampāpito. Tathāpi varo uttamo munivīro
anya-e0812n0:2185_2: muniguṇavīraguṇayutto tathāgato sayaṃ mārāribhaṅgañca akāsīti. Ettha bhamubhaṅgaracanādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2185_4: vuttattā esā kriyāvisesavutti nāma. Bhūnaṃ kuṭi vaṅkatāti ca, māro eva arīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2192_0: 284. “Ni”ccādi. Disāsu dasasu byattā patthaṭā raṃsi na bhavati. Loke sakalasmiṃ patthaṭo
anya-e0812n0:2192_1: vitthato ālokona bhavati. Tathāpīti visesanicchāyaṃ, tajjātikattābhāvepi sādhūnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2192_2: subhāsitaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ paramaccantameva andhatamaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhāvekallato paññācakkhussa
anya-e0812n0:2192_3: andhakāraṃ mohandhakāraṃ haratīti andhatamaharanti. Raṃsiyā andhakārāpahārasamatthāya
anya-e0812n0:2193_0: 284. “Na disāsu”iccādi. Disāsu byattā patthaṭā raṃsipi natthi, lokapatthaṭo ālokopi
anya-e0812n0:2193_1: natthi. Tathāpi sādhusubhāsitaṃ saddhammo paramaccantaṃ andhatamaharaṃ atthānatthatīraṇakkhamassa
anya-e0812n0:2193_2: paññācakkhussa andhakārakamohatamaṃ haraṃ hotīti. Idha andhakāraviddhaṃsane samatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2193_4: vuttattā ayaṃ jātivisesavutti nāma. Loke patthaṭoti ca, andhetīti andho moho, tamasadisattā
anya-e0812n0:2193_5: andhoyeva tamoti ca, taṃ haratīti ca, sādhūnaṃ subhāsitamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2195: Na kharaṃ na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda vacanaṃ tava;
anya-e0812n0:2198_0: 285. “Na khara”miccādi. Muninda tava vacanaṃ na kharaṃ na lūkhaṃ, na thaddhaṃ vā
anya-e0812n0:2198_1: kaṭhinañca na hi. Tathāpi tādisakharattādiguṇābhāvepi janatāya janasamūhassa madaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2198_2: gāḷhaṃ daḷhaṃ taṇhaṃ (ka.) katvā nimmūlaṃ khanatīti. Ayosaṅkumhi pasiddhakharattādiguṇanisedhena
anya-e0812n0:2199_0: 285. “Na khara”miccādi. He muninda tava vacanaṃ kharaṃ kakkasaṃ na hoti, thaddhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2199_1: vā na hoti. Tathāpi janatāmadaṃ janasamūhassa jātyādiṃ nissāya pavattaṃ gabbaṃ gāḷhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2199_2: daḷhaṃ katvā nimmūlaṃ mūlamasesetvā khanatīti. Khaṇanakkhamaayosaṅkuādīsu labbhamānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2199_4: vuttattā ayaṃ guṇavisesavutti nāma hoti. Natthi mūlamassa khaṇanassāti ca, janānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2199_5: samūhoti ca, tāya madoti ca viggaho. “Gāḷhaṃ nimmūla”nti khaṇanakriyāya visesanattā
anya-e0812n0:2206_0: 286. Idāni ruḷhāhaṅkāraṃ dasseti “dassīyate” iccādinā. Sūravīrattanaṃ sūrabhāvavīrabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2206_1: atidittaṃ tu atisayena pana dittaṃ yahiṃ vākye dassīyate, īdisaṃ vacanaṃ viññū kavayo
anya-e0812n0:2206_2: ruḷhāhaṅkāramiti vadantīti. Sūro ca vīro cāti ca, tesaṃ bhāvoti ca, ruḷho uggato
anya-e0812n0:2212_1: dame damane me mama niravadhisarantippameyyappabhāvānucaritakittinopi parassa byāpāradassanā
anya-e0812n0:2212_2: payogapaṭipādanena kiṃ payojanaṃ, na kimpi, yato me pādasambhattā pādāvanatā tādise
anya-e0812n0:2212_3: kammani sajjā baddhakacchā santeva vijjanteva, tatoti yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2213_0: 287. “Dame”ccādi. Nandopanandassa nāgarañño dame damakaraṇe byāpāradassanā bhuvanattaye
anya-e0812n0:2213_1: pavattamānaānubhāvena ca sampavattitakittisamūhena ca samannāgatassa mayhaṃ tādisapayogadassanena
anya-e0812n0:2213_2: kiṃ payojanaṃ. Yasmā me pādasambhattā mayhaṃ caraṇāvanatā tādise kicce sajjā sannaddhā
anya-e0812n0:2213_3: puttā bahavo santi eva, tasmāti. Cetovasitāya sūravīrabhāvo iha atiditto dassito
anya-e0812n0:2213_4: hoti. Byāpārassa dassanamiti ca, pādesu sambhattāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2219_1: Ekena samānena padena sarūpena āyutamanvitaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttīti anuvaditvā so silesoti
anya-e0812n0:2219_2: vidhīyate, yena kenaci rūpena upamānopameyyalakkhaṇatthānaṃ silesanato. Ayañcevaṃlakkhaṇo
anya-e0812n0:2219_3: sileso tedhā īrito. Kathaṃ? Abhinnapadavākyādivasā abhinnamekaṃ padaṃ syādyantatyādyantarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2219_4: yatra, tameva vākyaṃ vākyalakkhaṇopetattā. Taṃ ādi yesaṃ, tesaṃ vasāti attho.
anya-e0812n0:2220_0: 288. Idāni silesālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “sileso”ccādinā. Anekābhidheyyaṃ ekapadāyutaṃ ubhayattha
anya-e0812n0:2220_1: sādhāraṇattā tulyena saddarūpena yuttaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ atthi, so sileso nāma. So pana
anya-e0812n0:2220_2: yena kenaci sādhammarūpena upamānopameyyabhūtānamatthānaṃ siliṭṭhattā aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2220_3: phusitvā ṭhitattā sileso nāma. Ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇo sileso abhinnapadavākyādivasā akatavikārānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2220_5: Anekamabhidheyyaṃ yasseti ca, ekañca taṃ padañceti ca, tena āyutanti ca, abhinnāni
anya-e0812n0:2220_6: padāni yasminti ca, tañca taṃ vākyañcāti ca, taṃ ādi yesaṃ abhinnapadavākyānanti
anya-e0812n0:2220_7: ca, tesaṃ vaso bhedoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2225_0: 289. Udāharati “andhantami”ccādi. Ayaṃ bhagavā sūriyo mahāmuni ca. Tattha sūriyo
anya-e0812n0:2225_1: tāva andhantamaharo pakatiyandhakāropahārī, mahāmuni tu andhakāramohatamāpahārī.
anya-e0812n0:2225_2: Hārī manuñño sūriyo mahāmuni ca, sūriyo mahodayaṃ mahantaṃ udayaṃ pabbataṃ samāruḷho,
anya-e0812n0:2225_3: mahāmuni tu mahodayaṃ mahantamabbhudayaṃ sammāsambodhisamadhigamarūpaṃ samāruḷho
anya-e0812n0:2225_4: patto. Raṃsīnaṃ mālā, sā assa atthīti raṃsimālī, sūriyo mahāmuni ca. Jane bodhayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2225_5: niddāpagamanena kilesaniddāpagamanena vā pabodhayanto rājate dibbatīti. Abhinnapadavākyasileso
anya-e0812n0:2226_0: 289. Idāni udāharati “andha”miccādinā. Mahodayaṃ mahantaṃ udayaṃ pabbataṃ, sabbaññupadavisaṅkhātamahābhivuddhiṃ
anya-e0812n0:2226_1: vā samāruḷho āruḷho, sampatto vā, andhantamaharo cakkavāḷagabbhe patthaṭapakatighanandhakārassa,
anya-e0812n0:2226_2: ñāṇalocanassa andhakaraṇato andhakāroti vuttamohassa vā viddhaṃsako, hārī teneva
anya-e0812n0:2226_3: manuñño raṃsimālī attano raṃsimālāya samannāgato jane pakatiniddāya kilesaniddāya
anya-e0812n0:2226_4: vā samannāgate satte bodhayaṃ bodhayanto ayaṃ bhagavā divākaro, chahi bhagadhammehi
anya-e0812n0:2226_5: samannāgato buddho vā rājate dibbatīti. Dvīsu pakkhesu padānaṃ samānabhāvena ṭhitattā
anya-e0812n0:2226_6: ayaṃ abhinnapadavākyasileso. Andho ca so tamo ceti ca, taṃ haratīti ca, mahanto ca
anya-e0812n0:2226_7: so udayo pabbato cāti ca, mahanto ca so udayo abbhudayo abhivuddhi cāti ca, raṃsīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2226_8: mālāti ca, sā assa atthīti ca, bhago sirī assa sūriyassa atthīti ca, bhago sirīkāmapayatanādippakāro
anya-e0812n0:2226_9: assa satthuno atthīti ca viggaho. Abhinnapadavākyasaṅkhāto sileso. Aparopi attho
anya-e0812n0:2226_10: ettha silissatīti sileso. “Bhinnapadavākyasileso”tiādikampi iminā nayena ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2231_0: 290. “Sārade”ccādi. Sudhā assa atthīti sudhī, cando. Sobhanā sabbaññutaññāṇarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2231_1: buddhi assa atthīti sudhī, sammāsambuddho. Sārado saradakāle sambhūto amalako nimmalo
anya-e0812n0:2231_2: ābhā sobhā yassa so, cando. Paresaṃ nibbānasāraṃ dadātīti sārado, amalako ābhāso,
anya-e0812n0:2231_3: amalakassa hatthāmalakasseva vā ābhāso asesañeyyāvabodho yassa so, sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0812n0:2231_4: Saṃ sammā kamenānīyamānattā ānīto parikkhayo kaṇhapakkho yena so, cando. Samaṃ vūpasamaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2231_5: ānīto parikkhayo hāni kilesasattukato adhigatakkhayattā yenaso, sammāsambuddho. Kumudākarassa
anya-e0812n0:2231_6: kumudassa raṃsiyā sambodhi vikāso yassa raṃsiyo sambodhi vikāsa’ssa (ka.) so, cando.
anya-e0812n0:2231_7: Kuyā pathaviyā mudaṃ pītiṃ karotīti kumudākaro, sambodho catusaccāvabodho yassa so,
anya-e0812n0:2231_8: sammāsambuddho, janataṃ janasamūhaṃ pīṇetīti. Ayaṃ bhinnapadavākyasileso vuttena
anya-e0812n0:2232_0: 290. “Sāra”iccādi. Sārado saradakāle sambhūto, veneyyānaṃ nibbānasāradāyako vā, amalakābhāso
anya-e0812n0:2232_1: nimmalasobho, nimmalaketumālāsamannāgatattā tādisamatthakasobho vā, atha vā sāradāmalakābhāso
anya-e0812n0:2232_2: saradakāle sañjātanimmalasobho, veneyyānaṃ nibbānasāradāyakanimmalasobho vā, atha
anya-e0812n0:2232_4: kaṇhapakkhe suṭṭhu kamena ānīto parikkhayo paripuṇṇo vā cando, samasaṅkhatasantiṃ
anya-e0812n0:2232_7: Sudhī sudhāsaṅkhātaamatavantatāya tannāmako cando, sundarapaññavantatāya tannāmako
anya-e0812n0:2232_8: sammāsambuddho vā. Janataṃ janasamūhaṃ pīṇetīti. Ubhayapakkhesu padaṃ bhinditvā atthassa
anya-e0812n0:2232_9: yojanato ayaṃ bhinnapadavākyasileso. Sarade bhavo sārado, cando. Sāraṃ dadātīti sārado,
anya-e0812n0:2232_10: bhagavā. “Sārado”ti idaṃ “ābhāso”ti padassa visesanaṃ hoti. Amalakonimmalo ābhāso
anya-e0812n0:2232_11: assa candassāti ca, kamhi matthake ābhāsoti ca, amalo kābhāso assa satthunoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2232_12: sārado amalako ābhāso yassa candassa bhagavato vāti ca, sārado āmalakassa viya ābhāso
anya-e0812n0:2232_13: ñeyyāvabodho assa bhagavatoti ca, saṃ sammā ānīto parikkhayo kalāhāni aneneti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2232_14: samaṃ vūpasamaṃ ānīto parikkhayo hāni kilesasattuto yeneti ca, kumudānaṃ ākaroti
anya-e0812n0:2232_15: ca, tesaṃ sambodho vikāso yasseti ca, mudaṃ pītiṃ karotīti mudākaro. Kuyā pathaviyā
anya-e0812n0:2232_16: mudākaroti ca, so sambodho catusaccāvabodho yasseti ca, sudhā amataṃ assa candassa
anya-e0812n0:2232_17: atthīti ca, su sobhanā dhī buddhi assa sambuddhassāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2235: Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.
anya-e0812n0:2237_0: 291. “Samāhite”ccādi. Saṃ sammā āhito patiṭṭhāpito attassa vinayo vinayanaṃ sabbattha
anya-e0812n0:2237_1: savisaye appaṭihatacāravasena yassa so, garuḷo. Vinayanaṃ pavivittakāyacittappavattivasena
anya-e0812n0:2237_2: damanaṃ yassa so, sammāsambuddho. Iti abhinnapadaṃ. Ahīnaṃ sappānaṃ inā nāyakā, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2237_3: madaṃ maddatīti ahīnamadamaddano, garuḷo. Ahīnānamuttamapurisānampi mahābrahmādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2237_4: madaṃ maddatīti ahīnamadamaddano, sammāsambuddho. Sundaraṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ samuddaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2237_5: bhinditvā jalasaṅgamato paṭhamamevauggamanasāmatthiyayogato yassa so, garuḷo. Sundaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2237_6: gamanamassa nāgavikkantacārattā sugato, sammāsambuddho. Abhinnapadaṃ. So vīnaṃ pakkhīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2237_7: nāyako, garuḷo. Visaṃ dadātīti visadaṃ pāṇinaṃ nāgalokaṃ pātu ahiṃsanavasena pālayatu,
anya-e0812n0:2237_8: so vineti veneyyeti vināyako, sammāsambuddho. Pāṇinaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ visadaṃ asallīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2237_9: pātu. Bhinnābhinnapadavākyasilesoyaṃ vuttanayena padānaṃ pana (ka.) ubhayamissattā.
anya-e0812n0:2238_0: 291. “Samāhite”ccādi. Samāhitattavinayo sammā āhitāya ṭhapitāya sarīrassa savisaye
anya-e0812n0:2238_1: gatiyā samannāgato, sammā āhitena ṭhapitena cittadamanena samannāgato vā, ahīnamadamaddano
anya-e0812n0:2238_2: nāgarājūnaṃ madamaddano, ahīnānaṃ uttamānaṃ bakabrahmādīnampi madamaddano vā, sugato
anya-e0812n0:2238_3: pakkhavātavegena samuddajalaṃ dvidhā katvā tasmiṃ jale anekībhūteyeva nāgabhavanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2238_4: gantvā nāge gahetvā gamane samatthattā sundaragamano, samantabhaddakaanekappakāragamano
anya-e0812n0:2238_5: vā, vināyako pakkhīnaṃ nāyako so garuḷarājā visadaṃ ghoravisattā visadāyakaṃ pāṇinaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2238_6: nāgalokaṃ pātu ahiṃsanavasena pāletu. No ce, vināyako veneyye vinento so sammāsambuddho
anya-e0812n0:2238_7: pāṇinaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ visadaṃ visāradaṃ katvā pātu ahitāpanayanahitopanayanena
anya-e0812n0:2238_9: abhinnehi ca padehi samannāgatattā ayaṃ bhinnābhinnapadavākyasileso. Attassa vinayoti
anya-e0812n0:2238_10: ca, samāhito attavinayo yassa garuḷassa tathāgatassa vāti ca, ahīnaṃ inā nāyakāti
anya-e0812n0:2238_11: ca, ahīnānaṃ nāgarājūnaṃ madoti ca, hīnehi aññe ahīnā uttamā, tesaṃ madoti ca, taṃ
anya-e0812n0:2238_12: maddatīti ca, vīnaṃ pakkhīnaṃ nāyakoti ca, veneyyajane vinetīti ca vākyaṃ. Dutiyapakkhe
anya-e0812n0:2245_1: ca aññamabhinnañca, tāniyeva kammāni kriyāni yesaṃ, te tayo silesā. Niyamo’vadhāraṇamasmiṃ
anya-e0812n0:2245_2: atthīti niyamavā, paro añño silesopi. Niyamassa akkhepo nisedhanaṃ yassa, taṃ vacanamabhidhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2245_3: yassa, tādisopi. Nāssa virodho atthītyavirodhi, sopi. Virodho asaṅgati ettha vijjatīti
anya-e0812n0:2245_4: virodhi, sopi. Ocityaṃ samposetīti ocityasamposako, so ādi yassa alaṅkārantaragocarassa
anya-e0812n0:2245_5: silesassa, so padato jātādisilesopi. Itite parepi silesabhedā santi. Esaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2245_6: nidassanesu payogesveva rūpaṃ sabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ āvibhavissatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2246_1: api ubhayatthassa viruddhena ca aviruddhena ca abhinnena ca kammena samanvitā tayo
anya-e0812n0:2246_2: silesā ca, paro añño niyamavāpi avadhāraṇena yuttasileso ca, niyamakkhepavacanopi
anya-e0812n0:2246_4: ca, virodhiapi ubhayatthassa virodhisileso ca, padajādi padena jāto vākyena jāto
anya-e0812n0:2246_6: rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vā āvibhavissati, nidassiyamānaudāharaṇeneva lakkhaṇassa
anya-e0812n0:2246_7: gammamānattā visuṃ na kathessāmīti adhippāyo. Viruddhāni ca aviruddhāni ca abhinnañceti
anya-e0812n0:2246_8: ca, tameva kammaṃ kriyā yesaṃ silesānamiti ca, niyamo avadhāraṇaṃ asmiṃ atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2246_9: niyamassa akkhepo paṭisedho assa atthīti ca, taṃ vacanaṃ abhidhānaṃ yassa silesassāti
anya-e0812n0:2246_10: ca, nāssa virodho atthīti ca, ocityaṃ samposetīti ca, so ādi yassa upamāsilesādinoti
anya-e0812n0:2246_11: ca, padato jātoti ca, so ādi yassa vākyassāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2249: Savase vattayaṃ lokaṃ, akhilaṃ kallaviggaho kalaviggaho (sī.);
anya-e0812n0:2251_0: 294. Tato kamena tedassīyanti “savase”iccādi. Akhilaṃ lokaṃ savase vattayaṃ mārāri
anya-e0812n0:2251_1: dhammarājā ca, kallo manuñño viggaho kalaho yassa mārārino, viggaho sarīrasampadā
anya-e0812n0:2251_2: yassa dhammarājassa, tesu mārāri parābhavati parābhavamapeti bodhiyaṃ paṭiladdhaparājayavasena,
anya-e0812n0:2252_0: 294. Idāni uddesakkamena udāharati “savase”iccādi. Akhilaṃ lokaṃ savase vattayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2252_1: anatthe yuñjanato attano vase vattayanto, no ce, sakalalokaṃ hite yuñjanato attano
anya-e0812n0:2252_2: vase vattayanto kallaviggaho manuññakalaho, no ce, manuññasarīrasampattiyutto mārāri
anya-e0812n0:2252_3: parābhavati bodhimūle laddhaparājayavasena parābhavaṃ pāpuṇāti, dhammarājā tathāgato
anya-e0812n0:2252_4: pana vijambhate lokattaye patthaṭajayaghosavasena vijambhatīti. Parābhavanavijambhanakriyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2252_5: aññamaññaviruddhattā ayaṃ viruddhakammasileso nāma. Sassa attano vaso issariyamiti
anya-e0812n0:2252_6: ca, kallo manuñño viggaho vivādo deho vā yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2256: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2257_0: 295. “Sabhāve”ccādi. Sabhāveneva madhurā piyā vācā, madhuraṃ amataṃ, puññavisesassa
anya-e0812n0:2257_1: udayo abhivaḍḍhi, tena sambhavo, yassa vā taṃ, munino vācaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ janā
anya-e0812n0:2257_2: suṇanti, tassayaṃ amatañca tassa ca nissayaṃ amatanti (ka.) passantīti ayamaviruddhakammasileso
anya-e0812n0:2258_1: vināpi madhurattā pakatimadhuraṃ, no ce, kenaci paccayena anuppannattā saṅkharavisesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2258_2: vināpi pakatipaṇītaṃ, puññavisesodayasambhavaṃ puññavisesadesakassa munino kassaci
anya-e0812n0:2258_3: kusalavisesassa abhivuddhiyā sambhūtaṃ, no ce, veneyyajanānaṃ nibbānādhippāyena katakusalavisesassa
anya-e0812n0:2258_4: abhivuddhiyā ārammaṇattena paṭiladdhaṃ munino vācaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ suṇanti, amataṃ
anya-e0812n0:2258_5: nibbānañca janā veneyyajanā passantīti. Savanadassanakriyānaṃ aññamaññāviruddhattā
anya-e0812n0:2258_6: ayaṃ aviruddhakammasileso. Sassa attano bhāvoti ca, tena madhurā, madhuramiti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2258_7: puññameva visesoti ca, tassodayoti ca, tena sambhavo yasseti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2265_0: 296. “Andhakāre”ccādi. Andhakāraṃ mohasaṅkhātaṃ pakatiandhakāraṃ vā apaharatīti andhakārāpahārā,
anya-e0812n0:2265_1: vācā, bhā ca. Tāya sabhāvabhāsāya, sobhāya ca jino jantūnaṃ mano cittaṃ pīṇetīti
anya-e0812n0:2265_2: ayamabhinnakammasileso pīṇanalakkhaṇāyekāya kriyāya vācāya bhāya ca sampannoti.
anya-e0812n0:2266_1: sabhāvamadhurāya ca sabhāvato kaṇṇasukhāya, sabhāvato nettābhirāmāya vācāya bhāya
anya-e0812n0:2266_2: sarīrakantiyā ca jino jantūnaṃ mano cittaṃ dhinoti pīṇetīti. Pīṇayanasabhāvāya ekāya
anya-e0812n0:2266_3: kriyāya saddhiṃ karaṇabhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ vācābhānaṃ yojitattā ayaṃ abhinnakammasileso.
anya-e0812n0:2266_4: Andhakāra’mapaharatīti ca, sabhāvena madhurāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2271_0: 297. “Kesi”ccādi. Kaṇhattaṃ kesakkhīnaṃyeva, na manasi, kaṇhattaguṇo pāpattañca siliṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2271_1: Vaṅkatā bhamūnaṃyeva, na ajjhāsaye, vaṅkatānatattaṃ saṭhattañca siliṭṭhaṃ. Atirattatā
anya-e0812n0:2271_2: pāṇipādādharānaṃyeva, na citte, atirattatāguṇo rāgo ca silissate. “Munindassā”ti
anya-e0812n0:2271_3: “kaṇhatta”ntiādīsu sabbattha sambandhanīyaṃ. Niyamavā sileso kesakkhīnaṃvāti avadhāraṇappayogāti.
anya-e0812n0:2272_0: 297. “Kesakkhīna”miccādi. Munindassa kaṇhattaṃ kesakkhīnaṃ eva hoti, kaṇhattasaṅkhatamakusalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2272_1: na citte. Vaṅkatā bhamūnaṃyeva, najjhāsaye. Atirattatā pāṇipādādharānaṃ eva, na kesuci
anya-e0812n0:2272_3: saddhiṃ pāpattassa ca, vaṅkaguṇena saddhiṃ sāṭheyyassa ca, rattaguṇena saddhiṃ rāgassa
anya-e0812n0:2272_4: ca siliṭṭhattā ayaṃ niyamavantasileso nāma. Kesāni ca akkhīni ceti ca, kaṇhassa bhāvoti
anya-e0812n0:2272_5: ca, vaṅkassa bhāvoti ca, pāṇayo ca pādāni ca adharāni cāti ca, atirattassa bhāvoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2277_0: 298. “Pāṇi”ccādi. Nātha tava pāṇipādādharesveva sārāgo sobhano rattavaṇṇo dissati,
anya-e0812n0:2277_1: na citte, sārāgo rattavaṇṇo chandarāgo cāti siliṭṭhaṃ. Ayaṃ niyamo akkhipyate. Atha
anya-e0812n0:2277_2: vā kathaṃ niyamyate, yato so ayaṃ sārāgo sādhūnaṃ guṇesveva virāgalakkhaṇo dissate
anya-e0812n0:2278_0: 298. “Pāṇi”ccādi. He nātha tava sārāgo sobhano rattavaṇṇo pāṇipādādharesveva dissati,
anya-e0812n0:2278_1: citte lobho pana na dissati. Atha vā so ayaṃ sārāgo kattukamyatākusalacchandabhūto
anya-e0812n0:2278_2: sādhuguṇesvapi sajjanānaṃ sīlādiguṇesupi dissati. “Evā”ti dassitaniyamassa paṭisedhakena
anya-e0812n0:2278_3: “atha vā”ti vacanena samannāgatattā rattavaṇṇasaṅkhātarāgena lobhassa siliṭṭhattā
anya-e0812n0:2278_4: ca ayaṃ niyamakkhepavacanasileso. Saṃ sobhano rāgoti viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2285_1: vā vattamāno salakkhaṇo, cando munindo ca, atisubhago so ca, tejassī sūriyo pabhāvisesayutto
anya-e0812n0:2285_2: ca, niyato patidinamudayo pabhālakkhaṇo yassa so niyatodayo, sūriyo, niyato thiro
anya-e0812n0:2285_3: udayo sammāsambuddho sambodhirūpo yassa so niyatodayo, munindo, lokeso brahmā munindo
anya-e0812n0:2285_4: ca, jito saṃkleso jhānarativasena kāyacittābādho yena so, brahmā, jito saṃkleso dasavidho
anya-e0812n0:2285_5: aggamaggaññāṇalābhā yena so. So maṇīnaṃ issaro upamaṇi uttamamaṇi (?), samaṇānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2285_6: issaro munindo vibhātīti yojjaṃ. Ayamavirodhisileso lakkhaṇasubhagādīnamubhayatthāpi abyavahitattā.
anya-e0812n0:2286_0: 299. “Salakkhaṇo”iccādi. Salakkhaṇo lakkhaṇena sahito, atisubhago atisundarāya lakkhiyā
anya-e0812n0:2286_1: samannāgato, no ce, dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi sahito ativiya sobhādīhi yutto,
anya-e0812n0:2286_2: tejassī andhakāravidhamanasaṅkhatamahānubhāvena yutto, niyatodayo patidinaṃ pubbaṇhakāle
anya-e0812n0:2286_3: niyamitagaganuggamano, no ce, nirantarapavattabuddhatejasā yutto thirasabbaññupadavisaṅkhātābhivuḍḍhiyā
anya-e0812n0:2286_4: samannāgato, lokeso brahmabhūto, jitasaṃkleso jhānapītiyā vijitakāyacittadaratho,
anya-e0812n0:2286_5: no ce, tilokassa issarabhūto catutthamaggaññāṇena hatadasavidhasaṃkileso, samaṇissaro
anya-e0812n0:2286_6: so uttamo maṇi vibhāti sobhati, no ce, samaṇānaṃ issaro vibhāti dibbatīti. “Salakkhaṇo
anya-e0812n0:2286_7: subhago”iccādikānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ aviruddhattā ca, paṭhamapāde candena dutiye sūriyena
anya-e0812n0:2286_8: tatiye brahmunā catutthe maṇinā ca sabbaññupadatthassa siliṭṭhattā ca ayaṃ avirodhisileso
anya-e0812n0:2286_9: nāma. Saha lakkhaṇena vattamānoti ca, atisobhano bhago sirī vā sirīkāmapayatanādiko
anya-e0812n0:2286_10: vā assāti ca, tejo assa atthīti ca, niyato udayo asseti ca, lokassa iso issaroti
anya-e0812n0:2286_11: ca, jito saṃkleso yeneti ca, maṇīnaṃ samaṇānaṃ vā issaroti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2293_0: 300. “Asamopi”ccādi. Natthi samo rājaguṇādīhi assāti asamo, koci rājādi, “asamo”ti
anya-e0812n0:2293_1: lokekasikhāmaṇibhāvena muni. Tattha yadā asamo rājādi, tadā loke samoti viruddhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2293_2: asamattā tassa. Apisaddo virodhaṃ joteti. Pakkhantare tvaviruddhaṃ, loke devadattādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2293_3: virodhisattānaṃ rāhulādīnaṃ avirodhisattānañca samattā, tatoyevāyaṃ virodhābhāsānañcasā
anya-e0812n0:2293_4: virodhoyeva. Lokeso brahmā muni ca. Tattha “brahmā naruttamo”ti viruddhaṃ dibbayonittā
anya-e0812n0:2293_5: tassa. Pakkhantare tvabyāghāto uttamanarattā tassa. Dayo dānaṃ, saha dayenāti sadayo,
anya-e0812n0:2293_6: koci puriso. Saha dayāya vattatīti sadayo, muni. Tattha puriso dāyako pāpe jane kathamadayoti
anya-e0812n0:2293_7: virujjhati. Muni pāpe rāgādike adayoti virujjhati. Tasmā munino ayaṃ yathāvuttā gati
anya-e0812n0:2293_8: pavatti cittā abbhutāti ayaṃ vuttanayena virodhisileso udāhaṭo.
anya-e0812n0:2294_0: 300. “Asamo”iccādi. Asamopi atulyopi koci rājādiko loke samo tulyo, no ce, sadisapuggalarahito
anya-e0812n0:2294_1: eva rāhulabhadradevadattādisabbaloke anunayapaṭighābhāvena samo hoti. Lokesopi brahmabhūtopi
anya-e0812n0:2294_2: naruttamo naravaro hoti, no ce, sakalalokādhipati hutvā eva naruttamo. Sadayopi yācakesu
anya-e0812n0:2294_3: dayasaṅkhātena dānena yuttopi pāpe pāpiṭṭhe adayo dānarahito, no ce, dayāsahito eva
anya-e0812n0:2294_4: akusale niddayo. Munino ayaṃ gati pavatti cittā vicittāti rājādino asamasamatā ca,
anya-e0812n0:2294_5: brahmā hutvā uttamanarabhāvo ca, dānasahitassa kassaci purisassa dānarahitabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2294_6: ca viruddho hoti. Tasmā rājabrahmapurisehi munino siliṭṭhattā ayaṃ virodhisileso
anya-e0812n0:2294_7: nāma. Pubbapubbapakkhe virodho aparāparapakkhehi nirākato hoti. Pubbapakkhe apisaddo
anya-e0812n0:2294_8: virodhaṃ joteti, aparapakkhe avadhāraṇanti. Natthi samo yasseti ca, naro ca so uttamo
anya-e0812n0:2294_9: ceti ca, saha dayena dayāya vā vattamānoti ca, natthi dayo dayā vā asseti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2299_1: dukkhaṃ dukkhamattādinā, tena upahatā pahaṭā janatā, amataṃ sukhaṃ amataṃ vā nibbānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2299_2: dadātīti amatandadāti āmantanaṃ, tvayi avanatā paṇāmavasena icchitamatimataṃ dukkhāpagamanibbattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2299_3: kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ accantaṃ vindati paṭilabhatīti. Ettha amataṃ sudhā nibbānañca,
anya-e0812n0:2299_4: amatandado dukkhopahate sukhayatīti ucitanti “amataṃ dadātī”ti padamadhigate vatthuni
anya-e0812n0:2299_5: ocityaṃ samposayatīti ocityasamposako padasilesoyaṃ. Ādisaddena “sugandhisobhāsambandhī”tyādyupamāsilesādayo saṅgahitāti.
anya-e0812n0:2300_1: dukkhena upahatā janatā, amatandada he sudhādāyaka no ce, nibbānadāyaka tathāgata
anya-e0812n0:2300_2: tvayi avanatā paṇamanavasena onatā icchitaṃ abhimataṃ sukhaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2300_3: accantaṃ atisayena vindati sevatīti. Amatadāyakā dukkhite sukhite karontīti idaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2300_4: ucitameveti ubhayatthassāpi vācakaṃ “amataṃ dadātī”ti padaṃ tādisajanassa sukhadāne
anya-e0812n0:2300_5: ocityaṃ posetīti ayaṃ ocityasamposakapadasileso. Saṃsāroyeva dukkhanti ca, tena upahatāti
anya-e0812n0:2300_6: ca, amataṃ sudhaṃ nibbānaṃ vā dadātīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2303: Saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ, sā matā tulyayogitā.
anya-e0812n0:2304_0: 302. Tulyayogitaṃ yojayati “guṇe”ccādinā. Guṇo dhammo sādhu asādhu vā, tena yuttehi
anya-e0812n0:2304_1: vatthūhi saha samaṃ katvāna vatthuto asāmyepi tathābhāvamāropya kassaci purisādino
anya-e0812n0:2304_2: thutinindatthaṃ yaṃ kittanamākhyānaṃ, sā tulyakkhaṇā tulyayogitā matā, vattumicchitena
anya-e0812n0:2304_3: guṇena tādisānaṃ tulyayogitāpaṭipādanato tadatthiyena tulyayogitā tathā dvidhā vattati.
anya-e0812n0:2305_1: yehi kehici guṇehi yuttehi vatthūhi, samaṃ katvāna tatvato asamānesupi samānattabuddhiyā
anya-e0812n0:2305_2: āropanaṃ katvā, kassaci purisādino thutiṃ nindaṃ vā nissāya yaṃ saṃkittanaṃ guṇāguṇakathanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2305_3: bhavati, sā tulyayogitāti matāti. Guṇehi yuttāti ca, tulyena guṇena saha yogoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2305_4: so etesaṃ raṃsimālībhagavantādīnamatthīti ca, tesaṃ bhāvo tulyaguṇasambandhoti ca
anya-e0812n0:2305_5: viggaho. Ettha tulyaguṇayuttapadatthānaṃ tagguṇasambandhassa tulyayogitābhāvato tappaṭipādako
anya-e0812n0:2311_0: 303. Udāharati “sampatte”ccādi. Tamaṃ nudatīti tamonudo. Raṃsimālī sūriyo ca, atha
anya-e0812n0:2311_1: vā sammāsambuddho cāti ubhohi karaṇabhūtehi hetubhūtehi vā loko sattaloko, sampatto
anya-e0812n0:2311_2: sammado pīti yena tathāvidho ca, sampatto ālokassa sampadā yena tathāvidho cāpīti.
anya-e0812n0:2311_3: Ettha pītidānādiguṇayuttena raṃsimālinā samaṃ katvā bhagavato thutivasena kittananti
anya-e0812n0:2312_0: 303. Idāni udāharati “sampatti”ccādinā. Tamonudo andhakāraṃ paharanto raṃsimālī ca
anya-e0812n0:2312_1: bhagavā ca ubhohi karaṇabhūtehi hetubhūtehi vā, loko sattaloko sampattasammado paṭiladdhapītiko
anya-e0812n0:2312_2: ca sampattālokasampadā ca hotīti. Ettha pītidānālokakaraṇasaṅkhātaguṇayuttena sūriyena
anya-e0812n0:2312_3: tulyaṃ katvā bhagavato thutivasena guṇakathanaṃ hoti. Sampatto sammado pīti yeneti
anya-e0812n0:2312_4: ca, ālokassa sampadāti ca, sampattā ālokasampadā yeneti ca, tamaṃ nudatīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2312_5: Udāharaṇe adassitepi asādhuguṇayuttena kenaci vatthunā samaṃ katvā kassaci kātabbanindāpi evameva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2315: Dassīyate asantaṃ vā, santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2316_1: aññaṃ kiñci ucitaṃ kāriyaṃ sādhayatā kenaci vatthunā hetubhūtena, tena atthantareneva
anya-e0812n0:2316_2: sadisaṃ tulyaṃ phalaṃ kiñci asantaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ vā santaṃ iṭṭhaṃ vā dassīyate paṭipādīyate,
anya-e0812n0:2317_1: aññaṃ ucitakāriyasaṅkhātamattaṃ ucitakicca… (ka.) sādhayatā sādhayantena kenaci vatthunā
anya-e0812n0:2317_2: taṃsadisaṃ tena atthantarena samānaṃ asantaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ vā santaṃ iṭṭhaṃ vā kiñci phalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2317_3: dassīyate vatthūhi paṭipādīyate, taṃ tādisaṃ phalaṃ nidassanaṃ nāmāti. Attho ca so
anya-e0812n0:2317_4: antaro añño cāti ca, tena atthantarena sadisamiti ca, nidassīyateti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2322_0: 305. “Udayā”iccādi. Samaṇindassa mahāmunino udayā pātubhāvena pāpā lobhādayo parābhavaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2322_1: nidhanaṃ yanti, parābhavantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Udayapubbakena pāpaparābhavanatthantarena
anya-e0812n0:2322_2: sadisaṃ phalaṃ nidasseti. Kiṃ karontā? Dhammarājā dhammānapeto rājā, munindo cāti
anya-e0812n0:2322_3: siliṭṭhaṃ, tena viruddhānaṃ, duṭṭho viruddho anto avasānaṃ yassa, tassa bhāvo, taṃ
anya-e0812n0:2323_0: 305. Idāni udāharati “udayā”iccādinā. Samaṇindassa munindassa udayā loke pātubhāvena
anya-e0812n0:2323_1: pāpā lobhādayo dhammarājaviruddhānaṃ rājadhammehi samannāgatarājūhi, dhammādhipatinā
anya-e0812n0:2323_2: munindena vā viruddhānaṃ durantataṃ aniṭṭhāvasānataṃ sūcayantā pakāsento parābhavaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2323_3: parihāniṃ yanti pāpuṇantīti. Ettha pubbaddhena udayapubbako pāpaparābhavanasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n0:2323_4: atthantaro dassito, aparaddhena taṃsadisavirodhahetukaṃ durantasaṅkhātaṃ asantaphalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2323_6: ca, dhammena yutto rājāti vā dhammesu rājāti vāti ca, tena viruddhāti ca, duṭṭho
anya-e0812n0:2323_7: virūpo anto pariyosānaṃ yesamiti ca, tesaṃ bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2330_1: bhinditvā samuggatānamacchariyaguṇopetānamambujānaṃ sirasi matthake nikkhittā caraṇā
anya-e0812n0:2330_2: yena so jino. Ambujoparicaraṇanikkhepalakkhaṇenatthantarena sadisaṃ phalaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0812n0:2330_3: Attano paramacchariyabhāvaṃ viññāpeti. Santaphalamidaṃ nidassanaṃ jinabbhutatthadīpanassa iṭṭhattāti.
anya-e0812n0:2331_0: 306. “Siro”iccādi. Ayaṃ jino acchariyānaṃ attano pādapaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā
anya-e0812n0:2331_1: uggatattā accharāpaharaṇayoggānaṃ ambujānaṃ sironikkhittacaraṇo matthake ṭhapitapādo
anya-e0812n0:2331_2: loke sattaloke attano paramabbhutataṃ atiacchariyaguṇaṃ viññāpeti avabodhetīti. Ettha
anya-e0812n0:2331_4: viññāpetīti ayaṃ sadisasantaphalaṃ jinabbhutatthadīpanassa iṭṭhattā. Sirasi nikkhittāni
anya-e0812n0:2331_5: caraṇāni yeneti ca, accharaṃ accharāsaṅghātaṃ arahantīti ca, paramo uttamo abbhuto
anya-e0812n0:2331_6: guṇo asseti ca, tassa bhāvoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2335_1: vā ajjhāsayassa vā paramukkaṃsataṃ paramātisayabhāvaṃ yātaṃ upagataṃ mahantattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2336_0: 307. Idāni mahantattālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “vibhūti” iccādinā. Vibhūtiyā sampattiyā vā
anya-e0812n0:2336_1: adhippāyassa ajjhāsayassa vā paramukkaṃsataṃ atyukkaṃsabhāvaṃ yātaṃ yaṃ mahantattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2336_2: siyā, taṃ mahantattamiti īritanti. Mahato bhāvoti ca, paramo ukkaṃso atisayo yasseti
anya-e0812n0:2341_0: 308. Udāharati “kirīṭe”ccādi. Abhinikkhamā purā pubbe bodhisatto māyādeviyā putto
anya-e0812n0:2341_1: paramukkaṭṭhaṃ anāññasādhāraṇaṃ siriṃ vibhūtiṃ vindi paṭilabhi. Kīdiso? Kirīṭe makuṭe
anya-e0812n0:2341_2: ratanānaṃ chāyāhi sobhāhi anuviddho churito ātapavāraṇo setacchattaṃ yassa so tādisoti
anya-e0812n0:2342_0: 308. Idāni udāharati “kirīṭa”iccādinā. Bodhisatto antimajātiyaṃ mahābodhisatto abhinikkhamā
anya-e0812n0:2342_2: rañjitasetacchatto paramukkaṭṭhaṃ siriṃ vibhūtiṃ vindi anubhavīti. Ettha moliratanakantiyā
anya-e0812n0:2342_3: setacchattassa oviddhabhāvakathanena vibhūtiyā mahantattaṃ hoti. Kirīṭe ratanānīti
anya-e0812n0:2342_4: ca, tesaṃ chāyāyoti ca, tāhi anuviddho churito ātapavāraṇo yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2349_0: 309. “Satto”iccādi. Snehena piyabhāvena jātena rasena rāgena ābaddhamattani rāhulamātaraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2349_1: bimbādevimpi, kimutaññaṃ yuvatijanaṃ, hitvā anapekkhitvā anāsatto hutvā sattānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2349_2: hitāya lokiyalokuttarāya vaḍḍhiyā bodhisatto siddhattho sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇeyeva
anya-e0812n0:2349_3: satto āsatto, tattheva laggoti adhippāyo. Mahantattamukkaṭṭhaṃ tādisavanitāratanānāsajjanalakkhaṇamālakkhīyatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2350_1: rāhulamātaraṃ api bimbādevimpi hitvā sattahitāya sattānaṃ lokiyalokuttaratthāya sambodhiyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2350_2: sabbaññutaññāṇeyeva satto laggoti. Tādisaitthiratanepi alaggatākathanena bodhisattassa
anya-e0812n0:2350_3: ukkaṭṭhajjhāsayamahantattaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Sammā bujjhati etāyāti ca, bodhiyaṃ satto
anya-e0812n0:2350_4: laggoti ca, sattānaṃ hitamiti ca, snehena piyabhāvena jāto raso rāgoti ca, tena ābaddhāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2356_0: 310. Vañcanaṃ vadati “gopetvā”iccādinā, vaṇṇanīyaṃ kiñci vatthuṃ gopetvā niraṃkatvā
anya-e0812n0:2356_1: tassa vaṇṇanīyassa asamaṃ visamaṃ visadisaṃ paramaññaṃ yaṃ kiñci vatthu yadi dassīyate
anya-e0812n0:2356_2: kavināti anuvaditvā sā vañcanā matāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n0:2357_0: 310. Idāni vañcanālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “gopetvā”iccādinā. Vaṇṇanīyaṃ kiñci vatthuṃ gopetvā
anya-e0812n0:2357_1: tassa vaṇṇanīyassa samaṃ sadisaṃ vā asamaṃ visadisaṃ vā paraṃ yaṃ kiñci vatthu yadi
anya-e0812n0:2357_2: dassīyate kavinā, sā vañcanāiti matāti. Vañceti vaṇṇanīyaṃ etāya vuttiyāti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2364_0: 311. Udāharati “purato”iccādi. Māro kāmo tādino lobhādīsu tādisattā munino purato
anya-e0812n0:2364_1: sammukhe sahassaṃ isavo assāti sahassesu ca na hoti. Pañca isavo assāti pañcesu ca
anya-e0812n0:2364_2: na hotīti vaṇṇanīyo mārotra gopyate. Tassa yo tibhuvanaṃ jayī. Paresu aññasattesu
anya-e0812n0:2364_3: sarāgesu esamisūnaṃ dasavaḍḍhitaṃ dasahi guṇitaṃ sahassaṃ, kathamaññathābhuvanattayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2364_4: jayeyyāti māraṃ gopetvā dasasahassopalakkhitavatthantarassa dassitattā asamavañcanāyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2365_0: 311. Idāni udāharati “purato”iccādinā. Māro tādino lābhālābhādīsu avikārino tathāgatassa
anya-e0812n0:2365_1: purato abhimukhe sahassesu ca sahassasaropi na hoti, pañcesu pañca isu ca tādise
anya-e0812n0:2365_2: ṭhapetvā pañca isu na hoti. Paresu sugatasammukhe īdisesupi aññesu saṃkilesesu tassa
anya-e0812n0:2365_3: tilokajetuno mārassa esaṃ sarānaṃ dasavaḍḍhitaṃ dasagaṇanāya vaḍḍhitaṃ sahassaṃ hoti
anya-e0812n0:2365_4: dasasahassaṃ hotīti. Vaṇṇanīyaṃ māraṃ gopetvā dasasahassasaṅkhyāhi gaṇitassa aññassa
anya-e0812n0:2365_5: sarasaṅkhātavatthuno dassitattā ayaṃ asamavañcanā nāma. Sahassaṃ isavo asseti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2365_6: pañca isavo asseti ca, dasahi vaḍḍhitanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2372: 312. “Vivāda”miccādi. Manobhunoti kāmassa. Samavañcanāyaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ niraṃkatvā chattassa dassitattā.
anya-e0812n0:2373_1: sampuṇṇo ayaṃ paccakkho candimā na hoti. Kiñcarahi etaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ manobhuno anaṅgassa
anya-e0812n0:2373_2: ubbhūtiyaṃ chattaṃ samussitasetacchattanti. Vaṇṇanīyaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ ṭhapetvā tato
anya-e0812n0:2373_3: aññassa candasadisassa chattassa dassitattā ayaṃ vutti samavañcanā nāma. Munīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2373_4: indoti ca, tassa vadanamiti ca, indusadiso indu, munindavadanameva indūti ca, samantato
anya-e0812n0:2373_5: puṇṇoti ca, manasi bhūtoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2377_0: 313. Appakatatthutiṃ pakāseti “pari”ccādinā. Paresaṃ yesaṃ kesañci anuvattanaṃ sevā,
anya-e0812n0:2377_1: tamādi yesaṃ tehi nibbindena virattena appakate asannihite buddhivisayeyeva iha kismiñci
anya-e0812n0:2377_2: vatthumhi katā yā thuti saṃrādhanaṃ, sāyaṃ appakatatthuti siyā.
anya-e0812n0:2378_0: 313. Idāni appakatatthutiṃ dasseti “parānu”ccādinā. Parānuvattanādīhi aññassa yassa
anya-e0812n0:2378_1: kassaci anuvattanādīhi nibbindena ubbegaṃ pattena appakate anadhigate buddhivisaye
anya-e0812n0:2378_2: eva iha imasmiṃ kismiñci vatthumhi katā yā thuti saṃrādhanasaṅkhātā pasaṃsā atthi,
anya-e0812n0:2378_3: sā ayaṃ appakatatthuti nāma siyāti. Paresamanuvattanamiti ca, taṃ ādi yesaṃ parapīḷādīnamiti
anya-e0812n0:2378_4: ca, na pakatoti ca, rakāro sandhijo, appakate katā thutīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2382_0: 314. Udāharati “sukha”miccādi. Jalehi dabbaṅkurehi dabbatiṇuggamehi. Ādisaddena tarupallavādīhi.
anya-e0812n0:2382_1: Kīdisehi? Anāyāsena sevāpariklesādinā vinā upalābhehi pāpuṇitabbehi. Paramaññaṃ kiñci
anya-e0812n0:2382_2: na sevanti sīleneti aparasevino. Paracittārādhanabyasanaparammukhā hariṇā vanesu
anya-e0812n0:2382_3: sukhaṃ nirākulaṃ jīvantīti. Ettha rājānuvattanaklesanibbindena sannihitā migavutti pasaṃsitāti.
anya-e0812n0:2383_0: 314. Idāni udāharati “sukha”miccādinā. Hariṇā migā aparasevino vuttiṃ nissāya paraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2383_1: asevamānā anāyāsopalābhehi parapariggahābhāvato parasevāparissamaṃ vinā labbhanīyehi
anya-e0812n0:2383_3: sukhaṃ jīvanti sukhajīvanaṃ karontīti. Ettha rājasevābyasanappattena kenaci anadhigatāpi
anya-e0812n0:2383_4: migajīvikā pasaṃsitā hoti. Paraṃ na sevanti sīlenāti ca, abhāvo āyāsasseti ca, tena
anya-e0812n0:2383_5: upalabhitabbāti ca, dabbānaṃ aṅkurānīti ca, jalañca dabbaṅkurāni ceti ca, tāni ādi
anya-e0812n0:2387_0: 315. Ekāvaliṃ kathayati “uttara”micchādinā. Yattha vuttiyaṃ uttaraṃ uttaraṃ upariṭṭhānamupariṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2387_1: pubbassa pubbassa visesanaṃ vidhinisedhanavasena ekāvali nāma siyā. Ayaṃ ekāvali
anya-e0812n0:2388_0: 315. Idāni ekāvaliṃ dasseti “uttara”miccādinā. Yattha uttiyaṃ uttaraṃ uttaraṃ uparūparibhavaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2388_1: padaṃ pubbapubbavisesanaṃ pubbapubbapadassa vidhinisedhanavasena visesanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n0:2388_2: sā ekāvali nāma siyā. Ayaṃ ekāvali vidhinisedhato vidhinisedhavasena dvidhā hotīti.
anya-e0812n0:2388_3: Uttaraṃ pubbanti ṭhānūpacārena ṭhānībhūtaṃ padameva vuccati. Pubbassa pubbassa visesanamiti
anya-e0812n0:2388_4: ca, ekato āvaliyanti saṃvaliyanti padāni etāyāti ca, vidhividhānañca nisedho paṭisedho
anya-e0812n0:2388_5: cāti ca vākyaṃ. Ettha “uttaraṃ uttara”nti ca “pubbassa pubbassa”iti ca kamena visesanavisesyaguṇena
anya-e0812n0:2395: 316. Udāharati “pādā”iccādi. Sugammaṃ. Ettha pādādīnaṃ visesyānaṃ nakhālirucirattādividhānena visesanena visesitabbattā ayaṃ vidhiekāvali.
anya-e0812n0:2396_0: 316. Idāni udāharati “pādā”iccādinā. Satthuno pādā nakhālirucirā nakhapantīhi manuññā
anya-e0812n0:2396_1: nakhālī nakhapantiyo raṃsibhāsurā raṃsīhi dibbamānā raṃsī kantiyo tamopahānekarasā
anya-e0812n0:2396_2: andhakāravidhamane asahāyakiccā hutvā sobhantīti. Ettha pādādīnaṃ pubbapadānaṃ nakhālirucirattādividhāyakehi
anya-e0812n0:2396_3: uttarauttaravisesanehi visesitattā ayaṃ vidhiekāvali nāma. Nakhānaṃ āli pāḷīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2396_4: nakhālīhi rucirāti ca, raṃsīhi bhāsurāti ca, tamaso apahāro apaharaṇamiti ca, so
anya-e0812n0:2396_5: eko raso kiccaṃ etāsaṃ raṃsīnamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2403_0: 317. “Asantuṭṭho”iccādi. Asantuṭṭho catupaccayasantosavasena yo koci yati nāma neva
anya-e0812n0:2403_1: siyā. Ālayena taṇhāya āhato ca yo, so santoso nāma na hoti. Yo jantūnaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2403_2: anantabyasanāvaho na hoti, so ālayo nāma na bhavatīti. Asantuṭṭhādīnaṃ yatittādinisedhanavasena
anya-e0812n0:2404_1: aññatarena asantuṭṭho yati na eva bhikkhu nāma na hoti. Ālayāhato taṇhāya pahato
anya-e0812n0:2404_2: santoso na hoti. Yo jantūnaṃ anantabyasanāvaho na yo sattānaṃ apariyantapīḷāpāpako
anya-e0812n0:2404_3: na hoti, so ālayo na hotīti. Asantuṭṭhādīnaṃ yatibhāvādipaṭisedhavasena visesanānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2404_4: pavattattā ayaṃ nisedhaekāvali nāma. Asantuṭṭhapadaṃ yatisahitasakalasattasamudāyassa
anya-e0812n0:2404_5: sādhāraṇabhāvena ṭhitaṃ, yati na bhavatīti yatito aññesu sakalasattasaṅkhātesu avayavesu
anya-e0812n0:2404_6: patiṭṭhāpanato “asantuṭṭho”ti visesyo, “yati ne”ti idaṃ visesanaṃ. Sesesupi visesanavisesyattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2404_7: vuttaniyāmena yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Na santussatīti ca, ālayena hatoti ca, natthi
anya-e0812n0:2404_8: anto etesamiti ca, tāni ca tāni byasanāni ceti ca, tāni āvahatīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2408: 318. Aññamaññamāha “yahi”miccādinā. Yahiṃ sadisattaṃ vinā eva vatthunaṃ padatthānaṃ aññamaññaṃ bhūsiyabhūsattaṃ, taṃ aññamaññaṃ nāma vibhūsanamalaṅkāroti.
anya-e0812n0:2409_0: 318. Idāni aññamaññālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “yahi”miccādinā. Yahiṃ alaṅkāre sadisattaṃ vinā
anya-e0812n0:2409_1: eva vatthunaṃ aññamaññaṃ tu bhūsiyabhūsattaṃ alaṅkāriyaalaṅkārattaṃ hoti, taṃ aññamaññavibhūsanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2409_2: hotīti. Bhūsiyañca bhūsā cāti ca, tāsaṃ bhāvoti ca, aññañca aññañceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2409_4: imassa visesanaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ. Alaṅkāriyamapekkhāya alaṅkāravatthu ca, tamapekkhāya
anya-e0812n0:2409_5: alaṅkāriyavatthu ca aññamaññaṃ nāma. Tandīpakālaṅkāropi tadatthiyena tannāmako hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2412: Mahantiṃ vindatī kantiṃ, sopi teneva tādisiṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2414_1: tena muninā karaṇabhūtena mahantiṃ mahatiṃ pūjanīyaṃ vā kantiṃ sobhaṃ vindati sevati,
anya-e0812n0:2414_2: sopi muni tena eva byāmaṃsumaṇḍalena tādisiṃ kantiṃ vindatīti. Aññamaññaṃ asadisānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2414_3: byāmaṃsumaṇḍalamunisaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ byāmaṃsumaṇḍalaṃ paṭhamavākye alaṅkāriyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2414_4: hoti, munipadattho alaṅkāro hoti. Aparavākye ime dve vipallāsena alaṅkāriyaalaṅkārā
anya-e0812n0:2414_5: honti. Aṃsūnaṃ maṇḍalamiti ca, byāmaṃ eva aṃsumaṇḍalamiti ca, loko bandhu asseti
anya-e0812n0:2414_6: ca, sā viya dissatīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2416: Kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa, kriyāya ca guṇassa ca;
anya-e0812n0:2419_0: 320. Idāni sahavuttiṃ dasseti “kathana”miccādinā. Kriyāya guṇassa cāti dvinnaṃ sahabhāvassa
anya-e0812n0:2419_1: sahattassa kathanaṃ sahavuttīti viññeyyaṃ. Tadudāharaṇaṃ yathā tassa udāharaṇaṃ evaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2419_2: vakkhamānanayena daṭṭhabbanti. Saha saddhiṃ bhavanamiti ca, sahabhāvassa vutti kathanamiti
anya-e0812n0:2419_3: ca, tassa udāharaṇamiti ca viggaho. Sahabhāvo candarasminakhaṃsuādīnaṃ padatthānaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2419_4: Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ taṃsahattaṃ yassaṃ kriyāyaṃ guṇe vā bhavatīti sahattaṃ kriyāguṇānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2419_5: hotīti katvā “kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa cā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2424: 321. “Jalanti”iccādi. Samanti saha, tassa satthuno mukhacandimā. Sesaṃ subodhaṃ. Ettha jalanavijambhanānaṃ ubhayasādhāraṇānaṃ kriyānaṃ sahabhāvo vihitoti kriyāsahavutti ayanti.
anya-e0812n0:2425_0: 321. Idāni yathāpaṭiññātaudāharaṇaṃ dasseti “jalanti”iccādinā. Satthu satthuno nakhaṃsavo
anya-e0812n0:2425_1: nakhakiraṇā candaraṃsīhi samaṃ jalanti, tammukhacandimā ca candena samaṃ vijambhatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2425_3: esā kriyāsahavutti nāma. Candassa raṃsiyoti ca, nakhānaṃ aṃsavoti ca, tassa satthuno
anya-e0812n0:2425_4: mukhanti ca, tameva candimasadisattā candimāti ca vākyaṃ. Samaṃiti sahapariyāyo nipāto.
anya-e0812n0:2430_0: 322. “Jinodayena”ccādi. Jinodayena karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena vā dujjanacetasā saha
anya-e0812n0:2430_1: pāpaṃ malinaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ, sajjanacetasā saha disā dasavidhāpi suvimalā accantanimmalā
anya-e0812n0:2430_2: suvimalayasomālāvalayitattā sajjanaceto pāpāpagameneti. Ettha malinattassa ca suvimalattassa
anya-e0812n0:2431_0: 322. “Jino”iccādi. Jinodayena jitamārassa bhagavato pātubhāvena, karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtena
anya-e0812n0:2431_1: vā pāpaṃ lobhādidhammaṃ dujjanacetasā dujjanānaṃ cittena saha malinaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2431_2: Imināyeva jinodayena disā dasa disāyo sajjanacetasā saha suvimalā sajjanacetasantānato
anya-e0812n0:2431_3: pāpānaṃ apagamena kittimālāya bhuvanattaye patthaṭattā atinimmalāti ubhayapadatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2431_5: guṇasahavutti nāma. Jinassa udayoti ca, dujjanānaṃ cetoti ca, vigataṃ malaṃ etāhiti
anya-e0812n0:2431_6: ca, su atisayena vimalāti ca, santo ca te janā ceti ca, tesaṃ cetoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2435_1: yattha vuttivisese saṃsaggassa sannidhino dassanaṃ, kimatthaṃ? Samukkaṃsassa atisayassa
anya-e0812n0:2435_2: abhidhānatthaṃ kathanatthāya, sā ayaṃ virodhitā virodhīti matā.
anya-e0812n0:2436_0: 323. Idāni virodhālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “virodhīna”miccādinā. Yattha uttivisese samukkaṃsābhidhānatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2436_2: saṃsaggadassanaṃ sanniṭṭhānadassanaṃ sambandhadassanaṃ hoti, sā ayaṃ utti virodhitāti
anya-e0812n0:2436_3: matāti. Virodho etesaṃ guṇādīnaṃ atthīti ca, saṃsaggassa sambandhassa dassanamiti
anya-e0812n0:2436_4: ca, samukkaṃsassa adhikassa abhidhānanti ca, virodhīnaṃ bhāvo asaṅgahitoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2440_1: api guṇā arahantatādayo sevitā pāpasevīhi tesaṃ pāpasevīnaṃ mānasaṃ sampadūsenti
anya-e0812n0:2440_2: dosaduṭṭhāpādanavasenāvikaronti “tādiso guṇātisayo tassā”ti. Ettha guṇānaṃ sabhāvamadhurānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2441_0: 324. Udāharati “guṇā”iccādinā. Lokekabandhuno buddhassa guṇā arahattādayo sabhāvamadhurā
anya-e0812n0:2441_1: api pakatimadhurā api sevitā pāpasevīhi sevitā samānā pāpasevīnaṃ mānasaṃ sampadūsenti
anya-e0812n0:2441_2: atisayena kopentīti. Evaṃ hīnādhimuttikehi sahitumasakkuṇeyyo tassa guṇātisayo vattati.
anya-e0812n0:2441_3: Nanu sabhāvamadhuro guṇo pītiṃ vinā sampadūsanaṃ na kareyya, sampadūsanampi tādisasabhāvamadhuraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2441_4: vinā na bhaveyyāti aññoññaviruddhānamesaṃ madhuraguṇasampadūsanakriyānaṃ saṃsaggaguṇādhikadassanatthanti
anya-e0812n0:2441_5: lakkhaṇena yojetabbaṃ. Apisaddo virodhatthe vattate. Sabhāvena madhurāti ca, eko
anya-e0812n0:2441_6: ca so bandhu cāti ca, lokassa ekabandhūti ca, pāpaṃ sevanti sīlenāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2443: Yassa kassaci dānena, yassa kassaci vatthuno;
anya-e0812n0:2445: 325. Parivuttiṃ pavatteti “yassa”iccādinā. Yassa kassacīti paṭiggāhakaṃ dasseti. Visiṭṭhassa yaṃ ādānanti sambandho. Sesaṃ subodhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2446_0: 325. Idāni parivuttiṃ dasseti “yassa kassaci”ccādinā. Yassa kassaci vatthuno khuddakavatthuno
anya-e0812n0:2446_1: yassa kassaci paṭiggāhakassa dānena hetubhūtena visiṭṭhassa uttamavatthuno yaṃ ādānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2446_2: gahaṇaṃ atthi, sā parivuttīti matāti. Dānaggahaṇaparivuttattā parivutti nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2449: Muninā samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsirī muninda samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsiriṃ (ka.).
anya-e0812n0:2450: 326. Udāharati “purā”iccādi. Subodhaṃ. Ettha nayanādidānena sabbaññutāsiriyā ādānanti parivutti ayaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2451_0: 326. Idāni udāharati “purā”iccādinā. Muninā purā pubbe paresaṃ manuññaṃ nayanādikaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2451_1: datvāna idāni sabbaññutāsirī sabbaññutāsaṅkhātā anaññasādhāraṇā sirī samanupattāti.
anya-e0812n0:2451_2: Iha yassa dinnaṃ tato eva gahaṇe parivuttisaddassa niruḷhattā nayanādīnaṃ dānena
anya-e0812n0:2451_3: sabbaññutāsiriyā ādānato, dānābhāve ādānābhāvato ca paṭiggāhakajane avijjamānepi
anya-e0812n0:2451_4: sabbaññutā vijjamānattena parikappitāti parivutti hoti. Teneva daṇḍiyaṃ–
anya-e0812n0:2453: Ciraṃ citābhaṭo tesaṃ, yaso kumudapaṇḍaro”ti kābyādāsa 2.356.
anya-e0812n0:2454_0: Imasmiṃ udāharaṇe paccatthikānaṃ āyudhappahāraṃ datvā tava bāhunā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ ciraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2454_1: rāsikato keravanimmalo yaso ābhaṭoti. Dadāti kammayuttato eva ādānaṃ dassetvā parivuttiphuṭā
anya-e0812n0:2454_2: katā. Nayanāni ādīni yassa uttamaṅgādinoti ca, sabbaṃ jānātīti ca, tassa bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2460_0: 327. Bhamaṃ sambhāveti “kiñcī”tiādinā. Viññātā puriso kiñci disvā ujjalanādikaṃ disvāna
anya-e0812n0:2460_1: taṃsamaṃ tassa pure dissamānassa padatthassa sadisamaññaṃ vatthuṃ saṃsayāpagataṃ
anya-e0812n0:2460_2: asannidhiṃ katvā paṭipajjati jānāti yattha visese, sāyaṃ bhamo mato.
anya-e0812n0:2461_0: 327. Idāni bhamālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “kiñci”iccādinā. Yattha uttivisese viññātā avabodhakārako
anya-e0812n0:2461_1: kiñci disāvilocanādikaṃ disvāna taṃsamaṃ vatthuṃ tena dissamānavatthunā tulyamaññaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2461_2: vatthuṃ saṃsayāpagataṃ nissaṃsayaṃ katvā paṭipajjati jānāti, so ayaṃ alaṅkāro bhamoti
anya-e0812n0:2461_3: matoti. Tena tassa vā samanti ca, saṃsayo apagato etasmāti ca, bhamanaṃ anavaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2465_0: 328. Udāharati “sama”miccādi. Jinassa pādesu nakhaṃsunā disāsu sabbāsu samaṃ ekato
anya-e0812n0:2465_1: ujjalāsu sajotīsu tā ujjalā disā passantā janā, candātapoti mano yesaṃ te tathāvidhā.
anya-e0812n0:2466_0: 328. Idāni udāharati “sama”miccādinā. Jinapādanakhaṃsunā karaṇabhūtena disāsu dasasu
anya-e0812n0:2466_1: samaṃ ekakkhaṇe ujjalāsu tā ujjalā disā passantā janā candātapamanā candātapoti pavattacittā
anya-e0812n0:2466_2: abhinandantīti. Vijjamānanakhamarīciyaṃ buddhimakatvā candātape buddhiyā pavattāpanato
anya-e0812n0:2466_3: bhamo nāma. Samanti asaṅkhyaṃ. Candātapoiti mano yesanti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2472_0: 329. Bhāvaṃ bhāveti “pavuccate”ccādinā. Kavīnaṃ bhāvo adhippāyo, taṃ bodhetīti bhāvabodhanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2472_1: yaṃ nāmādi. Ādisaddena visesanavākyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Yena kenaci nisedhanarūpena ākārena
anya-e0812n0:2473_0: 329. Idāni bhāvālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “pavuccate” iccādinā. Kavīnaṃ vattūnaṃ bhāvabodhanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2473_1: adhippāyapakāsakaṃ yaṃ nāmādi nāmapadavisesanapadādi yena kenaci vaṇṇena ākārena
anya-e0812n0:2473_2: sāgarādiatthantaraṃ paṭisedhetvā vā no vā pavuccate, ayaṃ bhāvo nāmāti īritoti. Nāmaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2473_3: ādi yassa visesanavākyadvayasseti ca, bhāvaṃ bodhetīti ca vākyaṃ. Kavīnaṃ adhippāyasaṅkhātabhāvapakāsako
anya-e0812n0:2473_4: uttiviseso tadatthena bhāvo nāma, tassa nissayabhūtaṃ nāmādipadasantānaṃ iha nissitopacārena
anya-e0812n0:2479_0: 330. Udāharati “nanu”ccādi. Manampīti īsakampi. Mariyādanti attano ācārasīmaṃ, saṃvaṭṭepi
anya-e0812n0:2479_1: palayakālepi. Sesaṃ subodhaṃ. Ettha na ime pakatisamuddādayo samuddādayo honti, ye
anya-e0812n0:2479_2: palayakāle attano velānullaṅghanasaṅkhātaṃ acalattasaṅkhātañca mariyādaṃ pariccajanti.
anya-e0812n0:2479_3: Kiñcarahi santā evete samuddādayo, ye yadi palayakālepi samāpateyyuṃ, tadāpi attano
anya-e0812n0:2479_4: mariyādaṃ na muñcanti. Koci vipattiṃ patto niratisayaṃ dhīrattamattanovabodhetīti
anya-e0812n0:2479_5: aññanisedhena kathitaṃ nāmaṃ kavisabhāvaṃ yathāvuttaṃ bodhetīti bhāvoyamiti.
anya-e0812n0:2480_0: 330. Idāni udāharati “nanu”ccādinā. Sāgarā saṃvaṭṭakāle tīramariyādaṃ atikkamentā
anya-e0812n0:2480_1: pakatisamuddā sāgarā na bhavanti. Kulācalā tādisakāle acalasaṅkhātamariyādamatikkamentā
anya-e0812n0:2480_2: satta kulapabbatā kulācalā nāma na bhavanti. Kiñcarahi sāgarādayo. Ye sādhavo saṃvaṭṭepi
anya-e0812n0:2480_3: sabbavatthuvināsakakappavināsakālepi mariyādaṃ attano ācāramariyādaṃ manampi īsakampi
anya-e0812n0:2480_4: no jahanti. Santā eva te sāgarādayo nāma honti nanūti. Koci byasanaṃ patto attano
anya-e0812n0:2480_5: anaññasādhāraṇaṃ dhīrattaṃ pakāsetīti iha sāgarādiatthantarapaṭisedharūpena dassitasāgarādinā
anya-e0812n0:2480_6: vattuno akampanādhippāyaṃ avabodhetīti ayaṃ bhāvālaṅkāro nāma. Mananti appakālavācakamasaṅkhyaṃ. Apīti sambhāvane.
anya-e0812n0:2484_0: 331. Missaṃ dasseti “aṅga”iccādinā. Aṅgamupakārakaṃ, aṅgī upakāriyaṃ, tesaṃ bhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2484_1: aṅgaṅgibhāvo sādhiyasādhanattaṃ, tato ca. Sadisaṃ samaṃ balaṃ yesaṃ te, tesaṃ bhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2484_2: aṅgaṅgibhāvamantarena appadhānabhāvenāvaṭṭhānaṃ tato ca hetuto. Bandhane visaye,
anya-e0812n0:2484_3: yo alaṅkatīnaṃ saṃsaggo ekattha sannidhānaṃ, taṃ missanti pavuccati.
anya-e0812n0:2485_1: hetubhūtena sadisabalabhāvā ca sādhiyasādhanabhāvaṃ vinā samānabalavantabhāvena ca
anya-e0812n0:2485_2: bandhane pajjādibandhanavisaye alaṅkatīnaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ yo saṃsaggo sannidhānaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0812n0:2485_3: missanti pavuccatīti. Aṅgaṃ sādhanaṃ assa sādhiyassa atthīti ca, aṅgañca aṅgī ceti
anya-e0812n0:2485_4: ca, tesaṃ bhāvo sādhiyasādhanasaṅkhāto sambandhoti ca, sadisaṃ balaṃ yesamalaṅkārānamiti
anya-e0812n0:2485_5: ca, tesaṃ bhāvo aññamaññanirapekkhatāti ca, missanaṃ missībhavanamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2489: Aho gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
anya-e0812n0:2490_0: 332. Udāharati “pasatthā muni”ccādi. Munino pādesu nakhā tesaṃ raṃsi eva mahānadīsadisattā
anya-e0812n0:2490_1: mahānadī, sā pasatthā acchariyappattisabbhāvato gāḷhamaccantaṃ nimuggepi te jane
anya-e0812n0:2490_2: sukhayatyeva, aho acchariyaṃ yato sesanadīvidhuraṃ. “Ayaṃ attani gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi
anya-e0812n0:2491_0: 332. Idāni udāharati “pasatthā” iccādinā. Munino pasatthā acchariyattā pasaṃsanīyā
anya-e0812n0:2491_2: te jane sādhusappurise sukhayati eva sukhite kato eva. Aho acchariyaṃ sesanadīnamesā
anya-e0812n0:2491_3: pavatti viruddhāti. Ettha sādhanīyabhāvena aṅgino “nimugge”ti samādhialaṅkārassa
anya-e0812n0:2491_5: imesaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ missitā. Pādesu nakhāti ca, tesaṃ raṃsīti ca, mahatī ca sā nadī
anya-e0812n0:2491_6: ceti ca, mahānadī viya mahānadī pādanakharaṃsiyo eva mahānadīti ca vākyaṃ. Gāḷhanti
anya-e0812n0:2491_7: kriyāvisesanaṃ. Gāḷhaṃ nimujjanaṃ ye akaṃsu, tepīti yojanā. Sukhasamaṅgino janā sukhite
anya-e0812n0:2495: Madhūvamunino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2497_0: 333. “Veso”iccādi. Munino sabhāvamadhuro pakatimadhuro veso jināveṇiko buddhaveso
anya-e0812n0:2497_1: ca nettarasāyanaṃ rūpaṃ lakkhaṇānubyañjanasampannaṃ rūpañca madhūva madhurattena
anya-e0812n0:2497_2: madhusamānā vācā bhāratī ca kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇetīti. “Sabhāvamadhuro”ti samādhialaṅkāro
anya-e0812n0:2497_3: ca, “nettarasāyana”nti rūpakālaṅkāro ca, “madhūvā”ti upamālaṅkāro cāti ime tayo pīṇane
anya-e0812n0:2497_4: aññamaññāpekkharahitattā tulyabalāti imesaṃ missattaṃ hoti. Sabhāvena madhuroti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2497_5: rasīyati assādīyatīti ca, raso rasabhūto āyanaṃ gati pavatti assāti rasāyanaṃ, rasavatthu.
anya-e0812n0:2497_6: Rasāyanamiva rūpaṃ rasāyanaṃ, nettānaṃ rasāyananti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2503_0: 334. Āsiṃ dasseti “āsi”ccādinā. Iṭṭhassa abhimatassa vatthuno āsīsanaṃ patthanamityanuvaditvā
anya-e0812n0:2503_1: āsī nāma siyāti vidhīyate. “Yathe”tyudāharati. Tilokassa lokattayavattino janassa
anya-e0812n0:2503_2: ekagati asahāyagati paṭisaraṇabhūto nātho lokaṃ sattalokaṃ apāyato pātu pāletūti.
anya-e0812n0:2504_0: 334. Idāni āsīalaṅkāraṃ dasseti “āsī” iccādinā. Iṭṭhassa atthassa icchitavatthuno
anya-e0812n0:2504_1: āsīsanā patthanā āsī nāma siyā. Yathā tatthodāharaṇamevaṃ. Tilokekagati tibhavassa
anya-e0812n0:2504_2: asahāyasaraṇabhūto nātho lokasāmi lokaṃ sattalokaṃ apāyato pātu rakkhatūti. Āsī nāma
anya-e0812n0:2504_3: patthanā, taddīpikāpi utti tannāmikāva hoti. “Tilokekagatī”ti imasmiṃ udāharaṇe pālanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2504_4: āsīsitaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ samāhāroti ca, ekoyeva gati paṭisaraṇanti ca, tilokassa
anya-e0812n0:2508_1: patītijanakaṃ avagamasampādakaṃ jāyate, taṃ vibhūsanaṃ rasavantavidhānato sampādanato
anya-e0812n0:2509_0: 335. Uddese rasīti uddiṭṭharasālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “rasa”iccādinā. Yaṃ vibhūsanaṃ vuttālaṅkārānamantare
anya-e0812n0:2509_1: yo koci alaṅkāro rasappatītijanakaṃ siṅgārādinavavidharasesu ekassa rasassa vā tasseva
anya-e0812n0:2509_2: rasābhāsassa vā avabodhanaṃ sampādento jāyate, taṃ vibhūsanaṃ rasavantavidhānato
anya-e0812n0:2509_3: attano rasasahitabhāvassa pakāsanato rasavantanti rasīti ñeyyanti. Yathā atthappatītijanako
anya-e0812n0:2509_4: saddo “atthavā”ti vuccati, evaṃ rasappatītijanako alaṅkāro rasavanto “rasī”ti ca
anya-e0812n0:2509_5: vuccati. Rasassa patīti ca, taṃ janetīti ca, raso assa atthīti ca, rasavato bhāvoti
anya-e0812n0:2509_6: ca, tassa vidhānaṃ sampādananti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2515_0: 336. Udāharati “rāga”iccādi. Dharāya pathavīaṅganāya rāgena ānataṃ, mukhaṃ. Rāgaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2515_1: rattavaṇṇaṃ ānataṃ ninnamitaṃ, sarojaṃ. Paṭhame abbhutasarojasadisatāya mukhaṃ, tena
anya-e0812n0:2515_2: samānādhikaraṇanti rāgānatena samāso. Dutiye tu rāgānatañca taṃ abbhutasarojaṃ pathaviṃ
anya-e0812n0:2515_3: bhinditvā sirīpādasampaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ uṭṭhahamacchariyapadumañca, tameva tassā mukhasadisattā
anya-e0812n0:2515_4: mukhanti rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ. Tilokaguruno sammāsambuddhassa pādā. Kīdisā?
anya-e0812n0:2515_5: Adhikabandho rāgo anurāgo, rattavaṇṇo vā yesaṃ te, tathāvidhā. Niccamanavarataṃ sarasena
anya-e0812n0:2515_6: rasavatā karena hatthena, raṃsinā vā gāḷhaṃ ādāya gahetvā satataṃ niccaṃ āhito sambhamo
anya-e0812n0:2515_7: ādaro, tadabhimukhatā vā, tena sañcumbayanti, nikkhipanti vā. Ettha silesarūpakehi
anya-e0812n0:2515_8: sambhogasiṅgārarasābhāso janyate. Siṅgāro duvidho vippalambho, sambhogo ceti. Tesu
anya-e0812n0:2515_9: vippalambhova samaggavaṇṇanādhārattā manoharo, nediso sambhogo. Sambhogābhāse tu
anya-e0812n0:2515_11: kiñci vicāressāma. Tatra pādānaṃ kāmukattaṃ dharāya kāminittañca vākyasāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n0:2515_12: viññāyate. Saddena vuccamānaṃ puna vuttaṃ siyā. Atra pādānaṃ taṃ viññeyyaṃ, ratyukkaṃsābhāso
anya-e0812n0:2515_13: yadi kavinā paṭipādetabbo na bhaveyya, tadā gāthāyamananupapannaṃ siyāti evaṃvidhavacanatova
anya-e0812n0:2515_14: pādā ratyābhāsavantoti gamyate. Ratiyā ālambaṇavibhāvābhāso dharākāmini, rammadesādivisesābhāve
anya-e0812n0:2515_17: hi “niccasarasena karena gāḷhaṃ ādāyā”ti karassa sarasatāgāḷhaggahaṇakathanena harisādayo
anya-e0812n0:2515_18: gamyante. “Satatāhitasambhamenā”ti iminā ussukkattādayo pahīyantīti evaṃ bandhavuttīti
anya-e0812n0:2515_19: vibhāvādīhi bandhatthābhāsānaṃ manasi yo uppajjati ānandābhāso, so rasābhāso sambhogarasābhāso vuttoti.
anya-e0812n0:2516_1: anurūpato siṅgārarasayuttameva dasseti “rāgā”iccādinā. Dharāya mahīaṅganāya rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2516_2: rāgena anurāgena abhimukhaṃ katvā namitaṃ acchariyaguṇopetapadumasadisānanaṃ no ce,
anya-e0812n0:2516_4: sammāsambuddhassa pādā adhikabaddharāgā adhikabaddhānurāgavantā no ce, pubbakammena
anya-e0812n0:2516_5: kataadhikarattavaṇṇā niccasarasena karena satatānurāgayuttena hatthena no ce, avikalattā
anya-e0812n0:2516_6: satatasampattisahitena kiraṇena gāḷhaṃ ādāya gāḷhaṃ gahetvā no ce, phusitvā satatāhitasambhamena
anya-e0812n0:2516_7: niccaṃ katādarena no ce, nirantarāhitaabhimukhabhāvena sañcumbayanti cumbanti no
anya-e0812n0:2517_0: Rāgena anurāgena ānataṃ abhimukhīkatamiti ca, abbhutañca taṃ sarojañceti ca, tena
anya-e0812n0:2517_1: sadisatāya abbhutasarojañca taṃ mukhañceti ca, rāgānatañca taṃ abbhutasarojamukhañceti
anya-e0812n0:2517_2: ca, rāgaṃ rattavaṇṇaṃ ānataṃ ninnamiti ca, tañca taṃ abbhutasarojañceti ca, tameva
anya-e0812n0:2517_3: tādisamukhasadisattā mukhamiti ca, tilokassa gurūti ca, adhikaṃ katvā baddho, attano
anya-e0812n0:2517_4: pubbakammena vā kato, rāgo anurāgo rattavaṇṇo vā yesamiti ca, rasena anurāgena sampattiyā
anya-e0812n0:2517_5: vā saha vattamānoti ca, āhito vihito ca so sambhamo ādaro tadabhimukhabhāvo vā ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2518_1: ca sambhogasiṅgārarasābhāso uppādīyati. Tādisaṃ itthipurisānaṃ sambhogābhāvena, tadākārena
anya-e0812n0:2518_2: ca kappitattā rasābhāso nāmāti daṭṭhabbo. Siṅgārassa āyogavippayogasambhogavasena
anya-e0812n0:2518_3: tividhattepi āyogavippayogadvayaṃ vippalambhamevāti vippalambho, sambhogo ceti duvidho
anya-e0812n0:2518_4: hoti. Tesu vippalambhova anūnavaṇṇanāya bhūmittā manoharo. Sambhogo pana tādiso na
anya-e0812n0:2518_5: hoti. Sambhogābhāsopi hīno hoti. Evaṃ sante payogaṃ katvā kurumānāya vaṇṇanāya ucitabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:2518_7: veditabbo. Pādānaṃ kāmukabhāvābhāse ca dharāya kāminībhāvābhāse ca vācakapadena avuttepi
anya-e0812n0:2518_8: “dharāya pādā tilokaguruno”ti idaṃ ṭhapetvā pāṇidhammapakāsakehi avasesapadehi ñāyate.
anya-e0812n0:2519_0: Dvinnaṃ aññamaññaṃ ratiābhāso “adhikabaddharāgā rāgānata”nti imehi vutto. Ayaṃ ratiābhāso
anya-e0812n0:2519_1: idha ṭhāyībhāvo purisaratiyā itthiyā ca, itthiratiyā purisassa ca ālambaṇattā pādakāmukadharākāminiyo
anya-e0812n0:2519_2: dve aññamaññaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvābhāsā honti. Rammadesādivisesaṃ vinā acchariyapadumodayassa
anya-e0812n0:2519_3: abhāvato abbhutasarojasaddassa uccāraṇena gammamānā rammadesādayo ratiṃ uddīpayantīti
anya-e0812n0:2519_4: uddīpanavibhāvābhāsā nāma. “Niccasarasena karena gāḷhamādāyā”ti iminā karassa sarasabhāvassa
anya-e0812n0:2519_5: ca gāḷhaṃ gahaṇassa ca vuttattā harisādayo ñāyante. “Satatāhitasambhamenā”ti iminā
anya-e0812n0:2519_6: ussāhādayo ñāyanti. Tattha harisaussāhādayo byabhicārībhāvābhāsā nāma honti. Te byabhicārībhāvābhāse
anya-e0812n0:2519_7: pakāsentāni yathāvuttakavivacanāni anubhāvābhāsā nāmāti evaṃ bandhe dissamānaṭhāyībhāvabyabhicārībhāvavibhāvaanubhāvehi
anya-e0812n0:2519_8: atthāvabodhaṃ karontānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ uppajjamāno yo santosābhāsasaṅkhāto rasābhāso
anya-e0812n0:2519_9: atthi, so idha sambhogarasābhāsoti kathitoti. Ṭhāyībhāvādayo upari āvibhavissanti.
anya-e0812n0:2529_0: 337. Evamuddesānukkamena yathāpaṭiññātaṃ niṭṭhapetvā idāni nigamanapubbakaṃ bahuttamesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2529_1: niddisitumāha “icci”ccādi. Iti iminā vuttappakārena purimānaṃ daṇḍīādīnaṃ ācariyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2529_2: ānubhāvaṃ bandhalakkhaṇāni anugamma anugantvā alaṅkatīnamalaṅkārānaṃ ayaṃ bhedo saṅkhepato
anya-e0812n0:2529_3: nigadito kathito. Saṅkhepatoti vutto, kasmāti āha “uparūparī”tiādi. Uparūpari dīghakālamārabbha
anya-e0812n0:2529_4: yāvedāni matthakamatthake kavīhi vikappiyānaṃ pabhediyamānānaṃ tāsamalaṅkatīnaṃ antaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2529_5: pariyantaṃ passituṃ khalu ekantena ko nāma jano alaṃ samattho.
anya-e0812n0:2532_0: 337. Evaṃ uddesakkamena yathāpaṭiññāte atthālaṅkāre niṭṭhapetvā idāni nigamanamukhena
anya-e0812n0:2532_1: esaṃ atthālaṅkārānaṃ bahubhāvaṃ dasseti “iccānugamma”iccādinā. Iti yathāvuttanayena
anya-e0812n0:2532_3: anugamma alaṅkatīnaṃ ayaṃ bhedo saṅkhepato nigadito mayā vutto saṅgahito. Kasmāti
anya-e0812n0:2532_4: ce? Uparūpari dīghakālato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā kavīhi racanākattārehi vikappiyānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2532_5: anekappakārato kappiyamānattā puthakkariyamānānaṃ tāsamalaṅkatīnaṃ antaṃ pariyantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2532_6: passituṃ khalu ekantena ko nāma puggalo alaṃ samatthoti. Saṅgahamanādiyitvā kenāpi
anya-e0812n0:2532_7: pariyantaṃ adhigantuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo. Pure bhavāti ca, purimā ca te ācariyā
anya-e0812n0:2532_8: ceti ca, tesamānubhāvoti ca, visesato asaṅkarato kappiyanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2539_4: paññā. Sā hi sarasaracanāyaccantopakārikā, tatova kabbaṃ “paṭibhāna”nti vuccati.
anya-e0812n0:2539_5: Tenāha “paṭibhānavatā”ti. Kavinā lokavohārānugantabbo. Yo hi sakalaṃ lokavohāraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2539_6: nānusarati, so kaviyeva na hoti. Tenāha “lokavohāramanusārinā”ti. Yato ocityaṃ nāma
anya-e0812n0:2539_7: kavīnaṃ paramaṃ rahassaṃ lokavohārepi ucitaññūyeva pasaṃsīyate, samucitalokavohārānusāreneva
anya-e0812n0:2539_8: ca vakkhamānānukkamena viracitā racanā sacetanānaṃ rasassādāya sampajjate, tasmā
anya-e0812n0:2539_9: ocitye samullasattaṃ dittaṃ phuṭameva bandhanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tatovaccantamocityasamullāsavedinā
anya-e0812n0:2539_11: ettha visesanaṃ, “kavinā”ti cetaṃ “nibandhā”ti ettha avutto kattā.
anya-e0812n0:2540_5: sakalaloke vohārānurūpamanugatena tato yasmā ocityaṃ nāma hadayato abahi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2540_6: rahassamiva bandhato viyojanīyaṃ na hoti. Tasmā paramatisayena ocityasamullāsavedinā
anya-e0812n0:2540_7: ucitabhāvena vattumicchitatthassa uddīpanasseva anurūpappakārena iṭṭhatthassa samullāsanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2540_8: dittiṃ jānantena kavinā bandhakārakena nibandhāti sambandho. Paṭibhā paṭibhānanti
anya-e0812n0:2540_9: paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ, tato jātakabbassapi paṭibhāti vuccamānattā ayaṃ paññāviseso racanāya
anya-e0812n0:2540_10: accantopakāroti ñātabbo. Paṭibhānamassatthīti ca, lokassa vohāroti ca, taṃ anugacchati
anya-e0812n0:2540_11: sīlenāti ca, ocityena samullāsoti ca, taṃ vijānāti sīlenāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2544_0: 339. “Ṭhāyi”ccādi. Ṭhāyino vakkhamānaratyādayo tehi saha sambandho vibhāvādīhi yoge
