anya-e0812n0:2544_2: vakkhamānalakkhaṇehīti sānubhāvakā, bhāvo vibhāvo ca, vakkhamāno bhāvena bhāvābhāsopi
anya-e0812n0:2545_0: 339. “Ṭhāyi”ccādi. Ṭhāyīsambandhino ṭhāyīpadena, tena vāccaratihāsādiatthena vā sambandhupagatā
anya-e0812n0:2545_1: sānubhāvakā vakkhamānānubhāvehi saha pavattā bhāvavibhāvā vakkhamānabhāvavibhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2545_2: nibandhā vuttaguṇopetakavinā bandhitā ekattha āharitvā dassitā sādhunaṃ issādidosarahitānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2545_3: sajjanānaṃ rasassādāya siṅgārādivakkhamānarasassa assādanatthaṃ sampajjanti pavattantīti.
anya-e0812n0:2545_4: Imāya gāthāya ṭhāyībhāvo byabhicārībhāvo kevalabhāvo vibhāvo anubhāvo raso ceti ime
anya-e0812n0:2545_5: uddiṭṭhā bhavanti, kathanti ce? Bhāvavibhāvānaṃ “ṭhāyīsambandhino”ti visesanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0812n0:2545_6: tena bhāvassa ṭhāyī ca so bhāvo ceti ca ṭhāyīpadena sambandhattā ṭhāyībhāvo ca, puna
anya-e0812n0:2545_7: byabhicārībhāve sati “ṭhāyībhāvo”ti imassa sādhakattā imasseva ṭhāyībhāvapadassa
anya-e0812n0:2545_8: payogasāmatthiyena gammamāno byabhicārībhāvo ca, puna ṭhāyīpadena samāsamakatvā visuṃ
anya-e0812n0:2545_9: dassitabhāvasaddasutiyā ṭhāyībhāvabyabhicārībhāvehi añño bhāvo ca, tathā eva ṭhāyīpadena
anya-e0812n0:2545_10: vāccaratihāsādiatthassa uppattiuddīpanadvayaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā sajjetvā ṭhitattā tehi
anya-e0812n0:2545_11: ratihāsādīhi atthehi sambandhino ālambaṇauddīpanasaṅkhatavividhavibhāvā ca, evameva
anya-e0812n0:2545_12: sānubhāvakapadena samāyogena dassitānubhāvo ca, “rasassādāyā”ti iminā niddiṭṭharaso
anya-e0812n0:2545_13: cāti evamime ṭhāyībhāvādayo uddiṭṭhā honti. Ṭhāyinā saha sambandhoti ca, so etesamatthīti
anya-e0812n0:2545_14: ca, bhāvo ca vibhāvo ceti ca, saha anubhāvehi vattantīti ca, rasassa assādoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2550_0: 340. Idāni yathāuddiṭṭhesu ṭhāyādīhi bhāvavibhāvānubhāvarasesu paṭhamaṃ bhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
anya-e0812n0:2550_2: tāva visesā visiṭṭhasabhāvatthāti cittavuttivisesā. Ratyādayo ṭhāyībyabhicārīsāttikā.
anya-e0812n0:2550_3: Tusaddo visese. Yato rase siṅgārādayo bhāvayanti nipphādenti. Tato bhāvasaddena parikittitā
anya-e0812n0:2550_4: bharatādīhi kathitā. Ettha hi ṇyanto bhūdhātu karaṇe vattate. Yato cāyaṃ na kevalaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2550_5: karaṇeyeva vattate, atha kho byāpane, paṭipādane ca, tasmāssa paṭibhānaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayanti
anya-e0812n0:2550_6: byāpenti. Atha vā kavino lokaṭṭhitiñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ adhippāyaṃ bhāvayanti paṭipādentīti
anya-e0812n0:2551_0: 340. Idāni uddiṭṭhesu ṭhāyībhāvādīsu ṭhāyīādīnaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ (ka.) tiṇṇaṃ sādhāraṇo
anya-e0812n0:2551_1: bhāvo nāma esoti dassento anvatthavasena dasseti “citta”iccādi. Cittavuttivisesā
anya-e0812n0:2551_2: tu cittassa uttari vakkhamānārammaṇahasanasocanādīhi, nibbedādīhi, thambhādīhi ca
anya-e0812n0:2551_3: ākārehi pavattisaṅkhātā aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarākārasaṅkhātā visesā pana ṭhāyībyabhicārīsāttikā
anya-e0812n0:2551_4: yato yasmā rase siṅgārādirase bhāvayanti nipphādenti karonti. No ce, rase siṅgārādirasavisaye
anya-e0812n0:2551_5: paṇḍitānaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayanti byāpanaṃ karonti. No ce, tasmiṃyeva rasavisaye kavino
anya-e0812n0:2551_6: lokasabhāvaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattañāṇalakkhaṇaṃ adhippāyaṃ bhāvayanti paṭipādanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2551_7: karonti. Tato bhāvasaddena hetukattari nipphannena ratyādayo ratihāsādayo parikittitā
anya-e0812n0:2551_8: bharatādīhi vuttā hontīti. “Ratyādayo”ti ettha ādisaddena hāsādayo ṭhāyībhāvā ca,
anya-e0812n0:2551_9: nibbedādayo byabhicārībhāvā ca, thambhapalayādayo sāttikabhāvā ca saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2551_10: Cittassa vuttiyoti ca, tā eva visesāti ca, bhāvo iti saddoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2558_0: 341. Ṭhāyādike tividhe bhāve kamenāha “virodhinā”iccādinā. Virodhinā aññena jigucchādinā
anya-e0812n0:2558_1: bhāvena yo bhāvo ratyādiko na tirohito nacchādito, eso bhāvo anucchijjamānattā eva
anya-e0812n0:2558_2: tiṭṭhati sīlenāti, ṭhāyī eva bhāvoti ṭhāyībhāvoti saddito kathito. Yo bhāvādīhi ālokitassādaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2558_3: nīto samānīto, so sāmājikehi assādiyamānattā rasoti vuccati. Vakkhati hi “savibhāva”iccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2559_0: 341. Idāni ṭhāyīādike tividhabhāve kamena niddisati “virodhi”iccādinā. Virodhinā
anya-e0812n0:2559_1: aññabhāvena ratihāsādīnaṃ viruddhena jigucchādinā aññabhāvena yo bhāvo ratihāsādiko
anya-e0812n0:2559_2: tirohito na byavahito na hoti, eso viruddhabhāvena abyavahito bhāvo tiṭṭhati sīlenāti
anya-e0812n0:2559_3: iminā atthena ṭhāyī nāma hotīti katvā ṭhāyībhāvoti saddito kathitoti. Yo vibhāvānubhāvādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2559_4: assādanīyattaṃ pāpito sabbhehi assādanīyattā rasoti vuccati, so ṭhāyī nāmāti vuccati.
anya-e0812n0:2559_5: Añño ca so bhāvo ceti ca, tiro kayiritthāti ca, ṭhāyī ca so bhāvo ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2566_0: 342. Ratyādīnaṃ navannameva ṭhāyitvaṃ sambhavatītyāha “rati”ccādi. Samo ceti evaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2566_1: ṭhāyino navāti yojanā. Navevete sakasakavibhāvānubhāvehi samullāsitā visumpi bandhitabbā
anya-e0812n0:2566_2: kavinā, abhinetabbā ca naṭena, tathā sesabhāvāpi. Tattha yadi panāyaṃ rati asesaitthipurisaguṇayuttānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2566_3: itthipurisānaṃ aññamaññaṃ janitā, candādīhi uddīpanavibhāvehi uddīpitā, ussukkatādibādhakehi
anya-e0812n0:2566_4: anubhāvehi paripositā, sakasakānubhāvasāmatthiyā patīyamānehi anekarūpehi byabhicārīhi
anya-e0812n0:2566_5: cittatā siyā, tadā tu ṭhāyī rati naṭābhinayena, subandhasavanena vā sabbhehi assādiyamānā
anya-e0812n0:2566_6: siṅgārarasattamāpajjate. Evaṃ yathāyogaṃ hāsādiṭhāyībhāvānaṃ hassarasādibhāvāpajjane yuttiṃ samanneyya.
anya-e0812n0:2567_0: 342. Ṭhāyībhāvo nāma ratyādayo naveveti dassetuṃ “ratihāsā”tiādimāha. Ratihāsā ca
anya-e0812n0:2567_1: soko ca kodhussāhabhayampi ca jigucchāvimhayā ceva samo santaguṇo cāti evaṃ ṭhāyino
anya-e0812n0:2567_2: nava honti. Imesaṃ ratyādīnaṃ navannaṃ sarūpakathanaṃ “siṅgārahassakaruṇā”tiādikāya
anya-e0812n0:2567_3: uddesagāthāya anantare niddese pākaṭo hoti. Rati ca hāso cāti ca, kodho ca ussāho
anya-e0812n0:2567_4: ca bhayañceti ca, jigucchā ca vimhayā ceti ca vākyaṃ. Ime nava ca evaṃ byabhicārībhāvasāttikābhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2567_5: ceti ime yathāsakamanurūpavibhāvānubhāvehi dittaṃ katvā paccekaṃ kavinā bandhitabbā,
anya-e0812n0:2567_6: naṭena gahetvā dassitabbā ca. Imesu tividhabhāvesu ayaṃ rati asesapumitthiguṇehi
anya-e0812n0:2567_7: yuttehi naranārīhi aññamaññaṃ uppāditā, candādīhi uddīpanavibhāvehi uddīpitā, ussāhādipakāsakakāyikavācasikapayogasaṅkhātānubhāvena
anya-e0812n0:2567_9: hoti. Īdisā’yaṃ rati naṭassa abhinayena ca pasatthabandhasavanena ca sabbhehi assādiyamānasiṅgārādirasattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2567_10: pāpuṇātīti viññātabbā. Hāsādīnaṃ sesaṭhāyībhāvānaṃ hassarasādibhāvāpattiyaṃ yutti
anya-e0812n0:2574_0: 343. Byabhicārino āha “tirobhāva”iccādinā. Tirobhāvo ṭhāyīnaṃ ekassāpi bhāvassa nibbedādino
anya-e0812n0:2574_1: aciraṭṭhāyitā ca āvibhāvo pākaṭatā ca nānārasanissayattā te ādayo yassa. Ādisaddena
anya-e0812n0:2574_2: ṭhāyīdhammassa sukhadukkhādirūpassa gahaṇaṃ, sova viseso, tena. Ṭhāyīdhammassa sukhadukkharūpassa
anya-e0812n0:2574_3: gahaṇaṃ, attano dhammassa sukhadukkharūpassa ṭhāyini samāropanañcābhimukhyaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0812n0:2574_4: hi ratiyaṃ parisamo sukhānuviddho bhavati, soke dukkhānuviddho. Ratiyaṃ sukhasabhāvāpi
anya-e0812n0:2574_5: gilānippabhutayo byabhicārino sakammaṃ dukkhamimaṃ samāropayanteva. Tato tena abhimukhabhāvena
anya-e0812n0:2574_6: ye ete bhāvā sīlena caranti pavattanti, te byabhicārino hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2575_1: Tirobhāvāvibhāvādivisesena byabhicārībhāvānaṃ attano anekarasaṃ nissāya pavattattā,
anya-e0812n0:2575_2: lokassa bhinnarucikattā ca kismiñci ṭhāyībhāve byabhicārībhāvānamattano guṇassa līnattañca
anya-e0812n0:2575_3: kismiñci tasseva guṇassa pākaṭattañcātiādikena visesena abhimukhyato ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2575_4: sukhadukkharūpaṃ attani ca attano sukhadukkharūpaṃ ṭhāyībhāvesu ca āropanasaṅkhātena
anya-e0812n0:2575_5: abhimukhabhāvena yete bhāvā sīlena caranti pakatiyā pavattanti, te bhāvā byabhicārino
anya-e0812n0:2575_6: nāma hontīti. Evameva evarūpā (ka.) pīḷā sarūpena eko parisamasaṅkhatabyabhicārībhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2575_7: ratiyaṃ saguṇena līno sukhānuviddho hutvā, soke saguṇena pākaṭo dukkhānuviddho ca
anya-e0812n0:2575_8: hutvā pavattate. Evameva sukhasabhāvaratiyaṃ gilānādayo byabhicārino sakiyaṃ dukkhasarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2575_9: āropentīti katvā tirobhāvavibhāvādivisesena abhimukhaṃ pavattanti. Tirobhavanamiti
anya-e0812n0:2575_10: ca, āvibhavanamiti ca, tirobhāvo ca āvibhāvo ceti ca, te ādayo yassa ṭhāyībhāvesu
anya-e0812n0:2575_11: vijjamānānaṃ sukhadukkhasabhāvānaṃ attani āropanasseti ca, soyeva visesoti ca, abhimukhānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2575_12: bhāvoti ca viggaho. Byabhicārīpade visaddo visesatthe abhisaddo abhimukhabhāve vattati.
anya-e0812n0:2586_0: 344. Te dasseti “nibbedo”iccādinā. Dīnatuggālasattanti dīnatā ca uggatañca ālasattañca,
anya-e0812n0:2586_1: gilāni ussukaiti ussukkaṃ. Capalaiti cāpallaṃ, saha capalena sacapalo, so cāyaṃ byādhi
anya-e0812n0:2586_2: ca, maraṇañca sacapalabyādhi ca samāhāre. Tañca saha biḷāya vattatīti sabiḷanti ete
anya-e0812n0:2586_3: yathāvuttabyabhicārībhāvā tettiṃsa hontīti. Ussāhavatā vīraraso taṃvaseneva assādīyati.
anya-e0812n0:2586_4: Bhīrunā tu sova bhayānakarasavaseneti lokasabhāvassa anekattā tadatthamete byabhicārino
anya-e0812n0:2586_5: ekekassarasassa bahavo vaṇṇanīyā, yato taṃvaṇṇanādvārena sabbopi tesu kiñci assādetīti.
anya-e0812n0:2586_6: Tattha yasmā pana māraṇopagataveridassanamekameva taṅkhaṇeyeva bhinnaṃ pakativasena
anya-e0812n0:2586_7: bhīruno bhayassa hetu, saṅgāmalolassa tu ussāhanimittaṃ siyā. Tathā naṭena kataṃ
anya-e0812n0:2586_8: vikatamābharaṇaṃ kriyāvā nīcapakatīnaṃ ṭhāyino hāsassa hetu, gambhīrapakatīnaṃ byabhicārino
anya-e0812n0:2586_9: hāsassa, tasmā bhāve vaṇṇayatā kavinā bhāvā tathā vaṇṇanīyā, yathocityapariposo siyā.
anya-e0812n0:2587: Tesu nibbedo attāvamānanaṃ. Tassa ca itthīnañca nīcānañca dāliddiyaṃ vibhāvo, yogīnaṃ tu tatvasaṃvedanaṃ vibhāvo, assupatanacintādayo ettha anubhāvā.
anya-e0812n0:2588: Takko vitakkanaṃ. Tassa sandeho vibhāvo, sirokampādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2590: Samo khedo. Tattha gatyādi vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2591: Dhiti santoso. Ñāṇādi vibhāvo, anubhāvo bhogālolatādi.
anya-e0812n0:2592: Jaḷatā appaṭipatti. Tassā iṭṭhāniṭṭhadassanādi vibhāvo, animisanayanālocanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2593: Dīnatā cetaso anojatā. Tassā vibhāvo duggatatādi, anubhāvo malinavatthatādi.
anya-e0812n0:2594: Uggatā dāruṇattaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo balavāparādhādi, tassa anubhāvo tajjanādi.
anya-e0812n0:2597: Tāso cittakkhobho. Vibhāvo assa gajjitādi, kampanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2599: Kālakkhamatā ussukaṃ. Vibhāvo tassa ramaṇīyadassanicchādi, anubhāvo turitatādi.
anya-e0812n0:2600: Cetopasādo harito. Tatra ussavādi vibhāvo, assusedādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2602: Paresamukkaṃsāsahanatā issā. Tassā dujjanattagabbādayo vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2603: Visādo khedo. Vibhāvo tassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhādi, bādhayatāpādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2604: Abahitthā kāyasaṃvaraṇaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo lajjādi, anubhāvo’ññavikriyā.
anya-e0812n0:2606: Gabbo abhimāno. Vibhāvossa issariyādi, anubhāvo avajānanādi.
anya-e0812n0:2607: Apamāro gāharukkhādīhi gāharukkhapatanādīhi (?), bhūpātādayo ettha anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2608: Amariso akkhamatā. Vibhāvo assāvamānanādi, sirokampanatajjanādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2609: Mado pamādukkaṃso. Tassa vibhāvo pānaṃ, calamānaṅgavacogatihāsādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2610: Mati kaṅkhacchedo. Upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhavikāsādi ettha anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2611: Asamekkhitakāritā ummādo. Tassa vibhāvo sannipātagahaṇādi, aṭṭhānaruditagītahāsādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2615: Capalatā rāgadosādīhi, sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo. Byādhi pākaṭo.
anya-e0812n0:2616_0: Ye vā panaññe idha niddiṭṭhā cittavuttivisesāpi saṃvijjanti sukhumabhedā, tesu keci
anya-e0812n0:2616_1: vuttesvantogadhā honti. Yathā hi icchāsabhāvā sabbe kāmā ratiyaṃ antogadhā, tathā
anya-e0812n0:2616_2: dosappakārā kodhā marisaissādīsvantogadhā, dukkhasabhāvā sokasamabyādhigilāni visādādīsvantogadhā.
anya-e0812n0:2616_3: Pītyādayo sukhasabhāvā hariseti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu bhayā tāso añño, saṅkā tathā amariso.
anya-e0812n0:2616_4: Tasmā issā, tathā gilānito samo, niddāya suttaṃ, ussukā capalatā, tathā mohā palayo
anya-e0812n0:2617_0: 344. Idāni te byabhicārībhāve sarūpena dasseti “nibbedo”iccādinā. Nibbedo attanindāsaṅkhato
anya-e0812n0:2617_1: ca, takkasaṅkā ca, samadhitijaḷatā parisamo santosalakkhaṇā dhiti jaḷatā ca, dīnatuggālasattaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2617_2: dīnabhāvadāruṇabhāvaalasabhāvā ca, suttaṃ sayanañca, tāso cittakkhobho ca, gilānaparimadditabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2617_4: ca, gabbo abhimāno ca, apamāro ca, amarisamadamatummādamohā akkhantipamādādhikkā
anya-e0812n0:2617_5: kaṅkhacchedaummādamohā ca, vibodho pabodho ca, niddāvegā niddā ca, āvegasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n0:2617_6: sambhamo ca, sabiḷaṃ lajjāsahitaṃ maraṇasacapalābyādhi maraṇañca cāpalyasahitā byādhi
anya-e0812n0:2617_7: ceti. Ete tettiṃsa byabhicārībhāvā nāma honti. Takko ca saṅkā ceti ca, samo ca dhiti
anya-e0812n0:2617_8: ca jaḷatā ceti ca, dīnatā ca uggo ca alasattañcāti ca, ussukañcahariso ca sati ca
anya-e0812n0:2617_9: issā ca visādo ca abahitthā ceti ca, amariso ca mado ca mati ca ummādo ca moho ceti
anya-e0812n0:2617_10: ca, niddā ca āvego ceti ca, saha biḷāya vattatīti ca, saha capalena cāpalyena vattatīti
anya-e0812n0:2617_11: ca, sacapalo ca so byādhiceti ca, maraṇañca sacapalabyādhi ceti ca vākyaṃ. Maraṇasacapalābyādhīti
anya-e0812n0:2617_12: samāhāradvando. Tasmā “sabiḷa”nti padaṃ etassa visesanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n0:2618_0: Lokasabhāvassa anekavidhattā ekoyeva vīraraso ussāhavatā vīrarasākārena assādanīyo
anya-e0812n0:2618_1: hoti, soyeva bhīrunā bhayākārena assādanīyo hoti. Tasmā ekekassa rasassa ime bahū
anya-e0812n0:2618_2: byabhicārino vaṇṇetabbā honti. Evaṃ sati anekādhippāyako loko tesu kiñci assādeti.
anya-e0812n0:2618_3: Evaṃ sati bandho sabbajanassa kanto hoti. Tassaṃ bhāvavaṇṇanāyaṃ yasmā māretumāgacchantānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2618_4: sattūnaṃ dassanamekameva taṅkhaṇe janādhippāyato bhijjitvā pakatibhīrūnaṃ purisānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2618_5: bhayassa ca yuddhalolassa ussāhanassa ca kāraṇaṃ hoti. Evaṃ naṭena hasanatthaṃ katavikatamābharaṇañca
anya-e0812n0:2618_6: tādisakiriyā ca uttānapakatikānaṃ purisānaṃ ṭhāyīhāsassa ca gambhīrapakatikānaṃ byabhicārīhāsassa
anya-e0812n0:2618_7: ca hetu bhaveyya. Tasmā bhāve vaṇṇentena kavinā ocityabhaṅgamakatvā sakkaccamocityaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2618_8: sajjetvā bhāvappakāsakāni savibhāvānubhāvakavivacanāni vaṇṇetabbāni. Ettha bhāvāvabodhakavibhāvādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2618_9: jānitabbattā tehi tehi bhāvehi saddhiṃ evaṃ veditabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2619_0: Tesu bhāvesu attāvamānanalakkhaṇo nibbedo. Itthīnaṃ, hīnānaṃ hīnācārānaṃ (ka.) vā
anya-e0812n0:2619_1: uppajjati ce, dāliddiyaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvo nāma, yogīnaṃ ce, tathāvabodho ālambaṇavibhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:2620: Vitakkassa sandeho uddīpanavibhāvo nāma, sirokampādikaṃ anubhāvo nāma.
anya-e0812n0:2621: Saṅkāya viruddhappavatti uddīpanavibhāvo, kampādiko anubhāvo. Upari “vibhāvo”ti vutte ālambaṇuddīpanesu dvīsu yaṃ yujjati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2622: Khedalakkhaṇassa samassa gamanādikaṃ vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2623: Santosalakkhaṇāya dhitiyā ñāṇādi vibhāvo, bhogesu alolabhāvādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2624: Ayoggatālakkhaṇāya jaḷatāya iṭṭhāniṭṭhānaṃ ajānanādi vibhāvo, vivaṭanayanehi abhimukhavilokanatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2625: Cittassanittejalakkhaṇāya dīnatāya duggatatādi vibhāvo, malinavatthatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2628: Sayanasaṅkhātassa suttassa niddādi vibhāvo, assādādi anubhāvo. Ettha assādanaṃ nāma seyyasukhapassasukhādikaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2629: Cittakkhobhasaṅkhātassa tāsassa gajjitādi vibhāvo, gajjitaṃ nāma bhayajanakavacanaṃ. Kopena kampanā anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2630: Pīḷāsaṅkhātassa gilānassa āyāsapipāsādi vibhāvo, dubbaṇṇatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2631: Anurūpakālassa anolokanassa ussukkassa rammavatthudassanicchādi vibhāvo, turitatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2632: Cetopasādalakkhaṇassa harisassa maṅgalakīḷādi vibhāvo, santosavacanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2633: Saraṇalakkhaṇāya satiyā saññāṇadassanādi vibhāvo, bhamukkhepādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2634: Parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya dujjanabhāvagabbādi vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādi anubhavo.
anya-e0812n0:2635: Khedalakkhaṇassa visādassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhikāriyabyāpattiādi vibhāvo, manosantāpādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2636: Ākārasaṃvaraṇalakkhaṇāya, rasasabhāvapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya vā abahitthayalajjādi vibhāvo, tadaññakriyākaraṇaṃ, adhomukhakaraṇaṃ, pādehi bhūmikhaṇanantiādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2637: Cintāya iṭṭhatthālābhādī vibhāvo, makulitanayanādi adhokhittacakkhādi vā anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2640: Akkhamalakkhaṇassa amarisassa avamānanādi vibhāvo, sirokampanatajjanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2641: Pamādādhikkalakkhaṇassa madassa santosapānaṃ vibhāvo, kampamānahatthapādavacanagamanahāsādī anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2642: Kaṅkhācchedanalakkhaṇāya matiyā upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhasantosādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2643: Anupaparikkhakāritālakkhaṇassa ummādassa sannipātajjarayakkhādi vibhāvo, akāraṇarodanahasanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2644: Muyhanalakkhaṇassa mohassa adhikabhayādi vibhāvo, sabhāvānavabodhanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2645: Niddāpagamasaṅkhātassa vibodhassa kālapariṇāmādi ālokasaraṇādi vā vibhāvo, akkhimaddanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2646: Manosampīḷanalakkhaṇāya niddāya kassaci acintanaakaraṇādi vibhāvo, akkhipidahanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2647: Bhayāgamanalakkhaṇassa āvegassa paccatthikadassanādi vibhāvo, utrāsakampādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2648: Lajjālakkhaṇāya biḷāya durācārādi vibhāvo, adhomukhatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2650: Cāpallassa rāgadosādi vibhāvo, attano sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2651: Byādhiyā vātapittādīnaṃ ussadabhāvādi vibhāvo, nitthunanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2652_0: Imasmiṃ subodhālaṅkāre adassitasukhumabhedā aññāpi cittavuttivisesā santi, tesu icchāsabhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2652_1: sabbe bhedā kāmaratiyañca, dosapakārā kodhaamarisaissādīsu ca, dukkhasabhāvā sokasamabyādhigilānavisādādīsu
anya-e0812n0:2652_2: ca, pitiādayo harise ca antogadhāti veditabbā. Evaṃ samānānaṃ saṅgahe satipi tāsato
anya-e0812n0:2652_3: bhayassa ca, saṅkāya amarissa ca, amarisato issāya ca, gilānato samassa ca, niddāya
anya-e0812n0:2652_4: suttassa ca, ussukkato capalatāya ca, mohato vakkhamānapalayassa ca pākaṭavisesena
anya-e0812n0:2657_1: attā cittaṃ tato pabhavaṃ uppannaṃ yaṃ, taṃ sattaṃ nāma. Tena sattena upapāditā nibbattitā
anya-e0812n0:2657_2: thambhādayo sāttikā vuccante. Te ca puna anubhāvāpi bhavanti thambhādibhāvasaṃsūcanasabhāvavikārarūpattā.
anya-e0812n0:2657_4: te sāttikā visuṃ puthageva bhāvā bhavanti, vuttanayena cittabhavattavirūpattā tesanti.
anya-e0812n0:2658_2: nāma hoti. Tena lābhālābhādīsu ekākārassa hetunā thirabhāvena upapāditā nipphāditā
anya-e0812n0:2658_3: thambhādayo sāttikā nāma bhavanti. Te sāttikā anubhāvattepi cittākārasaṅkhātathambhādipakāsanasabhāvavikārasarūpattā
anya-e0812n0:2658_4: attano anubhāvatte satipi visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti yathāvutta “cittavuttivisesā tu, bhāvayanti
anya-e0812n0:2658_5: rase yato”tiādinā bhāvā nāma hontīti. Ime sāttikābhāvānubhāvavasena duvidhā honti.
anya-e0812n0:2658_6: Samāhito ca so attā ceti ca, tato pabhavamiti ca, santo upasanto ca so attā ceti
anya-e0812n0:2658_7: ca, sattato bhavantīti ca, sattena uppāditāti ca, anubhāvānaṃ bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2665: 346. Te dasseti “thambho”iccādinā. Ettha thambho avissarakāyacittatā. Palayo assāsapassāsamattāvaseso suttāvatthāsabhāvo niddāpabhavo. Subyattalakkhaṇā sesā.
anya-e0812n0:2666_0: 346. Idāni sāttike dasseti “thambho”iccādinā. Thambho kāyacittānaṃ avisarabhāvasaṅkhāto
anya-e0812n0:2666_2: romuggamo ca tathā evaṃ sedassuvepathu ca bhayādīhi uppajjamānadāho ca santosādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2666_3: uppajjamānaassu ca kampā ca vevaṇṇiyaṃ virūpatā ca vissaratā virūpasaddatā cāti ete
anya-e0812n0:2666_4: aṭṭha sāttikā bhāvā nāma honti. Romānaṃ añco uggamoti ca, palayo ca romañco ceti
anya-e0812n0:2666_5: ca, vepanaṃ kampanamiti ca, sedo ca assu ca vepathu cāti ca, virūpo vaṇṇo asseti
anya-e0812n0:2666_6: ca, tassa bhāvoti ca, virūpo saro asseti ca, tassa bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2672: 347. Na kevalaṃ vuttāyeva byabhicārino, ratyādayopīti āha “yadā”iccādi. Bhavanti byabhicārinoti yathāyogaṃ yathāsambandhaṃ byabhicārino hontīti attho. Sesaṃ subodhaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2673_0: 347. Idāni nibbedādayo viya ratihāsādayopi kismiñci kāle byabhicārinopi hontīti dasseti
anya-e0812n0:2673_1: “yadā” iccādinā. Ratyādayo ratihāsādayo bhāvā nava ṭhāyībhāvā yadā ṭhitisīlā na honti
anya-e0812n0:2673_2: ce virodhīhi tehi tehi bhāvantarehi byavahitattā sabhāvato ṭhitisabhāvā yadi na honti,
anya-e0812n0:2673_3: tadā te bhāvā ratyādayo sabbepi byabhicārino bhavantīti. Yathāsakaṃ byabhicāritānurūpavibhāvānubhāvānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2673_4: yogānurūpena byabhicārībhāvā honti. Ratiādi yesaṃ hāsādīnamiti ca, ṭhiti sīlaṃ yesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2679_0: 348. Idāni vibhāvānubhāve dasseti “vibhāvo”iccādinā. Tesaṃ ratyādīnaṃ bhāvānaṃ uppattiyā,
anya-e0812n0:2679_1: tathā uddīpane ca kāraṇaṃ ālambaṇauddīpanavasena duvidho vibhāvo nāma. Tattha ālambaṇavibhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2679_2: kantādi, uddīpanavibhāvo candādi. Tesaṃ bodhako ñāpako kāyiko ca vācasiko ca byāpāro
anya-e0812n0:2680_0: 348. Idāni vibhāvānubhāve dasseti “vibhāvo”iccādinā. Tesaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2680_1: uppattiyā ca tathā uddīpane ca uppannānaṃ dīpane ca kāraṇaṃ ālambaṇauddīpanavasena
anya-e0812n0:2680_2: duvidho hetu vibhāvo nāma, tesaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ bodhako kāyikavācasiko yo siyā naṭakavīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2680_3: byāpāro atthi, ayaṃ anubhāvoti īritoti. Visesena bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti vibhāvo. Anubhāveti
anya-e0812n0:2680_4: bodhetīti anubhāvo. Ettha vibhāvo nāma rativisaye naranārīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvo,
anya-e0812n0:2680_5: candarammadesādi uddīpanavibhāvo ceti duvidho. Hāsādīnampi duvidhavibhāvaṃ yathārahaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2680_6: yojetabbaṃ. Anubhāvo nāma ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāvānaṃ pakāsakavācasikabyāpārasaṅkhātakavipayogo
anya-e0812n0:2680_7: ca kāyikapayogabhūto naṭānaṃ abhinayasaṅkhāto taṃtaṃbhāvasarūpanirūpako ceti duvidho byāpāro.
anya-e0812n0:2684_1: sañjāta”miti vutte sokā ānandā rogā ceti ko nāma sakkoti kāraṇaṃ nicchituṃ, cittavuttivisesañca
anya-e0812n0:2684_2: bhāvaṃ vinā vibhāvānubhāvaṃ kavi vaṇṇetuṃ naṭobhinetuṃ sāmajjiko vā viññātuṃ ko sakkotīti
anya-e0812n0:2684_3: dassetumāha “neka”iccādi. Nekahetuṃ bahuhetuṃ manovuttivisesañca bhāvaṃ vibhāvituṃ
anya-e0812n0:2684_4: pakāsetuṃ vibhāvānubhāvā vuttalakkhaṇā bandhane sabhāvanirūpakapade phuṭaṃ vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n0:2685_0: 349. “Devadattassa cakkhūni assupuṇṇānī”ti vutte sokena santosena rogena vāti yathā
anya-e0812n0:2685_1: assukāraṇakathanaṃ vinā na jānāti, evaṃ cittassa pavattisaṅkhātā ratihāsādayo te
anya-e0812n0:2685_2: te bhāvā attano patītiyānurūpaṃ vibhāvānubhāvakathanaṃ vinā kavīhi vaṇṇetabbā, naṭehi
anya-e0812n0:2685_3: dassetabbā, sabbhehi assādanīyā natthīti ṭhāyīādīnaṃ vaṇṇanameva kātabbanti idāni
anya-e0812n0:2685_4: anusāsento āha “neka”iccādi. Nekahetuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāvānaṃ uppatyādo ālambaṇavibhāvādibahukāraṇavantaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2685_5: manovuttivisesaṃ bhāvañca cittassa pavattivisesasaṅkhātabhāvañca vibhāvituṃ pakāsetuṃ
anya-e0812n0:2685_6: vibhāvānubhāvā anantaraniddiṭṭhā bandhane rasabhāvappakāsane phuṭaṃ pakāsaṃ katvā
anya-e0812n0:2685_7: vaṇṇiyā kavinā vaṇṇanīyā hontīti. Na ekoti ca, so hetu asseti ca, manaso vuttīti
anya-e0812n0:2685_8: ca, tāya visesoti ca, vibhāvo ca anubhāvo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2689_0: 350. Idāni te bhāvā lokasabhāvānatikkamena vibhāvādīhi vaṇṇanīyāti āha “savibhāve”ccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2689_1: Saha vibhāvehi savibhāvā, te ca te anubhāvā ca, tehi. Yathārahanti attano sambandhīnaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2690_0: 350. Idāni vibhāvānubhāve nissāya vaṇṇanīyā te bhāvā lokasabhāvamanatikkamma kātabbāti
anya-e0812n0:2690_1: anusāsanto āha “savibhāvā”iccādi. Lokarūpānugāminā lokavohāramanuvattamānena te te
anya-e0812n0:2690_2: bhāvā ṭhāyībhāvādayo tayo yathocityaṃ ocityānurūpaṃ savibhāvānubhāvehi vibhāvasahitehi
anya-e0812n0:2690_3: anubhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi yathārahaṃ tehi tehi bhāvehi sambandhīnaṃ vibhāvādīnaṃ vasena
anya-e0812n0:2690_4: anurūpato vaṇṇanīyā vaṇṇetabbā hontīti. Vibhāvehi saha ye vattantīti ca, te ca te
anya-e0812n0:2690_5: anubhāvā ceti ca, anatikkamma arahanti ca, anatikkamma ocityamiti ca, lokassa rūpaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2690_6: sarūpamiti ca, taṃ anugacchati sīlenāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n0:2694_0: 351. Sāttikā kathaṃ vaṇṇanīyāti āha “citte”ccādi. Cittassa vuttiviseso yesaṃ, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2694_1: bhāvo, tasmā mānasā manasi bhavā sāttikā aṅgato sarīrato bahinissaṭehi niggatehi
anya-e0812n0:2694_2: sedādīhi anubhāvehi vaṇṇanīyā, na pana sedasalilameva bhāvoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2695_0: 351. Evaṃ sāmaññena bhāvavaṇṇanakkamaṃ dassetvā idāni visesena sāttikabhāvavaṇṇanā
anya-e0812n0:2695_1: īdisāti dasseti “citta”iccādinā. Cittavuttivisesattā cittassa pavattivisesattā mānasā
anya-e0812n0:2695_2: citte bhavā sāttikābhāvā aṅgato sarīrato bahinissaṭasedādianubhāvehi bahinikkhantasedādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2695_3: anubhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi vaṇṇiyā vaṇṇanīyā hontīti, aṅgato bahi nissaṭanti visesanena
anya-e0812n0:2695_4: visiṭṭhabhūtasedādīnameva bhāvānubhāvattaṃ vinā kevalaṃ sedādayo vuttā samānā bhāvādayo
anya-e0812n0:2695_5: nāma na hontīti adhippāyo. Cittassa vuttīti ca, sā eva viseso yesaṃ sāttikānamiti
anya-e0812n0:2695_6: ca, tesaṃ bhāvoti ca, manasi bhavāti ca, sedo ādi yesaṃ kheḷādīnamiti ca, nissaṭā
anya-e0812n0:2695_7: niggatā ca te sedādayo ceti ca, te eva anubhāvāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2700_0: 352. Idāni “rasassādāya sādhūna”nti vuttattā rase niddisanto āha “sāmajjikāna”miccādi.
anya-e0812n0:2700_1: Bandhassa attho, tadanussaranti manobhāvanāvasenāti bandhatthānusārino, tesaṃ sāmajjikānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2700_2: sabbhānaṃ manasi yo ānando, ayaṃ lokamadhurādiraso viya bandhe siṅgārādi raso nāma
anya-e0812n0:2700_3: īrito taññūhi rasaññūhi. Kathamityāha “rasīyatī”ti, assādīyatīti attho. Kiñca? Yathā
anya-e0812n0:2700_4: nānābyañjanasaṅkhatamannaṃ bhuñjamānā rase assādiyanti sumānasā purisā santosañcādhigacchanti,
anya-e0812n0:2700_5: tathā nānābhinayabyañjite vācaṅgasatthopete ṭhāyībhāve assādenti sumānasāpekkhakā,
anya-e0812n0:2701_0: 352. Idāni “rasassādāya sādhūna”nti vatvā uddiṭṭhakkamena sampattaṃ rasaṃ dasseti
anya-e0812n0:2701_2: sāmajjikānaṃ sabbhānaṃ citte bhavo yo ānando santoso atthi, ayaṃ loke madhurādiraso
anya-e0812n0:2701_3: viya assādanīyo hotīti atthayuttena “rasīyatī”ti iminā vacanatthena raso nāmāti taññūhirasaññūhi
anya-e0812n0:2701_4: īrito kathitoti. Samajjāyaṃ niyuttāti ca, bandhassa atthoti ca, taṃ anussarantīti
anya-e0812n0:2701_5: ca, taṃ jānantīti ca vākyaṃ. Yathā nānābyañjanehi abhisaṅkhatamāhāraṃ paribhuñjantā
anya-e0812n0:2701_6: sattā lavaṇambilādayo te te rase assādeyyuṃ, santuṭṭhā ca bhaveyyuṃ, evameva nānappakāraabhinayehi
anya-e0812n0:2701_7: pakāsitavaṇṇanāya aṅgabhūtehi anurūpehi satthehi yutte ṭhāyībhāve issādirahitapaññavantā
anya-e0812n0:2701_8: assādenti, tasmā ime ṭhāyībhāvā naṭābhinayehi byañjitattā ca sabbhānaṃ santosasaṅkhatarasassa
anya-e0812n0:2708: 353. Ṭhāyīnameva rasattāpattimāha “savibhāve”ccādinā. Ṭhāyeva soti so yathāvutto raso ṭhāyībhāvoyeva, nāññoti attho.
anya-e0812n0:2709_1: So raso anantaraniddiṭṭho savibhāvānubhāvehi tesaṃ tesaṃ ṭhāyīnaṃ anurūpehi vibhāvasahitehi
anya-e0812n0:2709_3: karaṇabhūtehi assādiyattaṃ ānīyamāno kavino sāmatthiyā pāpuṇiyamāno ṭhāyeva ṭhāyībhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2709_4: evāti kāriyopacārena raso nāmāti veditabboti. Saha bhāvehi pavattantīti ca, savibhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2709_5: ca te anubhāvā ceti ca, sāttikā ca byabhicārino ceti ca, assādiyassa bhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2713: 354. Tesaṃ nāmavasena vibhāgamāha “siṅgāre”ccādinā. Ṭhāyīnanukkamāti “ratihāsā ca soko cā”tiādinā vuttānaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā, paṭipāṭiyāti attho.
anya-e0812n0:2714_0: 354. Rasāvatthāsampattaratihāsādīnaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ idāni kamena nāmantaraṃ dasseti
anya-e0812n0:2714_1: “siṅgāra”iccādinā. Ṭhāyīnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ ratihāsādiṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā paṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0812n0:2714_2: siṅgārahassakaruṇā siṅgāro hasso karuṇā ca ruddavīrabhayānakā ruddo vīro bhayānako
anya-e0812n0:2714_3: ca bībhacchabbhutasantā ca bibhaccho abbhuto santo ceti nava rasā nāma hontīti. Siṅgāraraso
anya-e0812n0:2714_4: hassarasotiādinā rasasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Siṅgāro ca hasso ca karuṇā ceti ca
anya-e0812n0:2714_5: viggaho. Sesesupi liṅgasamāsā imeyeva. Ime siṅgārādīnaṃ ratyādīhi anaññattā upari
anya-e0812n0:2720_0: 355. Sokādirūpokaruṇādi kathaṃ raso siyāti āha “dukkhe”ccādi. Vessantarassa puttadāraviyogā
anya-e0812n0:2720_1: karuṇā sokarūpo dukkhameva ahosi, sampati pana sotūnaṃ sabbhānaṃ ānandoyevāti etthādhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2721_0: 355. Heṭṭhā vuttaraso santosova, sokakodhādilakkhaṇo karuṇāruddādiko kathaṃ raso
anya-e0812n0:2721_2: niddiṭṭho dukkharūpe dukkhalakkhaṇe karuṇādike karuṇāruddādike visaye kathaṃ bhaveyyāti
anya-e0812n0:2721_3: ce, nesa doso hi tatheva vessantarassa bodhisattassa soko puttadāravirahato jātasoko
anya-e0812n0:2721_4: sotūnaṃ idāni suṇantānaṃ sabbhānaṃ ānando siyā ānandassa kāraṇattā kāriyopacārena
anya-e0812n0:2721_5: santoso nāma bhaveyyāti. Vattuno sāmatthiyā karuṇārasādikaṃ pāpetvā pakāsiyamānassa
anya-e0812n0:2721_6: sokādikassa dukkharūpena ṭhitattā suṇantānaṃ pīti uppādiyatevāti adhippāyo. Dukkhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2721_7: rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassa karuṇādinoti ca, karuṇā ādi yassa ruddādinoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2727_1: dassitā. “Yuvāna”nti iminā ālambaṇavibhāvo. Itthī hi purisassa, puriso itthiyā ālambaṇavibhāvo.
anya-e0812n0:2728_0: 356. Idāni siṅgārādināmake teratyādike kamena niddisati “ramma”iccādinā. Rammadesakalākālavesādipaṭisevanā
anya-e0812n0:2728_3: imesaṃ diṭṭhasutamutādīsu diṭṭhādimattamakatvā paññāya tena tenākārena punappunānubhavanena
anya-e0812n0:2728_5: purisānaṃ pamodo abhiramaṇavasena santoso pīti rati ruccate ruccanato “ratī”ti vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2728_6: Imasmiṃ pakkhe rakāro sandhijo. Deso ca kalā ca kālo ca veso ceti ca, te ādayo yesamiti
anya-e0812n0:2728_7: ca, rammā ca te desa…pe… vesādayo ceti ca, tesaṃ paṭi punappunaṃ sevanamiti ca, añño
anya-e0812n0:2728_8: ca añño ceti ca, tesu rattāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2734_1: ye saṅkāussukkādayo bhāvā taṃbyañjakā tadanurūpā anubhāvā ca ayogādike siṅgāre yathā
anya-e0812n0:2734_2: yathā yuñjanti, tādisiyāva yuttiyā nibandhā naṃ ratiṃ samposayanti, soyevamevaṃ posito
anya-e0812n0:2734_3: siṅgāro nāma raso sampajjate. Sopi tidhāti sambandho. Tattha ayogo nāma pubbe asaṅgatānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2734_5: sileso vippayogo. Balavakāmāvesavisesānaṃ kāmīnaṃ dassanādisamañjanaṃ sambhogo.
anya-e0812n0:2735_0: 357. Idāni ratiyā puṭṭhakāraṇaṃ puṭṭhapayogañca dasseti “yutyā”iccādinā. Te bhāvānubhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2735_1: niddiṭṭhabyabhicārībhāvesu ratyānurūpabyabhicārībhāvo tappakāsako anubhāvo ceti ime
anya-e0812n0:2735_2: dve yutyā hetubhūtāya ayogavippayogasambhogasaṅkhatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ siṅgārānaṃ anukūlatthena
anya-e0812n0:2735_3: ratiyā viruddhattā ālasiyauggajigucchādike parivajjetvā saṅkāussukkādīnaṃ ratyānukūlabhāvānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2735_4: vasena yathāyogaṃ nibandhā kavīhi bandhā naṃ ratiṃ posayanti yathā tappakāsanena
anya-e0812n0:2735_5: pūrenti sajjenti, evaṃ sajjito ratisiṅgāro nāma raso hoti. Sopi sāmaññena niddiṭṭhasiṅgārarasopi
anya-e0812n0:2735_6: ayogavippayogasambhogānaṃ siṅgārānaṃ vasā bhedena tidhā bhavatīti. Tattha ayogo nāma
anya-e0812n0:2735_7: pubbe aññamaññasaṅgamarahitānaṃ abhinavānurāgabalena saṅgamaṃ patthentānaṃ thīpumānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2735_8: asaṅgamo. Vippayogo nāma saṅgamātisayena viruḷhapemānaṃ thīpumānaṃ aññamaññavisileso.
anya-e0812n0:2735_9: Sambhogo nāma balavakāmataṇhāvisesavasena yuttānaṃ kāminikāmukānaṃ aññamaññaṃ dassanādiassādo.
anya-e0812n0:2735_10: Bhāvo ca anubhāvo ceti ca, ayogo ca vippayogo ca sambhogo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2736_1: tapodhanānaṃ aññarasāvabodhane payojanābhāvepi lokiyesu tesu tesu vohāresu asammohatthaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2736_4: tassa tassa lakkhiyassa mukhamattaṃ dassetabbaṃ hoti. Heṭṭhā “rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2736_6: bhāvābhāsassa, vibhāvābhāsassa, anubhāvābhāsassa ca ñātabbattā siṅgārarasassa lakkhiyamevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2741_0: Gītassarena hatthīnaṃ gītikāya piyattā gītikādhaninā upakaḍḍhiya attano samīpaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā
anya-e0812n0:2741_1: nettarasmibandhaṃ nettasaṅkhātahatthācariyassa rajjunā bandhaṃ karaggahena hatthaggāhena
anya-e0812n0:2741_2: soṇḍaggahaṇena vivasañca apagataicchācāraṃ paravasaṃ karaṃ iva hatthaṃ iva gītassarena
anya-e0812n0:2741_3: attano līlopetagītikādhaninā upakaḍḍhiya attano samīpaṃ netvā nettarasmibandhaṃ attano
anya-e0812n0:2741_4: nayanakantiyā paṭibandhaṃ karaggahena hatthaggāhena vivasañca apagatadhitiṃ mūḷhaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2741_5: maṃ yā kantā tādisepi dukkare viniyojayi, sā irandatī irandatī nāma nāgamānavikā
anya-e0812n0:2741_6: mayā ajja vidhinā bhāgyena adhigatā laddhāti.
anya-e0812n0:2742_0: Ettha gītassaranettarasmikaraggahasaṅkhatāhi imāhi padāvalīhi uddīpanavibhāvo dassito.
anya-e0812n0:2742_1: Thiyā puriso ca, purisassa thī ca ālambaṇaṃ hotīti “sā irandatī mayā”ti iminā ārammaṇavibhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2742_2: dassito. “Upakaḍḍhiya bandhaṃ vivasa”nti imehi kāmena uddīpitaṭhāyībhāvasaṅkhatā
anya-e0812n0:2742_3: rati dassitā. “Tādisepi dukkare viniyojayī”ti imehi ussāhādikā ca “vidhinā adhigatā
anya-e0812n0:2742_4: mayajjā”ti imehi harisādikā ca byabhicārībhāvā dassitā. Ratiyā viruddhe nibbedaālasiyauggatajigucchādike
anya-e0812n0:2742_6: anurūpaṃ payuttā kavippayogā idha anubhāvā nāma honti. Nāṭakādidassanīyasatthe abhinayo
anya-e0812n0:2742_7: anubhāvo. Rammadesarammakālarammavesādayo tadabhāve ratiyā anuppajjanato sāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n0:2742_8: gamyā bhavantīti evaṃ lakkhaṇānugatalakkhiyapariggāho sabbattha kātabbo. Evaṃ satibandhatthāvabodhakānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2742_9: sabbhānaṃ uppajjamānāyapītiyā kāraṇattā kāriyopacārena eso bandho raso nāma hotīti. Uparipi evameva.
anya-e0812n0:2751_0: 358. “Vikāre”ccādi. Vikārākati desavayādīnaṃ viparīto kesabandhanādi, so ādi yesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2751_1: aññākatyādinaccanādīnaṃ, tehi vibhāvehi hāso cetovikāso, sopi attano sambandhī vā
anya-e0812n0:2751_2: atha parassa sambandhī vā, tattha yo vibhāvasāmatthiyāyevābhibyattiṃ yāti, so attaṭṭho.
anya-e0812n0:2751_3: Yo pana vibhāvadassanā uppannāpi purisassa gambhīrattādinā chādito samāno purisantare
anya-e0812n0:2751_4: hasatyābhibyatto, so paraṭṭho. So hāso niddādīhi byabhicārīhiyeva, anubhāvapakkhe
anya-e0812n0:2751_5: ādisaddena akkhiphandanādayo gahitā. Paripose sati hasso nāma raso siyā. So hasso
anya-e0812n0:2751_6: bhiyyo itthipabhutīnaṃ siyāti sambandho. Ettha pabhutisaddena nīcapakatayo saṅgaṇhanti.
anya-e0812n0:2752_0: 358. Idāni hassarasassa posanākāraṃ dassetumāha “vikāra”iccādi. Vikārākatiādīhi desavayoliṅgānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2752_1: viparītehi kesabandhagatiṭṭhitiādikehi, naccagītaādikehi ca duvidhehi ākatisaṅkhatehi
anya-e0812n0:2752_2: hetubhūtehi attano vā atha parassa vā sambandhī so hāso ceto vikāsalakkhaṇo niddāsamālasyamucchādibyabhicāribhi
anya-e0812n0:2752_4: karaṇabhūtehi paripose sati hasso hasso nāma raso siyā, so hasso bhiyyo itthipabhutīnaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2752_5: nīcapakatīnañca siyāti. Vikārā ca sā ākati ceti ca, so ādi yesanti ca, niddā ca samo
anya-e0812n0:2752_6: ca ālasyañca mucchā ceti ca, te ādi yesaṃ akkhiphandanādīnaṃ anubhāvānanti ca, te
anya-e0812n0:2752_7: ca byabhicārino ceti ca, itthī pabhuti yesaṃ nīcapakatīnanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2764_0: 359-360. Hasse bhedamāha “sita”miccādinā. Iha hasse vikāsīni nayanāni yassa taṃ sitaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2764_1: kiñci ālakkhiyā dijā dantā yassa taṃ hasitaṃ. Evaṃ madhuro saro saddo yassa taṃ vihasitaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2764_2: Aṃsasirokampena saha vattamānaṃ upahasitaṃ, saha jalena assunā vattamānāni akkhīni
anya-e0812n0:2764_3: yassa taṃ apahasitaṃ. Vikkhittāni ito tato pasāritāni aṅgāni yassa taṃ atihasitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2764_4: nāma. Esañca sitādīnaṃ majjhe dve dve hassā ādito paṭṭhāya kamaso yathākkamena jeṭṭhe
anya-e0812n0:2764_5: majjhe adhamepi ca kathitāti sambandho. Purātanehīti viññāyati.
anya-e0812n0:2765_0: 359-360. Idāni hassabhedaṃ dasseti “sita”miccādinā. Iha imasmiṃ hassavisaye vikāsinayanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2765_1: vivaṭanayanaṃ sitaṃ nāma. Kiñci ālakkhiyadijaṃ tu kiñci dissamānadantaṃ, taṃ hasitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2765_2: nāma. Madhurassaraṃ madhuranādaṃ vihasitaṃ nāma. Saṃsasirokampaṃ aṃsasirokampasahitaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2765_3: upahasitaṃ nāma. Sajalakkhi assuvilocanasahitaṃ apahasitaṃ nāma. Vikkhittaṅgaṃ aṭṭhāne
anya-e0812n0:2765_4: pasāraṇavasena vikkhittahatthapādādiavayavavantaṃ atihasitaṃ nāma bhavati. Esaṃ channaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2765_5: kamaso kamena dve dve jeṭṭhe majjhe adhamepi visaye kathitā purātanehi bhāsitāti.
anya-e0812n0:2765_6: Vikāsīni nayanāni asseti ca, kiñci īsakaṃ ālakkhiyā dijā yasseti ca, madhuro saro
anya-e0812n0:2765_7: asseti ca, aṃso ca siro ceti ca, aṃsasiraso kampoti ca, tena saha vattatīti ca, saha
anya-e0812n0:2765_8: jalena vattamānāni akkhīni yasseti ca, anusvarāgamo. Vikkhittāni aṅgāni yasseti ca
anya-e0812n0:2765_9: vākyaṃ. Sitahasitadvayaṃ uttame, vihasitaupahasitadvayaṃ majjhime, apahasitaatihasitadvayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2765_10: adhame vattate. Evaṃ sitādayo anurūpavibhāvādinā payuttā ime rasā’vatthaṃ pāpuṇantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n0:2771_0: Yo purā pubbe dhamme tassa dhammakathane pasanno kaṇṭhamaṇinā api attano anagghakaṇṭhamaṇināpi
anya-e0812n0:2771_1: taṃ pūjesi, so nāgarājā sabhāvaṃ attano adhippāyaṃ gopentiyā api thiyā vacanena itthiyā
anya-e0812n0:2771_2: vacanena asamadhuraṃ tulyarahitaṃ vidhuraṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ hantuṃ vināsanatthaṃ pharuse
anya-e0812n0:2771_3: caṇḍe mayi bhattiṃ akāsīti. Iha ekasmiṃyeva vatthuni nāgarājassa pasādavadhavidhānādiviparītappavatti
anya-e0812n0:2771_4: ālambaṇavibhāvo, paṭhamaṃ anagghapiyavatthūhi pūjitabhāvo ca bodhisattassa atulyabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2771_5: ca itthivacanassa sampaṭicchanabhāvo ca tassādhippāyassa aññātabhāvo ca puṇṇakassa
anya-e0812n0:2771_6: caṇḍabhāvo ceti imehi sabbavacanehi uddīpanavibhāvo dassito. Imehi uddīpitaṭhāyībhāvasaṅkhato
anya-e0812n0:2771_8: byabhicārībhāvā sāttikābhāvā ca evaṃ sāmatthiyena dīpitā. Tadanurūpavibhāvādipakāsakā
anya-e0812n0:2771_9: yathāvuttakavippayogā anubhāvā nāma honti. Hassabhedena majjhime purise vattabbāpi
anya-e0812n0:2780_0: 361. “Soke”ccādi. Aniṭṭhassa puttaviyogādino desanikkaḍḍhanādino patti ca iṭṭhassa
anya-e0812n0:2780_1: dhammassa, dhanādino vā nāso ca tato vibhāvabhūtehi sampanno sokarūpo sokasabhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2780_2: tu karuṇo raso nāma. Tattha uttamānaṃ soko puttaviyogādianiṭṭhuppattito, dhammādiiṭṭhanāsato
anya-e0812n0:2780_3: ca jāyate. Nīcānaṃ tu desanikkaḍḍhanādianiṭṭhuppattito, dhanādiiṭṭhanāsato ca, paresaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2780_4: dhanādināsato tu uttamasseva mahākāruṇikattā, sesaṃ subodhaṃ. Anubhāvo panettha yathocityaṃ nirūpayitabbo.
anya-e0812n0:2781_1: puttaviyogādino, desacāgādino vā aniṭṭhassa uppatti ca sīlādino, dhanādino vā iṭṭhassa
anya-e0812n0:2781_2: kantivatthuno vināso cāti imehi ālambaṇavibhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi uppanno sokarūpo
anya-e0812n0:2781_3: tu sokasabhāvo pana karuṇo karuṇāraso nāma hoti. Tattha karuṇārase ruditapalayatthambhakādayo
anya-e0812n0:2781_4: rudito palayo thambhotiādayo anubhāvā nāma bhavantīti. Thambhādīnaṃ sarūpo heṭṭhā
anya-e0812n0:2781_5: vuttova. Visādaālasyamaraṇacintādayo byabhicārino tasmiṃyeva byabhicārino bhavanti.
anya-e0812n0:2781_6: Iha puttaviyogādianiṭṭhappattiyā ca sīladhammādiiṭṭhanāsanena ca uttamānaṃ soko uppajjati,
anya-e0812n0:2781_7: desacāgādianiṭṭhappattiyā ca dhanādiiṭṭhanāsanena ca nīcānaṃ. Aññesaṃ dhanādivināsanena
anya-e0812n0:2781_8: pana mahākaruṇikattā uttamasseva uppajjati. Tasmiṃ visaye so soko sesānaṃ nuppajjati.
anya-e0812n0:2781_9: Tasmā yathārahaṃ payogo kātabbo. Sokassa rūpo sabhāvoti ca, aniṭṭhassa pattīti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2781_10: iṭṭhassa nāsoti ca, aniṭṭhappatti ca iṭṭhanāso ceti ca, ruditañca palayo ca thambhako
anya-e0812n0:2781_11: ceti ca, te ādi yesamiti ca, visādo ca ālasyañca maraṇañca cintā ceti ca, tā ādi
anya-e0812n0:2781_12: yesamiti ca vākyaṃ. Imassa karuṇārasassa lakkhiyamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ –
anya-e0812n0:2786_0: Yo ekasatarājapurakkhato rājūnaṃ ekasatena parivārito jino iva buddho iva dhammena
anya-e0812n0:2786_1: madhuradhammakathanena āsanaṃ dhammāsanaṃ alaṃkurute sajjeti, lokatilako lokassa
anya-e0812n0:2786_2: piyatāya tilakālaṅkārabhūto so vidhurapaṇḍito yakkhena puṇṇakena ākaḍḍhito hutvā
anya-e0812n0:2786_3: nīto assavālaṃ avalambiya idāni eko kiṃ kuruteti. Ihānītoti dassitapiyavatthuviyogo
anya-e0812n0:2786_4: sokassa ālambaṇavibhāvo hoti. “Ākaḍḍhitekasatarāje”ccādinā sakalena vākyena uddīpanavibhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2786_5: dassito, uddīpitasokasaṅkhātaṭhāyībhāvo ca visādālasyacintādiko byabhicārībhāvo ca
anya-e0812n0:2786_6: ruditapalayathambhakādikā vibhāvādibodhakaanubhāvā ca vākyasāmatthiyena dīpitā honti.
anya-e0812n0:2791_0: 362. “Kodho”iccādi, subodhaṃ. Ettha paṭhamena ādisaddena avikkhepaupahāsādayo vibhāvā
anya-e0812n0:2791_1: gahitā, dutiyena uggasambhamādayo byabhicārino, tatiyena bhūkuṭipuraṇaoṭṭhanippīḷanādayo anubhāvā.
anya-e0812n0:2792_0: 362. Idāni ruddarasassa posanakkamaṃ dasseti “kodho”iccādinā. Kodho macchariyādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2792_1: macchariyaavikkhepaupahāsādīhi ālambaṇādīhi vibhāvehi ca hetubhūtehi tāsamadādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2792_3: anubhāvehi ca karaṇabhūtehi pose sati ruddo nāma raso bhaveti. Macchariyaṃ ādi yesanti
anya-e0812n0:2792_4: ca, tāso ca mado ceti ca, te ādi yesamiti ca, nayanāni ca tāni aruṇāni cāti ca, tesaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2792_5: bhāvoti ca, sā ādi yesamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2798_0: Bho manussabhakkhena yakkhena adhigatosi gahito asi, assassa vālamavalamba vāladhiṃ
anya-e0812n0:2798_1: gahetvā idāneva puraṃ avekkha tuyhaṃ nagaraṃ olokehi, tatheva hi verambhavātamukhacuṇṇitasabbagatto
anya-e0812n0:2798_2: verambhavātassa abhimukhicuṇṇitasakalasarīro macco manusso jīvalokaṃ sattalokaṃ punapi
anya-e0812n0:2798_3: kathaṃ passatīti. Iha macchariyādivibhāvā ca kodhādisaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo ca vākyasāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n0:2798_4: dīpitā honti, aparaddhena tāsamadauggatādibyabhicārībhāvā vibhāvitā honti. Samudāyena
anya-e0812n0:2804_0: 363. “Patāpi”ccādi. Patāpo sattusantāpakārī tejo, vikkamo paramaṇḍalakkamantaṃ, te
anya-e0812n0:2804_1: ādayo yesaṃ balāvikkhepādīnaṃ paṭipuggalagatānaṃ vibhāvānaṃ, tehi jāto ussāho rasattamāpanno
anya-e0812n0:2804_2: vīro rasoti saññito, ayaṃ vīro raṇadānadayāyogā tividho bhave yuddhavīro dānavīro
anya-e0812n0:2804_3: dayāvīroti, te yuddhakaraṇādayo eva tattha anubhāvā bhavanti. Dhitimatiuggatādayo
anya-e0812n0:2805_2: phalabhedo cetiādīhi uppanno ussāho vīroti vīrarasoti saññito kavīhi ñāto, ayaṃ vīraraso
anya-e0812n0:2805_3: raṇadānadayāyogā yuddhacāgakaruṇāyogena hetubhūtena tividho bhave. Te eva raṇadānadayā
anya-e0812n0:2805_4: eva imā anubhāvā nāma honti. Dhitimatyādayo dhitimatiuggatagabbādayo byabhicārino
anya-e0812n0:2805_5: bhāvā hontīti. Yuddhavīradānavīradayāvīravasena vīraraso tividho hoti. Patāpo ca
anya-e0812n0:2805_6: vikkamo ceti ca, te ādi yesamiti ca, raṇo ca dānañca dayā ceti ca, tāhi yogoti ca,
anya-e0812n0:2805_7: tayo vidhā pakārā assāti ca, dhiti ca mati ceti ca, tā ādi yesamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2815_0: Kuveraṃ vessavaṇamahārājaṃ viññāpetvā bodhetvā sumahatimapi kumbhaṇḍasenaṃ atimahantiṃ
anya-e0812n0:2815_1: kumbhaṇḍasenaṃ ekova uttāsetvā bhayaṃ janetvā maṇiratanavaraṃ gahetvā jūte akkhakīḷāyaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2815_2: lakkhaṃ ādhāya ṭhapetvā korabyarājaṃ jetvā raññaṃ satamhā rājasambandhinā satena
anya-e0812n0:2815_3: sacivaratanaṃ amaccaratanaṃ uddhacca uddharitvā etthānetvā suyuvatiratanaṃ sobhanaitthiratanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2815_4: ādiyissaṃ gaṇhissāmi, ettha yathāvuttesu mama ko bhāro atthīti. Ettha “ko mametthatthi
anya-e0812n0:2815_5: bhāro”ti iminā ussāhasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo pakāsito. Etassa uppattiuddīpanesu kāraṇabhūtassa
anya-e0812n0:2815_8: eko”ti ca, “raññaṃ satamhā sacivaratanamuddhaccā”ti ca imehi dhitiuggatagabbādayo
anya-e0812n0:2815_9: ca, “viññāpetvā kuvera”nti ca, “uttāsetvā korabyarāja”nti ca, “etthānetvā iccādayo”ti
anya-e0812n0:2815_10: ca imehi matyādayo ca byabhicārino bhāvā vibhāvitā honti. Imehi vibhāvānubhāvabyabhicārībhāvehi
anya-e0812n0:2815_11: yuddhavīraraso positoti daṭṭhabbo. Imināyeva nayena dānavīrādayo viññātabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2822_0: 364. “Vikāri”ccādi. Vikāri asabhāvappavatto viruddho sano saddo satto ca, te ādayo
anya-e0812n0:2822_1: yesaṃ suññāraññādīnaṃ itthinīcappakatisambhavantānaṃ, vibhāvānaṃ, guruādīnaṃ vā uttamānaṃ,
anya-e0812n0:2822_2: tehi jātassa bhayassa, kittimassa vā ukkaṃso bhayānako nāma raso. Ettha sedakampanapādacalanādayo
anya-e0812n0:2823_1: pakativirahena vikāravantehi viruddhehi asanisaddādisaddehi, rakkhasādisattehi vā
anya-e0812n0:2823_2: vibhāvehi hetubhūtehi sañjāto sābhāviko, kittimo vā bhayapaṭibandho ukkaṃso bhayānakaraso
anya-e0812n0:2823_3: nāma hoti. Ettha bhayānakarasavisaye sedādayo dāhasarīrakampanādayo anubhāvā kāyikavācasikappayogasaṅkhatā
anya-e0812n0:2823_4: anubhāvā honti. Tāsādī byabhicārino tāsasaṅkādayo iha byabhicārībhāvā hontīti. Sano
anya-e0812n0:2823_5: ca satto ceti ca, vikāro etesaṃ atthīti ca, vikārino ca te sanasattā ceti ca, te
anya-e0812n0:2823_6: ādayo yesaṃ suññāraññādīnamiti ca, tehi jātaṃ bhayamiti ca, majjhe padalopo, tassa
anya-e0812n0:2823_7: ukkaṃsoti ca, sedo ādi yesaṃ kampanādīnamiti ca, tāso ādi yesaṃ saṅkādīnamiti ca
anya-e0812n0:2823_8: vākyaṃ. Itthinīcappakatikānaṃ bhayahetu vikārisanasattādi, uttamānaṃ guruādi.
anya-e0812n0:2829_0: Diṭṭhisatthapatanena diṭṭhisallasampātanena paripphurantī kampamānā samantā parisamantato
anya-e0812n0:2829_1: ācakkavāḷanagaṃ cakkavāḷapabbatāvadhi gamitā palāpitā kumbhaṇḍarakkhasacamū kumbhaṇḍarakkhasānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2829_2: senā yaṃ assagataṃ assapiṭṭhe nisinnakaṃ bhoto bhavataṃ tumhākaṃ purī iva puriyā
anya-e0812n0:2829_3: dassanamiva muhuṃ muhuṃ apassi khaṇe khaṇe apassittha, so ahaṃ puṇṇako nāma yakkhoti.
anya-e0812n0:2829_4: Ettha “diṭṭhisatthapatanenā”ti diṭṭhisatthāropanena ca “sa puṇṇako aha”nti iminā
anya-e0812n0:2829_5: ca bhayajananassa hetubhūtaviruddhasattasaṅkhātā vibhāvā niddiṭṭhā, “muhuṃ muhu’mapassī”ti
anya-e0812n0:2829_7: gamitā samantā ācakkavāḷanaga”nti tāsasaṅkādikā byabhicārino bhāvā jotitā. “Paripphurantī”ti
anya-e0812n0:2838_0: 365. “Jigucchā”iccādi. Rudhirantādīhi pūtikimiādīhi virāgato ca jātā jigucchā garahā
anya-e0812n0:2838_1: kamena khobhano ubbegī karuṇāyuto ca bībhaccho bhavati, nāsāvikunanamukhacchadanādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2838_2: anubhāvehi, saṅkāvegādīhi byabhicārīhi ca assa posanaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n0:2839_1: rattantaguṇādīhi ca, pūtyādīhi pūtikimiādīhi ca, virāgato virattabhāvena cāti imehi
anya-e0812n0:2839_2: tīhi vibhāvehi hetubhūtehi uppajjamānā jigucchā kamena rudhirādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vibhāvānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2839_3: paṭipāṭiyā khobhano anavaṭṭhāno asamāhito ubbegī ubbegavā karuṇāyuto sokarūpena sahito
anya-e0812n0:2839_4: cāti evaṃ bībhaccho raso nāma hoti. Nāsāvikunanādīhi nāsasaṅkocanamukhapidahanādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2839_5: anubhāvehi ca saṅkādīhi ca saṅkāāvegādīhi byabhicārībhāvehi ca karaṇabhūtehi assa
anya-e0812n0:2839_6: bībhaccharasassa posanaṃ hotīti. Rudhirādīsu tīsu padesu, khobhanādīsu tīsu ca gamyamānattā
anya-e0812n0:2839_7: avuttopi casaddo yojetabbo, tasmā khobhanādīhi tīhi yuttova bībhaccharaso nāmāti
anya-e0812n0:2839_8: daṭṭhabbo. Rudhiraṃ ādi yesaṃ antādīnamiti ca, pūtiādi yesaṃ kimiādīnamiti ca, ubbego
anya-e0812n0:2839_9: assa bībhacchassa atthīti ca, karuṇena āyutoti ca, nāsāya vikunanaṃ saṅkocanamiti
anya-e0812n0:2839_10: ca, taṃ ādi yesaṃ mukhacchādanādīnamiti ca, saṅkā ādi yesaṃ āvegādīnamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2845_3: littā sīsakapālapātihi sīsakapālasaṅkhātehi sarāvehi vasāmajjaṃ vasāsaṅkhātasuraṃ
anya-e0812n0:2845_4: pure abhimukhe pivantā ye yakkhā siyuṃ, ete yakkhā vidhurena paṇḍitena dhuttā viya
anya-e0812n0:2845_5: nagare surādhuttā viya upekkhitā hontīti. Iha “littā lohitakuṅkumehī”ti ca “uttaṃsīkatapāṇipallavadharā”ti
anya-e0812n0:2845_6: ca “hārīkatantoragā”ti ca imehi cittakkhobhakāraṇabhūto rudhirādivibhāvo ca, “maccakaraṅkakaṅkanaro”ti
anya-e0812n0:2845_7: ca “sīsakapālapātihi vasāmajjaṃ pivantā”ti ca imehi ubbegavantasabhāvassa hetubhūto
anya-e0812n0:2845_8: pūtyādivibhāvo ca pakāsito. Karuṇāyutasabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtavirajjanavibhāvo ca nāsāvikunanādianubhāvo
anya-e0812n0:2845_9: ca saṅkāvegādibyabhicārībhāvo ca bībhacchasaṅkhātaṭhāyībhāvo cāti ime sabbe vākyasāmatthiyena gammāti veditabbā.
anya-e0812n0:2854_0: 366. “Ati”ccādi. Atilokehi lokātivuttīhi māyādibbagehārāmādīhi padatthehi jāto ayaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2854_1: vimhayo cittavikārasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo abbhuto raso nāma. Sedaassusādhuvādaromañcādayo
anya-e0812n0:2854_2: tassa anubhāvā siyuṃ, tāsādayo byabhicārino hontīti.
anya-e0812n0:2855_0: 366. Idāni vimhayarasassa posanakkamaṃ dasseti “ati”iccādinā. Atilokapadatthehi lokaṭṭhitimatikkamma
anya-e0812n0:2855_1: pavattehi māyādibbabhavanaārāmavimānādipadatthehi hetubhūtehi uppajjamāno ayaṃ vimhayo
anya-e0812n0:2855_2: cittabyāpanasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo abbhuto raso abbhutaraso nāma bhave, sedassusādhuvādādayo
anya-e0812n0:2855_3: tassa abbhutarasassa anubhāvā siyuṃ, tāsāvegadhitippaññā ettha abbhutarasavisaye
anya-e0812n0:2855_4: byabhicārino bhāvā hontīti. Atikkantā lokamiti ca, te ca te padatthā ceti ca, sādhuiti
anya-e0812n0:2855_5: vādoti ca, sedo ca assu ca sādhuvādo ceti ca, te ādi yesaṃ romañcādīnamiti ca, tāso
anya-e0812n0:2855_6: ca āvego ca dhiti ca paññā ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2861_0: So vidhurapaṇḍito puṇṇakena yakkhena naṭena iva anekavikāradassanakena nāṭakena viya
anya-e0812n0:2861_3: adhosīsaṃ patanto asantasaṃ evaṃ appatiṭṭhepi anuttasanto taṃ pabbataṃ diṭṭhiyaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0812n0:2861_4: mini pamāṇamakāsi, aho acchariyanti. Ettha bhayahetumhi sati bhītiyā ca tattha parijānanābhāvassa
anya-e0812n0:2861_5: ca lokasabhāvattā tamatikkamma bhayakaraṇe asantāsassa ca diṭṭhiyā pabbataminanassa
anya-e0812n0:2861_6: ca pavattabhāvakathanena lokātikkantapadatthasaṅkhāto vibhāvo “asantasaṃ taṃ mini
anya-e0812n0:2861_7: diṭṭhiyaṭṭhiyā”ti iminā pakāsito. “Aho”ti vacanena, tassa sāmatthiyena ca sādhuvādasedaassuādayo
anya-e0812n0:2872: 367. “Ṭhāyi”ccādi. Mettādisambhavo samo upasamasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo bhavati, tadanurūpehi bhāvānubhāvehi tassa ukkaṃso yassa, so santo nāma raso bhavati, so ca santanisevitoti.
anya-e0812n0:2875_1: mettākaruṇāpītiādivibhāvehi sambhūto samo kāyacittopasamo ṭhāyībhāvo nāma hoti, bhāvādīhi
anya-e0812n0:2875_2: byabhicārībhāvādīhi karaṇabhūtehi, apica tassa samassa anurūpehi byabhicārībhāvānubhāvehi
anya-e0812n0:2875_3: tadukkaṃso tassa ṭhāyībhāvassa ukkaṃsayutto santanisevito sādhūhi sevito santo santaraso
anya-e0812n0:2875_4: nāma hotīti. Mettā ca dayā ca modo ceti ca, te ādayo yesamiti ca, tehi sambhavo yasseti
anya-e0812n0:2875_5: ca, tassa ukkaṃso assa santasseti ca, sataṃ nisevitoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n0:2881_0: Kesarikarīsu sīhahatthīsu entesu api bhiṃsanākārena samīpamāgacchantesupi nāge veṭhayantepi
anya-e0812n0:2881_1: nāgesu sarīraṃ veṭhayantesupi. Jātyāpekkhāyekavacanaṃ, veḷugumbaṃ madagaje viya vicālayati
anya-e0812n0:2881_2: madagaḷitahatthimhi cālente iva yakkhe puṇṇake nagaṃ kāḷāgiripabbataṃ vicālayatipi
anya-e0812n0:2881_3: anekappakāre cālentepi vidhuro paṇḍito santiṃ gatova nibbānaṃ ālambaṇakaraṇavasena
anya-e0812n0:2881_4: sampatto viya phalasamāpattisamāpanno iva atha vā diṭṭhadhammanibbānasaṅkhatanirodhasamāpattisamāpanno
anya-e0812n0:2881_5: viya īsakampi appakampi madhurā bhāvā api madhurasabhāvatopi no cali, nisinnaṭṭhānato
anya-e0812n0:2881_6: pagevāti adhippāyo. Ettha dhāvanarodanakampanādīnaṃ karaṇabhūtaṃ sīhādīnamāgamanaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2881_7: nāgaveṭhanaṃ pabbatakampanantiādīsu vattamānesupi nibbikārattena santiṃ gatoti iminā
anya-e0812n0:2881_8: santarasassa pakatibhūte uddese dassito navamo ṭhāyībhāvo dassito hoti, etassa uppattiuddīpanānaṃ
anya-e0812n0:2881_9: kāraṇabhūtā mettādayāmodādivibhāvā sāmatthiyā dassitā hontīti. Dhitimatisatiādayo
anya-e0812n0:2881_10: tadanurūpabyabhicārībhāvā ca tādisānubhāvā ca “entesu veṭhayante vicālayatī”ti iminā,
